original: RV_08.001.01.1{10} mā cidanyad vi śaṃsata sakhāyo mā riṣaṇyata
analyzed: mā cit anyat vi śaṃsata sakhāyaḥ mā riṣaṇyata

original: RV_08.001.01.2{10} indramitstotā vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute muhurukthā ca śaṃsata
analyzed: indram id stotā vṛṣaṇam sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata

original: RV_08.001.02.1{10} avakrakṣiṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yathājuraṃ gāṃ na carṣaṇīsaham
analyzed: avakrakṣiṇam vṛṣabham yathā ājuram gām na carṣaṇīsaham

original: RV_08.001.02.2{10} vidveṣaṇaṃ saṃvananobhayaṃkaraṃ maṃhiṣṭhamubhayāvinam
analyzed: vidveṣaṇam saṃvanana ubhayaṃkaram maṃhiṣṭham ubhayāvinam

original: RV_08.001.03.1{10} yaccid dhi tvā janā ime nānā havanta ūtaye
analyzed: yat cit hi tvā janāḥ ime nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_08.001.03.2{10} asmākaṃ brahmedamindra bhūtu te 'ha viśvā ca vardhanam
analyzed: asmākam brahma idam indra bhūtu te ha viśvā ca vardhanam

original: RV_08.001.04.1{10} vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścito 'ryo vipo janānām
analyzed: vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścitaḥ ryaḥ vipaḥ janānām

original: RV_08.001.04.2{10} upa kramasva pururūpamā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭhamūtaye
analyzed: upa kramasva puru rūpam ā bhara vājam nediṣṭham ūtaye

original: RV_08.001.05.1{10} mahe cana tvāmadrivaḥ parā śulkāya deyām
analyzed: mahe cana tvām adrivas parā śulkāya deyām

original: RV_08.001.05.2{10} na sahasrāyanāyutāya vajrivo na śatāya śatāmagha
analyzed: na sahasra ayana ayutāya vajrivas na śatāya śatāmagha

original: RV_08.001.06.1{11} vasyānindrāsi me pituruta bhrāturabhuñjataḥ
analyzed: vasyān indra asi me pituḥ uta bhrātuḥ abhuñjataḥ

original: RV_08.001.06.2{11} mātā came chadayathaḥ samā vaso vasutvanāya rādhase
analyzed: mātā came chadayathaḥ samā vaso vasutvanāya rādhase

original: RV_08.001.07.1{11} kveyatha kvedasi purutrā cid dhi te manaḥ
analyzed: kva iyatha kva idasi purutrā cit hi te manaḥ

original: RV_08.001.07.2{11} alarṣi yudhma khajakṛt purandara pra gāyatrā agāsiṣuḥ
analyzed: alarṣi yudhma khaja kṛt purandara pra gāyatrā agāsiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.001.08.1{11} prāsmai gāyatramarcata vāvāturyaḥ purandaraḥ
analyzed: pra asmai gāyatram arcata vāvātuḥ yaḥ purandaraḥ

original: RV_08.001.08.2{11} yābhiḥkāṇvasyopa barhirāsadaṃ yāsad vajrī bhinat puraḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥkāṇvasya upa barhiḥ āsadam yāsat vajrī bhinat puraḥ

original: RV_08.001.09.1{11} ye te santi daśagvinaḥ śatino ye sahasriṇaḥ
analyzed: ye te santi daśagvinaḥ śatinaḥ ye sahasriṇaḥ

original: RV_08.001.09.2{11} aśvāso yete vṛṣaṇo raghudruvastebhirnastūyamā gahi
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ ye te vṛṣaṇaḥ raghudruvaḥ tebhiḥ naḥ tūyamā gahi

original: RV_08.001.10.1{11} ā tvadya sabardughāṃ huve gāyatravepasam
analyzed: ā tu adya sabardughām huve gāyatra vepasam

original: RV_08.001.10.2{11} indraṃ dhenuṃsudughāmanyāmiṣamurudhārāmaraṃkṛtam
analyzed: indram dhenuṃsudughām anya āmiṣam uru dhārā maraṃkṛtam

original: RV_08.001.11.1{12} yat tudat sūra etaśaṃ vaṅkū vātasya parṇinā
analyzed: yat tudat sūraḥ etaśam vaṅkū vātasya parṇinā

original: RV_08.001.11.2{12} vahat kutsamārjuneyaṃ śatakratuḥ tsarad gandharvamastṛtam
analyzed: vahat kutsam ārjuneyam śatakratuḥ tsarat gandharvam astṛtam

original: RV_08.001.12.1{12} ya ṛte cidabhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaḥ ātṛdaḥ

original: RV_08.001.12.2{12} sandhātāsandhiṃ maghavā purūvasuriṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: sandhātā asandhim maghavā purūvasuḥ iṣkartā vihrutam punar

original: RV_08.001.13.1{12} mā bhūma niṣṭyā ivendra tvadaraṇā iva
analyzed: mā bhūma niṣṭyāḥ iva indra tvad araṇāḥ iva

original: RV_08.001.13.2{12} vanāni na prajahitānyadrivo duroṣāso amanmahi
analyzed: vanāni na prajahitāni adrivas duroṣāsaḥ amanmahi

original: RV_08.001.14.1{12} amanmahīdanāśavo 'nugrāsaśca vṛtrahan
analyzed: amanmahi id anāśavaḥ nugrāsaḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.001.14.2{12} sakṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasānu stomaṃ mudīmahi
analyzed: sakṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mudīmahi

original: RV_08.001.15.1{12} yadi stomaṃ mama śravadasmākamindramindavaḥ
analyzed: yadi stomam mama śravat asmākam indram indavaḥ

original: RV_08.001.15.2{12} tiraḥ pavitraṃ sasṛvāṃsa āśavo mandantu tugryāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: tiras pavitram sasṛvāṃsaḥ āśavaḥ mandantu tugryāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.001.16.1{13} ā tvadya sadhastutiṃ vāvātuḥ sakhyurā gahi
analyzed: ā tvā adya sadhastutim vāvātuḥ sakhyuḥ ā gahi

original: RV_08.001.16.2{13} upastutirmaghonāṃ pra tvāvatvadhā te vaśmi suṣṭutim
analyzed: upastutiḥ maghonām pra tvā avatu adhā te vaśmi suṣṭutim

original: RV_08.001.17.1{13} sotā hi somamadribhiremenamapsu dhāvata
analyzed: sotā hi somam adribhiḥ ema enam apsu dhāvata

original: RV_08.001.17.2{13} gavyā vastreva vāsayanta in naro nirdhukṣan vakṣaṇābhyaḥ
analyzed: gavyā vastrā iva vāsayantaḥ id naraḥ nirdhukṣan vakṣaṇābhyaḥ

original: RV_08.001.18.1{13} adha jmo adha vā divo bṛhato rocanādadhi
analyzed: adha jmaḥ adha vā divaḥ bṛhataḥ rocanāt adhi

original: RV_08.001.18.2{13} ayā vardhasva tanvā girā mamā jātā sukrato pṛṇa
analyzed: ayā vardhasva tanvā girā mamā jātā su krato pṛṇa

original: RV_08.001.19.1{13} indrāya su madintamaṃ somaṃ sotā vareṇyam
analyzed: indrāya su madintamam somam sotā vareṇyam

original: RV_08.001.19.2{13} śakra eṇaṃ pīpayad viśvayā dhiyā hinvānaṃ na vājayum
analyzed: śakraḥ eṇam pīpayat viśvayā dhiyā hinvānam na vājayum

original: RV_08.001.20.1{13} mā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācannahaṃ girā
analyzed: mā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācan aham girā

original: RV_08.001.20.2{13} bhūrṇiṃ mṛgaṃ na savaneṣu cukrudhaṃ ka īśānaṃ na yāciṣat
analyzed: bhūrṇim mṛgam na savaneṣu cukrudham kaḥ īśānam na yāciṣat

original: RV_08.001.21.1{14} madeneṣitaṃ madamugramugreṇa śavasā
analyzed: madena iṣitam madam ugram ugreṇa śavasā

original: RV_08.001.21.2{14} viśveṣāṃ tarutāraṃ madacyutaṃ made hi ṣmā dadāti naḥ
analyzed: viśveṣām tarutāram mada cyutam made hi sma dadāti naḥ

original: RV_08.001.22.1{14} śevāre vāryā puru devo martāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: śevāre vāryā puru devaḥ martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.001.22.2{14} sa sunvate castuvate ca rāsate viśvagūrto ariṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: sa sunvate castuvate ca rāsate viśva gūrtaḥ ariṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_08.001.23.1{14} endra yāhi matsva citreṇa deva rādhasā
analyzed: ā indra yāhi matsva citreṇa deva rādhasā

original: RV_08.001.23.2{14} saro na prāsyudaraṃ sapītibhirā somebhiruru sphiram
analyzed: saraḥ na prāsi udaram sapītibhiḥ ā somebhiḥ uru sphiram

original: RV_08.001.24.1{14} ā tvā sahasramā śataṃ yuktā rathe hiraṇyaye
analyzed: ā tvā sahasramā śatam yuktā rathe hiraṇyaye

original: RV_08.001.24.2{14} brahmayujo haraya indra keśino vahantu somapītaye
analyzed: brahma yujaḥ harayaḥ indra keśinaḥ vahantu soma pītaye

original: RV_08.001.25.1{14} ā tvā rathe hiraṇyaye harī mayūraśepyā
analyzed: ā tvā rathe hiraṇyaye harī mayūra śepyā

original: RV_08.001.25.2{14} śitipṛṣṭhā vahatāṃ madhvo andhaso vivakṣaṇasya pītaye
analyzed: śiti pṛṣṭhāḥ vahatām madhvaḥ andhasaḥ vivakṣaṇasya pītaye

original: RV_08.001.26.1{15} pibā tvasya girvaṇaḥ sutasya pūrvapā iva
analyzed: pibā tvasya girvaṇaḥ sutasya pūrva pāḥ iva

original: RV_08.001.26.2{15} pariṣkṛtasya rasina iyamāsutiścārurmadāya patyate
analyzed: pariṣkṛtasya rasinaḥ iyam āsutiḥ cāruḥ madāya patyate

original: RV_08.001.27.1{15} ya eko asti daṃsanā mahānugro abhi vrataiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ asti daṃsanā mahān ugraḥ abhi vrataiḥ

original: RV_08.001.27.2{15} gamat sa śiprī na sa yoṣadā gamad dhavaṃ na pari varjati
analyzed: gamat sa śiprī na sa yoṣadā gamat havam na pari varjati

original: RV_08.001.28.1{15} tvaṃ puraṃ cariṣṇvaṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya saṃ piṇak
analyzed: tvam puram cariṣṇvam vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya sam piṇak

original: RV_08.001.28.2{15} tvambhā anu caro adha dvitā yadindra havyo bhuvaḥ
analyzed: tvambhāḥ anu caraḥ adha dvitā yat indra havyaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: RV_08.001.29.1{15} mama tvā sūra udite mama madhyandine divaḥ
analyzed: mama tvā sūre udite mama madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_08.001.29.2{15} mama prapitveapiśarvare vasavā stomāso avṛtsata
analyzed: mama prapitve apiśarvare vasavā stomāsaḥ avṛtsata

original: RV_08.001.30.1{15} stuhi stuhīdete ghā te maṃhiṣṭhāso maghonām
analyzed: stuhi stuhi id ete gha te maṃhiṣṭhāsaḥ maghonām

original: RV_08.001.30.2{15} ninditāśvaḥ prapathī paramajyā maghasya medhyātithe
analyzed: nindita aśvaḥ prapathī paramajyāḥ maghasya medhyātithe

original: RV_08.001.31.1{16} ā yadaśvān vananvataḥ śraddhayāhaṃ rathe ruham
analyzed: ā yat aśvān vananvataḥ śraddhayā aham rathe ruham

original: RV_08.001.31.2{16} utavāmasya vasunaściketati yo asti yādvaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: uta vāmasya vasunaḥ ciketati yaḥ asti yādvaḥ paśuḥ

original: RV_08.001.32.1{16} ya ṛjrā mahyaṃ māmahe saha tvacā hiraṇyayā
analyzed: yaḥ ṛjrā mahyam māmahe saha tvacā hiraṇyayā

original: RV_08.001.32.2{16} eṣa viśvānyabhyastu saubhagāsaṅgasya svanadrathaḥ
analyzed: eṣa viśvāni abhyastu saubhaga āsaṅgasya svanat rathaḥ

original: RV_08.001.33.1{16} adha plāyogirati dāsadanyānāsaṅgo agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ
analyzed: adha plāyaḥ girati dāsa danya an āsaṅgaḥ agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ

original: RV_08.001.33.2{16} adhokṣaṇo daśa mahyaṃ ruśanto naḷā iva saraso niratiṣṭhan
analyzed: adhokṣaṇaḥ daśa mahyam ruśantaḥ naḷāḥ iva sarasaḥ niratiṣṭhan

original: RV_08.001.34.1{16} anvasya sthūraṃ dadṛśe purastādanastha ūruravarambamāṇaḥ
analyzed: anu asya sthūram dadṛśe purastāt anasthaḥ ūruḥ avarambamāṇaḥ

original: RV_08.001.34.2{16} śaśvatī nāryabhicakṣyāha subhadramarya bhojanaṃ bibharṣi
analyzed: śaśvatī nārī abhicakṣya āha su bhadram arya bhojanam bibharṣi

original: RV_08.002.01.1{17} idaṃ vaso sutamandhaḥ pibā supūrṇamudaram
analyzed: idam vaso sutam andhaḥ piba su pūrṇam udaram

original: RV_08.002.01.2{17} anābhayin rarimā te
analyzed: anābhayin rarimā te

original: RV_08.002.02.1{17} nṛbhirdhūtaḥ suto aśnairavyo vāraiḥ paripūtaḥ
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ dhūtaḥ sutaḥ aśnaiḥ avyaḥ vāraiḥ paripūtaḥ

original: RV_08.002.02.2{17} aśvona nikto nadīṣu
analyzed: aśva ūna niktaḥ nadīṣu

original: RV_08.002.03.1{17} taṃ te yavaṃ yathā gobhiḥ svādumakarma śrīṇantaḥ
analyzed: tam te yavam yathā gobhiḥ svādum akarma śrīṇantaḥ

original: RV_08.002.03.2{17} indra tvāsmin sadhamāde
analyzed: indra tvā asmin sadhamāde

original: RV_08.002.04.1{17} indra it somapā eka indraḥ sutapā viśvāyuḥ
analyzed: indraḥ id soma pāḥ ekaḥ indraḥ suta pāḥ viśvāyuḥ

original: RV_08.002.04.2{17} antardevān martyāṃśca
analyzed: antar devān martyān ca

original: RV_08.002.05.1{17} na yaṃ śukro na durāśīrna tṛprā uruvyacasam
analyzed: na yam śukraḥ na durāśīḥ na tṛpraḥ uru vyacasam

original: RV_08.002.05.2{17} apaspṛṇvate suhārdam
analyzed: apaspṛṇvate suhārdam

original: RV_08.002.06.1{18} gobhiryadīmanye asman mṛgaṃ na vrā mṛgayante
analyzed: gobhiḥ yadi īmanye asmat mṛgam na vrāḥ mṛgayante

original: RV_08.002.06.2{18} abhitsaranti dhenubhiḥ
analyzed: abhitsaranti dhenubhiḥ

original: RV_08.002.07.1{18} traya indrasya somāḥ sutāsaḥ santu devasya
analyzed: trayaḥ indrasya somāḥ sutāsaḥ santu devasya

original: RV_08.002.07.2{18} sve kṣaye sutapāvnaḥ
analyzed: sve kṣaye suta pāvnaḥ

original: RV_08.002.08.1{18} trayaḥ kośāsaḥ ścotanti tisraścamvaḥ supūrṇāḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ kośāsaḥ ścotanti tisraḥ camvaḥ su pūrṇāḥ

original: RV_08.002.08.2{18} samāne adhi bhārman
analyzed: samāne adhi bhārman

original: RV_08.002.09.1{18} śucirasi puruniṣṭhāḥ kṣīrairmadhyata āśīrtaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ asi puru niṣṭhāḥ kṣīraiḥ madhyatas āśīrtaḥ

original: RV_08.002.09.2{18} dadhnā mandiṣṭhaḥ śūrasya
analyzed: dadhnā mandiṣṭhaḥ śūrasya

original: RV_08.002.10.1{18} ime ta indra somāstīvrā asme sutāsaḥ
analyzed: ime te indra somāḥ tīvrāḥ asme sutāsaḥ

original: RV_08.002.10.2{18} śukrā āśiraṃyācante
analyzed: śukrāḥ āśiram yācante

original: RV_08.002.11.1{19} tānāśiraṃ puroḷāśamindremaṃ somaṃ śrīṇīhi
analyzed: tān āśiram puroḷāśam indra imam somam śrīṇīhi

original: RV_08.002.11.2{19} revantaṃ hi tvā śṛṇomi
analyzed: revantam hi tvā śṛṇomi

original: RV_08.002.12.1{19} hṛtsu pītāso yudhyante durmadāso na surāyām
analyzed: hṛtsu pītāsaḥ yudhyante durmadāsaḥ na surāyām

original: RV_08.002.12.2{19} ūdharna nagnā jarante
analyzed: ūdhar na nagnāḥ jarante

original: RV_08.002.13.1{19} revānid revata stotā syāt tvāvato maghonaḥ
analyzed: revān id revataḥ stotā syāt tvāvataḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_08.002.13.2{19} predu harivaḥ śrutasya
analyzed: predu harivas śrutasya

original: RV_08.002.14.1{19} ukthaṃ cana śasyamānamagorarirā ciketa
analyzed: uktham cana śasyamānam agoḥ ariḥ ā ciketa

original: RV_08.002.14.2{19} na gāyatraṃgīyamānam
analyzed: na gāyatram gīyamānam

original: RV_08.002.15.1{19} mā na indra pīyatnave mā śardhate parā dāḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ indra pīyatnave mā śardhate parā dāḥ

original: RV_08.002.15.2{19} śikṣā śacīvaḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: śikṣa śacīvas śacībhiḥ

original: RV_08.002.16.1{20} vayamu tvā tadidarthā indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: vayam u tvā tad id arthāḥ indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_08.002.16.2{20} kaṇvāukthebhirjarante
analyzed: kaṇvā ukthebhiḥ jarante

original: RV_08.002.17.1{20} na ghemanyadā papana vajrinnapaso naviṣṭau
analyzed: na ghemanyadā papana vajrin apasaḥ naviṣṭau

original: RV_08.002.17.2{20} tavedu stomaṃ ciketa
analyzed: tava idu stomam ciketa

original: RV_08.002.18.1{20} ichanti devāḥ sunvantaṃ na svapnāya spṛhayanti
analyzed: ichanti devāḥ sunvantam na svapnāya spṛhayanti

original: RV_08.002.18.2{20} yanti pramādamatandrāḥ
analyzed: yanti pramādam atandrāḥ

original: RV_08.002.19.1{20} o ṣu pra yāhi vājebhirmā hṛṇīthā abhyasmān
analyzed: ā u su pra yāhi vājebhiḥ mā hṛṇīthāḥ abhi asmān

original: RV_08.002.19.2{20} mahāniva yuvajāniḥ
analyzed: mahān iva yuva jāniḥ

original: RV_08.002.20.1{20} mo ṣvadya durhaṇāvān sāyaṃ karadāre asmat
analyzed: mā u su adya durhaṇāvān sāyam karadāre asmat

original: RV_08.002.20.2{20} aśrīra iva jāmātā
analyzed: aśrīraḥ iva jāmātā

original: RV_08.002.21.1{21} vidmā hyasya vīrasya bhūridāvarīṃ sumatim
analyzed: vidma hi asya vīrasya bhūri dāvarīm sumatim

original: RV_08.002.21.2{21} triṣu jātasya manāṃsi
analyzed: triṣu jātasya manāṃsi

original: RV_08.002.22.1{21} ā tū ṣiñca kaṇvamantaṃ na ghā vidma śavasānāt
analyzed: ā tu siñca kaṇvamantam na ghā vidma śavasānāt

original: RV_08.002.22.2{21} yaśastaraṃ śatamūteḥ
analyzed: yaśastaram śatamūteḥ

original: RV_08.002.23.1{21} jyeṣṭhena sotarindrāya somaṃ vīrāya śakrāya
analyzed: jyeṣṭhena sotar indrāya somam vīrāya śakrāya

original: RV_08.002.23.2{21} bharā piban naryāya
analyzed: bharā piban naryāya

original: RV_08.002.24.1{21} yo vediṣṭho avyathiṣvaśvāvantaṃ jaritṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vediṣṭhaḥ a vyathiṣu aśvāvantam jaritṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_08.002.24.2{21} vājaṃ stotṛbhyo gomantam
analyzed: vājam stotṛbhyaḥ gomantam

original: RV_08.002.25.1{21} panyam-panyamit sotāra ā dhāvata madyāya
analyzed: panyampanyamit sotāraḥ ā dhāvata madyāya

original: RV_08.002.25.2{21} somaṃ vīraya śūraya
analyzed: somam vīraya śūraya

original: RV_08.002.26.1{22} pātā vṛtrahā sutamā ghā gaman nāre asmat
analyzed: pātā vṛtrahā sutamā ghā gamat nā āre asmat

original: RV_08.002.26.2{22} ni yamate śatamūtiḥ
analyzed: ni yamate śatamūtiḥ

original: RV_08.002.27.1{22} eha harī brahmayujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam
analyzed: ā iha harī brahma yujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam

original: RV_08.002.27.2{22} gīrbhiḥśrutaṃ girvaṇasam
analyzed: gīrbhiḥśrutam girvaṇasam

original: RV_08.002.28.1{22} svādavaḥ somā ā yāhi śrītāḥ somā ā yāhi
analyzed: svādavaḥ somāḥ ā yāhi śrītāḥ somāḥ ā yāhi

original: RV_08.002.28.2{22} śiprinnṛṣīvaḥ śacīvo nāyamachā sadhamādam
analyzed: śiprin ṛṣīvaḥ śacīvas na ayam achā sadhamādam

original: RV_08.002.29.1{22} stutaśca yāstvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya
analyzed: stutaḥ ca yāḥ tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya

original: RV_08.002.29.2{22} indrakāriṇaṃ vṛdhantaḥ
analyzed: indra kāriṇam vṛdhantaḥ

original: RV_08.002.30.1{22} giraśca yāste girvāha ukthā ca tubhyaṃ tāni
analyzed: giraḥ ca yāḥ te gir vāhaḥ ukthā ca tubhyam tāni

original: RV_08.002.30.2{22} satrā dadhire śavāṃsi
analyzed: satrā dadhire śavāṃsi

original: RV_08.002.31.1{23} evedeṣa tuvikūrmirvājāneko vajrahastaḥ
analyzed: eva id eṣa tuvikūrmiḥ vājān ekaḥ vajra hastaḥ

original: RV_08.002.31.2{23} sanadamṛktodayate
analyzed: sa nadam ṛktā udayate

original: RV_08.002.32.1{23} hanta vṛtraṃ dakṣiṇenendraḥ puru puruhūtaḥ
analyzed: hanta vṛtram dakṣiṇena indraḥ puru puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_08.002.32.2{23} mahān mahībhiḥ śacibhiḥ
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ śacibhiḥ

original: RV_08.002.33.1{23} yasmin viśvāścarṣaṇaya uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca
analyzed: yasmin viśvāścarṣaṇayaḥ uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca

original: RV_08.002.33.2{23} anu ghen mandī maghonaḥ
analyzed: anu gha id mandī maghonaḥ

original: RV_08.002.34.1{23} eṣa etāni cakārendro viśvā yo 'ti śṛṇve
analyzed: eṣaḥ etāni cakāra indraḥ viśvā yaḥ ti śṛṇve

original: RV_08.002.34.2{23} vājadāvā maghonām
analyzed: vāja dāvā maghonām

original: RV_08.002.35.1{23} prabhartā rathaṃ gavyantamapākaccid yamavati
analyzed: prabhartā ratham gavyantam apa akaccit yamavati

original: RV_08.002.35.2{23} ino vasusa hi voḷhā
analyzed: inaḥ hi voḷhā

original: RV_08.002.36.1{24} sanitā vipro arvadbhirhantā vṛtraṃ nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ
analyzed: sanitā vipraḥ arvadbhiḥ hantā vṛtram nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ

original: RV_08.002.36.2{24} satyo 'vitā vidhantam
analyzed: satyaḥ vitā vidhantam

original: RV_08.002.37.1{24} yajadhvainaṃ priyamedhā indraṃ satrācā manasā
analyzed: yajadhva enam priyamedhāḥ indram satrācā manasā

original: RV_08.002.37.2{24} yo bhūt somaiḥ satyamadvā
analyzed: yaḥ bhūt somaiḥ satyamadvā

original: RV_08.002.38.1{24} gāthaśravasaṃ satpatiṃ śravaskāmaṃ purutmānam
analyzed: gātha śravasam sat patim śravaskāmam purutmānam

original: RV_08.002.38.2{24} kaṇvāsogāta vājinam
analyzed: vājinam

original: RV_08.002.39.1{24} ya ṛte cid gās padebhyo dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān
analyzed: yaḥ ṛte cit gāḥ padebhyaḥ dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān

original: RV_08.002.39.2{24} yeasmin kāmamaśriyan
analyzed: ye asmin kāmam aśriyan

original: RV_08.002.40.1{24} itthā dhīvantamadrivaḥ kāṇvaṃ medhyātithim
analyzed: itthā dhīvantam adrivas kāṇvam medhyātithim

original: RV_08.002.40.2{24} meṣo bhūto'bhi yannayaḥ
analyzed: meṣaḥ bhūtaḥ ubhi yat nayaḥ

original: RV_08.002.41.1{24} śikṣā vibhindo asmai catvāryayutā dadat
analyzed: śikṣa vibhindo asmai catvāri ayutā dadat

original: RV_08.002.41.2{24} aṣṭā paraḥ sahasrā
analyzed: aṣṭā paras sahasrā

original: RV_08.002.42.1{24} uta su tye payovṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā
analyzed: uta su tye payaḥ vṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā

original: RV_08.002.42.2{24} janitvanāya māmahe
analyzed: janitvanāya māmahe

original: RV_08.003.01.1{25} pibā sutasya rasino matsvā na indra gomataḥ
analyzed: pibā sutasya rasinaḥ matsva naḥ indra gomataḥ

original: RV_08.003.01.2{25} āpirno bodhisadhamādyo vṛdhe 'smānavantu te dhiyaḥ
analyzed: āpiḥ naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe sma an avantu te dhiyaḥ

original: RV_08.003.02.1{25} bhūyāma te sumatau vājino vayaṃ mā na starabhimātaye
analyzed: bhūyāma te sumatau vājinaḥ vayam mā naḥ starabhi mātaye

original: RV_08.003.02.2{25} asmāñcitrābhiravatādabhiṣṭibhirā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya
analyzed: asmān citrābhiḥ avatāt abhiṣṭibhiḥ ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya

original: RV_08.003.03.1{25} imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama

original: RV_08.003.03.2{25} pāvakavarṇāḥśucayo vipaścito 'bhi stomairanūṣata
analyzed: pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ bhi stomaiḥ anūṣata

original: RV_08.003.04.1{25} ayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe
analyzed: ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe

original: RV_08.003.04.2{25} satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye
analyzed: satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛṇe śavaḥ yajñeṣu viprarājye

original: RV_08.003.05.1{25} indramid devatātaya indraṃ prayatyadhvare
analyzed: indram id devatātaye indram prayati adhvare

original: RV_08.003.05.2{25} indraṃ samīkevanino havāmaha indraṃ dhanasya sātaye
analyzed: indram samīkevaninaḥ havāmahe indram dhanasya sātaye

original: RV_08.003.06.1{26} indro mahnā rodasī paprathacchava indraḥ sūryamarocayat
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā rodasī paprathat śavaḥ indraḥ sūryam arocayat

original: RV_08.003.06.2{26} indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemira indre suvānāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemire indre suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_08.003.07.1{26} abhi tvā pūrvapītaya indra stomebhirāyavaḥ
analyzed: abhi tvā pūrva pītaye indra stomebhiḥ āyavaḥ

original: RV_08.003.07.2{26} samīcīnāsaṛbhavaḥ samasvaran rudrā gṛnanta pūrvyam
analyzed: samīcīnāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ samasvaran rudrāḥ gṛnanta pūrvyam

original: RV_08.003.08.1{26} asyedindro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi
analyzed: asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi

original: RV_08.003.08.2{26} adyā tamasya mahimānamāyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā
analyzed: adyā tamasya mahimānam āyavaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: RV_08.003.09.1{26} tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye
analyzed: tat tvā yāmi su vīryam tat brahma pūrvacittaye

original: RV_08.003.09.2{26} yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvamāvitha
analyzed: yena yatibhyaḥ bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha

original: RV_08.003.10.1{26} yenā samudramasṛjo mahīrapastadindra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ
analyzed: yena samudram asṛjaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ tat indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ

original: RV_08.003.10.2{26} sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīranucakrade
analyzed: sadyas saḥ asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yam kṣoṇīḥ anucakrade

original: RV_08.003.11.1{27} śagdhī na indra yat tvā rayiṃ yāmi suvīryam
analyzed: śagdhi naḥ indra yat tvā rayim yāmi su vīryam

original: RV_08.003.11.2{27} śagdhi vājāya prathamaṃ siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya
analyzed: śagdhi vājāya prathamam siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya

original: RV_08.003.12.1{27} śagdhī no asya yad dha pauramāvitha dhiya indra siṣāsataḥ
analyzed: śagdhi naḥ asya yat ha pauram āvitha dhiyaḥ indra siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_08.003.12.2{27} śagdhi yathā ruśamaṃ śyāvakaṃ kṛpamindra prāvaḥ svarṇaram
analyzed: śagdhi yathā ruśamam śyāvakam kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram

original: RV_08.003.13.1{27} kan navyo atasīnāṃ turo gṛṇīta martyaḥ
analyzed: kad navyaḥ atasīnām turaḥ gṛṇīta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.003.13.2{27} nahī nvasya mahimānamindriyaṃ svargṛṇanta ānaśuḥ
analyzed: nahi nu asya mahimānam indriyam svar gṛṇantaḥ ānaśuḥ

original: RV_08.003.14.1{27} kadu stuvanta ṛtayanta devata ṛṣiḥ ko vipra ohate
analyzed: kadu stuvantaḥ ṛtayanta devataḥ ṛṣiḥ kaḥ vipraḥ ohate

original: RV_08.003.14.2{27} kadā havaṃ maghavannindra sunvataḥ kadu stuvata ā gamaḥ
analyzed: kadā havam maghavan indra sunvataḥ kadu stuvataḥ ā gamaḥ

original: RV_08.003.15.1{27} udu tye madhumattamā gira stomāsa īrate
analyzed: udu tye madhumattamāḥ giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate

original: RV_08.003.15.2{27} satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva
analyzed: satrājitaḥ dhana sāḥ akṣita ūtayaḥ vājayantaḥ rathāḥ iva

original: RV_08.003.16.1{28} kaṇvā iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryā iva viśvamid dhītamānaśuḥ
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryāḥ iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_08.003.16.2{28} indraṃ stomebhirmahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran
analyzed: indram stomebhiḥ mahayantaḥ āyavaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ asvaran

original: RV_08.003.17.1{28} yukṣvā hi vṛtrahantama harī indra parāvataḥ
analyzed: yukṣvā hi vṛtra hantama harī indra parāvataḥ

original: RV_08.003.17.2{28} arvācīno maghavan somapītaya ugra ṛṣvebhirā gahi
analyzed: arvācīnaḥ maghavan soma pītaye ugraḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_08.003.18.1{28} ime hi te kāravo vāvaśurdhiyā viprāso medhasātaye
analyzed: ime hi te kāravaḥ vāvaśuḥ dhiyā viprāsaḥ medha sātaye

original: RV_08.003.18.2{28} satvaṃ no maghavannindra girvaṇo veno na śṛṇudhī havam
analyzed: satvam naḥ maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ venaḥ na śṛṇudhi havam

original: RV_08.003.19.1{28} nirindra bṛhatībhyo vṛtraṃ dhanubhyo asphuraḥ
analyzed: niḥ indra bṛhatībhyaḥ vṛtram dhanubhyaḥ asphuraḥ

original: RV_08.003.19.2{28} nirarbudasya mṛgayasya māyino niḥ parvatasya gā ājaḥ
analyzed: nirarbudasya mṛgayasya māyinaḥ niḥ parvatasya gāḥ ājaḥ

original: RV_08.003.20.1{28} niragnayo rurucurniru sūryo niḥ soma indriyo rasaḥ
analyzed: niḥ agnayaḥ rurucuḥ niru sūryaḥ niḥ somaḥ indriyaḥ rasaḥ

original: RV_08.003.20.2{28} nirantarikṣādadhamo mahāmahiṃ kṛṣe tadindra pauṃsyam
analyzed: niḥ antarikṣāt adhamaḥ mahā mahim kṛṣe tat indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.003.21.1{29} yaṃ me durindro marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ
analyzed: yam me duḥ indraḥ marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ

original: RV_08.003.21.2{29} viśveṣāṃ tmanā śobhiṣṭhamupeva divi dhāvamānam
analyzed: viśveṣām tmanā śobhiṣṭham upa iva divi dhāvamānam

original: RV_08.003.22.1{29} rohitaṃ me pākasthāmā sudhuraṃ kakṣyaprām
analyzed: rohitam me pākasthāmā su dhuram kakṣya prām

original: RV_08.003.22.2{29} adād rāyo vibodhanam
analyzed: adāt rāyaḥ vibodhanam

original: RV_08.003.23.1{29} yasmā anye daśa prati dhuraṃ vahanti vahnayaḥ
analyzed: yasmai anye daśa prati dhuram vahanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_08.003.23.2{29} astaṃ vayo na tugryam
analyzed: astam vayaḥ na tugryam

original: RV_08.003.24.1{29} ātmā pitustanūrvāsa ojodā abhyañjanam
analyzed: ātmā pituḥ tanūḥ vāsaḥ ojaḥ dāḥ abhyañjanam

original: RV_08.003.24.2{29} turīyamid rohitasya pākasthāmānaṃ bhojaṃ dātāramabravam
analyzed: turīyam id rohitasya pākasthāmānam bhojam dātāram abravam

original: RV_08.004.01.1{30} yadindra prāgapāgudaṃ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: yat indra prāk apāk udam nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_08.004.01.2{30} simā purū nṛṣūto asyānave 'si praśardha turvaśe
analyzed: sima purū nṛṣūtaḥ asya anave si praśardha turvaśe

original: RV_08.004.02.1{30} yad vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpa indra mādayase sacā
analyzed: yat vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpe indra mādayase sacā

original: RV_08.004.02.2{30} kaṇvāsastvā brahmabhi stomavāhasa indrā yachantyā gahi
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ tvā brahmabhiḥ stoma vāhasaḥ indrāḥ yacchantyā gahi

original: RV_08.004.03.1{30} yathā gauro apā kṛtaṃ tṛṣyannetyaveriṇam
analyzed: yathā gauraḥ apā kṛtam tṛṣyan eti ava iriṇam

original: RV_08.004.03.2{30} āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyamā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba
analyzed: āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyama ā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba

original: RV_08.004.04.1{30} mandantu tvā maghavannindrendavo rādhodeyāya sunvate
analyzed: mandantu tvā maghavan indra indavaḥ rādhaḥ deyāya sunvate

original: RV_08.004.04.2{30} āmuṣyā somamapibaścamū sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad dadhiṣe sahaḥ
analyzed: āmuṣya somam apibaḥ camū sutam jyeṣṭham tat dadhiṣe sahaḥ

original: RV_08.004.05.1{30} pra cakre sahasā saho babhañja manyumojasā
analyzed: pra cakre sahasā sahaḥ babhañja manyum ojasā

original: RV_08.004.05.2{30} viśve ta indra pṛtanāyavo yaho ni vṛkṣā iva yemire
analyzed: viśve te indra pṛtanāyavaḥ yaho ni vṛkṣāḥ iva yemire

original: RV_08.004.06.1{31} sahasreṇeva sacate yavīyudhā yasta ānaḷ upastutiṃ putraṃ prāvargaṃ kṛṇute suvīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ
analyzed: sahasreṇa iva sacate yavīyudhā yaḥ te ānaṭ upastutim putram prāvargam kṛṇute su vīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ

original: RV_08.004.07.1{31} mā bhema mā śramiṣmograsya sakhye tava
analyzed: mā bhema mā śramiṣma ugrasya sakhye tava

original: RV_08.004.07.2{31} mahat te vṛṣṇo abhicakṣyaṃ kṛtaṃ paśyema turvaśaṃ yadum
analyzed: mahat te vṛṣṇaḥ abhicakṣyam kṛtam paśyema turvaśam yadum

original: RV_08.004.08.1{31} savyāmanu sphigyaṃ vāvase vṛṣā na dāno asya roṣati
analyzed: savyām anu sphigyam vāvase vṛṣā na dānaḥ asya roṣati

original: RV_08.004.08.2{31} madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavastūyamehi dravā piba
analyzed: madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavaḥ tūyam ehi drava piba

original: RV_08.004.09.1{31} aśvī rathī surūpa id gomānidindra te sakhā
analyzed: aśvī rathī surūpaḥ id gomān id indra te sakhā

original: RV_08.004.09.2{31} śvātrabhajā vayasā sacate sadā candro yāti sabhāmupa
analyzed: śvātrabhajā vayasā sacate sadā candraḥ yāti sabhām upa

original: RV_08.004.10.1{31} ṛśyo na tṛṣyannavapānamā gahi pibā somaṃ vaśānanu
analyzed: ṛśyaḥ na tṛṣyan avapānam ā gahi pibā somam vaśān anu

original: RV_08.004.10.2{31} nimeghamāno maghavan dive-diva ojiṣṭhaṃ dadhiṣe sahaḥ
analyzed: nimeghamānaḥ maghavan dive dive ojiṣṭham dadhiṣe sahaḥ

original: RV_08.004.11.1{32} adhvaryo drāvayā tvaṃ somamindraḥ pipāsati
analyzed: adhvaryo drāvaya tvam somam indraḥ pipāsati

original: RV_08.004.11.2{32} upa nūnaṃyuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā
analyzed: upa nūnaṃyuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā

original: RV_08.004.12.1{32} svayaṃ cit sa manyate dāśurirjano yatrā somasya tṛmpasi
analyzed: svayam cit sa manyate dāśuriḥ janaḥ yatra somasya tṛmpasi

original: RV_08.004.12.2{32} idaṃ te annaṃ yujyaṃ samukṣitaṃ tasyehi pra dravā piba
analyzed: idam te annam yujyam samukṣitam tasya ihi pra drava piba

original: RV_08.004.13.1{32} ratheṣṭhāyādhvaryavaḥ somamindrāya sotana
analyzed: ratheṣṭhāya adhvaryavaḥ somam indrāya sotana

original: RV_08.004.13.2{32} adhi bradhnasyādrayo vi cakṣate sunvanto dāśvadhvaram
analyzed: adhi bradhnasya adrayaḥ vi cakṣate sunvantaḥ dāśu adhvaram

original: RV_08.004.14.1{32} upa bradhnaṃ vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indramapasu vakṣataḥ
analyzed: upa bradhnam vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indram apasu vakṣataḥ

original: RV_08.004.14.2{32} arvāñcaṃ tvā saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savanedupa
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā saptayaḥ dhvara śriyaḥ vahantu savanā id upa

original: RV_08.004.15.1{32} pra pūṣaṇaṃ vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum
analyzed: pra pūṣaṇam vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum

original: RV_08.004.15.2{32} sa śakra śikṣa puruhūta no dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana
analyzed: sa śakra śikṣa puru hūta naḥ dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana

original: RV_08.004.16.1{33} saṃ naḥ śiśīhi bhurijoriva kṣuraṃ rāsva rāyo vimocana
analyzed: sam naḥ śiśīhi bhurijoḥ iva kṣuram rāsva rāyaḥ vimocana

original: RV_08.004.16.2{33} tve tan naḥ suvedamusriyaṃ vasu yaṃ tvaṃ hinoṣi martyam
analyzed: tve tat naḥ su veda musriyam vasu yam tvam hinoṣi martyam

original: RV_08.004.17.1{33} vemi tvā pūṣannṛñjase vemi stotava āghṛṇe
analyzed: vemi tvā pūṣan nṛñjase vemi stotave āghṛṇe

original: RV_08.004.17.2{33} na tasya vemyaraṇaṃ hi tad vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne
analyzed: na tasya vemi araṇam hi tat vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne

original: RV_08.004.18.1{33} parā gāvo yavasaṃ kaccidāghṛṇe nityaṃ rekṇo amartya
analyzed: parā gāvaḥ yavasam kaccit āghṛṇe nityam rekṇaḥ amartya

original: RV_08.004.18.2{33} asmākaṃ pūṣannavitā śivo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye
analyzed: asmākam pūṣan navitā śivaḥ bhava maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vāja sātaye

original: RV_08.004.19.1{33} sthūraṃ rādhaḥ śatāśvaṃ kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: sthūram rādhaḥ śata aśvam kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_08.004.19.2{33} rājñastveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣvamanmahi
analyzed: rājñaḥ tveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣu amanmahi

original: RV_08.004.20.1{33} dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhairabhidyubhiḥ
analyzed: dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhaiḥ abhidyubhiḥ

original: RV_08.004.20.2{33} ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrānu nirmajāmaje niryūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā anu nirmajā maje niryūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_08.004.21.1{33} vṛkṣāścin me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣāḥ cit me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ

original: RV_08.004.21.2{33} gāṃ bhajanta mehanāśvaṃ bhajanta mehana
analyzed: gām bhajanta mehana aśvam bhajanta mehana

original: RV_08.005.01.1{01} dūrādiheva yat satyaruṇapsuraśiśvitat
analyzed: dūrāt iha iva yat satī aruṇapsuḥ aśiśvitat

original: RV_08.005.01.2{01} vi bhānuṃ viśvadhātanat
analyzed: vi bhānum viśvadhā atanat

original: RV_08.005.02.1{01} nṛvad dasrā manoyujā rathena pṛthupājasā
analyzed: nṛvat dasrā manaḥ yujā rathena pṛthu pājasā

original: RV_08.005.02.2{01} sacethe aśvinoṣasam
analyzed: sacethe aśvinā uṣasam

original: RV_08.005.03.1{01} yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū prati stoma adṛkṣata
analyzed: yuvābhyām vājinīvasū prati stomaḥ adṛkṣata

original: RV_08.005.03.2{01} vācaṃ dūtoyathohiṣe
analyzed: vācam

original: RV_08.005.04.1{01} purupriyā ṇa ūtaye purumandrā purūvasū
analyzed: puru priyā naḥ ūtaye puru mandrā purūvasū

original: RV_08.005.04.2{01} stuṣe kaṇvāsoaśvinā
analyzed: stuṣe kaṇvāsaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.05.1{01} maṃhiṣṭhā vājasātameṣayantā śubhas patī
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhā vāja sātamā iṣayantā śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_08.005.05.2{01} gantārā dāśuṣo gṛham
analyzed: gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_08.005.06.1{02} tā sudevāya dāśuṣe sumedhāmavitāriṇīm
analyzed: tā su devāya dāśuṣe su medhām a vitāriṇīm

original: RV_08.005.06.2{02} ghṛtairgavyūtimukṣatam
analyzed: ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam

original: RV_08.005.07.1{02} ā na stomamupa dravat tūyaṃ śyenebhirāśubhiḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ stomam upa dravat tūyam śyenebhiḥ āśubhiḥ

original: RV_08.005.07.2{02} yātamaśvebhiraśvinā
analyzed: yātam aśvebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.08.1{02} yebhistisraḥ parāvato divo viśvāni rocanā
analyzed: yebhiḥ tisraḥ parāvataḥ divaḥ viśvāni rocanā

original: RV_08.005.08.2{02} trīnraktūn paridīyathaḥ
analyzed: trīn raktūn paridīyathaḥ

original: RV_08.005.09.1{02} uta no gomatīriṣa uta sātīraharvidā
analyzed: uta naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ uta sātīḥ ahar vidā

original: RV_08.005.09.2{02} vi pathaḥ sātaye sitam
analyzed: vi pathaḥ sātaye sitam

original: RV_08.005.10.1{02} ā no gomantamaśvinā suvīraṃ surathaṃ rayim
analyzed: ā naḥ gomantam aśvinā su vīram su ratham rayim

original: RV_08.005.10.2{02} voḷhamaśvāvatīriṣaḥ
analyzed: voḍham aśvāvatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_08.005.11.1{03} vāvṛdhānā śubhas patī dasrā hiraṇyavartanī
analyzed: vāvṛdhānā śubhaḥ patī dasrā hiraṇya vartanī

original: RV_08.005.11.2{03} pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_08.005.12.1{03} asmabhyaṃ vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaśca saprathaḥ
analyzed: asmabhyam vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaḥ ca saprathaḥ

original: RV_08.005.12.2{03} chardiryantamadābhyam
analyzed: chardiḥ yantam adābhyam

original: RV_08.005.13.1{03} ni ṣu brahma janānāṃ yāviṣṭaṃ tūyamā gatam
analyzed: ni su brahma janānām yā āviṣṭam tūyamā gatam

original: RV_08.005.13.2{03} mo ṣvanyānupāratam
analyzed: mā u su anya anupāratam

original: RV_08.005.14.1{03} asya pibatamaśvinā yuvaṃ madasya cāruṇaḥ
analyzed: asya pibatam aśvinā yuvam madasya cāruṇaḥ

original: RV_08.005.14.2{03} madhvo rātasyadhiṣṇyā
analyzed: madhvaḥ rātasya adhiṣṇyā

original: RV_08.005.15.1{03} asme ā vahataṃ rayiṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam
analyzed: asme ā vahatam rayim śatavantam sahasriṇam

original: RV_08.005.15.2{03} purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam
analyzed: purukṣum viśva dhāyasam

original: RV_08.005.16.1{04} purutrā cid dhi vāṃ narā vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: purutrā cit hi vām narāḥ vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_08.005.16.2{04} vāghadbhiraśvinā gatam
analyzed: vāghadbhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_08.005.17.1{04} janāso vṛktabarhiṣo haviṣmanto araṃkṛtaḥ
analyzed: janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ haviṣmantaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.005.17.2{04} yuvāṃ havante aśvinā
analyzed: yuvām havante aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.18.1{04} asmākamadya vāmayaṃ stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ
analyzed: asmākam adya vām ayam stomaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ antamaḥ

original: RV_08.005.18.2{04} yuvābhyāṃ bhūtvaśvinā
analyzed: yuvābhyām bhūtu aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.19.1{04} yo ha vāṃ madhuno dṛtirāhito rathacarṣaṇe
analyzed: yaḥ ha vām madhunaḥ dṛtiḥ āhitaḥ rathacarṣaṇe

original: RV_08.005.19.2{04} tataḥ pibatamaśvinā
analyzed: tatas pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.20.1{04} tena no vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śaṃ gave
analyzed: tena naḥ vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śam gave

original: RV_08.005.20.2{04} vahataṃ pīvarīriṣaḥ
analyzed: vahatam pīvarīriṣaḥ

original: RV_08.005.21.1{05} uta no divyā iṣa uta sindhūnraharvidā
analyzed: uta naḥ divyāḥ iṣaḥ uta sindhūn rahaḥ vidā

original: RV_08.005.21.2{05} apa dvāreva varṣathaḥ
analyzed: apa dvārā iva varṣathaḥ

original: RV_08.005.22.1{05} kadā vāṃ taugryo vidhat samudre jahito narā
analyzed: kadā vām taugryaḥ vidhat samudre jahitaḥ narā

original: RV_08.005.22.2{05} yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt
analyzed: yat vām rathaḥ vibhiḥ patāt

original: RV_08.005.23.1{05} yuvaṃ kaṇvāya nāsatyāpiriptāya harmye
analyzed: yuvam kaṇvāya nāsatya apiriptāya harmye

original: RV_08.005.23.2{05} śaśvadūtīrdaśasyathaḥ
analyzed: śaśvat ūtīḥ daśasi athaḥ

original: RV_08.005.24.1{05} tābhirā yātamūtibhirnavyasībhiḥ suśastibhiḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā yātam ūtibhiḥ navyasībhiḥ su śastibhiḥ

original: RV_08.005.24.2{05} yad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū huve
analyzed: yat vām vṛṣaṇvasū huve

original: RV_08.005.25.1{05} yathā cit kaṇvamāvataṃ priyamedhamupastutam
analyzed: yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam

original: RV_08.005.25.2{05} atriṃ śiñjāramaśvinā
analyzed: atrim śiñjāram aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.26.1{06} yathota kṛtvye dhane 'ṃśuṃ goṣvagastyam
analyzed: yathā uta kṛtvye dhane ṃśum goṣu agastyam

original: RV_08.005.26.2{06} yathā vājeṣu sobharim
analyzed: yathā vājeṣu sobharim

original: RV_08.005.27.1{06} etāvad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ato vā bhūyo aśvinā
analyzed: etāvat vām vṛṣaṇvasū atas vā bhūyaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.27.2{06} gṛṇantaḥ sumnamīmahe
analyzed: gṛṇantaḥ sumnam īmahe

original: RV_08.005.28.1{06} rathaṃ hiraṇyavandhuraṃ hiraṇyābhīśumaśvinā
analyzed: ratham hiraṇya vandhuram hiraṇya abhīśum aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.28.2{06} ā hi sthātho divispṛśam
analyzed: ā hi sthāthaḥ divispṛśam

original: RV_08.005.29.1{06} hiraṇyayī vāṃ rabhirīṣā akṣo hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: hiraṇyayī vām rabhiḥ īṣāḥ akṣaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_08.005.29.2{06} ubhā cakrā hiraṇyayā
analyzed: ubhā cakrā hiraṇyayā

original: RV_08.005.30.1{06} tena no vājinīvasū parāvataścidā gatam
analyzed: tena naḥ vājinīvasū parāvataḥ cidā gatam

original: RV_08.005.30.2{06} upemāṃ suṣṭutiṃ mama
analyzed: upa imām suṣṭutim mama

original: RV_08.005.31.1{07} ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīraśnantāvaśvinā
analyzed: ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīḥ aśnantau aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.31.2{07} iṣo dāsīramartyā
analyzed: iṣaḥ dāsīḥ amartyā

original: RV_08.005.32.1{07} ā no dyumnairā śravobhirā rāyā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: ā naḥ dyumnaiḥ ā śravobhiḥ ā rāyā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.005.32.2{07} puruścandrā nāsatyā
analyzed: puru ścandrā nāsatyā

original: RV_08.005.33.1{07} eha vāṃ pruṣitapsavo vayo vahantu parṇinaḥ
analyzed: ā iha vām pruṣitapsavaḥ vayaḥ vahantu parṇinaḥ

original: RV_08.005.33.2{07} achā svadhvaraṃ janam
analyzed: achā su adhvaram janam

original: RV_08.005.34.1{07} rathaṃ vāmanugāyasaṃ ya iṣā vartate saha
analyzed: ratham vām anugāyasam yaḥ iṣā vartate saha

original: RV_08.005.34.2{07} na cakramabhi bādhate
analyzed: na cakram abhi bādhate

original: RV_08.005.35.1{07} hiraṇyayena rathena dravatpāṇibhiraśvaiḥ
analyzed: hiraṇyayena rathena dravat pāṇibhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_08.005.35.2{07} dhījavanā nāsatyā
analyzed: dhī javanā nāsatyā

original: RV_08.005.36.1{08} yuvaṃ mṛgaṃ jāgṛvāṃsaṃ svadatho vā vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: yuvam mṛgam jāgṛvāṃsam svadathaḥ vā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.005.36.2{08} tā naḥpṛṅktamiṣā rayim
analyzed: tā naḥpṛṅktam iṣā rayim

original: RV_08.005.37.1{08} tā me aśvinā sanīnāṃ vidyātaṃ navānām
analyzed: tā me aśvinā sanīnām vidyātam navānām

original: RV_08.005.37.2{08} yathā ciccaidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatamuṣṭrānāṃ dadat sahasrā daśa gonām
analyzed: yathā cit caidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatam uṣṭrānām dadat sahasrā daśa gonām

original: RV_08.005.38.1{08} yo me hiraṇyasandṛśo daśa rājño amaṃhata
analyzed: yaḥ me hiraṇya sandṛśaḥ daśa rājñaḥ amaṃhata

original: RV_08.005.38.2{08} adhaspadā iccaidyasya kṛṣṭayaścarmamnā abhito janāḥ
analyzed: adhaspadāḥ id caidyasya kṛṣṭayaḥ carmamnāḥ abhitas janāḥ

original: RV_08.005.39.1{08} mākirenā pathā gād yeneme yanti cedayaḥ
analyzed: mākirenā pathā gāt yena ime yanti cedayaḥ

original: RV_08.005.39.2{08} anyo net sūrirohate bhūridāvattaro janaḥ
analyzed: anyaḥ na id sūri rohate bhūri dāvattaraḥ janaḥ

original: RV_08.006.01.1{09} mahānindro ya ojasā parjanyo vṛṣṭimāniva
analyzed: mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā parjanyaḥ vṛṣṭimān iva

original: RV_08.006.01.2{09} stomairvatsasya vāvṛdhe
analyzed: stomaiḥ vatsasya vāvṛdhe

original: RV_08.006.02.1{09} prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yad bharanta vahnayaḥ
analyzed: prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yat bharanta vahnayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.02.2{09} viprā ṛtasya vāhasā
analyzed: viprāḥ ṛtasya vāhasā

original: RV_08.006.03.1{09} kaṇvā indraṃ yadakrata stomairyajñasya sādhanam
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ indram yat akrata stomaiḥ yajñasya sādhanam

original: RV_08.006.03.2{09} jāmibruvata āyudham
analyzed: jāmibruvataḥ āyudham

original: RV_08.006.04.1{09} samasya manyave viśo viśvā namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: samasya manyave viśaḥ viśvāḥ namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.04.2{09} samudrāyeva sindhavaḥ
analyzed: samudrāya iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_08.006.05.1{09} ojastadasya titviṣa ubhe yad samavartayat
analyzed: ojaḥ tat asya titviṣe ubhe yat samavartayat

original: RV_08.006.05.2{09} indraścarmevarodasī
analyzed: indraḥ carma iva rodasī

original: RV_08.006.06.1{10} vi cid vṛtrasya dodhato vajreṇa śataparvaṇā
analyzed: vi cit vṛtrasya dodhataḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_08.006.06.2{10} śiro bibhedavṛṣṇinā
analyzed: śiraḥ bibheda vṛṣṇinā

original: RV_08.006.07.1{10} imā abhi pra ṇonumo vipāmagreṣu dhītayaḥ
analyzed: imāḥ abhi pra nonumaḥ vipām agreṣu dhītayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.07.2{10} agneḥ śocirna didyutaḥ
analyzed: agneḥ śociḥ na didyutaḥ

original: RV_08.006.08.1{10} guhā satīrupa tmanā pra yacchocanta dhītayaḥ
analyzed: guhā satīḥ upa tmanā pra yat śocanta dhītayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.08.2{10} kaṇvāṛtasya dhārayā
analyzed: kaṇva aṛtasya dhārayā

original: RV_08.006.09.1{10} pra tamindra naśīmahi rayiṃ gomantamaśvinam
analyzed: pra tam indra naśīmahi rayim gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_08.006.09.2{10} pra brahmapūrvacittaye
analyzed: pra brahma pūrva cittaye

original: RV_08.006.10.1{10} ahamid dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha
analyzed: aham id hi pituḥ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha

original: RV_08.006.10.2{10} ahaṃ sūrya ivājani
analyzed: aham sūrye iva ajani

original: RV_08.006.11.1{11} ahaṃ pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇvavat
analyzed: aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇva vat

original: RV_08.006.11.2{11} yenendraḥśuṣmamid dadhe
analyzed: yena indraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe

original: RV_08.006.12.1{11} ye tvāmindra na tuṣṭuvur{ṛ}ṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ
analyzed: ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvuḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: RV_08.006.12.2{11} mamedvardhasva suṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: mama id vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_08.006.13.1{11} yadasya manyuradhvanīd vi vṛtraṃ parvaśo rujan
analyzed: yat asya manyuḥ adhvanīt vi vṛtram parvaśas rujan

original: RV_08.006.13.2{11} apaḥ samudramairayat
analyzed: apaḥ samudram airayat

original: RV_08.006.14.1{11} ni śuṣṇa indra dharṇasiṃ vajraṃ jaghantha dasyavi
analyzed: ni śuṣṇe indra dharṇasim vajram jaghantha dasyavi

original: RV_08.006.14.2{11} vṛṣāhyugra śṛṇviṣe
analyzed: vṛṣā ahi ugra śṛṇviṣe

original: RV_08.006.15.1{11} na dyāva indramojasā nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam
analyzed: na dyāvaḥ indram ojasā na antarikṣāṇi vajriṇam

original: RV_08.006.15.2{11} na vivyacanta bhūmayaḥ
analyzed: na vivyacanta bhūmayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.16.1{12} yasta indra mahīrapa stabhūyamāna āśayat
analyzed: yaḥ te indra mahīḥ apaḥ stabhūyamānaḥ āśayat

original: RV_08.006.16.2{12} ni taṃ padyāsu śiśnathaḥ
analyzed: ni tam padyāsu śiśnathaḥ

original: RV_08.006.17.1{12} ya ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt
analyzed: yaḥ ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt

original: RV_08.006.17.2{12} tamobhirindra taṃ guhaḥ
analyzed: tamobhiḥ indra tam guhaḥ

original: RV_08.006.18.1{12} ya indra yatayastvā bhṛgavo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ
analyzed: ye indra yatayaḥ tvā bhṛgavaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: RV_08.006.18.2{12} mamedugra śrudhī havam
analyzed: mama id ugra śrudhi havam

original: RV_08.006.19.1{12} imāsta indra pṛśnayo ghṛtaṃ duhata āśiram
analyzed: imāḥ te indra pṛśnayaḥ ghṛtam duhate āśiram

original: RV_08.006.19.2{12} enām ṛtasya pipyuṣīḥ
analyzed: enām ṛtasya pipyuṣīḥ

original: RV_08.006.20.1{12} yā indra prasvastvāsā garbhamacakriran
analyzed: yāḥ indra prasvastvāsāḥ garbham acakriran

original: RV_08.006.20.2{12} pari dharmeva sūryam
analyzed: pari dharmā iva sūryam

original: RV_08.006.21.1{13} tvāmicchavasas pate kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: tvām id śavasaḥ pate kaṇvāḥ ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_08.006.21.2{13} tvāṃ sutāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: tvām sutāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_08.006.22.1{13} tavedindra praṇītiṣūta praśastiradrivaḥ
analyzed: tava id indra praṇītiṣu uta praśastiḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.006.22.2{13} yajño vitantasāyyaḥ
analyzed: yajñaḥ vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_08.006.23.1{13} ā na indra mahīmiṣaṃ puraṃ na darṣi gomatīm
analyzed: ā naḥ indra mahīm iṣam puram na darṣi gomatīm

original: RV_08.006.23.2{13} uta prajāṃ suvīryam
analyzed: uta prajām su vīryam

original: RV_08.006.24.1{13} uta tyadāśvaśvyaṃ yadindra nāhuṣīṣvā
analyzed: uta tyadā āśu aśvyam yat indra nāhuṣīṣvā

original: RV_08.006.24.2{13} agre vikṣupradīdayat
analyzed: agre vikṣupradīdayat

original: RV_08.006.25.1{13} abhi vrajaṃ na tatniṣe sūra upākacakṣasam
analyzed: abhi vrajam na tatniṣe sūraḥ upāka cakṣasam

original: RV_08.006.25.2{13} yadindra mṛḷayāsi naḥ
analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_08.006.26.1{14} yadaṅga taviṣīyasa indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ
analyzed: yat aṅga taviṣīyase indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ

original: RV_08.006.26.2{14} mahānapāra ojasā
analyzed: mahān apāraḥ ojasā

original: RV_08.006.27.1{14} taṃ tvā haviṣmatīrviśa upa bruvata ūtaye
analyzed: tam tvā haviṣmatīḥ viśaḥ upa bruvate ūtaye

original: RV_08.006.27.2{14} urujrayasamindubhiḥ
analyzed: uru jrayasam indubhiḥ

original: RV_08.006.28.1{14} upahvare girīṇāṃ saṃgathe ca nadīnām
analyzed: upahvare girīṇām saṃgathe ca nadīnām

original: RV_08.006.28.2{14} dhiyā vipro ajāyata
analyzed: dhiyā vipraḥ ajāyata

original: RV_08.006.29.1{14} ataḥ samudramudvataścikitvānava paśyati
analyzed: atas samudram udvataḥ cikitvān ava paśyati

original: RV_08.006.29.2{14} yato vipāna ejati
analyzed: yatas vipānaḥ ejati

original: RV_08.006.30.1{14} ādit pratnasya retaso jyotiṣ paśyanti vāsaram
analyzed: ādit pratnasya retasaḥ jyotiḥ paśyanti vāsaram

original: RV_08.006.30.2{14} paro yadidhyate divā
analyzed: paras yat idhyate divā

original: RV_08.006.31.1{15} kaṇvāsa indra te matiṃ viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ indra te matim viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.006.31.2{15} uto śaviṣṭha vṛṣṇyam
analyzed: uta u śaviṣṭha vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_08.006.32.1{15} imāṃ ma indra suṣṭutiṃ juṣasva pra su māmava
analyzed: imām me indra suṣṭutim juṣasva pra su mām ava

original: RV_08.006.32.2{15} uta pravardhayā matim
analyzed: uta pravardhaya matim

original: RV_08.006.33.1{15} uta brahmaṇyā vayaṃ tubhyaṃ pravṛddha vajrivaḥ
analyzed: uta brahmaṇyāḥ vayam tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivas

original: RV_08.006.33.2{15} viprā atakṣma jīvase
analyzed: viprāḥ atakṣma jīvase

original: RV_08.006.34.1{15} abhi kaṇvā anūṣatāpo na pravatā yatīḥ
analyzed: abhi kaṇvāḥ anūṣata apaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_08.006.34.2{15} indraṃ vananvatī matiḥ
analyzed: indram vananvatī matiḥ

original: RV_08.006.35.1{15} indramukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudramiva sindhavaḥ
analyzed: indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_08.006.35.2{15} anuttamanyumajaram
analyzed: anutta manyum ajaram

original: RV_08.006.36.1{16} ā no yāhi parāvato haribhyāṃ haryatābhyām
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi parāvataḥ haribhyām haryatābhyām

original: RV_08.006.36.2{16} imamindra sutaṃ piba
analyzed: imam indra sutam piba

original: RV_08.006.37.1{16} tvāmid vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: tvām id vṛtra hantama janāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.006.37.2{16} havante vājasātaye
analyzed: havante vājasātaye

original: RV_08.006.38.1{16} anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakraṃ na vartyetaśam
analyzed: anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakram na vartī etaśam

original: RV_08.006.38.2{16} anu suvānāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: anu suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_08.006.39.1{16} mandasvā su svarṇara utendra śaryaṇāvati
analyzed: mandasva su svarṇare uta indra śaryaṇāvati

original: RV_08.006.39.2{16} matsvā vivasvato matī
analyzed: matsva vivasvataḥ matī

original: RV_08.006.40.1{16} vāvṛdhāna upa dyavi vṛṣā vajryaroravīt
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ upa dyavi vṛṣā vajrī aroravīt

original: RV_08.006.40.2{16} vṛtrahā somapātamaḥ
analyzed: vṛtra hā soma pātamaḥ

original: RV_08.006.41.1{17} ṛṣirhi pūrvajā asyeka īśāna ojasā
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ hi pūrva jāḥ asi ekaḥ īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_08.006.41.2{17} indra coṣkūyase vasu
analyzed: indra coṣkūyase vasu

original: RV_08.006.42.1{17} asmākaṃ tvā sutānupa vītapṛṣṭhā abhi prayaḥ
analyzed: asmākam tvā sutān upa vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.42.2{17} śataṃvahantu harayaḥ
analyzed: śatam vahantu harayaḥ

original: RV_08.006.43.1{17} imāṃ su pūrvyāṃ dhiyaṃ madhorghṛtasya pipyuṣīm
analyzed: imām su pūrvyām dhiyam madhoḥ ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm

original: RV_08.006.43.2{17} kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_08.006.44.1{17} indramid vimahīnāṃ medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ
analyzed: indram id vi mahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.006.44.2{17} indraṃ saniṣyurūtaye
analyzed: indram saniṣyuḥ ūtaye

original: RV_08.006.45.1{17} arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedha stutā harī

original: RV_08.006.45.2{17} somapeyāyavakṣataḥ
analyzed: soma peyā yavakṣataḥ

original: RV_08.006.46.1{17} śatamahaṃ tirindire sahasraṃ parśāvā dade
analyzed: śata maham tirindire sahasram parśāvā dade

original: RV_08.006.46.2{17} rādhāṃsiyādvānām
analyzed: rādhāṃsiyādvānām

original: RV_08.006.47.1{17} trīṇi śatānyarvatāṃ sahasrā daśa gonām
analyzed: trīṇi śatāni arvatām sahasrā daśa gonām

original: RV_08.006.47.2{17} daduṣ pajrāya sāmne
analyzed: daduḥ pajrāya sāmne

original: RV_08.006.48.1{17} udānaṭ kakuho divamuṣṭrāñcaturyujo dadat
analyzed: udānaṭ kakuhaḥ divam uṣṭrān catur yujaḥ dadat

original: RV_08.006.48.2{17} śravasā yādvaṃ janam
analyzed: śravasā yādvam janam

original: RV_08.007.01.1{18} pra yad vastriṣṭubhamiṣaṃ maruto vipro akṣarat
analyzed: pra yat vaḥ triṣṭubham iṣam marutaḥ vipraḥ akṣarat

original: RV_08.007.01.2{18} vi parvateṣu rājatha
analyzed: vi parvateṣu rājatha

original: RV_08.007.02.1{18} yadaṅga taviṣīyavo yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam
analyzed: yat aṅga taviṣīyavaḥ yāmam śubhrāḥ acidhvam

original: RV_08.007.02.2{18} ni parvatā ahāsata
analyzed: ni parvatāḥ ahāsata

original: RV_08.007.03.1{18} udīrayanta vāyubhirvāśrāsaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ
analyzed: udīrayanta vāyubhiḥ vāśrāsaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_08.007.03.2{18} dhukṣantapipyuśīmiṣam
analyzed: dhukṣantapipyuśīmiṣam

original: RV_08.007.04.1{18} vapanti maruto mihaṃ pra vepayanti parvatān
analyzed: vapanti marutaḥ miham pra vepayanti parvatān

original: RV_08.007.04.2{18} yad yāmaṃ yānti vāyubhiḥ
analyzed: yat yāmam yānti vāyubhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.05.1{18} ni yad yāmāya vo girirni sindhavo vidharmaṇe
analyzed: ni yat yāmāya vaḥ giriḥ ni sindhavaḥ vidharmaṇe

original: RV_08.007.05.2{18} mahe śuṣmāya yemire
analyzed: mahe śuṣmāya yemire

original: RV_08.007.06.1{19} yuṣmānu naktamūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe
analyzed: yuṣmān anu naktamūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe

original: RV_08.007.06.2{19} yuṣmān prayatyadhvare
analyzed: yuṣmān prayati adhvare

original: RV_08.007.07.1{19} udu tye aruṇapsavaścitrā yāmebhirīrate
analyzed: udu tye aruṇapsavaḥ citrāḥ yāmebhiḥ īrate

original: RV_08.007.07.2{19} vāśrā adhiṣṇunā divaḥ
analyzed: vāśrāḥ adhiṣṇunā divaḥ

original: RV_08.007.08.1{19} sṛjanti raśmimojasā panthāṃ sūryāya yātave
analyzed: sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthām sūryāya yātave

original: RV_08.007.08.2{19} te bhānubhirvi tasthire
analyzed: te bhānubhiḥ vi tasthire

original: RV_08.007.09.1{19} imāṃ me maruto giramimaṃ stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: imām me marutaḥ giram imam stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.007.09.2{19} imaṃ me vanatā havam
analyzed: imam me vanata havam

original: RV_08.007.10.1{19} trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayo duduhre vajriṇe madhu
analyzed: trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayaḥ duduhre vajriṇe madhu

original: RV_08.007.10.2{19} utsaṃ kavandhamudriṇam
analyzed: utsam kabandha mudriṇam

original: RV_08.007.11.1{20} maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe
analyzed: marutaḥ yat ha vaḥ divaḥ sumnāyantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.007.11.2{20} ā tū na upagantana
analyzed: ā tū naḥ upagantana

original: RV_08.007.12.1{20} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavo rudrā ṛbhukṣaṇo dame
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ rudrāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ dame

original: RV_08.007.12.2{20} uta pracetaso made
analyzed: uta pracetasaḥ made

original: RV_08.007.13.1{20} ā no rayiṃ madacyutaṃ purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim mada cyutam purukṣum viśva dhāyasam

original: RV_08.007.13.2{20} iyartā maruto divaḥ
analyzed: iyarta marutaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_08.007.14.1{20} adhīva yad girīṇāṃ yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam
analyzed: adhi iva yat girīṇām yāmam śubhrāḥ acidhvam

original: RV_08.007.14.2{20} suvānairmandadhva indubhiḥ
analyzed: suvānaiḥ mandadhve indubhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.15.1{20} etāvataścideṣāṃ sumnaṃ bhikṣeta martyaḥ
analyzed: etāvataḥ cit eṣām sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.007.15.2{20} adābhyasya manmabhiḥ
analyzed: adābhyasya manmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.16.1{21} ye drapsā iva rodasī dhamantyanu vṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: ye drapsāḥ iva rodasī dhamanti anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.16.2{21} utsaṃ duhanto akṣitam
analyzed: utsam duhantaḥ akṣitam

original: RV_08.007.17.1{21} udu svānebhirīrata ud rathairudu vāyubhiḥ
analyzed: udu svānebhiḥ īrate ud rathaiḥ udu vāyubhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.17.2{21} ut stomaiḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ
analyzed: ud stomaiḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_08.007.18.1{21} yenāva turvaśaṃ yaduṃ yena kaṇvaṃ dhanaspṛtam
analyzed: yena ava turvaśam yadum yena kaṇvam dhana spṛtam

original: RV_08.007.18.2{21} rāye su tasya dhīmahi
analyzed: rāye su tasya dhīmahi

original: RV_08.007.19.1{21} imā u vaḥ sudānavo ghṛtaṃ na pipyuṣīriṣaḥ
analyzed: imāḥ u vaḥ sudānavaḥ ghṛtam na pipyuṣī iriṣaḥ

original: RV_08.007.19.2{21} vardhān kāṇvasya manmabhiḥ
analyzed: vardhān kāṇvasya manmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.20.1{21} kva nūnaṃ sudānavo madathā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: kva nūnam sudānavaḥ madatha vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.007.20.2{21} brahmā ko vaḥsaparyati
analyzed: brahmā kaḥ vaḥsaparyati

original: RV_08.007.21.1{22} nahi ṣma yad dha vaḥ purā stomebhirvṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: na hi sma yat ha vaḥ purā stomebhiḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.007.21.2{22} śardhān ṛtasya jinvatha
analyzed: śardhān ṛtasya jinvatha

original: RV_08.007.22.1{22} samu tye mahatīrapaḥ saṃ kṣoṇī samu sūryam
analyzed: samu tye mahatīḥ apaḥ sam kṣoṇī samu sūryam

original: RV_08.007.22.2{22} saṃ vajraṃ parvaśo dadhuḥ
analyzed: sam vajram parvaśas

original: RV_08.007.23.1{22} vi vṛtraṃ parvaśo yayurvi parvatānarājinaḥ
analyzed: vi vṛtram parvaśas yayuḥ vi parvatān arājinaḥ

original: RV_08.007.23.2{22} cakrāṇā vṛṣṇi pauṃsyam
analyzed: cakrāṇāḥ vṛṣṇi pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.007.24.1{22} anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmamāvannuta kratum
analyzed: anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvan uta kratum

original: RV_08.007.24.2{22} anvindraṃ vṛtratūrye
analyzed: anu indram vṛtratūrye

original: RV_08.007.25.1{22} vidyuddhastā abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ
analyzed: vidyut hastāḥ abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ

original: RV_08.007.25.2{22} śubhrā vyañjata śriye
analyzed: śubhrāḥ vyañjata śriye

original: RV_08.007.26.1{23} uśanā yat parāvata ukṣṇo randhramayātana
analyzed: uśanā yat parāvataḥ ukṣṇaḥ randhram ayātana

original: RV_08.007.26.2{23} dyaurna cakradad bhiyā
analyzed: dyauḥ na cakradat bhiyā

original: RV_08.007.27.1{23} ā no makhasya dāvane 'śvairhiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ makhasya dāvane śvaiḥ hiraṇya pāṇibhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.27.2{23} devāsa upa gantana
analyzed: devāsaḥ upa gantana

original: RV_08.007.28.1{23} yadeṣāṃ pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭirvahati rohitaḥ
analyzed: yat eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭiḥ vahati rohitaḥ

original: RV_08.007.28.2{23} yānti śubhrā riṇannapaḥ
analyzed: yānti śubhrāḥ riṇan apaḥ

original: RV_08.007.29.1{23} suṣome śaryaṇāvatyārjīke pastyāvati
analyzed: su some śaryaṇāvati ārjīke pastyāvati

original: RV_08.007.29.2{23} yayurnicakrayā naraḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ nicakrayā naraḥ

original: RV_08.007.30.1{23} kadā gachātha maruta itthā vipraṃ havamānam
analyzed: kadā gacchātha marutaḥ itthā vipram havamānam

original: RV_08.007.30.2{23} mārḍīkebhirnādhamānam
analyzed: mārḍīkebhiḥ nādhamānam

original: RV_08.007.31.1{24} kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyo yadindramajahātana
analyzed: kad ha nūnam kadhapriyaḥ yat indram ajahātana

original: RV_08.007.31.2{24} ko vaḥ sakhitva ohate
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ sakhi tve ohate

original: RV_08.007.32.1{24} saho ṣu ṇo vajrahastaiḥ kaṇvāso agniṃ marudbhiḥ
analyzed: saha u su naḥ vajra hastaiḥ kaṇvāsaḥ agnim marudbhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.32.2{24} stuṣehiraṇyavāśībhiḥ
analyzed: stuṣe hiraṇya vāśībhiḥ

original: RV_08.007.33.1{24} o ṣu vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūnā navyase suvitāya
analyzed: ā u su vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūnā navyase suvitāya

original: RV_08.007.33.2{24} vavṛtyāṃ citravājān
analyzed: vavṛtyām citra vājān

original: RV_08.007.34.1{24} girayaścin ni jihate parśānāso manyamānāḥ
analyzed: girayaḥ cit ni jihate parśānāsaḥ manyamānāḥ

original: RV_08.007.34.2{24} parvatāścin ni yemire
analyzed: parvatāḥ cit ni yemire

original: RV_08.007.35.1{24} ākṣṇayāvāno vahantyantarikṣeṇa patataḥ
analyzed: ā akṣṇayāvānaḥ vahanti antarikṣeṇa patataḥ

original: RV_08.007.35.2{24} dhātāraḥ stuvate vayaḥ
analyzed: dhātāraḥ stuvate vayaḥ

original: RV_08.007.36.1{24} agnirhi jāni pūrvyaśchando na sūro arciṣā
analyzed: agniḥ hi jāni pūrvyaḥ chandaḥ na sūraḥ arciṣā

original: RV_08.007.36.2{24} te bhānubhirvi tasthire
analyzed: te bhānubhiḥ vi tasthire

original: RV_08.008.01.1{25} ā no viśvābhirūtibhiraśvinā gachataṃ yuvam
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_08.008.01.2{25} dasrā hiraṇyavartanī pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_08.008.02.1{25} ā nūnaṃ yātamaśvinā rathena sūryatvacā
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā rathena sūrya tvacā

original: RV_08.008.02.2{25} bhujī hiraṇyapeśasā kavī gambhīracetasā
analyzed: bhujī hiraṇya peśasā kavī gambhīra cetasā

original: RV_08.008.03.1{25} ā yātaṃ nahuṣas paryāntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ
analyzed: ā yātam nahuṣaḥ pari ā antarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_08.008.03.2{25} pibāthoaśvinā madhu kaṇvānāṃ savane sutam
analyzed: pibāthaḥ u aśvinā madhu kaṇvānām savane sutam

original: RV_08.008.04.1{25} ā no yātaṃ divas paryāntarikṣādadhapriyā
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam divaḥ pari ā antarikṣa adadha priyā

original: RV_08.008.04.2{25} putraḥ kaṇvasya vāmiha suṣāva somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu

original: RV_08.008.05.1{25} ā no yātamupaśrutyaśvinā somapītaye
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam upaśrutī aśvinā soma pītaye

original: RV_08.008.05.2{25} svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhirnarā
analyzed: svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhiḥ narā

original: RV_08.008.06.1{26} yaccid dhi vāṃ pura ṛṣayo juhūre 'vase narā
analyzed: yat cit hi vām puras ṛṣayaḥ juhūre vase narā

original: RV_08.008.06.2{26} ā yātamaśvinā gatamupemāṃ suṣṭutiṃ mama
analyzed: ā yātam aśvinā gatam upa imām suṣṭutim mama

original: RV_08.008.07.1{26} divaścid rocanādadhyā no gantaṃ svarvidā
analyzed: divaḥ cit rocanā ādadhyā naḥ gantam svar vidā

original: RV_08.008.07.2{26} dhībhirvatsapracetasā stomebhirhavanaśrutā
analyzed: dhībhiḥ vatsa pracetasā stomebhiḥ havana śrutā

original: RV_08.008.08.1{26} kimanye paryāsate 'smat stomebhiraśvinā
analyzed: kim anye paryāsate smat stomebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.008.08.2{26} putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣirgīrbhirvatso avīvṛdhat
analyzed: putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_08.008.09.1{26} ā vāṃ vipra ihāvase 'hvat stomebhiraśvinā
analyzed: ā vām vipraḥ iha avase hvat stomebhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.008.09.2{26} ariprā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtaṃ mayobhuvā
analyzed: ariprā vṛtra hantamā tā naḥ bhūtam mayobhuvā

original: RV_08.008.10.1{26} ā yad vāṃ yoṣaṇā rathamatiṣṭhad vājinīvasū
analyzed: ā yat vām yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhat vājinīvasū

original: RV_08.008.10.2{26} viśvānyaśvinā yuvaṃ pra dhītānyagachatam
analyzed: viśvāni aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāni agachatam

original: RV_08.008.11.1{27} ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: atas sahasra nirṇijā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.008.11.2{27} vatso vāṃ madhumad vaco 'śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: vatsaḥ vām madhumat vacaḥ śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_08.008.12.1{27} purumandrā purūvasū manotarā rayīṇām
analyzed: puru mandrā purūvasū manotarā rayīṇām

original: RV_08.008.12.2{27} stomaṃ me aśvināvimamabhi vahnī anūṣātām
analyzed: stomam me aśvinau imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām

original: RV_08.008.13.1{27} ā no viśvānyaśvinā dhattaṃ rādhāṃsyahrayā
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvāni aśvinā dhattam rādhāṃsi ahrayā

original: RV_08.008.13.2{27} kṛtaṃ na ṛtviyāvato mā no rīradhataṃ nide
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ ṛtviyāvataḥ mā naḥ rīradhatam nide

original: RV_08.008.14.1{27} yan nāastyā parāvati yad vā stho adhyambare
analyzed: yat na aastyā parāvati yat vā sthaḥ adhyambare

original: RV_08.008.14.2{27} ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: atas sahasra nirṇijā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.008.15.1{27} yo vāṃ nāsatyāv ṛṣirgīrbhirvatso avīvṛdhat
analyzed: yaḥ vām nāsatyau ṛṣiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_08.008.15.2{27} tasmai sahasranirṇijamiṣaṃ dhattaṃ ghṛtaścutam
analyzed: tasmai sahasra nirṇijam iṣam dhattam ghṛtaścutam

original: RV_08.008.16.1{28} prāsmā ūrjaṃ ghṛtaścutamaśvinā yachataṃ yuvam
analyzed: pra asmai ūrjam ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchatam yuvam

original: RV_08.008.16.2{28} yo vāṃ sumnāya tuṣṭavad vasūyād dānunas patī
analyzed: yaḥ vām sumnāya tuṣṭavat vasūyāt dānunaḥ patī

original: RV_08.008.17.1{28} ā no gantaṃ riśādasemaṃ stomaṃ purubhujā
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam riśādasā imam stomam puru bhujā

original: RV_08.008.17.2{28} kṛtaṃ naḥ suśriyo naremā dātamabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ su śriyaḥ narā imā dātam abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.008.18.1{28} ā vāṃ viśvābhirūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata
analyzed: ā vām viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_08.008.18.2{28} rājantāvadhvarāṇāmaśvinā yāmahūtiṣu
analyzed: rājantau adhvarāṇām aśvinā yāma hūtiṣu

original: RV_08.008.19.1{28} ā no gantaṃ mayobhuvāśvinā śambhuvā yuvam
analyzed: ā naḥ gantam mayobhuvā aśvinā śambhuvā yuvam

original: RV_08.008.19.2{28} yo vāṃ vipanyū dhītibhirgīrbhirvatso avīvṛdhat
analyzed: yaḥ vām vipanyū dhītibhiḥ gīrbhiḥ vatsaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: RV_08.008.20.1{28} yābhiḥ kaṇvaṃ medhātithiṃ yābhirvaśaṃ daśavrajam
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithim yābhiḥ vaśam daśavrajam

original: RV_08.008.20.2{28} yābhirgośaryamāvataṃ tābhirno 'vataṃ narā
analyzed: yābhiḥ gośaryam āvatam tābhiḥ naḥ vatam narā

original: RV_08.008.21.1{29} yābhirnarā trasadasyumāvataṃ kṛtvye dhane
analyzed: yābhiḥ narā trasadasi umāvatam kṛtvye dhane

original: RV_08.008.21.2{29} tābhiḥ ṣvasmānaśvinā prāvataṃ vājasātaye
analyzed: tābhiḥ su asmān aśvinā prāvatam vājasātaye

original: RV_08.008.22.1{29} pra vāṃ stomāḥ suvṛktayo giro vardhantvaśvinā
analyzed: pra vām stomāḥ suvṛktayaḥ giraḥ vardhantu aśvinā

original: RV_08.008.22.2{29} purutrā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtaṃ puruspṛhā
analyzed: purutrā vṛtra hantamā tā naḥ bhūtam puruspṛhā

original: RV_08.008.23.1{29} trīṇi padānyaśvinorāviḥ sānti guhā paraḥ
analyzed: trīṇi padāni aśvinoḥ āvis sānti guhā paras

original: RV_08.008.23.2{29} kavī ṛtasya patmabhirarvāg jīvebhyas pari
analyzed: kavī ṛtasya patmabhiḥ arvāk jīvebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_08.009.01.1{30} ā nūnamaśvinā yuvaṃ vatsasya gantamavase
analyzed: ā nūnam aśvinā yuvam vatsasya gantam avase

original: RV_08.009.01.2{30} prāsmai yachatamavṛkaṃ pṛthu chardiryuyutaṃ yā arātayaḥ
analyzed: pra asmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu chardiḥ yuyutam yāḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_08.009.02.1{30} yadantarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣānanu
analyzed: yat antarikṣe yat divi yat pañca mānuṣān anu

original: RV_08.009.02.2{30} nṛmṇantad dhattamaśvinā
analyzed: nṛmṇantat dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_08.009.03.1{30} ye vāṃ daṃsāṃsyaśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ
analyzed: ye vām daṃsāṃsi aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ

original: RV_08.009.03.2{30} evet kāṇvasya bodhatam
analyzed: eva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_08.009.04.1{30} ayaṃ vāṃ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate
analyzed: ayam vām gharmaḥ aśvinā stomena pari sicyate

original: RV_08.009.04.2{30} ayaṃ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṃ ciketathaḥ
analyzed: ayam somaḥ madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtram ciketathaḥ

original: RV_08.009.05.1{30} yadapsu yad vanaspatau yadoṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kṛtam
analyzed: yat apsu yat vanaspatau yat oṣadhīṣu puru daṃsasā kṛtam

original: RV_08.009.05.2{30} tena māviṣṭamaśvinā
analyzed: tena mā aviṣṭam aśvinā

original: RV_08.009.06.1{31} yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ
analyzed: yat nāsatyā bhuraṇyathaḥ yat vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ

original: RV_08.009.06.2{31} ayaṃ vāṃ vatso matibhirna vindhate haviṣmantaṃ hi gachathaḥ
analyzed: ayam vām vatsaḥ matibhiḥ na vindhate haviṣmantam hi gachathaḥ

original: RV_08.009.07.1{31} ā nūnamaśvinor{ṛ}ṣiḥ stomaṃ ciketa vāmayā
analyzed: ā nūnam aśvinoḥ ṛṣiḥ stomam ciketa vāmayā

original: RV_08.009.07.2{31} ā somaṃ madhumattamaṃ gharmaṃ siñcādatharvaṇi
analyzed: ā somam madhumattamam gharmam siñcāt atharvaṇi

original: RV_08.009.08.1{31} ā nūnaṃ raghuvartaniṃ rathaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā
analyzed: ā nūnam raghu vartanim ratham tiṣṭhāthaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.009.08.2{31} ā vāṃ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata
analyzed: ā vām stomāḥ ime mama nabhaḥ na cucyavīrata

original: RV_08.009.09.1{31} yadadya vāṃ nāsatyokthairācucyuvīmahi
analyzed: yat adya vām nāsatya ukthaiḥ ācucyuvīmahi

original: RV_08.009.09.2{31} yad vā vāṇībhiraśvinevet kāṇvasya bodhatam
analyzed: yat vā vāṇībhiḥ aśvinā iva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_08.009.10.1{31} yad vāṃ kakṣīvānuta yad vyaśva ṛṣiryad vāṃ dīrghatamā juhāva
analyzed: yat vām kakṣīvān uta yat vyaśvaḥ ṛṣiḥ yat vām dīrghatamāḥ juhāva

original: RV_08.009.10.2{31} pṛthī yad vāṃ vainyaḥ sādaneṣvevedato aśvinā cetayethām
analyzed: pṛthī yat vām vainyaḥ sādaneṣu eva idataḥ aśvinā cetayethām

original: RV_08.009.11.1{32} yātaṃ chardiṣpā uta naḥ paraspā bhūtaṃ jagatpā uta nastanūpā
analyzed: yātam chardiṣpau uta naḥ paraspā bhūtam jagat pau uta naḥ tanū pā

original: RV_08.009.11.2{32} vartistokāya tanayāya yātam
analyzed: varti stokāya tanayāya yātam

original: RV_08.009.12.1{32} yadindreṇa sarathaṃ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā
analyzed: yat indreṇa sa ratham yāthaḥ aśvinā yat vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā

original: RV_08.009.12.2{32} yadādityebhir{ṛ}bhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇorvikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ
analyzed: yat ādityebhiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yat vā viṣṇoḥ vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ

original: RV_08.009.13.1{32} yadadyāśvināvahaṃ huveya vājasātaye
analyzed: yat adya aśvinau aham huveya vājasātaye

original: RV_08.009.13.2{32} yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahastacchreṣṭhamaśvinoravaḥ
analyzed: yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahaḥ tat śreṣṭham aśvinā uravaḥ

original: RV_08.009.14.1{32} ā nūnaṃ yātamaśvinemā havyāni vāṃ hitā
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā imā havyāni vām hitā

original: RV_08.009.14.2{32} ime somāsoadhi turvaśe yadāvime kaṇveṣu vāmatha
analyzed: ime somāsaḥ adhi turvaśe yadau ime kaṇveṣu vām atha

original: RV_08.009.15.1{32} yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam
analyzed: yat nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam

original: RV_08.009.15.2{32} tena nūnaṃ vimadāya pracetasā chardirvatsāya yachatam
analyzed: tena nūnam vimadāya pracetasā chardiḥ vatsāya yacchatam

original: RV_08.009.16.1{33} abhutsyu pra devyā sākaṃ vācāhamaśvinoḥ
analyzed: pra devyā sākam vācā aham aśvinoḥ

original: RV_08.009.16.2{33} vyāvardevyā matiṃ vi rātiṃ martyebhyaḥ
analyzed: vyāvardevyā matim vi rātim martyebhyaḥ

original: RV_08.009.17.1{33} pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi
analyzed: pra bodhaya uṣaḥ aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi

original: RV_08.009.17.2{33} pra yajñahotarānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat
analyzed: pra yajña hotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_08.009.18.1{33} yaduṣo yāsi bhānunā saṃ sūryeṇa rocase
analyzed: yaduṣaḥ yāsi bhānunā sam sūryeṇa rocase

original: RV_08.009.18.2{33} ā hāyamaśvino ratho vartiryāti nṛpāyyam
analyzed: ā ha ayam aśvinoḥ rathaḥ vartiḥ yāti nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_08.009.19.1{33} yadāpītāso aṃśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ
analyzed: yadā apītāsaḥ aṃśavaḥ gāvaḥ na duhre ūdhabhiḥ

original: RV_08.009.19.2{33} yad vā vāṇīranūṣata pra devayanto aśvinā
analyzed: yat vā vāṇīḥ anūṣata pra devayantaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.009.20.1{33} pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe
analyzed: pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe

original: RV_08.009.20.2{33} pra dakṣāya pracetasā
analyzed: pra dakṣāya pracetasā

original: RV_08.009.21.1{33} yan nūnaṃ dhībhiraśvinā pituryonā niṣīdathaḥ yad vāsumnebhirukthyā
analyzed: yat nūnam dhībhiḥ aśvinā pituḥ yonā niṣīdathaḥ yat vāsumnebhiḥ ukthyā

original: RV_08.010.01.1{34} yat stho dīrghaprasadmani yad vādo rocane divaḥ
analyzed: yat sthaḥ dīrghaprasadmani yat vā adaḥ rocane divaḥ

original: RV_08.010.01.2{34} yad vā samudre adhyākṛte gṛhe 'ta ā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: yat vā samudre adhyākṛte gṛhe te ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.010.02.1{34} yad vā yajñaṃ manave sammimikṣathurevet kāṇvasya bodhatam
analyzed: yat vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathuḥ eva id kāṇvasya bodhatam

original: RV_08.010.02.2{34} bṛhaspatiṃ viśvān devānahaṃ huva indrāviṣṇū aśvināvāśuheṣasā
analyzed: bṛhaspatim viśvān devān aham huve indrāviṣṇū aśvinau āśu heṣasā

original: RV_08.010.03.1{34} tyā nvaśvinā huve sudaṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā
analyzed: tyā nu aśvinā huve su daṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā

original: RV_08.010.03.2{34} yayorasti praṇaḥ sakhyaṃ deveṣvadhyāpyam
analyzed: yayoḥ asti praṇaḥ sakhyam deveṣu adhyāpyam

original: RV_08.010.04.1{34} yayoradhi pra yajñā asūre santi sūrayaḥ
analyzed: yayoḥ adhi pra yajñāḥ asūre santi sūrayaḥ

original: RV_08.010.04.2{34} tā yajñasyādhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhiryā pibataḥ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: tā yajñasya adhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhiḥ yā pibataḥ somyam madhu

original: RV_08.010.05.1{34} yadadyāśvināvapāg yat prāk stho vājinīvasū
analyzed: yat adya aśvinau apāk yat prāk sthaḥ vājinīvasū

original: RV_08.010.05.2{34} yad druhyavyanavi turvaśe yadau huve vāmatha mā gatam
analyzed: yat turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam

original: RV_08.010.06.1{34} yadantarikṣe patathaḥ purubhujā yad veme rodasī anu
analyzed: yat antarikṣe patathaḥ puru bhujā yat vā ime rodasī anu

original: RV_08.010.06.2{34} yadvā svadhābhiradhitiṣṭhatho rathamata ā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: yat vā svadhābhiḥ adhitiṣṭhathaḥ ratham atas ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.011.01.1{35} tvamagne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣvā
analyzed: tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi devaḥ ā martya iṣvā

original: RV_08.011.01.2{35} tvaṃ yajñeṣvīḍyaḥ
analyzed: tvam yajñeṣu īḍyaḥ

original: RV_08.011.02.1{35} tvamasi praśasyo vidatheṣu sahantya
analyzed: tvam asi praśasyaḥ vidatheṣu sahantya

original: RV_08.011.02.2{35} agne rathīradhvarāṇām
analyzed: agne rathīḥ adhvarāṇām

original: RV_08.011.03.1{35} sa tvamasmadapa dviṣo yuyodhi jātavedaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam asmat apa dviṣaḥ yuyodhi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_08.011.03.2{35} adevīragne arātīḥ
analyzed: adevīḥ agne arātīḥ

original: RV_08.011.04.1{35} anti cit santamaha yajñaṃ martasya ripoḥ
analyzed: anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ

original: RV_08.011.04.2{35} nopa veṣi jātavedaḥ
analyzed: na upa veṣi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_08.011.05.1{35} martā amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe
analyzed: martāḥ amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe

original: RV_08.011.05.2{35} viprāso jātavedasaḥ
analyzed: viprāsaḥ jātavedasaḥ

original: RV_08.011.06.1{36} vipraṃ viprāso 'vase devaṃ martāsa ūtaye
analyzed: vipram viprāsaḥ vase devam martāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_08.011.06.2{36} agniṃ gīrbhirhavāmahe
analyzed: agnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.011.07.1{36} ā te vatso mano yamat paramāccit sadhasthāt
analyzed: ā te vatsaḥ manaḥ yamat paramāt cit sadhasthāt

original: RV_08.011.07.2{36} agne tvāṃ kāmayā girā
analyzed: agne tvām kāmayā girā

original: RV_08.011.08.1{36} purutrā hi sadṛṃṃ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ
analyzed: purutrā hi sadṛś asi viśaḥ viśvāḥ anu prabhuḥ

original: RV_08.011.08.2{36} samatsutvā havāmahe
analyzed: samad sutvā havāmahe

original: RV_08.011.09.1{36} samatsvagnimavase vājayanto havāmahe
analyzed: samatsu agnim avase vājayantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.011.09.2{36} vājeṣu citrarādhasam
analyzed: vājeṣu citra rādhasam

original: RV_08.011.10.1{36} pratno hi kamīḍyo adhvareṣu sanācca hotā navyaśca satsi
analyzed: pratnaḥ hi kamī īḍyaḥ adhvareṣu sanāt ca hotā navyaḥ ca satsi

original: RV_08.011.10.2{36} svāṃ cāgne tanvaṃ piprayasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagamā yajasva
analyzed: svām ca agne tanvam piprayasva asmabhyam ca saubhagam ā yajasva

original: RV_08.012.01.1{01} ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati
analyzed: yaḥ indra soma pātamaḥ madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati

original: RV_08.012.01.2{01} yenā haṃsi nyatriṇaṃ tamīmahe
analyzed: yena haṃsi nyatriṇam tamīmahe

original: RV_08.012.02.1{01} yenā daśagvamadhriguṃ vepayantaṃ svarṇaram
analyzed: yena daśagvam adhrigum vepayantam svarṇaram

original: RV_08.012.02.2{01} yenā samudramāvithā tamīmahe
analyzed: yena samudram āvitha tamīmahe

original: RV_08.012.03.1{01} yena sindhuṃ mahīrapo rathāniva pracodayaḥ
analyzed: yena sindhum mahī rapaḥ rathān iva pracodayaḥ

original: RV_08.012.03.2{01} panthām ṛtasya yātave tamīmahe
analyzed: panthām ṛtasya yātave tamīmahe

original: RV_08.012.04.1{01} imaṃ stomamabhiṣṭaye ghṛtaṃ na pūtamadrivaḥ
analyzed: imam stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtam na pūtam adrivas

original: RV_08.012.04.2{01} yenā nusadya ojasā vavakṣitha
analyzed: yena nusadyas ojasā vavakṣitha

original: RV_08.012.05.1{01} imaṃ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudra iva pinvate
analyzed: imam juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudraḥ iva pinvate

original: RV_08.012.05.2{01} indra viśvābhirūtibhirvavakṣitha
analyzed: indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ vavakṣitha

original: RV_08.012.06.1{02} yo no devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe

original: RV_08.012.06.2{02} divo na vṛṣṭiṃ prathayan vavakṣitha
analyzed: divaḥ na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha

original: RV_08.012.07.1{02} vavakṣurasya ketavo uta vajro gabhastyoḥ
analyzed: vavakṣuḥ asya ketavaḥ uta vajraḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_08.012.07.2{02} yat sūryo na rodasī avardhayat
analyzed: yat sūryaḥ na rodasī avardhayat

original: RV_08.012.08.1{02} yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasraṃ mahiṣānaghaḥ
analyzed: yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣa anaghaḥ

original: RV_08.012.08.2{02} ādit ta indriyaṃ mahi pra vāvṛdhe
analyzed: ādit te indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe

original: RV_08.012.09.1{02} indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhirnyarśasānamoṣati
analyzed: indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ nyarśasānam oṣati

original: RV_08.012.09.2{02} agnirvaneva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe
analyzed: agniḥ vanā iva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe

original: RV_08.012.10.1{02} iyaṃ ta ṛtviyāvatī dhītireti navīyasī
analyzed: iyam te ṛtviyāvatī dhītiḥ eti navīyasī

original: RV_08.012.10.2{02} saparyantī purupriyā mimīta it
analyzed: saparyantī puru priyā mimīte id

original: RV_08.012.11.1{03} garbho yajñasya devayuḥ kratuṃ punīta ānuṣak
analyzed: garbhaḥ yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīte ānuṣak

original: RV_08.012.11.2{03} stomairindrasya vāvṛdhe mimīta it
analyzed: stomaiḥ indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīte id

original: RV_08.012.12.1{03} sanirmitrasya papratha indraḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: sanirmitrasya paprathe indraḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.012.12.2{03} prācī vāśīva sunvate mimīta it
analyzed: prācī vāśī iva sunvate mimīte id

original: RV_08.012.13.1{03} yaṃ viprā ukthavāhaso 'bhipramandurāyavaḥ
analyzed: yam viprāḥ uktha vāhasaḥ bhipra mandurāyavaḥ

original: RV_08.012.13.2{03} ghṛtaṃ na pipya āsany ṛtasya yat
analyzed: ghṛtam na pipye āsani ṛtasya yat

original: RV_08.012.14.1{03} uta svarāje aditi stomamindrāya jījanat
analyzed: uta sva rāje aditiḥ stomam indrāya jījanat

original: RV_08.012.14.2{03} purupraśastamūtaya ṛtasya yat
analyzed: puru praśastam ūtaye ṛtasya yat

original: RV_08.012.15.1{03} abhi vahnaya ūtaye 'nūṣata praśastaye
analyzed: abhi vahnayaḥ ūtaye nūṣata praśastaye

original: RV_08.012.15.2{03} na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat
analyzed: na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat

original: RV_08.012.16.1{04} yat somamindra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye
analyzed: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yat vā gha trite āptye

original: RV_08.012.16.2{04} yad vā marutsu mandase samindubhiḥ
analyzed: yat vā marutsu mandase samindubhiḥ

original: RV_08.012.17.1{04} yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase
analyzed: yat vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase

original: RV_08.012.17.2{04} asmākamit sute raṇā samindubhiḥ
analyzed: asmākam id sute raṇa sam indubhiḥ

original: RV_08.012.18.1{04} yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate
analyzed: yat vā asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ yajamānasya satpate

original: RV_08.012.18.2{04} ukthe vā yasyaraṇyasi samindubhiḥ
analyzed: ukthe vā yasya araṇyasi sam indubhiḥ

original: RV_08.012.19.1{04} devaṃ-devaṃ vo 'vasa indram-indraṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi
analyzed: devam devam vaḥ vase indram indram gṛṇīṣaṇi

original: RV_08.012.19.2{04} adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vyānaśuḥ
analyzed: adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vyānaśuḥ

original: RV_08.012.20.1{04} yajñebhiryajñavāhasaṃ somebhiḥ somapātamam
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ yajña vāhasam somebhiḥ soma pātamam

original: RV_08.012.20.2{04} hotrābhirindraṃ vāvṛdhurvyānaśuḥ
analyzed: hotrābhiḥ indram vāvṛdhuḥ vyānaśuḥ

original: RV_08.012.21.1{05} mahīrasya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīruta praśastayaḥ
analyzed: mahīḥ asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_08.012.21.2{05} viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vyānaśuḥ
analyzed: viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vyānaśuḥ

original: RV_08.012.22.1{05} indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave devāso dadhire puraḥ
analyzed: indram vṛtrāya hantave devāsaḥ dadhire puras

original: RV_08.012.22.2{05} indraṃ vāṇīranūṣatā samojase
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anūṣata samojase

original: RV_08.012.23.1{05} mahāntaṃ mahinā vayaṃ stomebhirhavanaśrutam
analyzed: mahāntam mahinā vayam stomebhiḥ havana śrutam

original: RV_08.012.23.2{05} arkairabhipra ṇonumaḥ samojase
analyzed: arkaiḥ abhipra nonumaḥ samojase

original: RV_08.012.24.1{05} na yaṃ vivikto rodasī nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam
analyzed: na yam viviktaḥ rodasī na antarikṣāṇi vajriṇam

original: RV_08.012.24.2{05} amādidasya titviṣe samojasaḥ
analyzed: amādidasya titviṣe samojasaḥ

original: RV_08.012.25.1{05} yadindra pṛtanājye devāstvā dadhire puraḥ
analyzed: yat indra pṛtanājye devāḥ tvā dadhire puras

original: RV_08.012.25.2{05} ādit te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ
analyzed: ādit te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ

original: RV_08.012.26.1{06} yadā vṛtraṃ nadīvṛtaṃ śavasā vajrinnavadhīḥ
analyzed: yadā vṛtram nadīvṛtam śavasā vajrin avadhīḥ
ā t it te

original: RV_08.012.27.1{06} yadā te viṣṇurojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame
analyzed: yadā te viṣṇuḥ ojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame
ā t it te

original: RV_08.012.28.1{06} yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive-dive
analyzed: yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive dive

original: RV_08.012.28.2{06} ādit te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire
analyzed: ādit te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire

original: RV_08.012.29.1{06} yadā te mārutīrviśastubhyamindra niyemire
analyzed: yadā te mārutīḥ viśaḥ tubhyam indra niyemire
ā id te u

original: RV_08.012.30.1{06} yadā sūryamamuṃ divi śukraṃ jyotiradhārayaḥ
analyzed: yadā sūryam amum divi śukram jyotiḥ adhārayaḥ
āditte u

original: RV_08.012.31.1{06} imāṃ ta indra suṣṭutiṃ vipra iyarti dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: imām te indra suṣṭutim vipraḥ iyarti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_08.012.31.2{06} jāmiṃ padeva pipratīṃ prādhvare
analyzed: jāmim padā iva pipratīm pra adhvare

original: RV_08.012.32.1{06} yadasya dhāmani priye samīcīnāso asvaran
analyzed: yat asya dhāmani priye samīcīnāsaḥ asvaran

original: RV_08.012.32.2{06} nābhā yajñasya dohanā prādhvare
analyzed: nābhā yajñasya dohanā pra adhvare

original: RV_08.012.33.1{06} suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ sugavyaṃ indra daddhi naḥ
analyzed: su vīryam su aśvyam su gavyam indra daddhi naḥ

original: RV_08.012.33.2{06} hoteva pūrvacittaye prādhvare
analyzed: hotā iva pūrvacittaye pra adhvare

original: RV_08.013.01.1{07} indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratuṃ punīta ukthyam
analyzed: indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratum punīte ukthyam

original: RV_08.013.01.2{07} vide vṛdhasyadakṣaso mahān hi ṣaḥ
analyzed: vide vṛdhasya dakṣasaḥ mahān hi saḥ

original: RV_08.013.02.1{07} sa prathame vyomani devānāṃ sadane vṛdhaḥ
analyzed: sa prathame vyomani devānām sadane vṛdhaḥ
