original: RV_08.013.02.2{07} supāraḥ suśravastamaḥ samapsujit
analyzed: su pāraḥ su śravastamaḥ sam apsujit

original: RV_08.013.03.1{07} tamahve vājasātaya indraṃ bharāya śuṣmiṇam
analyzed: tam ahve vājasātaye indram bharāya śuṣmiṇam

original: RV_08.013.03.2{07} bhavā naḥsumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe
analyzed: bhavā naḥsumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe

original: RV_08.013.04.1{07} iyaṃ ta indra girvaṇo rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ
analyzed: iyam te indra girvaṇaḥ rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ

original: RV_08.013.04.2{07} mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi
analyzed: mandānaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ vi rājasi

original: RV_08.013.05.1{07} nūnaṃ tadindra daddhi no yat tvā sunvanta īmahe
analyzed: nūnam tat indra daddhi naḥ yat tvā sunvantaḥ īmahe

original: RV_08.013.05.2{07} rayiṃ naścitramā bharā svarvidam
analyzed: rayim naḥ citramā ā bhara svar vidam

original: RV_08.013.06.1{08} stotā yat te vicarṣaṇiratipraśardhayad giraḥ
analyzed: stotā yat te vicarṣaṇiḥ atipraśardhayat giraḥ

original: RV_08.013.06.2{08} vayā ivānu rohate juṣanta yat
analyzed: vayāḥ iva anu rohate juṣanta yat

original: RV_08.013.07.1{08} pratnavajjanayā giraḥ śṛṇudhī jariturhavam
analyzed: pratna vat janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhi jarituḥ havam

original: RV_08.013.07.2{08} made-made vavakṣithā sukṛtvane
analyzed: mademade vavakṣitha su kṛtvane

original: RV_08.013.08.1{08} krīḷantyasya sūnṛtā āpo na pravatā yatīḥ
analyzed: krīḍanti asya sūnṛtāḥ āpaḥ na pravatā yatīḥ

original: RV_08.013.08.2{08} ayā dhiyā ya ucyate patirdivaḥ
analyzed: ayā dhiyā yaḥ ucyate patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_08.013.09.1{08} uto patirya ucyate kṛṣṭīnāmeka id vaśī
analyzed: uta u patiḥ yaḥ ucyate kṛṣṭīnām ekaḥ id vaśī

original: RV_08.013.09.2{08} namovṛdhairavasyubhiḥ sute raṇa
analyzed: namaḥ vṛdhaiḥ avasyubhiḥ sute raṇa

original: RV_08.013.10.1{08} stuhi śrutaṃ vipaścitaṃ harī yasya prasakṣiṇā
analyzed: stuhi śrutam vipaścitam harī yasya prasakṣiṇā

original: RV_08.013.10.2{08} gantārā dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ namasvinaḥ
analyzed: gantārā dāśuṣaḥ gṛham namasvinaḥ

original: RV_08.013.11.1{09} tūtujāno mahemate 'śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ
analyzed: tūtujānaḥ mahemate śvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ

original: RV_08.013.11.2{09} ā yāhi yajñamāśubhiḥ śamid dhi te
analyzed: ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śamidh hi te

original: RV_08.013.12.1{09} indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayiṃ gṛṇatsu dhāraya
analyzed: indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayim gṛṇatsu dhāraya

original: RV_08.013.12.2{09} śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanam
analyzed: śravaḥ sūribhyaḥ amṛtam vasutvanam

original: RV_08.013.13.1{09} have tvā sūra udite have madhyandine divaḥ
analyzed: have tvā sūre udite have madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_08.013.13.2{09} juṣāṇa indra saptibhirna ā gahi
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra saptibhiḥ naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_08.013.14.1{09} ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsvā sutasya gomataḥ
analyzed: ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsva sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.013.14.2{09} tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ yathā vide
analyzed: tantum tanuṣva pūrvyam yathā vide

original: RV_08.013.15.1{09} yacchakrāsi parāvati yadarvāvati vṛtrahan
analyzed: yat śakra asi parāvati yat arvāvati vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.013.15.2{09} yad vā samudre andhaso 'vitedasi
analyzed: yat vā samudre andhasaḥ vitedasi

original: RV_08.013.16.1{10} indraṃ vardhantu no gira indraṃ sutāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: indram vardhantu naḥ giraḥ indram sutāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_08.013.16.2{10} indre haviṣmatīrviśo arāṇiṣuḥ
analyzed: indre haviṣmatīḥ viśaḥ arāṇiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.013.17.1{10} tamid viprā avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: tam id viprāḥ avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.013.17.2{10} indraṃ kṣoṇīravardhayan vayā iva
analyzed: indram kṣoṇīḥ avardhayan vayāḥ iva

original: RV_08.013.18.1{10} trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñamatnata
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

original: RV_08.013.18.2{10} tamid vardhantuno giraḥ sadāvṛdham
analyzed: tam id vardhantunaḥ giraḥ sadāvṛdham

original: RV_08.013.19.1{10} stotā yat te anuvrata ukthāny ṛtuthā dadhe
analyzed: stotā yat te anuvrataḥ ukthāni ṛtuthā dadhe

original: RV_08.013.19.2{10} śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate so adbhutaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ ucyate saḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_08.013.20.1{10} tadid rudrasya cetati yahvaṃ pratneṣu dhāmasu
analyzed: tat id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu

original: RV_08.013.20.2{10} mano yatrāvi tad dadhurvicetasaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ yatra avi tat

original: RV_08.013.21.1{11} yadi me sakhyamāvara imasya pāhyandhasaḥ
analyzed: yadi me sakhyam āvaraḥ imasya pāhi andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.013.21.2{11} yena viśvā ati dviṣo atārima
analyzed: yena viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ atārima

original: RV_08.013.22.1{11} kadā ta indra girvaṇa stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ
analyzed: kadā te indra girvaṇaḥ stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ

original: RV_08.013.22.2{11} kadā no gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ
analyzed: kadā naḥ gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ

original: RV_08.013.23.1{11} uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahato ratham
analyzed: uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahataḥ ratham

original: RV_08.013.23.2{11} ajuryasya madintamaṃ yamīmahe
analyzed: ajuryasya madintamam yamīmahe

original: RV_08.013.24.1{11} tamīmahe puruṣṭutaṃ yahvaṃ pratnābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: tam īmahe puruṣṭutam yahvam pratnābhiḥ rūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.013.24.2{11} ni barhiṣi priye sadadadha dvitā
analyzed: ni barhiṣi priye sadadadha dvitā

original: RV_08.013.25.1{11} vardhasvā su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: vardhasva su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭuta ābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.013.25.2{11} dhukṣasvapipyuṣīmiṣamavā ca naḥ
analyzed: dhukṣasva pipyuṣī imiṣam avā ca naḥ

original: RV_08.013.26.1{12} indra tvamavitedasītthā stuvato adrivaḥ
analyzed: indra tvam avitā idam itthā stuvataḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.013.26.2{12} ṛtādiyarmi te dhiyaṃ manoyujam
analyzed: ṛtā ādiyarmi te dhiyam manaḥ yujam

original: RV_08.013.27.1{12} iha tyā sadhamādya yujānaḥ somapītaye
analyzed: iha tyā sadhamādya yujānaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_08.013.27.2{12} harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara
analyzed: harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara

original: RV_08.013.28.1{12} abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam
analyzed: abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam

original: RV_08.013.28.2{12} uto marutvatīrviśo abhi prayaḥ
analyzed: uta u marutvatīḥ viśaḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_08.013.29.1{12} imā asya pratūrtayaḥ padaṃ juṣanta yad divi
analyzed: imāḥ asya pratūrtayaḥ padam juṣanta yat divi

original: RV_08.013.29.2{12} nābhā yajñasya saṃ dadhuryathā vide
analyzed: nābhā yajñasya sam dadhuḥ yathā vide

original: RV_08.013.30.1{12} ayaṃ dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayatyadhvare
analyzed: ayam dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayati adhvare

original: RV_08.013.30.2{12} mimīte yajñamānuṣag vicakṣya
analyzed: mimīte yajña mānuṣak vicakṣya

original: RV_08.013.31.1{13} vṛṣāyamindra te ratha uto te vṛṣaṇā harī
analyzed: vṛṣā ayam indra te rathaḥ uta u te vṛṣaṇā harī

original: RV_08.013.31.2{13} vṛṣā tvaṃśatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā tvam śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_08.013.32.1{13} vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā madaḥ vṛṣā somaḥ ayam sutaḥ

original: RV_08.013.32.2{13} vṛṣāyajño yaminvasi vṛṣā havaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā ayajñaḥ yamin vasi vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_08.013.33.1{13} vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñcitrābhirutibhiḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇam huve vajrin citrābhiḥ rutibhiḥ

original: RV_08.013.33.2{13} vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutiṃ vṛṣā havaḥ
analyzed: vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutim vṛṣā havaḥ

original: RV_08.014.01.1{14} yadindrāhaṃ yathā tvamīśīya vasva eka it
analyzed: yat indra aham yathā tvam īśīya vasvaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_08.014.01.2{14} stotā megoṣakhā syāt
analyzed: stotā megoṣakhā syāt

original: RV_08.014.02.1{14} śikṣeyamasmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe
analyzed: śikṣeyam asmai ditseyam śacīpate manīṣiṇe

original: RV_08.014.02.2{14} yadahaṃ gopatiḥ syām
analyzed: yat aham gopatiḥ syām

original: RV_08.014.03.1{14} dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: dhenuḥ te indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_08.014.03.2{14} gāmaśvaṃ pipyuṣī duhe
analyzed: gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe

original: RV_08.014.04.1{14} na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ
analyzed: na te vartā asti rādhasaḥ indra devaḥ na martyaḥ

original: RV_08.014.04.2{14} yad ditsasistuto magham
analyzed: yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham

original: RV_08.014.05.1{14} yajña indramavardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vyavartayat
analyzed: yajñaḥ indram avardhayat yat bhūmim vyavartayat

original: RV_08.014.05.2{14} cakrāṇa opaśaṃ divi
analyzed: cakrāṇaḥ opaśam divi

original: RV_08.014.06.1{15} vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ
analyzed: vāvṛdhānasya te vayam viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_08.014.06.2{15} ūtimindrā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: ūtim indra vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.014.07.1{15} vyantarikṣamatiran made somasya rocanā
analyzed: vi antarikṣam atirat made somasya rocanā

original: RV_08.014.07.2{15} indro yadabhinadvalam
analyzed: indraḥ yat abhinat valam

original: RV_08.014.08.1{15} ud gā ājadaṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ
analyzed: ud gāḥ ājat aṅgirobhyaḥ āvis kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ

original: RV_08.014.08.2{15} arvāñcaṃ nunude valam
analyzed: arvāñcam nunude valam

original: RV_08.014.09.1{15} indreṇa rocanā divo dṛḷhāni dṛṃhitāni ca
analyzed: indreṇa rocanā divaḥ dṛḍhāni dṛṃhitāni ca

original: RV_08.014.09.2{15} sthirāṇi naparāṇude
analyzed: sthirāṇi na parāṇude

original: RV_08.014.10.1{15} apāmūrmirmadanniva stoma indrājirāyate
analyzed: apām ūrmiḥ madan iva stomaḥ indra ajirāyate

original: RV_08.014.10.2{15} vi te madā arājiṣuḥ
analyzed: vi te madāḥ arājiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.014.11.1{16} tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsyukthavardhanaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi stoma vardhanaḥ indra asi uktha vardhanaḥ

original: RV_08.014.11.2{16} stotṝṇāmuta bhadrakṛt
analyzed: stotṝṇām uta bhadra kṛt

original: RV_08.014.12.1{16} indramit keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ
analyzed: indra mit keśinā harī soma peyāya vakṣataḥ

original: RV_08.014.12.2{16} upa yajñaṃsurādhasam
analyzed: upa yajñaṃsurādhasam

original: RV_08.014.13.1{16} apāṃ phenena namuceḥ śira indrodavartayaḥ
analyzed: apām phenena namuceḥ śiraḥ indra udavartayaḥ

original: RV_08.014.13.2{16} viśvā yadajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ
analyzed: viśvāḥ yat ajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.014.14.1{16} māyābhirutsisṛpsata indra dyāmārurukṣataḥ
analyzed: māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsataḥ indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ

original: RV_08.014.14.2{16} ava dasyūnradhūnuthāḥ
analyzed: ava dasyūn radhūnuthāḥ

original: RV_08.014.15.1{16} asunvāmindra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vyanāśayaḥ
analyzed: a sunvām indra saṃsadam viṣūcīm vyanāśayaḥ

original: RV_08.014.15.2{16} somapā uttaro bhavan
analyzed: soma pāḥ uttaraḥ bhavan

original: RV_08.015.01.1{17} taṃ vabhi pra gāyata puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutam
analyzed: tam vabhi pra gāyata puru hūtam puruṣṭutam

original: RV_08.015.01.2{17} indraṃ gīrbhistaviṣamā vivāsata
analyzed: indram gīrbhiḥ taviṣamāḥ vivāsata

original: RV_08.015.02.1{17} yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī
analyzed: yasya dvibarhasaḥ bṛhat sahaḥ dādhāra rodasī

original: RV_08.015.02.2{17} girīnrajrānapaḥ svarvṛṣatvanā
analyzed: girīn rajrān apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā

original: RV_08.015.03.1{17} sa rājasi puruṣṭuta eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase
analyzed: sa rājasi puruṣṭutaḥ ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnase

original: RV_08.015.03.2{17} indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave
analyzed: indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave

original: RV_08.015.04.1{17} taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇaṃ pṛtsu sāsahim
analyzed: tam te madam gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim

original: RV_08.015.04.2{17} u lokakṛtnumadrivo hariśriyam
analyzed: u loka kṛtnum adrivas hari śriyam

original: RV_08.015.05.1{17} yena jyotīṃṣyāyave manave ca viveditha
analyzed: yena jyotīṃṣi āyave manave ca viveditha

original: RV_08.015.05.2{17} mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi
analyzed: mandānaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ vi rājasi

original: RV_08.015.06.1{18} tadadyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā
analyzed: tat adyā cit te ukthinaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: RV_08.015.06.2{18} vṛṣapatnīrapo jayā dive-dive
analyzed: vṛṣa patnīḥ apaḥ jaya dive dive

original: RV_08.015.07.1{18} tava tyadindriyaṃ bṛhat tava śuṣmamuta kratum
analyzed: tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum

original: RV_08.015.07.2{18} vajraṃ śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam
analyzed: vajram śiśāti dhiṣaṇā vareṇyam

original: RV_08.015.08.1{18} tava dyaurindra pauṃsyaṃ pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ
analyzed: tava dyauḥ indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ

original: RV_08.015.08.2{18} tvāmāpaḥ parvatāsaśca hinvire
analyzed: tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaḥ ca hinvire

original: RV_08.015.09.1{18} tvāṃ viṣṇurbṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ
analyzed: tvām viṣṇuḥ bṛhan kṣayaḥ mitraḥ gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ

original: RV_08.015.09.2{18} tvāṃśardho madatyanu mārutam
analyzed: tvāṃśardhaḥ madati anu mārutam

original: RV_08.015.10.1{18} tvaṃ vṛṣā janānāṃ maṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ indra jajñiṣe

original: RV_08.015.10.2{18} satrā viśvā svapatyāni dadhiṣe
analyzed: satrā viśvā su apatyāni dadhiṣe

original: RV_08.015.11.1{19} satrā tvaṃ puruṣṭuta eko vṛtrāṇi tośase
analyzed: satrā tvam puruṣṭutaḥ ekaḥ vṛtrāṇi tośase

original: RV_08.015.11.2{19} nānya indrātkaraṇaṃ bhūya invati
analyzed: na anyaḥ indrāt karaṇam bhūyaḥ invati

original: RV_08.015.12.1{19} yadindra manmaśastvā nānā havanta ūtaye
analyzed: yat indra manmaśas tvā nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_08.015.12.2{19} asmākebhirnṛbhiratrā svarjaya
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ atra svarjaya

original: RV_08.015.13.1{19} araṃ kṣayāya no mahe viśvā rūpāṇyāviśan
analyzed: aram kṣayāya naḥ mahe viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan

original: RV_08.015.13.2{19} indraṃ jaitrāya harṣayā śacīpatim
analyzed: indram jaitrāya harṣaya śacīpatim

original: RV_08.016.01.1{20} pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnāmindraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ
analyzed: pra samrājam carṣaṇīnām indram stota navyam gīrbhiḥ

original: RV_08.016.01.2{20} naraṃ nṛṣāhaṃ maṃhiṣṭham
analyzed: naram nṛṣāham maṃhiṣṭham

original: RV_08.016.02.1{20} yasminnukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā
analyzed: yasmin ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā

original: RV_08.016.02.2{20} apāmavona samudre
analyzed: samudre

original: RV_08.016.03.1{20} taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājaṃ bhare kṛtnum
analyzed: tam suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭha rājam bhare kṛtnum

original: RV_08.016.03.2{20} maho vājinaṃ sanibhyaḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ vājinam sanibhyaḥ

original: RV_08.016.04.1{20} yasyānūnā gabhīrā madā uravastarutrāḥ
analyzed: yasya anūnāḥ gabhīrāḥ madāḥ uravaḥ tarutrāḥ

original: RV_08.016.04.2{20} harṣumantaḥśūrasātau
analyzed: harṣumantaḥ śūrasātau

original: RV_08.016.05.1{20} tamid dhaneṣu hiteṣvadhivākāya havante
analyzed: tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣu adhivākāya havante

original: RV_08.016.05.2{20} yeṣāmindraste jayanti
analyzed: yeṣām indraḥ te jayanti

original: RV_08.016.06.1{20} tamiccyautnairāryanti taṃ kṛtebhiścarṣaṇayaḥ
analyzed: tam id cyautnaiḥ āryanti tam kṛtebhiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_08.016.06.2{20} eṣaindro varivaskṛt
analyzed: eṣā aindraḥ varivaskṛt

original: RV_08.016.07.1{21} indro brahmendra ṛṣirindraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ brahma indraḥ ṛṣiḥ indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_08.016.07.2{21} mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: mahān mahībhiḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_08.016.08.1{21} sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ
analyzed: sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ

original: RV_08.016.08.2{21} ekaścitsannabhibhūtiḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ cit san abhibhūtiḥ

original: RV_08.016.09.1{21} tamarkebhistaṃ sāmabhistaṃ gāyatraiścarṣaṇayaḥ
analyzed: tam arkebhiḥ tam sāmabhiḥ tam gāyatraiḥ carṣaṇayaḥ

original: RV_08.016.09.2{21} indraṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ
analyzed: indram vardhanti kṣitayaḥ

original: RV_08.016.10.1{21} praṇetāraṃ vasyo achā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu
analyzed: praṇetāram vasyaḥ achā kartāram jyotiḥ samatsu

original: RV_08.016.10.2{21} sāsahvāṃsaṃ yudhāmitrān
analyzed: sāsahvāṃsam yudhā amitrān

original: RV_08.016.11.1{21} sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ

original: RV_08.016.11.2{21} indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_08.016.12.1{21} sa tvaṃ na indra vājebhirdaśasyā ca gātuyā ca
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra vājebhiḥ daśasya ca gātuya ca

original: RV_08.016.12.2{21} achā canaḥ sumnaṃ neṣi
analyzed: achā canaḥ sumnam neṣi

original: RV_08.017.01.1{22} ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam
analyzed: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam piba imam

original: RV_08.017.01.2{22} edaṃ barhiḥ sado mama
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama

original: RV_08.017.02.1{22} ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatāmindra keśinā
analyzed: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā

original: RV_08.017.02.2{22} upa brahmaṇi naḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: upa brahmaṇi naḥ śṛṇu

original: RV_08.017.03.1{22} brahmāṇastvā vayaṃ yujā somapāmindra sominaḥ
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ tvā vayam yujā soma pām indra sominaḥ

original: RV_08.017.03.2{22} sutāvanto havāmahe
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.017.04.1{22} ā no yāhi sutāvato 'smākaṃ suṣṭutīrupa
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi sutāvataḥ smākam suṣṭutīḥ upa

original: RV_08.017.04.2{22} pibā su śiprinnandhasaḥ
analyzed: pibā su śiprin andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.017.05.1{22} ā te siñcāmi kukṣyoranu gātrā vi dhāvatu
analyzed: ā te siñcāmi kukṣyoḥ anu gātrā vi dhāvatu

analyzed: gṛbhāya jihvayā madhu

analyzed: svāduḥ te astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava

analyzed: somaḥ śam astu te hṛde

analyzed: ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīḥ iva abhi saṃvṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.017.07.2{23} pra soma indra sarpatu
analyzed: pra somaḥ indra sarpatu

original: RV_08.017.08.1{23} tuvigrīvo vapodaraḥ subāhurandhaso made
analyzed: tuvi grīvaḥ vapā udaraḥ su bāhuḥ andhasaḥ made

original: RV_08.017.08.2{23} indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_08.017.09.1{23} indra prehi purastvaṃ viśvasyeśāna ojasā
analyzed: indra prehi puras tvam viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_08.017.09.2{23} vṛtrāṇi vṛtrahañ jahi
