original: RV_08.017.10.1{23} dīrghaste astvaṅkuśo yenā vasu prayachasi
analyzed: dīrghaḥ te astu aṅkuśaḥ yena vasu prayacchasi

original: RV_08.017.10.2{23} yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_08.017.11.1{24} ayaṃ ta indra somo nipūto adhi barhiṣi
analyzed: ayam te indra somaḥ nipūtaḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_08.017.11.2{24} ehīmasya dravāpiba
analyzed: ehi imasya drava a piba

original: RV_08.017.12.1{24} śācigo śācipūjanāyaṃ raṇāya te sutaḥ
analyzed: śācigo śācipūjana ayam raṇāya te sutaḥ

original: RV_08.017.12.2{24} ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase
analyzed: ākhaṇḍala pra hūyase

original: RV_08.017.13.1{24} yaste śṛṅgavṛṣo napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ te śṛṅgavṛṣaḥ napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ

original: RV_08.017.13.2{24} nyasmin dadhra ā manaḥ
analyzed: nyasmin dadhre ā manaḥ

original: RV_08.017.14.1{24} vāstoṣ pate dhruvā sthūṇāṃsatraṃ somyānām
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate dhruvā sthūṇā aṃsatram somyānām

original: RV_08.017.14.2{24} drapso bhettā purāṃ śaśvatīnāmindro munīnāṃ sakhā
analyzed: drapsaḥ bhettā purām śaśvatīnām indraḥ munīnām sakhā

original: RV_08.017.15.1{24} pṛdākusānuryajato gaveṣaṇa ekaḥ sannabhi bhūyasaḥ
analyzed: pṛdākusānuḥ yajataḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ san abhi bhūyasaḥ

original: RV_08.017.15.2{24} bhūrṇimaśvaṃ nayat tujā puro gṛbhendraṃ somasya pītaye
analyzed: bhūrṇim aśvam nayat tujā puras gṛbhā indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.018.01.1{25} idaṃ ha nūnameṣāṃ sumnaṃ bhikṣeta martyaḥ
analyzed: idam ha nūnam eṣām sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.018.01.2{25} ādityānāmapūrvyaṃ savīmani
analyzed: ādityānām apūrvyam savīmani

original: RV_08.018.02.1{25} anarvāṇo hyeṣāṃ panthā ādityānām
analyzed: anarvāṇaḥ hi eṣām panthāḥ ādityānām

original: RV_08.018.02.2{25} adabdhāḥ santi pāyavaḥ sugevṛdhaḥ
analyzed: adabdhāḥ santi pāyavaḥ sugevṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.018.03.1{25} tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: tat su naḥ savitā bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_08.018.03.2{25} śarma yachantu sapratho yadīmahe
analyzed: śarma yacchantu saprathaḥ yadīmahe

original: RV_08.018.04.1{25} devebhirdevyadite 'riṣṭabharmannā gahi
analyzed: devebhiḥ devi adite riṣṭa bharman ā gahi

original: RV_08.018.04.2{25} smat sūribhiḥ purupriye suśarmabhiḥ
analyzed: smat sūribhiḥ puru priye su śarmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.018.05.1{25} te hi putrāso aditervidurdveṣāṃsi yotave
analyzed: te hi putrāsaḥ aditeḥ viduḥ dveṣāṃsi yotave

original: RV_08.018.05.2{25} aṃhościdurucakrayo 'nehasaḥ
analyzed: aṃhoḥ cit uru cakrayaḥ na īhasaḥ

original: RV_08.018.06.1{26} aditirno divā paśumaditirnaktamadvayāḥ
analyzed: aditiḥ naḥ divā paśum aditiḥ naktam advayāḥ

original: RV_08.018.06.2{26} aditiḥ pātvaṃhasaḥ sadāvṛdhā
analyzed: aditiḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ sadā vṛdhā

original: RV_08.018.07.1{26} uta syā no divā matiraditirūtyā gamat
analyzed: uta syā naḥ divā matiḥ aditiḥ ūtyā gamat

original: RV_08.018.07.2{26} sā śantāti mayas karadapa sridhaḥ
analyzed: sā śantāti mayaḥ karat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_08.018.08.1{26} uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śaṃ naḥ karato aśvinā
analyzed: uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śam naḥ karataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.018.08.2{26} yuyuyātāmito rapo apa sridhaḥ
analyzed: yuyuyātām itas rapaḥ apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_08.018.09.1{26} śamagniragnibhiḥ karacchaṃ nastapatu sūryaḥ
analyzed: śam agniḥ agnibhiḥ karat śam naḥ tapatu sūryaḥ

original: RV_08.018.09.2{26} śaṃ vāto vātvarapā apa sridhaḥ
analyzed: śam vātaḥ vātvara pāḥ apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_08.018.10.1{26} apāmīvāmapa sridhamapa sedhata durmatim
analyzed: apa amīvām apa sridham apa sedhata durmatim

original: RV_08.018.10.2{26} ādityāso yuyotanā no aṃhasaḥ
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ yuyotana naḥ aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_08.018.11.1{27} yuyotā śarumasmadānādityāsa utāmatim
analyzed: yuyota śarum asmadānā ādityāsaḥ uta amatim

original: RV_08.018.11.2{27} ṛdhag dveṣaḥkṛṇuta viśvavedasaḥ
analyzed: ṛdhak dveṣaḥ kṛṇuta viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_08.018.12.1{27} tat su naḥ śarma yachatādityā yan mumocati
analyzed: tat su naḥ śarma yacchata ādityāḥ yat mumocati

original: RV_08.018.12.2{27} enasvantaṃ cidenasaḥ sudānavaḥ
analyzed: enasvantam cit enasaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_08.018.13.1{27} yo naḥ kaścid ririkṣati rakṣastvena martyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ kaścid ririkṣati rakṣaḥ tvena martyaḥ

original: RV_08.018.13.2{27} svaiḥ ṣaevai ririṣīṣṭa yurjanaḥ
analyzed: svaiḥ ṣa evaiḥ ririṣīṣṭa yus janaḥ

original: RV_08.018.14.1{27} samit tamaghamaśnavad duḥśaṃsaṃ martyaṃ ripum
analyzed: samidh tam agham aśnavat duḥśaṃsam martyam ripum

original: RV_08.018.14.2{27} yo asmatrā durhaṇāvānupa dvayuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ asmatrā durhaṇāvān upa dvayuḥ

original: RV_08.018.15.1{27} pākatrā sthana devā hṛtsu jānītha martyam
analyzed: pākatrā sthana devāḥ hṛtsu jānītha martyam

original: RV_08.018.15.2{27} upa dvayuṃ cādvayuṃ ca vasavaḥ
analyzed: upa dvayum ca advayum ca vasavaḥ

original: RV_08.018.16.1{28} ā śarma parvatānāmotāpāṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: ā śarma parvatānām ā uta apām vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.018.16.2{28} dyāvākṣāmāre asmad rapas kṛtam
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā āre asmat rapaḥ kṛtam

original: RV_08.018.17.1{28} te no bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākaṃ nāvā vasavaḥ
analyzed: te naḥ bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākam nāvā vasavaḥ

original: RV_08.018.17.2{28} ati viśvāni duritā pipartana
analyzed: ati viśvāni duritā pipartana

original: RV_08.018.18.1{28} tuce tanāya tat su no drāghīya āyurjīvase
analyzed: tuce tanāya tat su naḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ jīvase

original: RV_08.018.18.2{28} ādityāsaḥsumahasaḥ kṛṇotana
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ su mahasaḥ kṛṇotana

original: RV_08.018.19.1{28} yajño hīḷo vo antara ādityā asti mṛḷata
analyzed: yajñaḥ hīḍaḥ vaḥ antare ādityāḥ asti mṛḍata

original: RV_08.018.19.2{28} yuṣme id vo api ṣmasi sajātye
analyzed: yuṣme id vaḥ api smasi sajātye

original: RV_08.018.20.1{28} bṛhad varūthaṃ marutāṃ devaṃ trātāramaśvinā
analyzed: bṛhat varūtham marutām devam trātāram aśvinā

original: RV_08.018.20.2{28} mitramīmahe varuṇaṃ svastaye
analyzed: mitramīmahe varuṇam svastaye

original: RV_08.018.21.1{28} aneho mitrāryaman nṛvad varuṇa śaṃsyam
analyzed: anehaḥ mitra aryaman nṛvat varuṇa śaṃsyam

original: RV_08.018.21.2{28} trivarūthaṃ maruto yanta naśchardiḥ
analyzed: tri varūtham marutaḥ yanta naḥ chardiḥ

original: RV_08.018.22.1{28} ye cid dhi mṛtyubandhava ādityā manavaḥ smasi
analyzed: ye cit hi mṛtyu bandhavaḥ ādityāḥ manavaḥ smasi

original: RV_08.018.22.2{28} pra sū naāyurjīvase tiretana
analyzed: pra su na āyuḥ jīvase tiretana

original: RV_08.019.01.1{29} taṃ gūrdhayā svarṇaraṃ devāso devamaratiṃ dadhanvire
analyzed: tam gūrdhayā svarṇaram devāsaḥ devam aratim dadhanvire

original: RV_08.019.01.2{29} devatrā havyamohire
analyzed: devatrā havyam ohire

original: RV_08.019.02.1{29} vibhūtarātiṃ vipra citraśociṣamagnimīḷiṣva yanturam
analyzed: vibhūta rātim vipra citra śociṣam agnim īḍiṣva yanturam

original: RV_08.019.02.2{29} asya medhasya somyasya sobhare premadhvarāya pūrvyam
analyzed: asya medhasya somyasya sobhare prema adhvarāya pūrvyam

original: RV_08.019.03.1{29} yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā vavṛmahe devaṃ devatrā hotāramamartyam
analyzed: yajiṣṭham tvā vavṛmahe devam devatrā hotāram amartyam

original: RV_08.019.03.2{29} asya yajñasya sukratum
analyzed: asya yajñasya sukratum

original: RV_08.019.04.1{29} ūrjo napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditimagniṃ śreṣṭhaśociṣam
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam subhagam su dīditim agnim śreṣṭha śociṣam

original: RV_08.019.04.2{29} sa no mitrasya varuṇasya so apāmā sumnaṃ yakṣate divi
analyzed: sa naḥ mitrasya varuṇasya saḥ apāmā sumnam yakṣate divi

original: RV_08.019.05.1{29} yaḥ samidhā ya āhutī yo vedena dadāśa marto agnaye
analyzed: yaḥ samidhā yaḥ āhutī yaḥ vedena dadāśa martaḥ agnaye

original: RV_08.019.05.2{29} yo namasā svadhvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ namasā su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_08.019.06.1{30} tasyedarvanto raṃhayanta āśavastasya dyumnitamaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: tasya idarvantaḥ raṃhayantaḥ āśavaḥ tasya dyumnitamam yaśaḥ

original: RV_08.019.06.2{30} na tamaṃho devakṛtaṃ kutaścana na martyakṛtaṃ naśat
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ deva kṛtam kutaścana na martya kṛtam naśat

original: RV_08.019.07.1{30} svagnayo vo agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasa ūrjāṃ pate
analyzed: su agnayaḥ vaḥ agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasaḥ ūrjām pate

original: RV_08.019.07.2{30} suvīrastvamasmayuḥ
analyzed: su vīraḥ tvam asmayuḥ

original: RV_08.019.08.1{30} praśaṃsamāno atithirna mitriyo 'gnī ratho na vedyaḥ
analyzed: praśaṃsamānaḥ atithiḥ na mitriyaḥ gniḥ rathaḥ na vedyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.08.2{30} tve kṣemāso api santi sādhavastvaṃ rājā rayīṇām
analyzed: tve kṣemāsaḥ api santi sādhavaḥ tvam rājā rayīṇām

original: RV_08.019.09.1{30} so addhā dāśvadhvaro 'gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ addhā dāśu adhvaraḥ gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.09.2{30} sa dhībhirastu sanitā
analyzed: sa dhībhiḥ astu sanitā

original: RV_08.019.10.1{30} yasya tvamūrdhvo adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate
analyzed: yasya tvam ūrdhvaḥ adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate

original: RV_08.019.10.2{30} so arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam
analyzed: saḥ arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam

original: RV_08.019.11.1{31} yasyāgnirvapurgṛhe stomaṃ cano dadhīta viśvavāryaḥ
analyzed: yasya agniḥ vapuḥ gṛhe stomam canaḥ dadhīta viśva vāryaḥ

original: RV_08.019.11.2{31} havyā vā veviṣad viṣaḥ
analyzed: havyā vā veviṣat viṣaḥ

original: RV_08.019.12.1{31} viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahaso yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu
analyzed: viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahasaḥ yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu

original: RV_08.019.12.2{31} avodevamuparimartyaṃ kṛdhi vaso vividuṣo vacaḥ
analyzed: ava udevam upari martyam kṛdhi vaso vividuṣaḥ vacaḥ

original: RV_08.019.13.1{31} yo agniṃ havyadātibhirnamobhirvā sudakṣamāvivāsati
analyzed: yaḥ agnim havya dātibhiḥ namobhiḥ vā su dakṣam āvivāsati

original: RV_08.019.13.2{31} girā vājiraśociṣam
analyzed: girā vājira śociṣam

original: RV_08.019.14.1{31} samidhā yo niśitī dāśadaditiṃ dhāmabhirasya martyaḥ
analyzed: samidhā yaḥ niśitī dāśat aditim dhāmabhiḥ asya martyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.14.2{31} viśvet sa dhībhiḥ subhago janānati dyumnairudna iva tāriṣat
analyzed: viśvā id sa dhībhiḥ subhagaḥ janān ati dyumnaiḥ udnaḥ iva tāriṣat

original: RV_08.019.15.1{31} tadagne dyumnamā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kaṃ cidatriṇam
analyzed: tat agne dyumnam ā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_08.019.15.2{31} manyuṃ janasya dūḍhyaḥ
analyzed: manyum janasya dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.16.1{32} yena caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ
analyzed: yena caṣṭe varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ

original: RV_08.019.16.2{32} vayaṃ tat te śavasā gātuvittamā indratvotā vidhemahi
analyzed: vayam tat te śavasā gātu vittamāḥ indra tva utāḥ vidhemahi

original: RV_08.019.17.1{32} te ghedagne svādhyo ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛcakṣasam
analyzed: te gha id agne su ādhyaḥ ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛ cakṣasam

original: RV_08.019.17.2{32} viprāso deva sukratum
analyzed: viprāsaḥ deva sukratum

original: RV_08.019.18.1{32} ta id vediṃ subhaga ta āhutiṃ te sotuṃ cakrire divi
analyzed: te id vedim subhaga te āhutim te sotum cakrire divi

original: RV_08.019.18.2{32} taid vājebhirjigyurmahad dhanaṃ ye tve kāmaṃ nyerire
analyzed: taiḥ id vājebhiḥ jigyuḥ mahat dhanam ye tve kāmam nyerire

original: RV_08.019.19.1{32} bhadro no agnirāhuto bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadro adhvaraḥ
analyzed: bhadraḥ naḥ agniḥ āhutaḥ bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadraḥ adhvaraḥ

original: RV_08.019.19.2{32} bhadrā uta praśastayaḥ
analyzed: bhadrāḥ uta praśastayaḥ

original: RV_08.019.20.1{32} bhadraṃ manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yenā samatsu sāsahaḥ
analyzed: bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yena samatsu sāsahaḥ

original: RV_08.019.20.2{32} ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatāṃ vanemā te abhiṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatām vanema te abhiṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_08.019.21.1{33} īḷe girā manurhitaṃ yaṃ devā dūtamaratiṃ nyerire
analyzed: īḍe girā manuḥ hitam yam devāḥ dūtam aratim nyerire

original: RV_08.019.21.2{33} yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhanam
analyzed: yajiṣṭham havyavāhanam

original: RV_08.019.22.1{33} tigmajambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayo gāyasyagnaye
analyzed: tigma jambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayaḥ gāyasi agnaye

original: RV_08.019.22.2{33} yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ suvīryamagnirghṛtebhirāhutaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ su vīryam agniḥ ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_08.019.23.1{33} yadī ghṛtebhirāhuto vāśīmagnirbharata uccāva ca
analyzed: yadī ghṛtebhiḥ āhutaḥ vāśīm agniḥ bharataḥ uccā ava ca

original: RV_08.019.23.2{33} asura iva nirṇijam
analyzed: asuraḥ iva nirṇijam

original: RV_08.019.24.1{33} yo havyānyairayatā manurhito deva āsā sugandhinā
analyzed: yaḥ havyāni ayatā manuḥ hitaḥ devaḥ āsā sugandhinā

original: RV_08.019.24.2{33} vivāsate vāryāṇi svadhvaro hotā devo amartyaḥ
analyzed: vivāsate vāryāṇi su adhvaraḥ hotā devaḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.25.1{33} yadagne martyastvaṃ syāmahaṃ mitramaho amartyaḥ
analyzed: yat agne martyaḥ tvam syām aham mitra mahas amartyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.25.2{33} sahasaḥ sūnavāhuta
analyzed: sahasaḥ sūnava ahuta

original: RV_08.019.26.1{34} na tvā rāsīyābhiśastaye vaso na pāpatvāya santya
analyzed: na tvā rāsīya abhiśastaye vaso na pāpa tvāya santya

original: RV_08.019.26.2{34} na me stotāmatīvā na durhitaḥ syādagne na pāpayā
analyzed: na me stotā amatīvā na durhitaḥ syāt agne na pāpayā

original: RV_08.019.27.1{34} piturna putraḥ subhṛto duroṇa ā devānetu pra ṇo haviḥ
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ su bhṛtaḥ duroṇe ā devān etu pra naḥ haviḥ

original: RV_08.019.28.1{34} tavāhamagna ūtibhirnediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣamā vaso
analyzed: tava aham agne ūtibhiḥ nediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣamā vaso

original: RV_08.019.28.2{34} sadā devasya martyaḥ
analyzed: sadā devasya martyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.29.1{34} tava kratvā saneyaṃ tava rātibhiragne tava praśastibhiḥ
analyzed: tava kratvā saneyam tava rātibhiḥ agne tava praśastibhiḥ

original: RV_08.019.29.2{34} tvāmidāhuḥ pramatiṃ vaso mamāgne harṣasva dātave
analyzed: tvām idā āhuḥ pramatim vaso mama agne harṣasva dātave

original: RV_08.019.30.1{34} pra so agne tavotibhiḥ suvīrābhistirate vājabharmabhiḥ
analyzed: pra saḥ agne tava ūtibhiḥ su vīrābhiḥ tirate vāja bharmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.019.30.2{34} yasya tvaṃ sakhyamāvaraḥ
analyzed: yasya tvam sakhyam āvaraḥ

original: RV_08.019.31.1{35} tava drapso nīlavān vāśa ṛtviya indhānaḥ siṣṇavā dade
analyzed: tava drapsaḥ nīlavān vāśaḥ ṛtviyaḥ indhānaḥ siṣṇavā dade

original: RV_08.019.31.2{35} tvaṃ mahīnāmuṣasāmasi priyaḥ kṣapo vastuṣu rājasi
analyzed: tvam mahīnām uṣasām asi priyaḥ kṣapaḥ vastuṣu rājasi

original: RV_08.019.32.1{35} tamāganma sobharayaḥ sahasramuṣkaṃ svabhiṣṭimavase
analyzed: tam āganma sobharayaḥ sahasra muṣkam su abhiṣṭim avase

original: RV_08.019.32.2{35} samrājaṃ trāsadasyavam
analyzed: samrājam trāsadasyavam

original: RV_08.019.33.1{35} yasya te agne anye agnaya upakṣito vayā iva
analyzed: yasya te agne anye agnayaḥ upakṣitaḥ vayāḥ iva

original: RV_08.019.33.2{35} vipo na dyumnā ni yuve janānāṃ tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan
analyzed: vipaḥ na dyumnā ni yuve janānām tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan

original: RV_08.019.34.1{35} yamādityāso adruhaḥ pāraṃ nayatha martyam
analyzed: yam ādityāsaḥ adruhaḥ pāram nayatha martyam

original: RV_08.019.34.2{35} maghonāṃ viśveṣāṃ sudānavaḥ
analyzed: maghonām viśveṣām sudānavaḥ

original: RV_08.019.35.1{35} yūyaṃ rājānaḥ kaṃ ciccarṣaṇīsahaḥ kṣayantaṃ mānuṣānanu
analyzed: yūyam rājānaḥ kam cit carṣaṇīsahaḥ kṣayantam mānuṣān anu

original: RV_08.019.35.2{35} vayaṃ te vo varuṇa mitrāryaman syāmed ṛtasya rathyaḥ
analyzed: vayam te vaḥ varuṇa mitra aryaman syāma id ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_08.019.36.1{35} adān me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśataṃ trasadasyurvadhūnām
analyzed: adāt me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśatam trasadasyuḥ vadhūnām

original: RV_08.019.36.2{35} maṃhiṣṭho aryaḥ satpatiḥ
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhaḥ aryaḥ satpatiḥ

original: RV_08.019.37.1{35} uta me prayiyorvayiyoḥ suvāstvā adhi tugvani
analyzed: uta me prayiyoḥ vayiyoḥ suvāstvā adhi tugvani

original: RV_08.019.37.2{35} tisṝṇāṃsaptatīnāṃ śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvad vasurdiyānāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tisṝṇām saptatīnām śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvat vasuḥ diyānām patiḥ

original: RV_08.020.01.1{36} ā gantā mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvāno māpa sthātā samanyavaḥ
analyzed: ā ganta mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvānaḥ mā apa sthāta samanyavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.01.2{36} sthirā cin namayiṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: sthirā cit namayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.02.1{36} vīḷupavibhirmaruta ṛbhukṣaṇa ā rudrāsaḥ sudītibhiḥ
analyzed: vīḍu pavibhiḥ marutaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ ā rudrāsaḥ su dītibhiḥ

original: RV_08.020.02.2{36} iṣā no adyā gatā puruspṛho yajñamā sobharīyavaḥ
analyzed: iṣā naḥ adyā gata puruspṛhaḥ yajñamā sobharīyavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.03.1{36} vidmā hi rudriyāṇāṃ śuṣmamugraṃ marutāṃ śimīvatām
analyzed: vidma hi rudriyāṇām śuṣmam ugram marutām śimīvatām

original: RV_08.020.03.2{36} viṣṇoreṣasya mīḷhuṣām
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ eṣasya mīḷhuṣām

original: RV_08.020.04.1{36} vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhad duchunobhe yujanta rodasī
analyzed: vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhat duchunā ubhe yujanta rodasī

original: RV_08.020.04.2{36} pra dhanvānyairata śubhrakhādayo yadejatha svabhānavaḥ
analyzed: pra dhanvāni airata śubhra khādayaḥ yat ejatha sva bhānavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.05.1{36} acyutā cid vo ajmannā nānadati parvatāso vanaspatiḥ
analyzed: acyutā cit vaḥ ajman ā nānadati parvatāsaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: RV_08.020.05.2{36} bhūmiryāmeṣu rejate
analyzed: bhūmiḥ yāmeṣu rejate

original: RV_08.020.06.1{37} amāya vo maruto yātave dyaurjihīta uttarā bṛhat
analyzed: amāya vaḥ marutaḥ yātave dyauḥ jihīte uttarā bṛhat

original: RV_08.020.06.2{37} yatrā naro dediśate tanūṣvā tvakṣāṃsi bāhvojasaḥ
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ dediśate tanūṣva tvakṣāṃsi bāhu ojasaḥ

original: RV_08.020.07.1{37} svadhāmanu śriyaṃ naro mahi tveṣā amavanto vṛṣapsavaḥ
analyzed: svadhām anu śriyam naraḥ mahi tveṣāḥ amavantaḥ vṛṣapsavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.07.2{37} vahante ahrutapsavaḥ
analyzed: vahante ahrutapsavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.08.1{37} gobhirvāṇo ajyate sobharīṇāṃ rathe kośe hiraṇyaye
analyzed: gobhiḥ vāṇaḥ ajyate sobharīṇām rathe kośe hiraṇyaye

original: RV_08.020.08.2{37} gobandhavaḥ sujātāsa iṣe bhuje mahānto naḥ sparase nu
analyzed: go bandhavaḥ sujātāsaḥ iṣe bhuje mahāntaḥ naḥ sparase nu

original: RV_08.020.09.1{37} prati vo vṛṣadañjayo vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam
analyzed: prati vaḥ vṛṣat añjayaḥ vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam

original: RV_08.020.09.2{37} havyā vṛṣaprayāvṇe
analyzed: havyā vṛṣa prayāvṇe

original: RV_08.020.10.1{37} vṛṣaṇaśvena maruto vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣanābhinā
analyzed: vṛṣaṇaśvena marutaḥ vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣa nābhinā

original: RV_08.020.10.2{37} ā śyenāso na pakṣiṇo vṛthā naro havyā no vītaye gata
analyzed: ā śyenāsaḥ na pakṣiṇaḥ vṛthā naraḥ havyā naḥ vītaye gata

original: RV_08.020.11.1{38} samānamañjyeṣāṃ vi bhrājante rukmāso adhi bāhuṣu
analyzed: samāna mañjyeṣām vi bhrājante rukmāsaḥ adhi bāhuṣu

original: RV_08.020.11.2{38} davidyutaty ṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: davidyutati ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_08.020.12.1{38} ta ugrāso vṛṣaṇa ugrabāhavo nakiṣ ṭanūṣu yetire
analyzed: te ugrāsaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ ugra bāhavaḥ nakir tanūṣu yetire

original: RV_08.020.12.2{38} sthirā dhanvānyāyudhā ratheṣu vo 'nīkeṣvadhi śriyaḥ
analyzed: sthirā dhanvāni āyudhā ratheṣu vaḥ nīkeṣu adhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_08.020.13.1{38} yeṣāmarṇo na sapratho nāma tveṣaṃ śaśvatāmekamidbhuje
analyzed: yeṣām arṇaḥ na saprathaḥ nāma tveṣam śaśvatām ekam id bhuje

original: RV_08.020.13.2{38} vayo na pitryaṃ sahaḥ
analyzed: vayaḥ na pitryam sahaḥ

original: RV_08.020.14.1{38} tān vandasva marutastānupa stuhi teṣāṃ hi dhunīnām
analyzed: tān vandasva marutaḥ tān upa stuhi teṣām hi dhunīnām

original: RV_08.020.14.2{38} arāṇāṃ na caramastadeṣāṃ dānā mahnā tadeṣām
analyzed: arāṇām na caramaḥ tat eṣām dānā mahnā tat eṣām

original: RV_08.020.15.1{38} subhagaḥ sa va ūtiṣvāsa pūrvāsu maruto vyuṣṭiṣu
analyzed: subhagaḥ sa vaḥ ūtiṣu āsa pūrvāsu marutaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_08.020.15.2{38} yovā nūnamutāsati
analyzed: yaḥ vā nūnam uta asati

original: RV_08.020.16.1{39} yasya vā yūyaṃ prati vājino nara ā havyā vītaye gatha
analyzed: yasya vā yūyam prati vājinaḥ naraḥ ā havyā vītaye

original: RV_08.020.16.2{39} abhi ṣa dyumnairuta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vo dhūtayo naśat
analyzed: abhi sa dyumnaiḥ uta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vaḥ dhūtayaḥ naśat

original: RV_08.020.17.1{39} yathā rudrasya sūnavo divo vaśantyasurasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: yathā rudrasya sūnavaḥ divaḥ vaśanti asurasya vedhasaḥ

original: RV_08.020.17.2{39} yuvānastathedasat
analyzed: yuvānaḥ tathā id asat

original: RV_08.020.18.1{39} ye cārhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ sman mīḷhuṣaścaranti ye
analyzed: ye ca arhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ smat mīḷhuṣaḥ caranti ye

original: RV_08.020.18.2{39} ataścidā na upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvāna ā vavṛdhvam
analyzed: ataścidā naḥ upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvānaḥ ā vavṛdhvam

original: RV_08.020.19.1{39} yūna ū ṣu naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakānabhi sobhare girā
analyzed: yūnaḥ u su naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakān abhi sobhare girā

original: RV_08.020.19.2{39} gāya gā iva carkṛṣat
analyzed: gāya gāḥ iva carkṛṣat

original: RV_08.020.20.1{39} sāhā ye santi muṣṭiheva havyo viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu
analyzed: sāhāḥ ye santi muṣṭi hā iva havyaḥ viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu

original: RV_08.020.20.2{39} vṛṣṇaścandrān na suśravastamān girā vandasva maruto aha
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ candrān na su śravastamān girā vandasva marutaḥ aha

original: RV_08.020.21.1{40} gāvaścid ghā samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sabandhavaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ cit gha samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sa bandhavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.21.2{40} rihate kakubho mithaḥ
analyzed: rihate kakubhaḥ mithas

original: RV_08.020.22.1{40} martaścid vo nṛtavo rukmavakṣasa upa bhrātṛtvamāyati
analyzed: martaḥ cit vaḥ nṛtavaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ upa bhrātṛ tvam āyati

original: RV_08.020.22.2{40} adhino gāta marutaḥ sadā hi va āpitvamasti nidhruvi
analyzed: adhinaḥ gāta marutaḥ sadā hi vaḥ āpi tvam asti nidhruvi

original: RV_08.020.23.1{40} maruto mārutasya na ā bheṣajasya vahatā sudānavaḥ
analyzed: marutaḥ mārutasya naḥ ā bheṣajasya vahata sudānavaḥ

original: RV_08.020.23.2{40} yūyaṃsakhāyaḥ saptayaḥ
analyzed: yūyaṃsakhāyaḥ saptayaḥ

original: RV_08.020.24.1{40} yābhiḥ sindhumavatha yābhistūrvatha yābhirdaśasyathākrivim
analyzed: yābhiḥ sindhum avatha yābhiḥ tūrvatha yābhiḥ daśasyatha akrivim

original: RV_08.020.24.2{40} mayo no bhūtotibhirmayobhuvaḥ śivābhirasacadviṣaḥ
analyzed: mayaḥ naḥ bhūta ūtibhiḥ mayobhuvaḥ śivābhiḥ a saca dviṣaḥ

original: RV_08.020.25.1{40} yat sindhau yadasiknyāṃ yat samudreṣu marutaḥ subarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: yat sindhau yat asiknyām yat samudreṣu marutaḥ su barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.020.25.2{40} yat parvateṣu bheṣajam
analyzed: yat parvateṣu bheṣajam

original: RV_08.020.26.1{40} viśvaṃ paśyanto bibhṛthā tanūṣvā tenā no adhi vocata
analyzed: viśvam paśyantaḥ bibhṛtha tanūṣva tena naḥ adhi vocata

original: RV_08.020.26.2{40} kṣamā rapo maruta āturasya na iṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: kṣamā rapaḥ marutaḥ āturasya naḥ iṣkarta vihrutam punar

original: RV_08.021.01.1{01} vayamu tvāmapūrvya sthūraṃ na kaccid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ
analyzed: vayam u tvāmapūrvya sthūram na kaccit bharantaḥ vasyavaḥ

original: RV_08.021.01.2{01} vāje citraṃ havāmahe
analyzed: vāje citram havāmahe

original: RV_08.021.02.1{01} upa tvā karmannūtaye sa no yuvograścakrāma yo dhṛṣat
analyzed: upa tvā karman ūtaye sa naḥ yuvā ugraḥ cakrāma yaḥ dhṛṣat

original: RV_08.021.02.2{01} tvāmid dhyavitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim
analyzed: tvām id hyavitāram vavṛmahe sakhāyaḥ indra sānasim

original: RV_08.021.03.1{01} ā yāhīma indavo 'śvapate gopata urvarāpate
analyzed: ā yāhi ime indavaḥ śva pate go pate urvarā pate

original: RV_08.021.03.2{01} somaṃ somapate piba
analyzed: somam soma pate piba

original: RV_08.021.04.1{01} vayaṃ hi tvā bandhumantamabandhavo viprāsa indra yemima
analyzed: vayam hi tvā bandhumantam abandhavaḥ viprāsaḥ indra yemima

original: RV_08.021.04.2{01} yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhirā gahi viśvebhiḥ somapītaye
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhiḥ ā gahi viśvebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_08.021.05.1{01} sīdantaste vayo yathā gośrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe
analyzed: sīdantaḥ te vayaḥ yathā go śrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe

original: RV_08.021.05.2{01} abhi tvāmindra nonumaḥ
analyzed: abhi tvām indra nonumaḥ

original: RV_08.021.06.1{02} achā ca tvainā namasā vadāmasi kiṃ muhuścid vi dīdhayaḥ
analyzed: achā ca tvā enā namasā vadāmasi kim muhuścit vi dīdhayaḥ

original: RV_08.021.06.2{02} santi kāmāso harivo dadiṣ ṭvaṃ smo vayaṃ santi no dhiyaḥ
analyzed: santi kāmāsaḥ harivas dadiḥ tvam smaḥ vayam santi naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_08.021.07.1{02} nūtnā idindra te vayamūtī abhūma nahi nū te adrivaḥ
analyzed: nūtnāḥ id indra te vayam ūtī abhūma nahi nu te adrivas

original: RV_08.021.07.2{02} vidmā purā parīṇasaḥ
analyzed: vidma purā parīṇasaḥ

original: RV_08.021.08.1{02} vidmā sakhitvamuta śūra bhojyamā te tā vajrinnīmahe
analyzed: vidma sakhi tvam uta śūra bhojyam ā te tā vajrin nīmahe

original: RV_08.021.08.2{02} uto samasminnā śiśīhi no vaso vāje suśipra gomati
analyzed: uta u samasmin ā śiśīhi naḥ vaso vāje su śipra gomati

original: RV_08.021.09.1{02} yo na idam-idaṃ purā pra vasya ānināya tamu va stuṣe
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ idam idam purā pra vasyaḥ ānināya tam u vaḥ stuṣe

original: RV_08.021.09.2{02} sakhāya indramūtaye
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ indramūtaye

original: RV_08.021.10.1{02} haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata
analyzed: haryaśvam satpatim carṣaṇīsaham sa hi sma yaḥ amandata

original: RV_08.021.10.2{02} ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyamaśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam
analyzed: ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavā śatam

original: RV_08.021.11.1{03} tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ prati śvasantaṃ vṛṣabha bruvīmahi
analyzed: tvayā ha svid yujā vayam prati śvasantam vṛṣabha bruvīmahi

original: RV_08.021.11.2{03} saṃsthe janasya gomataḥ
analyzed: saṃsthe janasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.021.12.1{03} jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇo 'bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ
analyzed: jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇaḥ bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_08.021.12.2{03} nṛbhirvṛtraṃ hanyāma śūśuyāma cāverindra pra ṇo dhiyaḥ
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ vṛtram hanyāma śūśuyāma ca aveḥ indra pra naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_08.021.13.1{03} abhrātṛvyo anā tvamanāpirindra januṣā sanādasi
analyzed: a bhrātṛvyaḥ anā tvam anāpiḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi

original: RV_08.021.13.2{03} yudhedāpitvamichase
analyzed: yudhā idāpi tvam ichase

original: RV_08.021.14.1{03} nakī revantaṃ sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ
analyzed: nakir revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ

original: RV_08.021.14.2{03} yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanuṃ samūhasyādit piteva hūyase
analyzed: yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanum samūhasya adit pitā iva hūyase

original: RV_08.021.15.1{03} mā te amājuro yathā mūrāsa indra sakhye tvāvataḥ
analyzed: mā te amājuraḥ yathā mūrāsaḥ indra sakhye tvāvataḥ

original: RV_08.021.15.2{03} ni ṣadāma sacā sute
analyzed: ni ṣadāma sacā sute

original: RV_08.021.16.1{04} mā te godatra nirarāma rādhasa indra mā te gṛhāmahi
analyzed: mā te go datra nirarāma rādhasaḥ indra mā te gṛhāmahi

original: RV_08.021.16.2{04} dṛḷhā cidaryaḥ pra mṛśābhyā bhara na te dāmāna ādabhe
analyzed: dṛḍhā cidaryaḥ pra mṛśa ābhyā bhara na te dāmānaḥ ādabhe

original: RV_08.021.17.1{04} indro vā ghediyan maghaṃ sarasvatī vā subhagā dadirvasu
analyzed: indraḥ vā ghediyat magham sarasvatī vā subhagā dadiḥ vasu

original: RV_08.021.17.2{04} tvaṃ vā citra dāśuṣe
analyzed: tvam vā citra dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.021.18.1{04} citra id rājā rājakā idanyake yake sarasvatīmanu
analyzed: citraḥ id rājā rājakāḥ id anyake yake sarasvatīm anu

original: RV_08.021.18.2{04} parjanya iva tatanad dhi vṛṣṭyā sahasramayutā dadat
analyzed: parjanyaḥ iva tatanat hi vṛṣṭyā sahasram ayutā dadat

original: RV_08.022.01.1{05} o tyamahva ā rathamadyā daṃsiṣṭhamūtaye
analyzed: ā u tyam ahve ā ratham adya daṃsiṣṭhamūtaye

original: RV_08.022.01.2{05} yamaśvinā suhavā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ
analyzed: yam aśvinā su havā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ

original: RV_08.022.02.1{05} pūrvāyuṣaṃ suhavaṃ puruspṛhaṃ bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam
analyzed: pūrva āyuṣam su havam puruspṛham bhujyum vājeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_08.022.02.2{05} sacanāvantaṃ sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasamanehasam
analyzed: sacanāvantam sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasam anehasam

original: RV_08.022.03.1{05} iha tyā purubhūtamā devā namobhiraśvinā
analyzed: iha tyā puru bhūtamā devā namobhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.022.03.2{05} arvācīnā svavase karāmahe gantārā daśuṣo gṛham
analyzed: arvācīnā su avase karāmahe gantārā daśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_08.022.04.1{05} yuvo rathasya pari cakramīyata īrmānyad vāmiṣaṇyati
analyzed: yuvoḥ rathasya pari cakramīyataḥ īrmānyat vā amiṣaṇyati

original: RV_08.022.04.2{05} asmānachā sumatirvāṃ śubhas patī ā dhenuriva dhāvatu
analyzed: asmān achā sumatiḥ vām śubhaḥ patī ā dhenuḥ iva dhāvatu

original: RV_08.022.05.1{05} ratho yo vāṃ trivandhuro hiraṇyabhīśuraśvinā
analyzed: rathaḥ yaḥ vām tri vandhuraḥ hiraṇya bhīśuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.022.05.2{05} pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutastena nāsatyā gatam
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutaḥ tena nāsatyā gatam

original: RV_08.022.06.1{06} daśasyantā manave pūrvyaṃ divi yavaṃ vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ
analyzed: daśasyantā manave pūrvyam divi yavam vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ

original: RV_08.022.06.2{06} tā vāmadya sumatibhiḥ śubhas patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi
analyzed: tā vām adya sumatibhiḥ śubhaḥ patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi

original: RV_08.022.07.1{06} upa no vajinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ
analyzed: upa naḥ vajinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ

original: RV_08.022.07.2{06} yebhistṛkṣiṃ vṛṣaṇā trasadasyavaṃ mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ
analyzed: yebhiḥ tṛkṣim vṛṣaṇā trasadasyavam mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ

original: RV_08.022.08.1{06} ayaṃ vāmadribhiḥ sutaḥ somo nara vṛṣaṇvasu
analyzed: ayam vām adribhiḥ sutaḥ somaḥ nara vṛṣaṇvasu

original: RV_08.022.08.2{06} ā yātaṃ somapītaye pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe
analyzed: ā yātam soma pītaye pibatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_08.022.09.1{06} ā hi ruhatamaśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: ā hi ruhatam aśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.022.09.2{06} yuñjāthāṃ pīvarīriṣaḥ
analyzed: yuñjāthām pīvarīriṣaḥ

original: RV_08.022.10.1{06} yābhiḥ pakthamavatho yābhiradhriguṃ yābhirbabhruṃ vijoṣasam
analyzed: yābhiḥ paktham avathaḥ yābhiḥ adhrigum yābhiḥ babhrum vijoṣasam

original: RV_08.022.10.2{06} tābhirno makṣū tūyamaśvinā gataṃ bhiṣajyataṃyadāturam
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ makṣū tūyam aśvinā gatam bhiṣajyataṃyat āturam

original: RV_08.022.11.1{07} yadadhrigāvo adhrigū idā cidahno aśvinā havāmahe
analyzed: yat adhrigāvaḥ adhrigū idā cit ahnaḥ aśvinā havāmahe

original: RV_08.022.11.2{07} vayaṃ gīrbhirvipanyavaḥ
analyzed: vayam gīrbhiḥ vipanyavaḥ

original: RV_08.022.12.1{07} tābhirā yātaṃ vṛṣaṇopa me havaṃ viśvapsuṃ viśvavāryam
analyzed: tābhiḥ ā yātam vṛṣaṇā upa me havam viśvapsum viśva vāryam

original: RV_08.022.12.2{07} iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā purubhūtamā narā yābhiḥ kriviṃ vavṛdhustābhirā gatam
analyzed: iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā puru bhūtamā narā yābhiḥ krivim vavṛdhuḥ tābhiḥ ā gatam

original: RV_08.022.13.1{07} tāvidā cidahānāṃ tāvaśvinā vandamāna upa bruve
analyzed: tau idā cit ahānām tau aśvinā vandamānaḥ upa bruve

original: RV_08.022.13.2{07} tā u namobhirīmahe
analyzed: tāḥ u namobhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_08.022.14.1{07} tāvid doṣā tā uṣasi śubhas patī tā yāman rudravartanī
analyzed: tau id doṣā tau uṣasi śubhaḥ patī tā yāman rudravartanī

original: RV_08.022.14.2{07} mā no martāya ripave vājinīvasū paro rudrāvati khyatam
analyzed: mā naḥ martāya ripave vājinīvasū paras rudrāvati khyatam

original: RV_08.022.15.1{07} ā sugmyāya sugmyaṃ prātā rathenāśvinā vā sakṣaṇī
analyzed: ā sugmyāya sugmyam prātar rathena aśvinā vā sakṣaṇī

original: RV_08.022.15.2{07} huve piteva sobharī
analyzed: huve pitā iva sobharī

original: RV_08.022.16.1{08} manojavasā vṛṣaṇā madacyutā makṣuṃgamābhirutibhiḥ
analyzed: manaḥ javasā vṛṣaṇā mada cyutā makṣuṃgamābhiḥ utibhiḥ

original: RV_08.022.16.2{08} ārāttāccid bhūtamasme avase purvībhiḥ purubhojasā
analyzed: ārāttāt cit bhūtam asme avase purvībhiḥ puru bhojasā

original: RV_08.022.17.1{08} ā no aśvāvadaśvinā vartiryāsiṣṭaṃ madhupātamā narā
analyzed: ā naḥ aśvāvat aśvinā vartiḥ yāsiṣṭam madhu pātamā narā

original: RV_08.022.17.2{08} gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat
analyzed: gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat

original: RV_08.022.18.1{08} suprāvargaṃ suvīryaṃ suṣṭhu vāryamanādhṛṣṭaṃ rakṣasvinā
analyzed: su prāvargam su vīryam suṣṭhu vāryam anādhṛṣṭam rakṣasvinā

original: RV_08.022.18.2{08} asminnā vāmāyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi
analyzed: asmin ā vāmāyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_08.023.01.1{09} īḷiṣvā hi pratīvyaṃ yajasva jātavedasam
analyzed: īḍiṣva ā hi pratīvyam yajasva jātavedasam

original: RV_08.023.01.2{09} cariṣṇudhūmamagṛbhītaśociṣam
analyzed: cariṣṇu dhūmam a gṛbhīta śociṣam

original: RV_08.023.02.1{09} dāmānaṃ viśvacarṣaṇe 'gniṃ viśvamano girā
analyzed: dāmānam viśvacarṣaṇe gnim viśvamanaḥ girā

original: RV_08.023.02.2{09} uta stuṣe viṣpardhaso rathānām
analyzed: uta stuṣe viṣpardhasaḥ rathānām

original: RV_08.023.03.1{09} yeṣāmābādha ṛgmiya iṣaḥ pṛkṣaśca nigrabhe
analyzed: yeṣām ābādhaḥ ṛgmiyaḥ iṣaḥ pṛkṣaḥ ca nigrabhe

original: RV_08.023.03.2{09} upavidāvahnirvindate vasu
analyzed: upavidā ahniḥ vindate vasu

original: RV_08.023.04.1{09} udasya śocirasthād dīdiyuṣo vyajaram
analyzed: udasya śociḥ asthāt dīdiyuṣaḥ vyajaram

original: RV_08.023.04.2{09} tapurjambhasya sudyuto gaṇaśriyaḥ
analyzed: tapuḥ jambhasya su dyutaḥ gaṇa śriyaḥ

original: RV_08.023.05.1{09} udu tiṣṭha svadhvara stavāno devyā kṛpā
analyzed: udu tiṣṭha su adhvara stavānaḥ devyā kṛpā

original: RV_08.023.05.2{09} abhikhyā bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ
analyzed: abhikhyā bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ

original: RV_08.023.06.1{10} agne yāhi suśastibhirhavyā juhvāna ānuṣak
analyzed: agne yāhi su śastibhiḥ havyā juhvānaḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_08.023.06.2{10} yathā dūto babhūtha havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: yathā dūtaḥ babhūtha havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_08.023.07.1{10} agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ huve hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: agnim vaḥ pūrvyam huve hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_08.023.07.2{10} tamayā vācā gṛṇe tamu va stuṣe
analyzed: tamayā vācā gṛṇe tamu vaḥ stuṣe

original: RV_08.023.08.1{10} yajñebhiradbhutakratuṃ yaṃ kṛpā sūdayanta it
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ adbhuta kratum yam kṛpā sūdayante id

original: RV_08.023.08.2{10} mitraṃ na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani
analyzed: mitram na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani

original: RV_08.023.09.1{10} ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavo yajñasya sādhanaṃ girā
analyzed: ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavaḥ yajñasya sādhanam girā

original: RV_08.023.09.2{10} upo enaṃ jujuṣurnamasas pade
analyzed: upa u enam jujuṣuḥ namasaḥ pade

original: RV_08.023.10.1{10} achā no aṅgirastamaṃ yajñāso yantu saṃyataḥ
analyzed: achā naḥ aṅgirastamam yajñāsaḥ yantu saṃyataḥ

original: RV_08.023.10.2{10} hotā yo asti vikṣvā yaśastamaḥ
analyzed: hotā yaḥ asti vikṣvā yaśastamaḥ

original: RV_08.023.11.1{11} agne tava tye ajarendhānāso bṛhad bhāḥ
analyzed: agne tava tye ajara indhānāsaḥ bṛhat bhās

original: RV_08.023.11.2{11} aśvā iva vṛṣaṇastaviṣīyavaḥ
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva vṛṣaṇaḥ taviṣīyavaḥ

original: RV_08.023.12.1{11} sa tvaṃ na ūrjāṃ pate rayiṃ rāsva suvīryam
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ ūrjām pate rayim rāsva su vīryam

original: RV_08.023.12.2{11} prāva nastoke tanaye samatsvā
analyzed: prāva naḥ toke tanaye samatsva

original: RV_08.023.13.1{11} yad vā u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ suprīto manuṣo visi
analyzed: yat vai u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ su prītaḥ manuṣaḥ visi

original: RV_08.023.13.2{11} viśvedagniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati
analyzed: viśvedagniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati

original: RV_08.023.14.1{11} śruṣṭyagne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate
analyzed: śruṣṭi agne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate

original: RV_08.023.14.2{11} ni māyinastapuṣa rakṣaso daha
analyzed: ni māyinaḥ tapuṣa rakṣasaḥ daha

original: RV_08.023.15.1{11} na tasya māyayā cana ripurīśīta martyaḥ
analyzed: na tasya māyayā cana ripuḥ īśīta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.023.15.2{11} yo agnaye dadāśa havyadātibhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ agnaye dadāśa havya dātibhiḥ

original: RV_08.023.16.1{12} vyaśvastvā vasuvidamukṣaṇyuraprīṇād ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_08.023.16.2{12} maho rayetamu tvā samidhīmahi
analyzed: mahaḥ rayā itamu tvā samidhīmahi

original: RV_08.023.17.1{12} uśanā kavyastvā ni hotāramasādayat
analyzed: uśanā kavyaḥ tvā ni hotāram asādayat

original: RV_08.023.17.2{12} āyajiṃ tvā manavejātavedasam
analyzed: āyajim tvā manave jātavedasam

original: RV_08.023.18.1{12} viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso devāso dūtamakrata
analyzed: viśve hi tvā sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ dūtam akrata

original: RV_08.023.18.2{12} śruṣṭī deva prathamo yajñiyo bhuvaḥ
analyzed: śruṣṭī deva prathamaḥ yajñiyaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: RV_08.023.19.1{12} imaṃ ghā vīro amṛtaṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇvīta martyaḥ
analyzed: imam gha vīraḥ amṛtam dūtam kṛṇvīta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.023.19.2{12} pāvakaṃkṛṣṇavartaniṃ vihāyasam
analyzed: pāvakam kṛṣṇa vartanim vihāyasam

original: RV_08.023.20.1{12} taṃ huvema yatasrucaḥ subhāsaṃ śukraśociṣam
analyzed: tam huvema yata srucaḥ su bhāsam śukra śociṣam

original: RV_08.023.20.2{12} viśāmagnimajaraṃ pratnamīḍyam
analyzed: viśām agnim ajaram pratnam īḍyam

original: RV_08.023.21.1{13} yo asmai havyadātibhirāhutiṃ marto 'vidhat
analyzed: yaḥ asmai havya dātibhiḥ āhutim martaḥ vidhat

original: RV_08.023.21.2{13} bhūri poṣaṃsa dhatte vīravad yaśaḥ
analyzed: bhūri poṣam sa dhatte vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_08.023.22.1{13} prathamaṃ jātavedasamagniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam
analyzed: prathamam jātavedasam agnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_08.023.22.2{13} prati srugeti namasā haviṣmatī
analyzed: prati srucā iti namasā haviṣmatī

original: RV_08.023.23.1{13} ābhirvidhemāgnaye jyeṣṭhābhirvyaśvavat
analyzed: ābhiḥ vidhema agnaye jyeṣṭhābhiḥ vyaśva vat

original: RV_08.023.23.2{13} maṃhiṣṭhābhirmatibhiḥ śukraśociṣe
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhābhiḥ matibhiḥ śukra śociṣe

original: RV_08.023.24.1{13} nūnamarca vihāyase stomebhiḥ sthūrayūpavat
analyzed: nūnam arca vihāyase stomebhiḥ sthūra yūpa vat

original: RV_08.023.24.2{13} ṛṣe vaiyaśvadamyāyāgnaye
analyzed: ṛṣe vaiyaśva damyāya agnaye

original: RV_08.023.25.1{13} atithiṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ sūnuṃ vanaspatīnām
analyzed: atithim mānuṣāṇām sūnum vanaspatīnām

original: RV_08.023.25.2{13} viprā agnimavase pratnamīḷate
analyzed: viprāḥ agnim avase pratnam īḍate

original: RV_08.023.26.1{14} maho viśvānabhi ṣato 'bhi havyāni mānuṣā
analyzed: mahaḥ viśvān abhi sataḥ bhi havyāni mānuṣā

original: RV_08.023.26.2{14} agne ni ṣatsi namasādhi barhiṣi
analyzed: agne ni satsi namasā adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_08.023.27.1{14} vaṃsvā no vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ
analyzed: vaṃsva naḥ vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ

original: RV_08.023.27.2{14} suvīryasya prajāvato yaśasvataḥ
analyzed: su vīryasya prajāvataḥ yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_08.023.28.1{14} tvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe 'gne janāya codaya
analyzed: tvam suṣāmṇe gne janāya codaya

original: RV_08.023.28.2{14} sadā vaso rātiṃ yaviṣṭha śaśvate
analyzed: sadā vasoḥ rātim yaviṣṭha śaśvate

original: RV_08.023.29.1{14} tvaṃ hi supratūrasi tvaṃ no gomatīriṣaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi supratūrasi tvam naḥ gomatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_08.023.29.2{14} maho rāyaḥ sātimagne apā vṛdhi
analyzed: mahaḥ rāyaḥ sā atimagne apa vṛdhi

original: RV_08.023.30.1{14} agne tvaṃ yaśā asyā mitrāvaruṇā vaha
analyzed: agne tvam yaśāḥ asyāḥ mitrāvaruṇā vaha

original: RV_08.023.30.2{14} ṛtāvānā samrājā pūtadakṣasā
analyzed: ṛtāvānā samrājā pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_08.024.01.1{15} sakhāya ā śiṣāmahi brahmendrāya vajriṇe
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā śiṣāmahi brahma indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_08.024.01.2{15} stuṣa ū ṣuvo nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave
analyzed: stuṣe u suvar nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave

original: RV_08.024.02.1{15} śavasa hyasi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā
analyzed: śavasa hi asi śrutaḥ vṛtra hatyena vṛtrahā

original: RV_08.024.02.2{15} maghairmaghono ati śūra dāśasi
analyzed: maghaiḥ maghonaḥ ati śūra dāśasi

original: RV_08.024.03.1{15} sa na stavāna ā bhara rayiṃ citraśravastamam
analyzed: sa naḥ stavānaḥ ā bhara rayim citraśravastamam

original: RV_08.024.03.2{15} nireke cid yo harivo vasurdadiḥ
analyzed: nireke cit yaḥ harivas vasurdadiḥ

original: RV_08.024.04.1{15} ā nirekamuta priyamindra darṣi janānām
analyzed: ā nirekam uta priyam indra darṣi janānām

original: RV_08.024.04.2{15} dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamāna ā bhara
analyzed: dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamānaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_08.024.05.1{15} na te savyaṃ na dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ varanta āmuraḥ
analyzed: na te savyam na dakṣiṇam hastam varante āmuraḥ

original: RV_08.024.05.2{15} na paribādho harivo gaviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: na paribādhaḥ harivas gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_08.024.06.1{16} ā tvā gobhiriva vrajaṃ gīrbhir{ṛ}ṇomyadrivaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā gobhiḥ iva vrajam gīrbhiḥ ṛṇomi adrivas

original: RV_08.024.06.2{16} ā sma kāmaṃ jariturā manaḥ pṛṇa
analyzed: ā sma kāmam jarituḥ ā manaḥ pṛṇa

original: RV_08.024.07.1{16} viśvani viśvamanaso dhiyā no vṛtrahantama
analyzed: viśvani viśvamanasaḥ dhiyā naḥ vṛtra hantama

original: RV_08.024.07.2{16} ugra praṇetaradhi ṣu vaso gahi
analyzed: ugra praṇetaradhi su vaso gahi

original: RV_08.024.08.1{16} vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ
analyzed: vayam te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ

original: RV_08.024.08.2{16} vaso spārhasya puruhūta rādhasaḥ
analyzed: vaso spārhasya puruhūta rādhasaḥ

original: RV_08.024.09.1{16} indra yathā hyasti te 'parītaṃ nṛto śavaḥ
analyzed: indra yathā hi asti te parītam nṛto śavaḥ

original: RV_08.024.09.2{16} amṛkta rātiḥ puruhūta dāśuṣe
analyzed: amṛkta rātiḥ puruhūta dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.024.10.1{16} ā vṛṣasva mahāmaha mahe nṛtama rādhase
analyzed: ā vṛṣasva mahā maha mahe nṛtama rādhase

original: RV_08.024.10.2{16} dṛḷhaścid dṛhya maghavan maghattaye
analyzed: dṛḍhaḥ cit dṛhya maghavan maghattaye

original: RV_08.024.11.1{17} nū anyatrā cidadrivastvan no jagmuraśasaḥ
analyzed: nu anyatra cit adrivastvat naḥ jagmuḥ raśasaḥ

original: RV_08.024.11.2{17} maghavañchagdhi tava tan na utibhiḥ
analyzed: maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ utibhiḥ

original: RV_08.024.12.1{17} nahyaṅga nṛto tvadanyaṃ vindāmi rādhase
analyzed: na hi aṅga nṛto tvad anyam vindāmi rādhase

original: RV_08.024.12.2{17} rāye dyumnāyaśavase ca girvaṇaḥ
analyzed: rāye dyumnāyaśavase ca girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.024.13.1{17} endumindrāya siñcata pibati somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: ā indum indrāya siñcata pibati somyam madhu

original: RV_08.024.13.2{17} pra rādhasā codayāte mahitvanā
analyzed: pra rādhasā codayāte mahitvanā

original: RV_08.024.14.1{17} upo harīṇāṃ patiṃ dakṣaṃ pṛñcantamabravam
analyzed: upa u harīṇām patim dakṣam pṛñcantam abravam

original: RV_08.024.14.2{17} nūnaṃ śrudhi stuvato aśvyasya
analyzed: nūnam śrudhi stuvataḥ aśvyasya

original: RV_08.024.15.1{17} nahyaṅga purā cana jajñe vīratarastvat
analyzed: na hi aṅga purā cana jajñe vīrataraḥ tvat

original: RV_08.024.15.2{17} nakī rāyā naivathā na bhandanā
analyzed: nakir rāyā na evathā na bhandanā

original: RV_08.024.16.1{18} edu madhvo madintaraṃ siñca vādhvaryo andhasaḥ
analyzed: ā idu madhvaḥ madintaram siñca vā adhvaryo andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.024.16.2{18} evā hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: eva hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.024.17.1{18} indra sthātarharīṇāṃ nakiṣ ṭe pūrvyastutim
analyzed: indra sthātar harīṇām nakir te pūrvya stutim

original: RV_08.024.17.2{18} udānaṃśaśavasā na bhandanā
analyzed: udānaṃśa śavasā na bhandanā

original: RV_08.024.18.1{18} taṃ vo vājānāṃ patimahūmahi śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: tam vaḥ vājānām patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_08.024.18.2{18} aprāyubhiryajñebhirvāvṛdhenyam
analyzed: aprāyubhiḥ yajñebhiḥ vāvṛdhenyam

original: RV_08.024.19.1{18} eto nvindraṃ stavāma sakhāyaḥ stomyaṃ naram
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma sakhāyaḥ stomyam naram

original: RV_08.024.19.2{18} kṛṣtīryo viśvā abhyastyeka it
analyzed: kṛṣtīḥ yaḥ viśvāḥ abhyasti ekaḥ id

original: RV_08.024.20.1{18} agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyam vacaḥ

original: RV_08.024.20.2{18} ghṛtāt svādīyo madhunaśca vocata
analyzed: ghṛtāt svādīyaḥ madhunaḥ ca vocata

original: RV_08.024.21.1{19} yasyāmitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave
analyzed: yasya amitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave

original: RV_08.024.21.2{19} jyotirna viśvamabhyasti dakṣiṇā
analyzed: jyotiḥ na viśvam abhyasti dakṣiṇā

original: RV_08.024.22.1{19} stuhīndraṃ vyaśvavadanūrmiṃ vājinaṃ yamam
analyzed: stuhi indram vyaśva vat anūrmim vājinam yamam

original: RV_08.024.22.2{19} aryo gayammaṃhamānaṃ vi dāśuṣe
analyzed: aryaḥ gayam maṃhamānam vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.024.23.1{19} evā nūnamupa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamaṃ navam
analyzed: eva nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamam navam

original: RV_08.024.23.2{19} suvidvāṃsaṃ carkṛtyaṃ caraṇīnām
analyzed: su vidvāṃsam carkṛtyam caraṇīnām

original: RV_08.024.24.1{19} vetthā hi nir{ṛ}tīnāṃ vajrahasta parivṛjam
analyzed: vettha hi nirṛtīnām vajrahasta parivṛjam

original: RV_08.024.24.2{19} ahar-ahaḥ śundhyuḥ paripadāmiva
analyzed: ahar ahar śundhyuḥ paripadām iva

original: RV_08.024.25.1{19} tadindrāva ā bhara yenā daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane
analyzed: tat indra avaḥ ā bhara yena daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane

original: RV_08.024.25.2{19} dvitā kutsāya śiśnatho ni codaya
analyzed: dvitā kutsāya śiśnathaḥ ni codaya

original: RV_08.024.26.1{20} tamu tvā nūnamīmahe navyaṃ daṃsiṣṭha sanyase
analyzed: tam u tvā nūnam īmahe navyam daṃsiṣṭha sanyase

original: RV_08.024.26.2{20} sa tvaṃno viśvā abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ viśvāḥ abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_08.024.27.1{20} ya ṛkṣādaṃhaso mucad yo vāryāt sapta sindhuṣu
analyzed: yaḥ ṛkṣāt aṃhasaḥ mucat yaḥ vā āryāt sapta sindhuṣu

original: RV_08.024.27.2{20} vadhardāsasya tuvinṛmṇa nīnamaḥ
analyzed: vadhardāsasya tuvi nṛmṇa nīnamaḥ

original: RV_08.024.28.1{20} yathā varo suṣāmṇe sanibhya āvaho rayim
analyzed: yathā suṣāmṇe sanibhyaḥ āvahaḥ rayim

original: RV_08.024.28.2{20} vyaśvebhyaḥ subhage vajinīvati
analyzed: vyaśvebhyaḥ subhage vajinīvati

original: RV_08.024.29.1{20} ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvānetu sominaḥ
analyzed: ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvān etu sominaḥ

original: RV_08.024.29.2{20} sthūraṃ ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat
analyzed: sthūram ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat

original: RV_08.024.30.1{20} yat tvā pṛchādījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte
analyzed: yat tvā pṛccha adījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte

original: RV_08.024.30.2{20} eṣo apaśritovalo gomatīmava tiṣṭhati
analyzed: eṣa u apaśrita uvalaḥ gomatīm ava tiṣṭhati

original: RV_08.025.01.1{21} tā vāṃ viśvasya gopā devā deveṣu yajñiya
analyzed: tā vām viśvasya gopāḥ devā deveṣu yajñiya

original: RV_08.025.01.2{21} ṛtāvānā yajase putadakṣasā
analyzed: ṛtāvānā yajase puta dakṣasā

original: RV_08.025.02.1{21} mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇo yaśca sukratuḥ
analyzed: mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇaḥ yaḥ ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_08.025.02.2{21} sanāt sujātā tanayā dhṛtavratā
analyzed: sanāt sujātā tanayā dhṛtavratā

original: RV_08.025.03.1{21} tā mātā viśvavedasāsuryāya pramahasā
analyzed: tā mātā viśva vedasā asuryāya pramahasā

original: RV_08.025.03.2{21} mahi jajānāditir{ṛ}tāvarī
analyzed: mahi jajāna aditiḥ ṛtāvarī

original: RV_08.025.04.1{21} mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devāvasurā
analyzed: mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devāvasurā

original: RV_08.025.04.2{21} ṛtāvānāvṛtamā ghoṣato bṛhat
analyzed: ṛtāvān avṛtamā ghoṣataḥ bṛhat

original: RV_08.025.05.1{21} napātā śavaso mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya sukratu
analyzed: napātā śavasaḥ mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya su kratu

original: RV_08.025.05.2{21} sṛpradānū iṣo vāstvadhi kṣitaḥ
analyzed: sṛpra dānū iṣaḥ vāstu adhi kṣitaḥ

original: RV_08.025.06.1{22} saṃ yā dānūni yemathurdivyāḥ pārthivīriṣaḥ
analyzed: sam yā dānūni yemathuḥ divyāḥ pārthivīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_08.025.06.2{22} nabhasvatīrā vāṃ carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: nabhasvatī irā vām carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_08.025.07.1{22} adhi yā bṛhato divo 'bhi yūtheva paśyataḥ
analyzed: adhi yā bṛhataḥ divaḥ bhi yūthā iva paśyataḥ

original: RV_08.025.07.2{22} ṛtāvānā samrājā namase hitā
analyzed: ṛtāvānā samrājā namase hitā

original: RV_08.025.08.1{22} ṛtāvānā ni ṣedatuḥ sāmrājyāya sukratū
analyzed: ṛtāvānā ni sedatuḥ sāmrājyāya su kratū

original: RV_08.025.08.2{22} dhṛtavratā kṣatriyā kṣatramaśatuḥ
analyzed: dhṛta vratā kṣatriyā kṣatram aśatuḥ

original: RV_08.025.09.1{22} akṣṇaścid gātuvittaranulbaṇena cakṣasā
analyzed: akṣṇaḥ cit gātu vittara nulbaṇena cakṣasā

original: RV_08.025.09.2{22} ni cin miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ
analyzed: ni cit miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ

original: RV_08.025.10.1{22} uta no devyaditiruruṣyatāṃ nāsatyā
analyzed: uta naḥ devī aditiḥ uruṣyatām nāsatyā

original: RV_08.025.10.2{22} uruṣyantu maruto vṛddhaśavasaḥ
analyzed: uruṣyantu marutaḥ vṛddha śavasaḥ

original: RV_08.025.11.1{23} te no nāvamuruṣyata divā naktaṃ sudānavaḥ
analyzed: te naḥ nāvam uruṣyata divā naktam sudānavaḥ

original: RV_08.025.11.2{23} ariṣyanto nipāyubhiḥ sacemahi
analyzed: a riṣyantaḥ nipāyubhiḥ sacemahi

original: RV_08.025.12.1{23} aghnate viṣṇave vayamariṣyantaḥ sudānave
analyzed: a ghnate viṣṇave vayam a riṣyantaḥ sudānave

original: RV_08.025.12.2{23} śrudhi svayāvan sindho pūrvacittaye
analyzed: śrudhi sva yāvan sindho pūrva cittaye

original: RV_08.025.13.1{23} tad vāryaṃ vṛṇīmahe variṣṭhaṃ gopayatyam
analyzed: tat vāryam vṛṇīmahe variṣṭham gopayatyam

original: RV_08.025.13.2{23} mitro yat pānti varuṇo yadaryamā
analyzed: mitraḥ yat pānti varuṇaḥ yat aryamā

original: RV_08.025.14.1{23} uta naḥ sindhurapāṃ tan marutastadaśvinā
analyzed: uta naḥ sindhuḥ apām tat marutaḥ tat aśvinā

original: RV_08.025.14.2{23} indro viṣṇurmīḍhvāṃsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viṣṇuḥ mīḍhvāṃsaḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_08.025.15.1{23} te hi ṣmā vanuṣo naro 'bhimātiṃ kayasya cit
analyzed: te hi sma vanuṣaḥ naraḥ bhimātim kayasya cit

original: RV_08.025.15.2{23} tigmaṃ nakṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ
analyzed: tigmam nakṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_08.025.16.1{24} ayameka itthā purūru caṣṭe vi viṣpatiḥ
analyzed: ayam ekaḥ itthā puru uru caṣṭe vi viṣpatiḥ

original: RV_08.025.16.2{24} tasya vratānyanu vaścaramasi
analyzed: tasya vratāni anu vaḥ caramasi

original: RV_08.025.17.1{24} anu pūrvāṇyokyā sāmrājyasya saścima
analyzed: anu pūrvāṇi okyā sāmrājyasya saścima

original: RV_08.025.17.2{24} mitrasya vratā varuṇasya dirghaśrut
analyzed: mitrasya vratā varuṇasya dirgha śrut

original: RV_08.025.18.1{24} pari yo raśminā divo 'ntān mame pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: pari yaḥ raśminā divaḥ ntāt mame pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_08.025.18.2{24} ubhe ā papraurodasī mahitvā
analyzed: ubhe ā papraurodasī mahitvā

original: RV_08.025.19.1{24} udu ṣya śaraṇe divo jyotirayaṃsta sūryaḥ
analyzed: udu sya śaraṇe divaḥ jyotiḥ ayaṃsta sūryaḥ

original: RV_08.025.19.2{24} agnirna śukraḥ samidhāna āhutaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ na śukraḥ samidhānaḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_08.025.20.1{24} vaco dīrghaprasadmanīśe vājasya gomataḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ dīrghaprasadmani īśe vājasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.025.20.2{24} īśe hi pitvo'viṣasya dāvane
analyzed: īśe hi pitvaḥ uviṣasya dāvane

original: RV_08.025.21.1{25} tat sūryaṃ rodasī ubhe doṣā vastorupa bruve
analyzed: tat sūryam rodasī ubhe doṣā vastoḥ upa bruve

original: RV_08.025.21.2{25} bhojeṣvasmānabhyuccarā sadā
analyzed: bhojeṣu asmān abhyuccarā sadā

original: RV_08.025.22.1{25} ṛjramukṣaṇyāyane rajataṃ harayāṇe
analyzed: ṛjram ukṣaṇyāyane rajatam harayāṇe

original: RV_08.025.22.2{25} rathaṃ yuktamasanāma suṣāmaṇi
analyzed: ratham yuktam asanāma suṣāmaṇi

original: RV_08.025.23.1{25} tā me aśvyānāṃ harīṇāṃ nitośanā
analyzed: tā me aśvyānām harīṇām nitośanā

original: RV_08.025.23.2{25} uto nu kṛtvyānāṃ nṛvāhasā
analyzed: uta u nu kṛtvyānām nṛ vāhasā

original: RV_08.025.24.1{25} smadabhīṣū kaśāvantā viprā naviṣṭhayā matī
analyzed: smat abhīṣū kaśāvantā viprāḥ naviṣṭhayā matī

original: RV_08.025.24.2{25} maho vājināvarvantā sacāsanam
analyzed: mahaḥ vājinau arvantā sacā asanam

original: RV_08.026.01.1{26} yuvoru ṣū rathaṃ huve sadhastutyāya suriṣu
analyzed: yuvā uru su ratham huve sadhastutyāya suriṣu

original: RV_08.026.01.2{26} aturtadakṣāvṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: aturta dakṣāvṛṣaṇā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.026.02.1{26} yuvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā
analyzed: yuvam suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā

original: RV_08.026.02.2{26} avobhiryatho vṛṣaṇa vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: avobhiḥ yathaḥ vṛṣaṇa vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.026.03.1{26} tā vāmadya havāmahe havyebhirvajinīvasū
analyzed: tā vām adya havāmahe havyebhiḥ vajinīvasū

original: RV_08.026.03.2{26} pūrvīriṣa iṣayantāvati kṣapaḥ
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ iṣayantāvati kṣapaḥ

original: RV_08.026.04.1{26} ā vāṃ vāhiṣṭho aśvinā ratho yātu śruto nara
analyzed: ā vām vāhiṣṭhaḥ aśvinā rathaḥ yātu śrutaḥ nara

original: RV_08.026.04.2{26} upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye
analyzed: upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye

original: RV_08.026.05.1{26} juhurāṇā cidaśvinā manyethāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: juhurāṇā cit aśvinā manyethām vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.026.05.2{26} yuvaṃ hi rudrā parṣatho ati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yuvam hi rudrā parṣathaḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_08.026.06.1{27} dasrā hi viśvamānuṣaṃ makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ
analyzed: dasrā hi viśva mānuṣam makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ

original: RV_08.026.06.2{27} dhiyaṃjinvā madhuvarṇā śubhas patī
analyzed: dhiyaṃjinvā madhu varṇā śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_08.026.07.1{27} upa no yātamaśvinā rāyā viśvapuṣā saha
analyzed: upa naḥ yātam aśvinā rāyā viśva puṣā saha

original: RV_08.026.07.2{27} maghavānā suvīrāvanapacyutā
analyzed: maghavānā su vīrau an apacyutā

original: RV_08.026.08.1{27} ā me asya pratīvyamindranāsatyā gatam
analyzed: ā me asya pratīvyam indra nāsatyāḥ gatam

original: RV_08.026.08.2{27} devā devebhiradya sacanastamā
analyzed: devā devebhiḥ adya sacanastamā

original: RV_08.026.09.1{27} vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmaha ukṣaṇyanto vyaśvavat
analyzed: vayam hi vām havāmahe ukṣaṇyantaḥ vyaśva vat

original: RV_08.026.09.2{27} sumatibhirupa viprāvihā gatam
analyzed: sumatibhiḥ upa viprau iha ā gatam

original: RV_08.026.10.1{27} aśvinā sv ṛṣe stuhi kuvit te śravato havam
analyzed: aśvinā su ṛṣe stuhi kuvid te śravataḥ havam

original: RV_08.026.10.2{27} nedīyasaḥ kūḷayātaḥ paṇīnruta
analyzed: nedīyasaḥ kūḷayātaḥ paṇīn ruta

original: RV_08.026.11.1{28} vaiyaśvasya śrutaṃ naroto me asya vedathaḥ
analyzed: vaiyaśvasya śrutam narā uta u me asya vedathaḥ

original: RV_08.026.11.2{28} sajoṣasā varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: sajoṣasā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_08.026.12.1{28} yuvādattasya dhiṣṇyā yuvānītasya sūribhiḥ
analyzed: yuvādattasya dhiṣṇyā yuvānītasya sūribhiḥ

original: RV_08.026.12.2{28} ahar-aharvṛṣaṇa mahyaṃ śikṣatam
analyzed: ahar ahar vṛṣaṇa mahyam śikṣatam

original: RV_08.026.13.1{28} yo vāṃ yajñebhirāvṛto 'dhivastra vadhūriva
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñebhiḥ āvṛtaḥ vadhūḥ iva

original: RV_08.026.13.2{28} saparyanta śubhe cakrāte aśvinā
analyzed: saparyanta śubhe cakrāte aśvinā

original: RV_08.026.14.1{28} yo vāmuruvyacastamaṃ ciketati nṛpāyyam
analyzed: yaḥ vām uru vyacastamam ciketati nṛ pāyyam

original: RV_08.026.14.2{28} vartiraśvinā pari yātamasmayū
analyzed: vartiḥ aśvinā pari yātam asmayū

original: RV_08.026.15.1{28} asmabhyaṃ su vṛṣaṇvasū yātaṃ vartirnṛpayyam
analyzed: asmabhyam su vṛṣaṇvasū yātam vartiḥ nṛ payyam

original: RV_08.026.15.2{28} viṣudruheva yajñamūhathurgirā
analyzed: viṣu druhā iva yajñam ūhathuḥ girā

original: RV_08.026.16.1{29} vāhiṣṭho vāṃ havānāṃ stomo dūto huvan narā
analyzed: vāhiṣṭhaḥ vām havānām stomaḥ dūtaḥ huvat narā

original: RV_08.026.16.2{29} yuvābhyāṃ bhūtvaśvinā
analyzed: yuvābhyām bhūtu aśvinā

original: RV_08.026.17.1{29} yadado divo arṇava iṣo va madatho gṛhe
analyzed: yat adaḥ divaḥ arṇave iṣaḥ vaḥ madathaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_08.026.17.2{29} śrutamin me amartyā
analyzed: śrutamin me amartyā

original: RV_08.026.18.1{29} uta syā śvetayāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vāṃ nadīnām
analyzed: uta syā śveta yāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vām nadīnām

original: RV_08.026.18.2{29} sindhurhiraṇyavartaniḥ
analyzed: sindhuḥ hiraṇya vartaniḥ

original: RV_08.026.19.1{29} smadetaya sukīrtyāśvinā śvetayā dhiyā
analyzed: smat etaya su kīrtyā aśvinā śvetayā dhiyā

original: RV_08.026.19.2{29} vahethe śubhrayāvānā
analyzed: vahethe śubhra yāvānā

original: RV_08.026.20.1{29} yukṣvā hi tvaṃ rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso
analyzed: yukṣvā hi tvam rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso

original: RV_08.026.20.2{29} ān no vāyo madhu pibāsmākaṃ savanā gahi
analyzed: āt naḥ vāyo madhu piba asmākam savanā gahi

original: RV_08.026.21.1{30} tava vāyav ṛtaspate tvaṣṭurjāmātaradbhuta
analyzed: tava vāyo ṛtaspate tvaṣṭuḥ jāmātar adbhuta

original: RV_08.026.21.2{30} avāṃsyā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: avāṃsyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.026.22.1{30} tvaṣṭurjāmātaraṃ vayamīśānaṃ rāya īmahe
analyzed: tvaṣṭuḥ jāmātaram vayam īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_08.026.22.2{30} sutāvanto vayuṃ dyumnā janāsaḥ
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ vayum dyumnā janāsaḥ

original: RV_08.026.23.1{30} vāyo yāhi śivā divo vahasva su svaśvyam
analyzed: vāyo yāhi śiva ā divaḥ vahasva su su aśvyam

original: RV_08.026.23.2{30} vahasva mahaḥpṛthupakṣasā rathe
analyzed: vahasva mahaḥ pṛthu pakṣasā rathe

original: RV_08.026.24.1{30} tvāṃ hi supsarastamaṃ nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe
analyzed: tvām hi su psarastamam nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe

original: RV_08.026.24.2{30} grāvāṇaṃ nāśvapṛṣṭhaṃ maṃhanā
analyzed: grāvāṇam na aśva pṛṣṭham maṃhanā

original: RV_08.026.25.1{30} sa tvaṃ no deva manasā vāyo mandāno agriyaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ deva manasā vāyo mandānaḥ agriyaḥ

original: RV_08.026.25.2{30} kṛdhi vājānapo dhiyaḥ
analyzed: kṛdhi vājānapaḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_08.027.01.1{31} agnirukthe purohito grāvāṇo barhiradhvare
analyzed: agniḥ ukthe purohitaḥ grāvāṇaḥ barhiḥ adhvare

original: RV_08.027.01.2{31} ṛcā yāmi maruto brahmaṇas patiṃ devānavo vareṇyam
analyzed: ṛcā yāmi marutaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patim devānavaḥ vareṇyam

original: RV_08.027.02.1{31} ā paśuṃ gāsi pṛthivīṃ vanaspatīnuṣāsā naktamoṣadhīḥ
analyzed: ā paśum gāsi pṛthivīm vanaspatīn uṣāsā naktam oṣadhīḥ

original: RV_08.027.02.2{31} viśve ca no vasavo viśvavedaso dhīnāṃ bhūta prāvitāraḥ
analyzed: viśve ca naḥ vasavaḥ viśva vedasaḥ dhīnām bhūta prāvitāraḥ

original: RV_08.027.03.1{31} pra sū na etvadhvaro 'gnā deveṣu pūrvyaḥ
analyzed: pra su naḥ etu adhvaraḥ gnāḥ deveṣu pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_08.027.03.2{31} ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛtavrate marutsu viśvabhānuṣu
analyzed: ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛta vrate marutsu viśva bhānuṣu

original: RV_08.027.04.1{31} viśve hi ṣmā manave viśvavedaso bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ
analyzed: viśve hi sma manave viśva vedasaḥ bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ

original: RV_08.027.04.2{31} ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhirviśvavedaso yantā no 'vṛkaṃ chardiḥ
analyzed: ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ viśva vedasaḥ yanta naḥ vṛkam chardiḥ

original: RV_08.027.05.1{31} ā no adya samanaso gantā viśve sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ adya samanasaḥ ganta viśve sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_08.027.05.2{31} ṛcā girā maruto devyadite sadane pastye mahi
analyzed: ṛcā girā marutaḥ devi adite sadane pastye mahi

original: RV_08.027.06.1{32} abhi priyā maruto yā vo aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana
analyzed: abhi priyā marutaḥ yā vaḥ aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana

original: RV_08.027.06.2{32} ābarhirindro varuṇasturā nara ādityāso sadantu naḥ
analyzed: ābarhiḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ turāḥ naraḥ ādityāsaḥ sadantu naḥ

original: RV_08.027.07.1{32} vayaṃ vo vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa ānuṣak
analyzed: vayam vaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ ānuṣak

original: RV_08.027.07.2{32} sutasomāso varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvadiddhāgnayaḥ
analyzed: suta somāsaḥ varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvat iddha agnayaḥ

original: RV_08.027.08.1{32} ā pra yāta maruto viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā
analyzed: ā pra yāta marutaḥ viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā

original: RV_08.027.08.2{32} indra ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhirvṛṣā yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe
analyzed: indraḥ ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhiḥ vṛṣā yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe

original: RV_08.027.09.1{32} vi no devāso adruho 'chidraṃ śarma yachata
analyzed: vi naḥ devāsaḥ adruhaḥ chidram śarma yacchata

original: RV_08.027.09.2{32} na yad dūrād vasavo nū cidantito varūthamādadharṣati
analyzed: na yat dūrāt vasavaḥ nu cit antitas varūtham ādadharṣati

original: RV_08.027.10.1{32} asti hi vaḥ sajātyaṃ riśādaso devāso astyāpyam
analyzed: asti hi vaḥ sajātyam riśādasaḥ devāsaḥ asti āpyam

original: RV_08.027.10.2{32} pra ṇaḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase
analyzed: pra naḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase

original: RV_08.027.11.1{33} idā hi va upastutimidā vāmasya bhaktaye
analyzed: idā hi vaḥ upastutim idā vāmasya bhaktaye

original: RV_08.027.11.2{33} upa vo viśvavedaso namasyurānasṛkṣyanyāmiva
analyzed: upa vaḥ viśva vedasaḥ namasyuḥ ānasṛkṣyan yām iva

original: RV_08.027.12.1{33} udu ṣya vaḥ savitā supraṇītayo 'sthādūrdhvo vareṇyaḥ
analyzed: udu sya vaḥ savitā su praṇītayaḥ sthāt ūrdhvaḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_08.027.12.2{33} ni dvipādaścatuṣpādo arthino 'viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: ni dvipādaḥ catuṣpādaḥ arthinaḥ viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_08.027.13.1{33} devaṃ-devaṃ vo 'vase devaṃ-devamabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: devam devam vaḥ vase devam devam abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.027.13.2{33} devaṃ-devaṃ huvema vājasātaye gṛṇanto devyā dhiyā
analyzed: devam devam huvema vājasātaye gṛṇantaḥ devyā dhiyā

original: RV_08.027.14.1{33} devāso hi ṣmā manave samanyavo viśve sākaṃ sarātayaḥ
analyzed: devāsaḥ hi sma manave samanyavaḥ viśve sākam sa rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.027.14.2{33} te no adya te aparaṃ tuce tu no bhavantu varivovidaḥ
analyzed: te naḥ adya te aparam tuce tu naḥ bhavantu varivaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_08.027.15.1{33} pra vaḥ śaṃsāmyadruhaḥ saṃstha upastutīnām
analyzed: pra vaḥ śaṃsāmi adruhaḥ saṃsthe upastutīnām

original: RV_08.027.15.2{33} na taṃ dhūrtirvaruṇa mitra martyaṃ yo vo dhāmabhyo 'vidhat
analyzed: na tam dhūrtiḥ varuṇa mitra martyam yaḥ vaḥ dhāmabhyaḥ vidhat

original: RV_08.027.16.1{33} pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīriṣo yo vo varāya dāśati
analyzed: pra sa kṣayam tirate vi mahī riṣaḥ yaḥ vaḥ varāya dāśati

original: RV_08.027.16.2{33} pra prajābhirjāyate dharmaṇas paryariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate
analyzed: pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ paryariṣṭaḥ sarvaḥ edhate

original: RV_08.027.17.1{34} ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhiryātyadhvanaḥ
analyzed: ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhiḥ yāti adhvanaḥ

original: RV_08.027.17.2{34} aryamā mitrovaruṇaḥ sarātayo yaṃ trāyante sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ sa rātayaḥ yam trāyante sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_08.027.18.1{34} ajre cidasmai kṛṇuthā nyañcanaṃ durge cidā susaraṇam
analyzed: ajre cit asmai kṛṇutha nyañcanam durge cit ā su saraṇam

original: RV_08.027.18.2{34} eṣā cidasmādaśaniḥ paro nu sāsredhantī vi naśyatu
analyzed: eṣā cit asmāt aśaniḥ paras nu sā a sredhantī vi naśyatu

original: RV_08.027.19.1{34} yadadya sūrya udyati priyakṣatrā ṛtaṃ dadha
analyzed: yat adya sūrye udyati priya kṣatrāḥ ṛtam

original: RV_08.027.19.2{34} yan nimruci prabudhi viśvavedaso yad vā madhyandine divaḥ
analyzed: yat nimruci prabudhi viśva vedasaḥ yat vā madhyandine divaḥ

original: RV_08.027.20.1{34} yad vābhipitve asurā ṛtaṃ yate chardiryema vi dāśuṣe
analyzed: yat vā abhipitve asurāḥ ṛtam yate chardiḥ yema vi dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.027.20.2{34} vayaṃ tad vo vasavo viśvavedasa upa stheyāma madhya ā
analyzed: vayam tat vaḥ vasavaḥ viśva vedasaḥ upa stheyāma madhye ā

original: RV_08.027.21.1{34} yadadya sūra udite yan madhyandina ātuci
analyzed: yat adya sūre udite yat madhyandine ātuci

original: RV_08.027.21.2{34} vāmaṃ dhattha manave viśvavedaso juhvānāya pracetase
analyzed: vāmam dhattha manave viśva vedasaḥ juhvānāya pracetase

original: RV_08.027.22.1{34} vayaṃ tad vaḥ samrāja ā vṛṇīmahe putro na bahupāyyam
analyzed: vayam tat vaḥ samrājaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe putraḥ na bahu pāyyam

original: RV_08.027.22.2{34} aśyāma tadādityā juhvato haviryena vasyo 'naśāmahai
analyzed: aśyāma tat ādityāḥ juhvataḥ haviḥ yena vasyaḥ naśāmahai

original: RV_08.028.01.1{35} ye triṃśati trayas paro devāso barhirāsadan
analyzed: ye triṃśati trayaḥ paras devāsaḥ barhiḥ āsadan

original: RV_08.028.01.2{35} vidannahadvitāsanan
analyzed: vidan ahat vita asanan

original: RV_08.028.02.1{35} varuṇo mitro aryamā smadrātiṣāco agnayaḥ
analyzed: varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā smat rātiṣācaḥ agnayaḥ

original: RV_08.028.02.2{35} patnīvanto vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ
analyzed: patnīvantaḥ vaṣaṭkṛtāḥ

original: RV_08.028.03.1{35} te no gopā apācyāsta udak ta itthā nyak
analyzed: te naḥ gopāḥ apācyāḥ te udak te itthā nyak

original: RV_08.028.03.2{35} purastāt sarvayā viśā
analyzed: purastāt sarvayā viśā

original: RV_08.028.04.1{35} yathā vaśanti devāstathedasat tadeṣāṃ nakirā minat
analyzed: yathā devāḥ tathā id asat tat eṣām nakirā minat

original: RV_08.028.04.2{35} arāvā cana martyaḥ
analyzed: arāvā cana martyaḥ

original: RV_08.028.05.1{35} saptānāṃ sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnānyeṣām
analyzed: saptānām sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnāni eṣām

original: RV_08.028.05.2{35} sapto adhi śriyo dhire
analyzed: sapta u adhi śriyaḥ dhire

original: RV_08.029.01.1{36} babhrureko viṣuṇaḥ sūnaro yuvāñjyaṅkte hiraṇyayam
analyzed: babhruḥ ekaḥ viṣuṇaḥ sūnaraḥ yuvān jyaṅkte hiraṇyayam

original: RV_08.029.02.1{36} yonimeka ā sasāda dyotano 'ntardeveṣu medhiraḥ
analyzed: yonim ekaḥ ā sasāda dyotanaḥ ntar deveṣu medhiraḥ

original: RV_08.029.03.1{36} vāśīmeko bibharti hasta āyasīmantardeveṣu nidhruviḥ
analyzed: vāśīm ekaḥ bibharti haste āyasīm antar deveṣu nidhruviḥ

original: RV_08.029.04.1{36} vajrameko bibharti hasta āhitaṃ tena vṛtrāṇi jighnate
analyzed: vajram ekaḥ bibharti haste āhitam tena vṛtrāṇi jighnate

original: RV_08.029.05.1{36} tigmameko bibharti hasta āyudhaṃ śucirugro jalāṣabheṣajaḥ
analyzed: tigmam ekaḥ bibharti haste āyudham śuciḥ ugraḥ jalāṣa bheṣajaḥ

original: RV_08.029.06.1{36} patha ekaḥ pīpāya taskaro yathā eṣa veda nidhīnām
analyzed: pathaḥ ekaḥ pīpāya taskaraḥ yathā eṣa veda nidhīnām

original: RV_08.029.07.1{36} trīṇyeka urugāyo vi cakrame yatra devāso madanti
analyzed: trīṇi ekaḥ urugāyaḥ vi cakrame yatra devāsaḥ madanti

original: RV_08.029.08.1{36} vibhirdvā carata ekayā saha pra pravāseva vasataḥ
analyzed: vibhiḥ dvā carataḥ ekayā saha pra pravāsā iva vasataḥ

original: RV_08.029.09.1{36} sado dvā cakrāte upamā divi samrājā sarpirāsutī
analyzed: sadaḥ dvā cakrāte upamā divi samrājā sarpiḥ āsutī

original: RV_08.029.10.1{36} arcanta eke mahi sāma manvata tena sūryamarocayan
analyzed: arcantaḥ eke mahi sāma manvata tena sūryam arocayan

original: RV_08.030.01.1{37} nahi vo astyarbhako devāso na kumārakaḥ
analyzed: nahi vaḥ asti arbhakaḥ devāsaḥ na kumārakaḥ

original: RV_08.030.01.2{37} viśve satomahānta it
analyzed: viśve satomahāntaḥ id

original: RV_08.030.02.1{37} iti stutāso asathā riśādaso ye stha trayaśca triṃśacca
analyzed: iti stutāsaḥ asatha riśādasaḥ ye stha trayaḥ ca triṃśat ca

original: RV_08.030.02.2{37} manordevā yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: manoḥ devāḥ yajñiyāsaḥ

analyzed: te naḥ trādhvam te vata te u naḥ adhi vocata

analyzed: mā naḥ pathaḥ pitryāt mānavāt adhi dūram naiṣṭa parāvataḥ

original: RV_08.030.04.1{37} ye devāsa iha sthana viśve vaiśvānarā uta
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ iha sthana viśve vaiśvānarāḥ uta

analyzed: asmabhyam śarma saprathaḥ gave śvāya yacchata

analyzed: yaḥ yajāti yajāte id sunavat ca pacāti ca

analyzed: brahmā id indrasya cākanat

analyzed: puroḷāśam yaḥ asmai somam rarate āśiram

analyzed: pādit tam śakraḥ aṃhasaḥ

analyzed: tasya dyumān asat rathaḥ deva jūtaḥ sa śūśuvat

original: RV_08.031.03.2{38} viśvā vanvannamitriyā
analyzed: viśvā vanvan amitriyā

original: RV_08.031.04.1{38} asya prajāvatī gṛhe 'saścantī dive-dive
analyzed: asya prajāvatī gṛhe saścantī dive dive

analyzed: iḍā dhenumatī duhe

analyzed: yā dampatī samanasā sunutaḥ ā ca dhāvataḥ

original: RV_08.031.05.2{38} devāso nityayāśirā
analyzed: devāsaḥ nityayā āśirā

analyzed: prati prāśa vyānitaḥ samyañcā barhiḥ āśāte

original: RV_08.031.06.2{39} na tā vājeṣu vāyataḥ
analyzed: na tā vājeṣu vāyataḥ

original: RV_08.031.07.1{39} na devānāmapi hnutaḥ sumatiṃ na jugukṣataḥ
analyzed: na devānām api hnutaḥ sumatim na jugukṣataḥ

analyzed: śravaḥ bṛhat vivāsataḥ

original: RV_08.031.08.2{39} ubhā hiraṇyapeśasā
analyzed: ubhā hiraṇya peśasā

analyzed: samudhaḥ romaśam hataḥ deva iṣū kṛṇutaḥ duvaḥ

analyzed: ā śarma parvatānām vṛṇīmahe nadīnām

original: RV_08.031.10.2{39} ā viṣṇoḥ sacābhuvaḥ
analyzed: ā viṣṇoḥ sacābhuvaḥ

analyzed: aitu pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ svasti sarva dhātamaḥ

original: RV_08.031.11.2{40} ururadhvā svastaye
analyzed: uru radhvā svastaye

original: RV_08.031.12.1{40} aramatiranarvaṇo viśvo devasya manasā
analyzed: aramatiḥ anarvaṇaḥ viśvaḥ devasya manasā

analyzed: ādityānām anehait

original: RV_08.031.13.1{40} yathā no mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ santi gopāḥ
analyzed: yathā naḥ mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ santi gopāḥ

original: RV_08.031.13.2{40} sugā ṛtasyapanthāḥ
analyzed: su gāḥ ṛtasya panthāḥ

analyzed: saparyantaḥpuru priyam mitram na kṣetrasādhasam

analyzed: devānām yaḥ id manaḥ yajamānaḥ iyakṣati abhi id ayajvanaḥ bhuvat

original: RV_08.031.16.1{40} na yajamāna riṣyasi na sunvāna na devayo
analyzed: na yajamāna riṣyasi na sunvāna na devayo

original: RV_08.031.16.2{40} devānāṃ ya in mano ...
analyzed: devānām yaḥ id manaḥ

original: RV_08.031.17.1{40} nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśan na pra yoṣan na yoṣati
analyzed: nakir tam karmaṇā naśat na pra yoṣat na yoṣati

original: RV_08.031.17.2{40} devānāṃ ya in mano ...
analyzed: devānām yaḥ id manaḥ

original: RV_08.031.18.1{40} asadatra suvīryamuta tyadāśvaśvyam
analyzed: asat atra su vīryam uta tyadā āśu aśvyam

original: RV_08.031.18.2{40} devānāṃ ya inmano ...
analyzed: devānām yaḥ id manaḥ

analyzed: pra kṛtāni ṛjīṣiṇaḥ kaṇvāḥ indrasya gāthayā

original: RV_08.032.01.2{01} made somasya vocata
analyzed: made somasya vocata

analyzed: yaḥ sṛbindam anarśanim piprum dāsa mahīśuvam

original: RV_08.032.02.2{01} vadhīdugro riṇannapaḥ
analyzed: vadhīt ugraḥ riṇan apaḥ

original: RV_08.032.03.1{01} nyarbudasya viṣṭapaṃ varṣmāṇaṃ bṛhatastira
analyzed: nyarbudasya viṣṭapam varṣmāṇam bṛhataḥ tira

original: RV_08.032.03.2{01} kṛṣe tadindra pauṃsyam
analyzed: kṛṣe tat indra pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.032.04.1{01} prati śrutāya vo dhṛṣat tūrṇāśaṃ na gireradhi

original: RV_08.032.04.2{01} huvesuśipramūtaye
analyzed: huve su śipram ūtaye

analyzed: sa goḥ aśvasya vi vrajam mandānaḥ somyebhyaḥ

analyzed: puram naśūra darṣasi

original: RV_08.032.06.1{02} yadi me rāraṇaḥ suta ukthe vā dadhase canaḥ
analyzed: yadi me rāraṇaḥ sute ukthe vā dadhase canaḥ

original: RV_08.032.06.2{02} ārādupasvadhā gahi
analyzed: ārāt upasvadhā gahi
