analyzed: vayam gha te api smasi stotāraḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.032.07.2{02} tvaṃ no jinva somapāḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ jinva soma pāḥ

original: RV_08.032.08.1{02} uta naḥ pitumā bhara saṃrarāṇo avikṣitam
analyzed: uta naḥ pitumā bhara saṃrarāṇaḥ a vikṣitam

original: RV_08.032.08.2{02} maghavan bhūri te vasu
analyzed: maghavan bhūri te vasu

original: RV_08.032.09.1{02} uta no gomatas kṛdhi hiraṇyavato aśvinaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ gomataḥ kṛdhi hiraṇyavataḥ aśvinaḥ

original: RV_08.032.09.2{02} iḷābhiḥ saṃ rabhemahi
analyzed: iḷābhiḥ sam rabhemahi

original: RV_08.032.10.1{02} bṛbadukthaṃ havāmahe sṛprakarasnamūtaye
analyzed: bṛbaduktham havāmahe sṛpra karasnamūtaye

original: RV_08.032.10.2{02} sādhu kṛṇvantamavase
analyzed: sādhu kṛṇvantam avase

original: RV_08.032.11.1{03} yaḥ saṃsthe cicchatakraturādīṃ kṛṇoti vṛtrahā
analyzed: yaḥ saṃsthe cit śatakratuḥ ādīm kṛṇoti vṛtrahā

original: RV_08.032.11.2{03} jaritṛbhyaḥ purūvasuḥ
analyzed: jaritṛbhyaḥ purūvasuḥ

original: RV_08.032.12.1{03} sa naḥ śakraścidā śakad dānavānantarābharaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ śakraḥ cidā śakat dānava anantara ābharaḥ

original: RV_08.032.12.2{03} indroviśvābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: indraḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.032.13.1{03} yo rāyo 'vanirmahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā
analyzed: yaḥ rāyaḥ vaniḥ mahān su pāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_08.032.13.2{03} tamindramabhi gāyata
analyzed: tam indram abhi gāyata

original: RV_08.032.14.1{03} āyantāraṃ mahi sthiraṃ pṛtanāsu śravojitam
analyzed: āyantāram mahi sthiram pṛtanāsu śravaḥ jitam

original: RV_08.032.14.2{03} bhūrerīśānamojasā
analyzed: bhūreḥ īśānam ojasā

original: RV_08.032.15.1{03} nakirasya śacīnāṃ niyantā sūnṛtānām
analyzed: nakirasya śacīnām niyantā sūnṛtānām

original: RV_08.032.15.2{03} nakirvaktā nadāditi
analyzed: nakirvaktā nadāt iti

original: RV_08.032.16.1{04} na nūnaṃ brahmaṇām ṛṇaṃ prāśūnāmasti sunvatām
analyzed: na nūnam brahmaṇām ṛṇam prāśūnām asti sunvatām

original: RV_08.032.16.2{04} na somo apratā pape
analyzed: na somaḥ apratā pape

original: RV_08.032.17.1{04} panya idupa gāyata panya ukthāni śaṃsata
analyzed: panye id upa gāyata panye ukthāni śaṃsata

original: RV_08.032.17.2{04} brahmā kṛṇotapanya it
analyzed: brahmā kṛṇotapanyaḥ id

original: RV_08.032.18.1{04} panya ā dardiracchatā sahasrā vājyavṛtaḥ
analyzed: panyaḥ ā dardirat śatā sahasrā vājya vṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.032.18.2{04} indro yo yajvano vṛdhaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ yaḥ yajvanaḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.032.19.1{04} vi ṣū cara svadhā anu kṛṣṭīnāmanvāhuvaḥ
analyzed: vi su cara svadhāḥ anu kṛṣṭīnām anvāhuvaḥ

original: RV_08.032.19.2{04} indra piba sutānām
analyzed: indra piba sutānām

original: RV_08.032.20.1{04} piba svadhainavānāmuta yastugrye sacā
analyzed: piba svadhā enavānām uta yaḥ tugrye sacā

original: RV_08.032.20.2{04} utāyamindra yastava
analyzed: uta ayam indra yaḥ tava

original: RV_08.032.21.1{05} atīhi manyuṣāviṇaṃ suṣuvāṃsamupāraṇe
analyzed: atīhi manyuṣāviṇam suṣuvāṃsam upāraṇe

original: RV_08.032.21.2{05} imaṃ rātaṃsutaṃ piba
analyzed: imam rātaṃsutam piba

original: RV_08.032.22.1{05} ihi tisraḥ parāvata ihi pañca janānati
analyzed: ihi tisraḥ parāvataḥ ihi pañca janān ati

original: RV_08.032.22.2{05} dhenā indrāvacākaśat
analyzed: dhenāḥ indra avacākaśat

original: RV_08.032.23.1{05} sūryo raśmiṃ yathā sṛjā tvā yachantu me giraḥ
analyzed: sūryaḥ raśmim yathā sṛja tvā yacchantu me giraḥ

original: RV_08.032.23.2{05} nimnamāpo na sadhryak
analyzed: nimnam āpaḥ na sadhryak

original: RV_08.032.24.1{05} adhvaryavā tu hi ṣiñca somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe
analyzed: adhvaryavā tu hi siñca somam vīrāya śipriṇe

original: RV_08.032.24.2{05} bharāsutasya pītaye
analyzed: bharā sutasya pītaye

original: RV_08.032.25.1{05} ya udnaḥ phaligaṃ bhinan nyak sindhūnravāsṛjat
analyzed: yaḥ udnaḥ phaligam bhinat nyak sindhūn ravā asṛjat

original: RV_08.032.25.2{05} yo goṣupakvaṃ dhārayat
analyzed: yaḥ goṣu pakvam dhārayat

original: RV_08.032.26.1{06} ahan vṛtram ṛcīṣama aurṇavābhamahīśuvam
analyzed: ahan vṛtram ṛcīṣamaḥ aurṇavābha mahīśuvam

original: RV_08.032.26.2{06} himenāvidhyadarbudam
analyzed: himena avidhyat arbudam

original: RV_08.032.27.1{06} pra va ugrāya niṣṭure 'ṣāḷhāya prasakṣiṇe
analyzed: pra vaḥ ugrāya niṣṭure ṣāḷhāya prasakṣiṇe

original: RV_08.032.27.2{06} devattaṃ brahma gāyata
analyzed: devattam brahma gāyata

original: RV_08.032.28.1{06} yo viśvānyabhi vratā somasya made andhasaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ viśvāni abhi vratā somasya made andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.032.28.2{06} indro deveṣu cetati
analyzed: indraḥ deveṣu cetati

original: RV_08.032.29.1{06} iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā
analyzed: iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇya keśyā

original: RV_08.032.29.2{06} voḷhāmabhi prayo hitam
analyzed: voḍhām abhi prayaḥ hitam

original: RV_08.032.30.1{06} arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī
analyzed: arvāñcam tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedha stutā harī

original: RV_08.032.30.2{06} somapeyāyavakṣataḥ
analyzed: soma peyā yavakṣataḥ

original: RV_08.033.01.1{07} vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: vayam gha tvā sutāvantaḥ āpaḥ na vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.033.01.2{07} pavitrasyaprasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate
analyzed: pavitrasya prasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāraḥ āsate

original: RV_08.033.02.1{07} svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ
analyzed: svaranti tvā sute naraḥ vaso nireke ukthinaḥ

original: RV_08.033.02.2{07} kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā gama indra svabdīva vaṃsagaḥ
analyzed: kadā sutam tṛṣāṇaḥ okaḥ ā gamaḥ indra svabdī iva vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_08.033.03.1{07} kaṇvebhirdhṛṣṇavā dhṛṣad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam
analyzed: kaṇvebhiḥ dhṛṣṇavā dhṛṣat vājam darṣi sahasriṇam

original: RV_08.033.03.2{07} piśaṅgarūpaṃ maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantamīmahe
analyzed: piśaṅga rūpam maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantam īmahe

original: RV_08.033.04.1{07} pāhi gāyāndhaso mada indrāya medhyātithe
analyzed: pāhi gāya andhasaḥ made indrāya medhyātithe

original: RV_08.033.04.2{07} yaḥ sammiśloharyoryaḥ sute sacā vajrī ratho hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sammiślaḥ haryoḥ yaḥ sute sacā vajrī rathaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_08.033.05.1{07} yaḥ suṣavyaḥ sudakṣiṇa ino yaḥ sukraturgṛṇe
analyzed: yaḥ suṣavyaḥ su dakṣiṇaḥ inaḥ yaḥ su kratuḥ gṛṇe

original: RV_08.033.05.2{07} ya ākaraḥ sahasrā yaḥ śatāmagha indro yaḥ pūrbhidāritaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ākaraḥ sahasrā yaḥ śatāmaghaḥ indraḥ yaḥ pūrbhidāritaḥ

original: RV_08.033.06.1{08} yo dhṛṣito yo 'vṛto yo asti śmaśruṣu śritaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dhṛṣitaḥ yaḥ vṛtaḥ yaḥ asti śmaśruṣu śritaḥ

original: RV_08.033.06.2{08} vibhūtadyumnaścyavanaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ kratvā gauriva śākinaḥ
analyzed: vibhūta dyumnaḥ cyavanaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ kratvā gauḥ iva śākinaḥ

original: RV_08.033.07.1{08} ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe
analyzed: kaḥ īm veda sute sacā pibantam kad vayaḥ dadhe

original: RV_08.033.07.2{08} ayaṃ yaḥpuro vibhinattyojasā mandānaḥ śipryandhasaḥ
analyzed: ayam yaḥpuraḥ vibhinatti ojasā mandānaḥ śipri andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.033.08.1{08} dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe
analyzed: dānā mṛgaḥ na vāraṇaḥ purutrā caratham dadhe

original: RV_08.033.08.2{08} nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamadā sute gamo mahāṃścarasyojasā
analyzed: nakir tvā ni yama dāḥ sute gamaḥ mahān carasi ojasā

original: RV_08.033.09.1{08} ya ugraḥ sannaniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ugraḥ sanna niṣṭṛta sthiraḥ raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.033.09.2{08} yadi stoturmaghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣatyā gamat
analyzed: yadi stotuḥ maghavā śṛṇavat havam na indraḥ yoṣatyā gamat

original: RV_08.033.10.1{08} satyamitthā vṛṣedasi vṛṣajūtirno 'vṛtaḥ
analyzed: satyam itthā vṛṣā idasi vṛṣa jūtiḥ naḥ vṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.033.10.2{08} vṛṣā hyugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣo arvāvati śrutaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā hi ugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣaḥ arvāvati śrutaḥ

original: RV_08.033.11.1{09} vṛṣaṇaste abhīśavo vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī
analyzed: vṛṣaṇaḥ te abhīśavaḥ vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī

original: RV_08.033.11.2{09} vṛṣā ratho maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvaṃ satakrato
analyzed: vṛṣā rathaḥ maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvam satakrato

original: RV_08.033.12.1{09} vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣannṛjīpinnā bhara
analyzed: vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣan ṛjīpin ā bhara

original: RV_08.033.12.2{09} vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇaṃ nadīṣvā tubhyaṃ sthātarharīṇām
analyzed: vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇam nadīṣva ā tubhyam sthātar harīṇām

original: RV_08.033.13.1{09} endra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam
analyzed: ā indra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam

original: RV_08.033.13.2{09} nāyamachā maghavā śṛṇavad giro brahmokthā ca sukratuḥ
analyzed: na ayam achā maghavā śṛṇavat giraḥ brahma ukthā ca su kratuḥ

original: RV_08.033.14.1{09} vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhāmā harayo rathayujaḥ
analyzed: vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhāmāḥ harayaḥ ratha yujaḥ

original: RV_08.033.14.2{09} tiraścidaryaṃ savanāni vṛtrahannanyeṣāṃ yā śatakrato
analyzed: tiraścit aryam savanāni vṛtrahan anyeṣām yā śatakrato

original: RV_08.033.15.1{09} asmākamadyāntamaṃ stomaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha
analyzed: asmākam adya antamam stomam dhiṣva mahā maha

original: RV_08.033.15.2{09} asmākaṃ te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ
analyzed: asmākam te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa soma pāḥ

original: RV_08.033.16.1{10} nahi ṣastava no mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati
analyzed: nahi sa stava na u mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati

original: RV_08.033.16.2{10} yo asmānvīra ānayat
analyzed: yaḥ asmān vīraḥ ānayat

original: RV_08.033.17.1{10} indraścid ghā tadabravīt striyā aśāsyaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ cit gha tat abravīt striyāḥ a śāsyam manaḥ

original: RV_08.033.17.2{10} uto aha kratuṃ raghum
analyzed: uta u aha kratum raghum

original: RV_08.033.18.1{10} saptī cid ghā madacyutā mithunā vahato ratham
analyzed: saptī cit gha mada cyutā mithunā vahataḥ ratham

original: RV_08.033.18.2{10} eved dhūrvṛṣṇa uttarā
analyzed: eva id dhūrvṛṣṇaḥ uttarā

original: RV_08.033.19.1{10} adhaḥ paśyasva mopari santarāṃ pādakau hara
analyzed: adhas paśyasva mā upari santarām pādakau hara

original: RV_08.033.19.2{10} mā te kaṣaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha
analyzed: mā te kaṣaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha

original: RV_08.034.01.1{11} endra yāhi haribhirupa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim
analyzed: ā indra yāhi haribhiḥ upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim

original: RV_08.034.01.2{11} divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso
analyzed: divaḥ amuṣya śāsataḥ divam yaya divāvaso

original: RV_08.034.02.1{11} ā tvā grāvā vadanniha somī ghoṣeṇa yachatu
analyzed: ā tvā grāvā vadan iha somī ghoṣeṇa yacchatu
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.03.1{11} atrā vi nemireṣāmurāṃ na dhūnute vṛkaḥ
analyzed: atrā vi nemiḥ eṣām urām na dhūnute vṛkaḥ
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.04.1{11} ā tvā kaṇvā ihāvase havante vājasātaye
analyzed: ā tvā kaṇvāḥ iha avase havante vājasātaye
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.05.1{11} dadhāmi te sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe na pūrvapāyyam
analyzed: dadhāmi te sutānām vṛṣṇe na pūrva pāyyam
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.06.1{12} smatpurandhirna ā gahi viśvatodhīrna ūtaye
analyzed: smat purandhiḥ naḥ ā gahi viśvatas dhīḥ naḥ ūtaye
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.07.1{12} ā no yāhi mahemate sahasrote śatāmagha
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi mahemate sahasra ūte śatāmagha
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.08.1{12} ā tvā hotā manurhito devatrā vakṣadīḍyaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā hotā manuḥ hitaḥ devatrā vakṣat īḍyaḥ
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.09.1{12} ā tvā madacyutā harī śyenaṃ pakṣeva vakṣataḥ
analyzed: ā tvā mada cyutā harī śyenam pakṣā iva vakṣataḥ
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.10.1{12} ā yāhyarya ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye
analyzed: ā yāhi aryaḥ ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.11.1{13} ā no yāhyupaśrutyuktheṣu raṇayā iha
analyzed: ā naḥ yāhi upaśrutī uktheṣu raṇaya iha
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.12.1{13} sarūpairā su no gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛtāśvaḥ
analyzed: sa rūpaiḥ ā su naḥ gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛta aśvaḥ
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.13.1{13} ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapaḥ
analyzed: ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasya adhi viṣṭapaḥ
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.14.1{13} ā no gavyānyaśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi
analyzed: ā naḥ gavyāni aśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.15.1{13} ā naḥ sahasraśo bharāyutāni śatāni ca
analyzed: ā naḥ sahasraśas bhara ayutāni śatāni ca
divaḥ amuṣya

original: RV_08.034.16.1{13} ā yadindraśca dadvahe sahasraṃ vasurociṣaḥ
analyzed: ā yat indraḥ ca dadvahe sahasram vasurociṣaḥ

original: RV_08.034.16.2{13} ojiṣṭhamaśvyaṃ paśum
analyzed: ojiṣṭham aśvyam paśum

original: RV_08.034.17.1{13} ya ṛjrā vātaraṃhaso 'ruṣāso raghuṣyadaḥ
analyzed: ye ṛjrāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ ruṣāsaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ

original: RV_08.034.17.2{13} bhrājante sūryā iva
analyzed: bhrājante sūryāḥ iva

original: RV_08.034.18.1{13} pārāvatasya rātiṣu dravaccakreṣvāśuṣu
analyzed: pārāvatasya rātiṣu dravat cakreṣu āśuṣu

original: RV_08.034.18.2{13} tiṣṭhaṃ vanasya madhya ā
analyzed: tiṣṭham vanasya madhye ā

original: RV_08.035.01.1{14} agninendreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunādityai rudrairvasubhiḥ sacābhuvā
analyzed: agninā indreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunā ādityaiḥ rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_08.035.01.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ pibatamaśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.02.1{14} viśvābhirdhībhirbhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyādribhiḥ sacābhuvā
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ dhībhiḥ bhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyā adribhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_08.035.02.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā

original: RV_08.035.03.1{14} viśvairdevaistribhirekādaśairihādbhirmarudbhirbhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā
analyzed: viśvaiḥ devaiḥ tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha adbhiḥ marudbhiḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā

original: RV_08.035.03.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā

original: RV_08.035.04.1{14} juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ bodhataṃ havasya me viśveha devau savanāva gachatam
analyzed: juṣethām yajñam bodhatam havasya me viśvā iha devau savanā ava gacchatam

original: RV_08.035.04.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷhamaśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca iṣam naḥ voḷham aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.05.1{14} stomaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśeva kanyanāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gachatam
analyzed: stomam juṣethām yuvaśā iva kanyanām viśvā iha devau savanā ava gachatam

original: RV_08.035.05.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryena ceṣaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryena ca iṣam

original: RV_08.035.06.1{14} giro juṣethāmadhvaraṃ juṣethāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gachatam
analyzed: giraḥ juṣethām adhvaram juṣethām viśvā iha devau savanā ava gacchatam

original: RV_08.035.06.2{14} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca iṣam

original: RV_08.035.07.1{15} hāridraveva patatho vanedupa somaṃ sutaṃ mahiṣevāva gachathaḥ
analyzed: hāridravā iva patathaḥ vanā id upa somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gachathaḥ

original: RV_08.035.07.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trirvartiryātamaśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris vartiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.08.1{15} haṃsāviva patatho adhvagāviva somaṃ sutaṃ mahiṣevāva gachathaḥ
analyzed: haṃsau iva patathaḥ adhvagau iva somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gachathaḥ

original: RV_08.035.08.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris

original: RV_08.035.09.1{15} śyenāviva patatho havyadātaye somaṃ sutaṃ mahiṣevāva gachathaḥ
analyzed: śyenau iva patathaḥ havya dātaye somam sutam mahiṣā iva ava gachathaḥ

original: RV_08.035.09.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca tris

original: RV_08.035.10.1{15} pibataṃ ca tṛpṇutaṃ cā ca gachataṃ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam
analyzed: pibatam ca tṛpṇutam ca ā ca gacchatam prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_08.035.10.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattamaśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam naḥ dhattam aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.11.1{15} jayataṃ ca pra stutaṃ ca pra cāvataṃ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam
analyzed: jayatam ca pra stutam ca pra ca avatam prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_08.035.11.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam

original: RV_08.035.12.1{15} hataṃ ca śatrūn yatataṃ ca mitriṇaḥ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam
analyzed: hatam ca śatrūn yatatam ca mitriṇaḥ prajām ca dhattam draviṇam ca dhattam

original: RV_08.035.12.2{15} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ūrjam

original: RV_08.035.13.1{16} mitrāvaruṇavantā uta dharmavantā marutvantā jariturgachatho havam
analyzed: mitrāvaruṇavantau uta dharmavantā marutvantā jarituḥ gachathaḥ havam

original: RV_08.035.13.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityairyātamaśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.14.1{16} aṅgirasvantā uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jariturgachatho havam
analyzed: aṅgirasvantau uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jarituḥ gacchathaḥ havam

original: RV_08.035.14.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ

original: RV_08.035.15.1{16} ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jariturgachatho havam
analyzed: ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jarituḥ gachathaḥ havam

original: RV_08.035.15.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca ādityaiḥ

original: RV_08.035.16.1{16} brahma jinvatamuta jinvataṃ dhiyo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatamamīvāḥ
analyzed: brahma jinvatam uta jinvatam dhiyaḥ hatam rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_08.035.16.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam sunvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.17.1{16} kṣatraṃ jinvatamuta jinvataṃ nṝn hataṃ rakṣāṇsi sedhatamamīvāḥ
analyzed: kṣatram jinvatam uta jinvatam nṝn hatam rakṣāṇsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_08.035.17.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam

original: RV_08.035.18.1{16} dhenūrjinvatamuta jinvataṃ viśo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatamamīvāḥ
analyzed: dhenūḥ jinvatam uta jinvatam viśaḥ hatam rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ

original: RV_08.035.18.2{16} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam

original: RV_08.035.19.1{17} atreriva śṛṇutaṃ pūrvyastutiṃ śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā
analyzed: atreḥ iva śṛṇutam pūrvya stutim śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_08.035.19.2{17} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryena cāśvinā tiroahnyam
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryena ca aśvinā tiroahnyam

original: RV_08.035.20.1{17} sargāniva sṛjataṃ suṣṭutīrupa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā
analyzed: sargān iva sṛjatam suṣṭutīḥ upa śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_08.035.20.2{17} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.21.1{17} raśmīnriva yachatamadhvarānupa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā
analyzed: raśmīn riva yat śatam adhvarān upa śyāvāśvasya sunvataḥ mada cyutā

original: RV_08.035.21.2{17} sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā ...
analyzed: sajoṣasau uṣasā sūryeṇa ca aśvinā

original: RV_08.035.22.1{17} arvāg rathaṃ ni yachataṃ pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: arvāk ratham ni yacchatam pibatam somyam madhu

analyzed: yam te bhāgam

original: RV_08.036.06.2{18} yaṃ te bhāgaṃ ...

analyzed: mādhyandinasya

analyzed: mādhyandinasya

analyzed: mādhyandinasya

analyzed: mādhyandinasya

original: RV_08.038.03.2{20} indrāgnī tasya bodhatam
analyzed: indra agnī tasya bodhatam

analyzed: indra agnī ā gatam narā

original: RV_08.038.05.2{20} indrāgnīā gataṃ narā
analyzed: indra agnīā gatam narā

analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

original: RV_08.038.08.2{21} indrāgnīsomapītaye
analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

analyzed: indra agnī soma pītaye

analyzed: ā aham sarasvatīvatoḥ indra agnyoḥ avaḥ vṛṇe

analyzed: yābhyām gāyatram ṛcyate

analyzed: nyagne navyasā vacaḥ tanūṣu śaṃsam eṣām

analyzed: nyarātīḥ viśvāḥ aryaḥ arātīḥ itas yuchantu āmuraḥ nabhantām anyake same

analyzed: agne manmāni tubhyam kam ghṛtam na juhve āsani

original: RV_08.039.03.2{22} sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvaṃ hyasi pūrvyaḥ śivo dūto vivasvato nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvam hi asi pūrvyaḥ śivaḥ dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.039.04.1{22} tat-tadagnirvayo dadhe yathā-yathā kṛpaṇyati
analyzed: tat tat agniḥ vayaḥ dadhe yathā yathā kṛpaṇyati

analyzed: ūrjā āhutiḥ vasūnām śam ca yoḥ ca mayaḥ dadhe viśvasyai deva hūtyai nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.039.05.1{22} sa ciketa sahīyasāgniścitreṇa karmaṇā

analyzed: agniḥ deveṣu saṃvasuḥ sa vikṣu yajñiyāsu ā

original: RV_08.039.08.1{23} yo agniḥ saptamānuṣaḥ śrito viśveṣu sindhuṣu
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ sapta mānuṣaḥ śritaḥ viśveṣu sindhuṣu

original: RV_08.039.08.2{23} tamāganma tripastyaṃ mandhāturdasyuhantamamagniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ nabhantāṃ anyake same

original: RV_08.039.09.1{23} agnistrīṇi tridhātūnyā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ sa trīnrekādaśāniha yakṣacca piprayacca no vipro dūtaḥ pariṣkṛto nabhantāmanyake
analyzed: agniḥ trīṇi tri dhātūni yā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ sa trīn rekādaśān iha yakṣat ca piprayat ca naḥ vipraḥ dūtaḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ nabhantām anyake

original: RV_08.039.10.2{23} tvāmāpaḥ parisrutaḥ pari yanti svasetavo nabhantāmanyake same

original: RV_08.040.01.1{24} indrāgnī yuvaṃ su naḥ sahantā dāsatho rayim

original: RV_08.040.01.2{24} yena dṛḷhā samatsvā vīḷu cit sāhiṣīmahyagnirvaneva vāta in nabhantāmanyake same

analyzed: nahi vām thā indram id yajāmahe śaviṣṭham nṛṇām naram

original: RV_08.040.02.2{24} sa naḥ kadā cidarvatā gamadā vājasātayegamadā medhasātaye nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa naḥ kadā cit arvatā gamadāḥ vāja sātaye gamadāḥ medha sātaye nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.03.1{24} tā hi madhyaṃ bharāṇāmindrāgnī adhikṣitaḥ
analyzed: tā hi madhyam bharāṇām indra agnī adhikṣitaḥ

original: RV_08.040.03.2{24} tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛchyamānā sakhīyate saṃ dhītamaśnutaṃ narā nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛchyamānā sakhīyate sam dhītam aśnutam narā nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.04.1{24} abhyarca nabhākavadindrāgnī yajasā girā
analyzed: abhyarca nabhāka vat indra agnī yajasā girā

original: RV_08.040.04.2{24} yayorviśvamidaṃ jagadiyaṃ dyauḥ pṛthivī mahyupasthe bibhṛto vasu nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: yayoḥ viśvam idam jagat iyam dyauḥ pṛthivī mahī upasthe bibhṛtaḥ vasu nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.05.1{24} pra brahmāṇi nabhākavadindrāgnibhyāmirajyata
analyzed: pra brahmāṇi nabhāka vat indra agnibhyām irajyata

analyzed: yā sapta budhnam arṇavam jihma bāram aporṇutaḥ indraḥ īśānaḥ ojasā nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.06.1{24} api vṛśca purāṇavad vratateriva guṣpitamojo dāsasya dambhaya
analyzed: api vṛśca purāṇa vat vratateḥ iva guṣpitam ojaḥ dāsasya dambhaya

original: RV_08.040.06.2{24} vayaṃ tadasya sambhṛtaṃ vasvindreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: vayam tat asya sambhṛtam vasu indreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.07.1{25} yadindrāgnī janā ime vihvayante tanā girā
analyzed: yat indra agnī janāḥ ime vihvayante tanā girā

original: RV_08.040.07.2{25} asmākebhirnṛbhirvayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyato nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ vayam sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.08.1{25} yā nu śvetāvavo diva uccarāta upa dyubhiḥ
analyzed: yā nu śvetau avaḥ divaḥ uccarātaḥ upa dyubhiḥ

original: RV_08.040.08.2{25} indrāgnyoranu vratamuhānā yanti sindhavo yān sīṃ bandhādamuñcatāṃ nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: indra agnyoḥ anu vratam uhānāḥ yanti sindhavaḥ yān sīm bandhāt amuñcatām nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.09.1{25} pūrvīṣ ṭa indropamātayaḥ pūrvīruta praśastayaḥ sūnohinvasya harivaḥ
analyzed: pūrvīḥ te indra upamātayaḥ pūrvīḥ uta praśastayaḥ sūnohinvasya harivas

original: RV_08.040.09.2{25} vasvo vīrasyāpṛco yā nu sādhanta no dhiyo nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: vasvaḥ vīrasya āpṛcaḥ yāḥ nu sādhanta naḥ dhiyaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.10.1{25} taṃ śiśītā suvṛktibhistveṣaṃ satvānam ṛgmiyam
analyzed: tam śiśīta suvṛktibhiḥ tveṣam satvānam ṛgmiyam

original: RV_08.040.10.2{25} uto nucid ya ojasā śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīrapo nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: uta u nucit yaḥ ojasā śuṣṇasya aṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīḥ apaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.11.1{25} taṃ śiśītā svadhvaraṃ satyaṃ satvānam ṛtviyam
analyzed: tam śiśīta su adhvaram satyam satvānam ṛtviyam

original: RV_08.040.11.2{25} uto nucid ya ohata āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedatyajaiḥ svarvatīrapo nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: uta u nucit yaḥ ohate āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedatyajaiḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.040.12.1{25} evendrāgnibhyāṃ pitṛvan navīyo mandhātṛvadaṅgirasvadavāci
analyzed: eva indra agnibhyām pitṛ vat navīyaḥ mandhātṛ vat aṅgirasvat avāci

original: RV_08.040.12.2{25} tridhātunā śarmaṇā pātamasmān vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām
analyzed: tri dhātunā śarmaṇā pātam asmān vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_08.041.01.1{26} asmā ū ṣu prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyo 'rcā viduṣṭarebhyaḥ
analyzed: asmai u su prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ rca viduṣṭarebhyaḥ

original: RV_08.041.01.2{26} yo dhītā mānuṣāṇāṃ paśvo gā iva rakṣati nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: yaḥ dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvaḥ gāḥ iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.02.1{26} tamū ṣu samanā girā pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ nābhākasyapraśastibhiryaḥ sindhūnāmupodaye saptasvasā sa madhyamo nabhantāmanyake
analyzed: tamū su samanā girā pitṝṇām ca manmabhiḥ nābhākasya praśastibhiḥ yaḥ sindhūnām upodaye sapta svasā sa madhyamaḥ nabhantām anyake

original: RV_08.041.03.1{26} sa kṣapaḥ pari ṣasvaje nyusro māyayā dadhe sa viśvaṃ pari darśataḥ
analyzed: sa kṣapaḥ pari sasvaje nyusraḥ māyayā dadhe sa viśvam pari darśataḥ

original: RV_08.041.03.2{26} tasya venīranu vratamuṣastisro avardhayannabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: tasya venīḥ anu vratam uṣaḥ tisraḥ avardhayan abhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.04.1{26} yaḥ kakubho nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyāmadhi darśataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kakubhaḥ nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ

original: RV_08.041.04.2{26} sa mātā pūrvyaṃ padaṃ tad varuṇasya saptyaṃ sa hi gopā iveryonabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa mātā pūrvyam padam tat varuṇasya saptyam sa hi gopāḥ iva iryaḥ nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.05.1{26} yo dhartā bhuvanānāṃ ya usrāṇāmapīcyā veda nāmāniguhyā
analyzed: yaḥ dhartā bhuvanānām yaḥ usrāṇām apīcyā veda nāmā aniguhyā

original: RV_08.041.05.2{26} sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpaṃ dyauriva puṣyati nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpam dyauḥ iva puṣyati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.06.1{27} yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhiriva śritā
analyzed: yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhiḥ iva śritā

original: RV_08.041.06.2{27} tritaṃ jūtī saparyata vraje gāvo na saṃyuje yuje aśvānayukṣata nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: tritam jūtī saparyata vraje gāvaḥ na saṃyuje yuje aśvān ayukṣata nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.07.1{27} ya āsvatka āśaye viśvā jātānyeṣām
analyzed: yaḥ āsvatkaḥ āśaye viśvā jātāni eṣām

original: RV_08.041.07.2{27} pari dhāmāni marmṛśad varuṇasya puro gaye viśve devā anu vrataṃ nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: pari dhāmāni marmṛśat varuṇasya puras gaye viśve devāḥ anu vratam nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.08.1{27} sa samudro apīcyasturo dyāmiva rohati ni yadāsu yajurdadhe
analyzed: sa samudraḥ apīcyaḥ turaḥ dyām iva rohati ni yadāsu yajuḥ dadhe

original: RV_08.041.08.2{27} sa māyā arcinā padāstṛṇān nākamāruhan nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa māyāḥ arcinā padā astṛṇāt nākam āruhat nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.09.1{27} yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisro bhūmīradhikṣitaḥ
analyzed: yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisraḥ bhūmīḥ adhikṣitaḥ

original: RV_08.041.09.2{27} triruttarāṇi papraturvaruṇasya dhruvaṃ sadaḥ sa saptānāmirajyati nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: tris uttarāṇi papratuḥ varuṇasya dhruvam sadaḥ sa saptānām irajyati nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.041.10.1{27} yaḥ śvetānadhinirṇijaścakre kṛṣṇānanu vratā
analyzed: yaḥ śvetān adhinirṇijaḥ cakre kṛṣṇān anu vratā

original: RV_08.041.10.2{27} sa dhāma pūrvyaṃ mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajo na dyāmadhārayan nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: sa dhāma pūrvyam mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajaḥ na dyām adhārayat nabhantām anyake same

original: RV_08.042.01.1{28} astabhnād dyāmasuro viśvavedā amimīta varimāṇaṃ pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: astabhnāt dyām asuraḥ viśva vedāḥ amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_08.042.01.2{28} āsīdad viśvā bhuvanāni samrāḍ viśvet tāni varuṇasya vratāni
analyzed: āsīdat viśvā bhuvanāni samrāj viśvā id tāni varuṇasya vratāni

original: RV_08.042.02.1{28} evā vandasva varuṇaṃ bṛhantaṃ namasyā dhīramamṛtasya gopām
analyzed: eva vandasva varuṇam bṛhantam namasya dhīram amṛtasya gopām

original: RV_08.042.02.2{28} sa naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsat pātaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe
analyzed: sa naḥ śarma tri varūtham vi yaṃsat pātam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe

analyzed: imām dhiyam śikṣamāṇasya deva kratum dakṣam varuṇa sam śiśādhi

original: RV_08.042.03.2{28} yayāti viśvā duritā tarema sutarmāṇamadhi nāvaṃ ruhema
analyzed: yayā ati viśvā duritā tarema su tarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruhema

original: RV_08.042.04.1{28} ā vāṃ grāvāṇo aśvinā dhībhirviprā acucyavuḥ
analyzed: ā vām grāvāṇaḥ aśvinā dhībhiḥ viprāḥ acucyavuḥ

analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

analyzed: yathā vām atriḥ aśvinā gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ ajohavīt

original: RV_08.042.05.2{28} nāsatyāsomapītaye nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

analyzed: eva vāmahve ūtaye yathā ahuvanta medhirāḥ

original: RV_08.042.06.2{28} nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantāmanyake same
analyzed: nāsatyā soma pītaye nabhantām anyake same

analyzed: ime viprasya vedhasaḥ gneḥ astṛta yajvanaḥ

analyzed: giraḥ stomāsaḥ īrate

analyzed: agne janāmi suṣṭutim

analyzed: admasadyāya hinvire

analyzed: agnim īḍe saḥ u śravat

analyzed: adhvarāṇām abhiśriyam

analyzed: kaviḥ vipreṇa vāvṛdhe

analyzed: mitraḥ pāntyadruhaḥ

analyzed: nahi te śūra rādhasaḥ ntam vindāmi satrā

original: RV_08.046.11.2{03} daśasyā no maghavan nū cidadrivo dhiyo vājebhirāvitha

analyzed: abhi vaḥ vīram andhasaḥ madeṣu gāya girā mahā vicetasam

original: RV_08.046.14.2{03} indraṃ nāma śrutyaṃ śākinaṃ vaco yathā
analyzed: indram nāma śrutyam śākinam vacaḥ yathā

original: RV_08.046.15.1{03} dadī rekṇastanve dadirvasu dadirvājeṣu puruhūta vājinam
analyzed: dadiḥ rekṇaḥ tanve dadiḥ vasu dadiḥ vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam

original: RV_08.046.15.2{03} nūnamatha
analyzed: nūnam atha

original: RV_08.046.16.1{04} viśveṣāmirajyantaṃ vasūnāṃ sāsahvāṃsaṃ cidasya varpasaḥ
analyzed: viśveṣām irajyantam vasūnām sāsahvāṃsam cit asya varpasaḥ

original: RV_08.046.16.2{04} kṛpayato nūnamatyatha
analyzed: kṛpayataḥ nūnam ati atha

original: RV_08.046.17.1{04} mahaḥ su vo aramiṣe stavāmahe mīḷhuṣe araṃgamāya jagmaye
analyzed: mahaḥ su vaḥ aramiṣe stavāmahe mīḍhuṣe araṃgamāya jagmaye

original: RV_08.046.17.2{04} yajñebhirgīrbhirviśvamanuṣāṃ marutāmiyakṣasi gāyetvā namasā girā
analyzed: yajñebhiḥ gīrbhiḥ viśva manuṣām marutām iyakṣasi gāya itvā namasā girā

original: RV_08.046.18.1{04} ye pātayante ajmabhirgirīṇāṃ snubhireṣām
analyzed: ye pātayante ajmabhiḥ girīṇām snubhiḥ eṣām

original: RV_08.046.18.2{04} yajñaṃ mahiṣvaṇīnāṃ sumnaṃ tuviṣvaṇīnāṃ prādhvare
analyzed: yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnām sumnam tuviṣvaṇīnām pra adhvare

original: RV_08.046.19.1{04} prabhaṅgaṃ durmatīnāmindra śaviṣṭhā bhara
analyzed: prabhaṅgam durmatīnām indra śaviṣṭha ā bhara

original: RV_08.046.19.2{04} rayimasmabhyaṃ yujyaṃ codayanmate jyeṣṭhaṃ codayanmate
analyzed: rayim asmabhyam yujyam codayat mate jyeṣṭham codayat mate

original: RV_08.046.20.1{04} sanitaḥ susanitarugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta
analyzed: sanitar su sanitar ugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta

original: RV_08.046.20.2{04} prāsahā samrāṭ sahuriṃ sahantaṃ bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam
analyzed: prāsahā samrāj sahurim sahantam bhujyum vājeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_08.046.21.1{05} ā sa etu ya īvadānadevaḥ pūrtamādade
analyzed: ā saḥ etu yaḥ īvat dāna devaḥ pūrtam ādade

original: RV_08.046.21.2{05} yathā cid vaśo aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte 'syā vyuṣyādade
analyzed: yathā cit vaśaḥ aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte syāḥ vyuṣi ādade

original: RV_08.046.22.1{05} ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśvyasyāyutāsanamuṣṭrānāṃ viṃśatiṃśatā
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasra aśvyasya ayuta āsanam uṣṭrānām viṃśatiṃśatā

original: RV_08.046.22.2{05} daśa śyāvīnāṃ śatā daśa tryaruṣīṇāṃ daśa gavāṃ sahasrā
analyzed: daśa śyāvīnām śatā daśa tri aruṣīṇām daśa gavām sahasrā

original: RV_08.046.23.1{05} daśa śyāvā ṛdhadrayo vītavārāsa āśavaḥ
analyzed: daśa śyāvāḥ ṛdhadrayaḥ vīta vārāsaḥ āśavaḥ

original: RV_08.046.23.2{05} mathrā nemiṃ ni vāvṛtuḥ
analyzed: mathrāḥ nemim ni vāvṛtuḥ

original: RV_08.046.24.1{05} dānāsaḥ pṛthuśravasaḥ kānītasya surādhasaḥ
analyzed: dānāsaḥ pṛthuśravasaḥ kānītasya surādhasaḥ

original: RV_08.046.24.2{05} rathaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ dadan maṃhiṣṭaḥ sūrirabhūd varṣiṣṭhamakṛta śravaḥ
analyzed: ratham hiraṇyayam dadan maṃhiṣṭaḥ sūriḥ abhūt varṣiṣṭham akṛta śravaḥ

original: RV_08.046.25.1{05} ā no vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase
analyzed: ā naḥ vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase

original: RV_08.046.25.2{05} vayaṃ hi te cakṛmā bhūri dāvane sadyaścin mahi dāvane
analyzed: vayam hi te cakṛma bhūri dāvane sadyaścit mahi dāvane

original: RV_08.046.26.1{06} yo aśvebhirvahate vasta usrāstriḥ sapta saptatīnām
analyzed: yaḥ aśvebhiḥ vahate usrāḥ tris sapta saptatīnām

original: RV_08.046.26.2{06} ebhiḥ somebhiḥ somasudbhiḥ somapā dānāya śukrapūtapāḥ
analyzed: ebhiḥ somebhiḥ soma sudbhiḥ soma pāḥ dānāya śukra pūta pāḥ

original: RV_08.046.27.1{06} yo ma imaṃ cidu tmanāmandaccitraṃ dāvane
analyzed: yaḥ me imam cit u tmanā amandat citram dāvane

original: RV_08.046.27.2{06} araṭve akṣenahuṣe sukṛtvani sukṛttarāya sukratuḥ
analyzed: araṭve akṣenahuṣe su kṛtvani sukṛttarāya su kratuḥ

original: RV_08.046.28.1{06} ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāḷ uta vāyo ghṛtasnāḥ
analyzed: ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāj uta vāyo ghṛta snāḥ

original: RV_08.046.28.2{06} aśveṣitaṃ rajeṣitaṃ śuneṣitaṃ prājma tadidaṃ nu tat
analyzed: aśva iṣitam raja iṣitam śunā iṣitam pra ajma tat idam nu tat

original: RV_08.046.29.1{06} adha priyamiṣirāya ṣasṭiṃ sahasrāsanam
analyzed: adha priyam iṣirāya ṣasṭim sahasra āsanam

original: RV_08.046.29.2{06} aśvānāmin na vṛṣṇām
analyzed: aśvānāmin na vṛṣṇām

original: RV_08.046.30.1{06} gāvo na yūthamupa yanti vadhraya upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ na yūtham upa yanti vadhrayaḥ upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ

original: RV_08.046.31.1{06} adha yaccārathe gaṇe śatamuṣṭrānacikradat
analyzed: adha yat cārathe gaṇe śatam uṣṭrān acikradat

original: RV_08.046.31.2{06} adha śvitneṣu viṃśatiṃ śatā
analyzed: adha śvitneṣu viṃśatim śatā

original: RV_08.046.32.1{06} śataṃ dāse balbūthe viprastarukṣa ā dade
analyzed: śatam dāse balbūthe vipraḥ tarukṣe ā dade

original: RV_08.046.32.2{06} te te vāyavime janā madantīndragopā madanti devagopāḥ
analyzed: te te vāyo ime janāḥ madanti indra gopāḥ madanti deva gopāḥ

original: RV_08.046.33.1{06} adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśamaśvyam
analyzed: adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśam aśvyam

original: RV_08.046.33.2{06} adhirukmā vi nīyate
analyzed: adhirukmā vi nīyate

original: RV_08.047.01.1{07} mahi vo mahatāmavo varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe
analyzed: mahi vaḥ mahatā amavaḥ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.047.01.2{07} yamādityā abhi druho rakṣathā nemaghaṃ naśadanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: yam ādityāḥ abhi druhaḥ rakṣatha nemagham naśat anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.02.1{07} vidā devā aghānāmādityāso apākṛtim
analyzed: vida devāḥ aghānām ādityāsaḥ apākṛtim

original: RV_08.047.02.2{07} pakṣā vayo yathopari vyasme śarma yachatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: pakṣā vayaḥ yathā upari vi asme śarma yacchata anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.03.1{07} vyasme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayo na yantana
analyzed: vi asme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayaḥ na yantana

original: RV_08.047.03.2{07} viśvāni viśvavedaso varūthyā manāmahe 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: viśvāni viśva vedasaḥ varūthyā manāmahe nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.04.1{07} yasmā arāsata kṣayaṃ jīvātuṃ ca pracetasaḥ
analyzed: yasmai arāsata kṣayam jīvātum ca pracetasaḥ

original: RV_08.047.04.2{07} manorviśvasya ghedima ādityā rāya īśate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: manoḥ viśvasya gha idime ādityāḥ rāyaḥ īśate nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.05.1{07} pari ṇo vṛṇajannaghā durgāṇi rathyo yathā
analyzed: pari naḥ vṛṇajan aghāḥ durgāṇi rathyaḥ yathā

original: RV_08.047.05.2{07} syāmedindrasya śarmaṇyādityānāmutāvasyanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: syāma id indrasya śarmaṇi ādityānām uta avasyanehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.06.1{08} parihvṛtedanā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati
analyzed: parihvṛta idanāḥ janaḥ yuṣmādattasya vāyati

original: RV_08.047.06.2{08} devā adabhramāśa vo yamādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ adabhram āśa vaḥ yama ādityāḥ ahetana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.07.1{08} na taṃ tigmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsadabhi taṃ guru
analyzed: na tam tigmam cana tyajaḥ na drāsat abhi tam guru

original: RV_08.047.07.2{08} yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvamanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: yasmai u śarma saprathaḥ ādityāsaḥ arādhvam anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.08.1{08} yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu
analyzed: yuṣme devāḥ api smasi yudhyantaḥ iva varmasu

original: RV_08.047.08.2{08} yūyaṃ maho na enaso yūyamarbhāduruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: yūyam mahaḥ naḥ enasaḥ yūyam arbhāt uruṣyata anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.09.1{08} aditirna uruṣyatvaditiḥ śarma yachatu
analyzed: aditiḥ naḥ uruṣyatu aditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_08.047.09.2{08} mātā mitrasya revato 'ryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: mātā mitrasya revataḥ ryamṇaḥ varuṇasya ca anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.10.1{08} yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yadanāturam
analyzed: yat devāḥ śarma śaraṇam yat bhadram yat anāturam

original: RV_08.047.10.2{08} tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tadasmāsu vi yantanānehaso va utayaḥsuūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: tri dhātu yat varūthyam tat asmāsu vi yantana anehasaḥ vaḥ utayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.11.1{09} ādityā ava hi khyatādhi kūlādiva spaśaḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ ava hi khyata adhi kūlāt iva spaśaḥ

original: RV_08.047.11.2{09} sutīrthamarvato yathānu no neṣathā sugamanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: su tīrtham arvataḥ yathā anu naḥ neṣatha sugama nehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.12.1{09} neha bhadraṃ rakṣasvine nāvayai nopayā uta
analyzed: na iha bhadram rakṣasvine na avayai na upayai uta

original: RV_08.047.12.2{09} gave ca bhadraṃ dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate 'nehaso na ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: gave ca bhadram dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate nehasaḥ naḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.13.1{09} yadāviryadapīcyaṃ devāso asti duṣkṛtam
analyzed: yat āvis yat apīcyam devāsaḥ asti duṣkṛtam

original: RV_08.047.13.2{09} trite tad viśvamāptya āre asmad dadhātanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayova ūtayaḥ
analyzed: trite tat viśvam āptye āre asmat dadhātana anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.14.1{09} yacca goṣu duṣvapnyaṃ yaccāsme duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: yat ca goṣu duṣvapnyam yat ca asme duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_08.047.14.2{09} tritāya tad vibhāvaryāptyāya parā vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: tritāya tat vibhāvari āptyāya parā vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.15.1{09} niṣkaṃ vā ghā kṛṇavate srajaṃ vā duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: niṣkam vā gha kṛṇavate srajam vā duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_08.047.15.2{09} trite duṣvapnyaṃ sarvamāptye pari dadmasyanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: trite duṣvapnyam sarva māptye pari dadmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.16.1{10} tadannāya tadapase taṃ bhāgamupaseduṣe
analyzed: tad annāya tad apase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe

original: RV_08.047.16.2{10} tritāya ca dvitāya coṣo duṣvapnyaṃ vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: tritāya ca dvitāya ca uṣaḥ duṣvapnyam vaha anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.17.1{10} yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha ṛṇaṃ saṃnayāmasi
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam saṃnayāmasi

original: RV_08.047.17.2{10} evā duṣvapnyaṃ sarvamāptye saṃ nayāmasyanehaso va ūtayaḥsuūtayo va ūtayaḥ
analyzed: eva duṣvapnyam sarva māptye sam nayāmasi anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.047.18.1{10} ajaiṣmādyāsanāma cābhūmānāgaso vayam
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam

original: RV_08.047.18.2{10} uṣo yasmād duṣvapnyādabhaiṣmāpa taduchatvanehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayova ūtayaḥ
analyzed: uṣaḥ yasmāt duṣvapnyāt abhaiṣma apa tat uchatu anehasaḥ vaḥ ūtayaḥ su ūtayaḥ uvaḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.048.01.1{11} svādorabhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya
analyzed: svādoḥ abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyaḥ varivaḥ vittarasya

original: RV_08.048.01.2{11} viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti
analyzed: viśve yam devāḥ uta martyāsaḥ madhu bruvantaḥ abhi saṃcaranti

original: RV_08.048.02.1{11} antaśca prāgā aditirbhavāsyavayātā haraso daivyasya
analyzed: antar ca prāgāḥ aditiḥ bhava asi avayātā harasaḥ daivyasya

original: RV_08.048.02.2{11} indavindrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuramanu rāya ṛdhyāḥ
analyzed: indo indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭī iva dhuram anu rāyaḥ ṛdhyāḥ

original: RV_08.048.03.1{11} apāma somamamṛtā abhūmāganma jyotiravidāma devān
analyzed: apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma aganma jyotiḥ avidāma devān

original: RV_08.048.03.2{11} kiṃ nūnamasmān kṛṇavadarātiḥ kimu dhūrtiramṛta martyasya
analyzed: kim nūnam asmān kṛṇavat arātiḥ kimu dhūrtiḥ amṛta martyasya

original: RV_08.048.04.1{11} śaṃ no bhava hṛda ā pīta indo piteva soma sūnave suśevaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ bhava hṛde ā pītaḥ indo pitā iva soma sūnave su śevaḥ

original: RV_08.048.04.2{11} sakheva sakhya uruśaṃsa dhīraḥ pra ṇa āyurjīvase somatārīḥ
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye uru śaṃsa dhīraḥ pra naḥ āyuḥ jīvase somatārīḥ

original: RV_08.048.05.1{11} ime mā pītā yaśasa uruṣyavo rathaṃ na gāvaḥ samanāhaparvasu
analyzed: ime mā pītāḥ yaśasaḥ uruṣyavaḥ ratham na gāvaḥ samanāha parvasu

original: RV_08.048.05.2{11} te mā rakṣantu visrasaścaritrāduta mā srāmādyavayantvindavaḥ
analyzed: te mā rakṣantu visrasaḥ caritrāt uta mā srāmāt yavayantu indavaḥ

original: RV_08.048.06.1{12} agniṃ na mā mathitaṃ saṃ didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyaso naḥ
analyzed: agnim na mā mathitam sam didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyasaḥ naḥ

original: RV_08.048.06.2{12} athā hi te mada ā soma manye revāniva pra carāpuṣṭimacha
analyzed: athā hi te made ā soma manye revān iva pra cara apuṣṭimacha

original: RV_08.048.07.1{12} iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasyeva rāyaḥ
analyzed: iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasya iva rāyaḥ

original: RV_08.048.07.2{12} soma rājan pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tārīrahānīva sūryo vāsarāṇi
analyzed: soma rājan pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tārīḥ ahāni iva sūryaḥ vāsarāṇi

original: RV_08.048.08.1{12} soma rājan mṛḷayā naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyāstasya viddhi
analyzed: soma rājan mṛḍaya naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyāḥ tasya viddhi

original: RV_08.048.08.2{12} alarti dakṣa uta manyurindo mā no aryo anukāmaṃ parādāḥ
analyzed: alarti dakṣaḥ uta manyuḥ indo mā naḥ aryaḥ anukāmam parādāḥ

original: RV_08.048.09.1{12} tvaṃ hi nastanvaḥ soma gopā gātre-gātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ tanvaḥ soma gopāḥ gātre gātre niṣasattha nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_08.048.09.2{12} yat te vayaṃ pramināma vratāni sa no mṛḷa suṣakhādeva vasyaḥ
analyzed: yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa naḥ mṛḍa su sakhā adeva vasyaḥ

original: RV_08.048.10.1{12} ṛdūdareṇa sākhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ
analyzed: ṛdūdareṇa sākhyā saceya yaḥ mā na riṣyet hari aśva pītaḥ

original: RV_08.048.10.2{12} ayaṃ yaḥ somo nyadhāyyasme tasmā indraṃ pratiramemyāyuḥ
analyzed: ayam yaḥ somaḥ nyadhāyi asme tasmai indram pratiramemi āyuḥ

original: RV_08.048.11.1{13} apa tyā asthuranirā amīvā niratrasan tamiṣīcīrabhaiṣuḥ
analyzed: apa tyāḥ asthuḥ anirāḥ amīvāḥ niratrasan tamiṣīcīḥ abhaiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.048.11.2{13} ā somo asmānaruhad vihāyā aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ
analyzed: ā somaḥ asmān aruhat vihāyāḥ aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_08.048.12.1{13} yo na induḥ pitaro hṛtsu pīto 'martyo martyānāviveśa
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ induḥ pitaraḥ hṛtsu pītaḥ martyaḥ martyān āviveśa

original: RV_08.048.12.2{13} tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma
analyzed: tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma

original: RV_08.048.13.1{13} tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha
analyzed: tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha

original: RV_08.048.13.2{13} tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām
analyzed: tasmai te indo haviṣā vidhema vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_08.048.14.1{13} trātāro devā adhi vocatā no mā no nidrā īśata mota jalpiḥ
analyzed: trātāraḥ devāḥ adhi vocata naḥ mā naḥ nidrā īśata mā uta jalpiḥ

original: RV_08.048.14.2{13} vayaṃ somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidathamāvadema
analyzed: vayam somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ su vīrāsaḥ vidatham āvadema

original: RV_08.048.15.1{13} tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato vayodhāstvaṃ svarvidā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas vayaḥ dhāḥ tvam svar vidā viśa nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_08.048.15.2{13} tvaṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātāduta vā purastāt
analyzed: tvam naḥ indo ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātāt uta vā purastāt

original: RV_08.049.01.1{14} abhi pra vaḥ surādhasamindramarca yathā vide
analyzed: abhi pra vaḥ su rādhasam indram arca yathā vide

original: RV_08.049.01.2{14} yo jaritribhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati
analyzed: yaḥ jaritribhyaḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇa iva śikṣati

original: RV_08.049.02.1{14} śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe
analyzed: śata anīkā iva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.049.02.2{14} gireriva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ
analyzed: gireḥ iva pra rasāḥ asya pinvire datrāṇi puru bhojasaḥ

original: RV_08.049.03.1{14} ā tvā sutāsa indavo madā ya indra girvaṇaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā sutāsaḥ indavaḥ madāḥ ye indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.049.03.2{14} āpo na vajrinnanvokyaṃ saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase
analyzed: āpaḥ na vajrin anvokyam saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase

original: RV_08.049.04.1{14} anehasaṃ prataraṇaṃ vivakṣaṇaṃ madhvaḥ svādiṣṭhamīṃ piba
analyzed: anehasam prataraṇam vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ piba

original: RV_08.049.04.2{14} ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudreva tmanā dhṛṣat
analyzed: ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudrā iva tmanā dhṛṣat

original: RV_08.049.05.1{14} ā na stomamupa dravad dhiyāno aśvo na sotṛbhiḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ stomam upa dravat dhiyānaḥ aśvaḥ na sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_08.049.05.2{14} yaṃ tesvadhāvan svadayanti dhenava indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ
analyzed: yam tesvadhāvan svadayanti dhenavaḥ indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.049.06.1{15} ugraṃ na vīraṃ namasopa sedima vibhūtimakṣitāvasum
analyzed: ugram na vīram namasā upa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum

original: RV_08.049.06.2{15} udrīva vajrinnavato na siñcate kṣarantīndra dhītayaḥ
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ na siñcate kṣaranti indra dhītayaḥ

original: RV_08.049.07.1{15} yad dha nūnaṃ yad vā yajñe yad vā pṛthivyāmadhi
analyzed: yat ha nūnam yat vā yajñe yat vā pṛthivyām adhi

original: RV_08.049.07.2{15} ato no yajñamāśubhirmahemata ugra ugrebhirā gahi
analyzed: atas naḥ yajñam āśubhiḥ mahemate ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_08.049.08.1{15} ajirāso harayo ye ta āśavo vātā iva prasakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: ajirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te āśavaḥ vātāḥ iva prasakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_08.049.08.2{15} yebhirapatyaṃ manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhirviśvaṃ svardṛśe
analyzed: yebhiḥ apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhiḥ viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_08.049.09.1{15} etāvatasta īmaha indra sumnasya gomataḥ
analyzed: etāvataḥ te īmahe indra sumnasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.049.09.2{15} yathā prāvo maghavan medhyātithiṃ yathā nīpātithiṃ dhane
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ maghavan medhyātithim yathā nīpātithim dhane

original: RV_08.049.10.1{15} yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje

original: RV_08.049.10.2{15} yathā gośarye asanor{ṛ}jiśvanīndra gomad dhiraṇyavat
analyzed: yathā gośarye asanoḥ ṛjiśvani indra gomat hiraṇyavat

original: RV_08.050.01.1{16} pra su śrutaṃ surādhasamarcā śakramabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: pra su śrutam su rādhasam arca śakram abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.050.01.2{16} yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate
analyzed: yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyam vasu sahasreṇa iva maṃhate

original: RV_08.050.02.1{16} śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ
analyzed: śata anīkāḥ hetayaḥ asya duṣṭarāḥ indrasya samiṣaḥ mahīḥ

original: RV_08.050.02.2{16} girirna bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yadīṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ
analyzed: giriḥ na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yadi īm sutāḥ amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.050.03.1{16} yadīṃ sutāsa indavo 'bhi priyamamandiṣuḥ
analyzed: yadi īm sutāsaḥ indavaḥ bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.050.03.2{16} āpo na dhāyi savanaṃ ma ā vaso dughā ivopa dāśuṣe
analyzed: āpaḥ na dhāyi savanam me ā vaso dughāḥ iva upa dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.050.04.1{16} anehasaṃ vo havamānamūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ
analyzed: anehasam vaḥ havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_08.050.04.2{16} ā tvā vaso havamānāsa indava upa stotreṣu dadhire
analyzed: ā tvā vaso havamānāsaḥ indavaḥ upa stotreṣu dadhire

original: RV_08.050.05.1{16} ā naḥ some svadhvara iyāno atyo na tośate
analyzed: ā naḥ some su adhvare iyānaḥ atyaḥ na tośate

original: RV_08.050.05.2{16} yaṃ te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam
analyzed: yam te sva dāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam

original: RV_08.050.06.1{17} pra vīramugraṃ viviciṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ vibhūtiṃ rādhaso mahaḥ
analyzed: pra vīram ugram vivicim dhana spṛtam vibhūtim rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_08.050.06.2{17} udrīva vajrinnavato vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe
analyzed: udrī iva vajrin avataḥ vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.050.07.1{17} yad dha nūnaṃ parāvati yad vā pṛthivyāṃ divi
analyzed: yat ha nūnam parāvati yat vā pṛthivyām divi

original: RV_08.050.07.2{17} yujāna indra haribhirmahemata ṛṣva ṛṣvebhirā gahi
analyzed: yujānaḥ indra haribhiḥ mahemate ṛṣvaḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: RV_08.050.08.1{17} rathirāso harayo ye te asridha ojo vātasya piprati
analyzed: rathirāsaḥ harayaḥ ye te asridhaḥ ojaḥ vātasya piprati

original: RV_08.050.08.2{17} yebhirni dasyuṃ manuṣo nighoṣayo yebhiḥ svaḥ parīyase
analyzed: yebhiḥ ni dasyum manuṣaḥ nighoṣayaḥ yebhiḥ svar parīyase

original: RV_08.050.09.1{17} etāvataste vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ
analyzed: etāvataḥ te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ

original: RV_08.050.09.2{17} yathā prāva etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśaṃ daśavraje
analyzed: yathā prāvaḥ etaśam kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśam daśavraje

original: RV_08.050.10.1{17} yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrghanīthe damūnasi
analyzed: yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrgha nīthe damūnasi

original: RV_08.050.10.2{17} yathā gośarye asiṣāso adrivo mayi gotraṃ hariśriyam
analyzed: yathā gośarye asiṣāsaḥ adrivas mayi gotram hari śriyam

original: RV_08.051.01.1{18} yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somamindrāpibaḥ sutam
analyzed: yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somam indra apibaḥ sutam

original: RV_08.051.01.2{18} nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā
analyzed: nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā

original: RV_08.051.02.1{18} pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvaṃ samasādayacchayānaṃ jivrimuddhitam
analyzed: pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvam samasādayat śayānam jivrim uddhitam

original: RV_08.051.02.2{18} sahasrāṇyasiṣāsad gavām ṛṣistvoto dasyave vṛkaḥ
analyzed: sahasrāṇi asiṣāsat gavām ṛṣiḥ tvotaḥ dasyave vṛkaḥ

original: RV_08.051.03.1{18} ya ukthebhirna vindhate cikid ya ṛṣicodanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ukthebhiḥ na vindhate cikit yaḥ ṛṣi codanaḥ

original: RV_08.051.03.2{18} indraṃ tamachā vada navyasyā matyariṣyantaṃ na bhojase
analyzed: indram tam achā vada navyasyā matyā a riṣyantam na bhojase

original: RV_08.051.04.1{18} yasmā arkaṃ saptaśīrṣāṇamānṛcustridhātumuttame pade
analyzed: yasmai arkam sapta śīrṣāṇam ānṛcuḥ tri dhātum uttame pade

original: RV_08.051.04.2{18} sa tvimā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradadādijjaniṣṭa pauṃsyam
analyzed: sa tu imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradadāt id janiṣṭa pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.051.05.1{18} yo no dātā vasūnāmindraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dātā vasūnām indram tam hūmahe vayam

original: RV_08.051.05.2{18} vidmā hyasya sumatiṃ navīyasīṃ gamema gomati vraje
analyzed: vidma hi asya sumatim navīyasīm gamema gomati vraje

original: RV_08.051.06.1{19} yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyas poṣamaśnute
analyzed: yasmai tvam vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyaḥ poṣam aśnute

original: RV_08.051.06.2{19} taṃ tvā vayaṃ maghavannindra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe
analyzed: tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.051.07.1{19} kadā cana starīrasi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe
analyzed: kadā cana starīrasi na indra saścasi dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.051.07.2{19} upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate
analyzed: upa upa id nu maghavan bhūyaḥ id nu te dānam devasya pṛcyate

original: RV_08.051.08.1{19} pra yo nanakṣe abhyojasā kriviṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇaṃ nighoṣayan
analyzed: pra yaḥ nanakṣe abhyojasā krivim vadhaiḥ śuṣṇam nighoṣayan

original: RV_08.051.08.2{19} yadedastambhīt prathayannamūṃ divamādijjaniṣṭa pārthivaḥ
analyzed: yadā id astambhīt prathayan amūm divam ādit janiṣṭa pārthivaḥ

original: RV_08.051.09.1{19} yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ
analyzed: yasya ayam viśvaḥ āryaḥ dāsaḥ śevadhi pāḥ ariḥ

original: RV_08.051.09.2{19} tiraścidarye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ
analyzed: tiraścit arye ruśame tubhya id saḥ ajyate rayiḥ

original: RV_08.051.10.1{19} turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkamānṛcuḥ
analyzed: turaṇyavaḥ madhumantam ghṛtaścutam viprāsaḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ

original: RV_08.051.10.2{19} asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo 'sme suvānāsa indavaḥ
analyzed: asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ sme suvānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_08.052.01.1{20} yathā manau vivasvati somaṃ śakrāpibaḥ sutam
analyzed: yathā manau vivasvati somam śakra apibaḥ sutam

original: RV_08.052.01.2{20} yathā trite chanda indra jujoṣasyāyau mādayase sacā
analyzed: yathā trite chandaḥ indra jujoṣasi āyau mādayase sacā

original: RV_08.052.02.1{20} pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvanīndra suvāne amandathāḥ
analyzed: pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvani indra suvāne amandathāḥ

original: RV_08.052.02.2{20} yathā somaṃ daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmāv ṛjūnasi
analyzed: yathā somam daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmau ṛjūnasi

original: RV_08.052.03.1{20} ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṃ dhṛṣitāpibat
analyzed: yaḥ ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somam dhṛṣitā apibat

original: RV_08.052.03.2{20} yasmai viṣṇustrīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ
analyzed: yasmai viṣṇuḥ trīṇi padā vicakrame upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.052.04.1{20} yasya tvamindra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñchatakrato
analyzed: yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākanaḥ vāje vājin śatakrato

original: RV_08.052.04.2{20} taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudughāmiva goduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ
analyzed: tam tvā vayam sudughām iva go duhaḥ juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_08.052.05.1{20} yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahānugra īśānakṛt
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dātā sa naḥ pitā mahān ugraḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_08.052.05.2{20} ayāmannugro maghavā purūvasurgoraśvasya pra dātu naḥ
analyzed: a yāman ugraḥ maghavā purūvasuḥ goḥ aśvasya pra dātu naḥ

original: RV_08.052.06.1{21} yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyas poṣaminvati
analyzed: yasmai tvam vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyaḥ poṣam invati

original: RV_08.052.06.2{21} vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomairindraṃ havāmahe
analyzed: vasūyavaḥ vasu patim śatakratum stomaiḥ indram havāmahe

original: RV_08.052.07.1{21} kadā cana pra yuchasyubhe ni pāsi janmanī
analyzed: kadā cana pra yuchasi ubhe ni pāsi janmanī

original: RV_08.052.07.2{21} turīyāditya havanaṃ ta indriyamā tasthāvamṛtaṃ divi
analyzed: turīya āditya havanam te indriyam ā tasthau amṛtam divi

original: RV_08.052.08.1{21} yasmai tvaṃ maghavannindra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe
analyzed: yasmai tvam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.052.08.2{21} asmākaṃ gira uta suṣṭutiṃ vaso kaṇvavacchṛṇudhī havam
analyzed: asmākam giraḥ uta suṣṭutim vaso kaṇva vat śṛṇudhi havam

original: RV_08.052.09.1{21} astāvi manma pūrvyaṃ brahmendrāya vocata
analyzed: astāvi manma pūrvyam brahma indrāya vocata

original: RV_08.052.09.2{21} pūrvīr{ṛ}tasya bṛhatīranūṣata stoturmedhā asṛkṣata
analyzed: pūrvīḥ ṛtasya bṛhatīḥ anūṣata stotuḥ medhāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_08.052.10.1{21} samindro rāyo bṛhatīradhūnuta saṃ kṣoṇī samu sūryam
analyzed: sam indraḥ rāyaḥ bṛhatīḥ adhūnuta sam kṣoṇī samu sūryam

original: RV_08.052.10.2{21} saṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṃ gavāśiraḥ somā indramamandiṣuḥ
analyzed: sam śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ sam gavāśiraḥ somāḥ indram amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_08.053.01.1{22} upamaṃ tvā maghonāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca vṛṣabhāṇām
analyzed: upamam tvā maghonām jyeṣṭham ca vṛṣabhāṇām

original: RV_08.053.01.2{22} pūrbhittamaṃ maghavannindra govidamīśānaṃ rāya īmahe
analyzed: pūrbhittamam maghavan indra go vidam īśānam rāyaḥ īmahe

original: RV_08.053.02.1{22} ya āyuṃ kutsamatithigvamardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive
analyzed: yaḥ āyum kutsam atithigvam ardayaḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ dive dive

original: RV_08.053.02.2{22} taṃ tvā vayaṃ haryaśvaṃ śatakratuṃ vājayanto havāmahe
analyzed: tam tvā vayam hari aśvam śatakratum vājayantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.053.03.1{22} ā no viśveṣāṃ rasaṃ madhvaḥ siñcantvadrayaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ viśveṣām rasam madhvaḥ siñcantu adrayaḥ

original: RV_08.053.03.2{22} ye parāvati sunvire janeṣvā ye arvāvatīndavaḥ
analyzed: ye parāvati sunvire janeṣvā ye arvāvati indavaḥ

original: RV_08.053.04.1{22} viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi cāva cā kṛdhi viśve sanvantvā vasu
analyzed: viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi ca ava ca kṛdhi viśve sanvantvā vasu

original: RV_08.053.04.2{22} śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāso aṃśavo yatrā somasya tṛmpasi
analyzed: śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāsaḥ aṃśavaḥ yatra somasya tṛmpasi

original: RV_08.053.05.1{23} indra nedīya edihi mitamedhābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: indra nedīyaḥ edihi mita medhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.053.05.2{23} ā śantama śantamābhirabhiṣṭibhirā svāpe svāpibhiḥ
analyzed: ā śantama śantamābhiḥ abhiṣṭibhiḥ ā su āpe su āpibhiḥ

original: RV_08.053.06.1{23} ājituraṃ satpatiṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ kṛdhi prajāsvābhagam
analyzed: āji turam sat patim viśvacarṣaṇim kṛdhi prajāsu ābhagam

original: RV_08.053.06.2{23} pra sū tirā śacībhirye ta ukthinaḥ kratuṃ punata ānuṣak
analyzed: pra su tira śacībhiḥ ye te ukthinaḥ kratum punate ānuṣak

original: RV_08.053.07.1{23} yaste sādhiṣṭho 'vase te syāma bhareṣu te
analyzed: yaḥ te sādhiṣṭhaḥ vase te syāma bhareṣu te

original: RV_08.053.07.2{23} vayaṃ hotrābhiruta devahūtibhiḥ sasavāṃso manāmahe
analyzed: vayam hotrābhiḥ uta deva hūtibhiḥ sasavāṃsaḥ manāmahe

original: RV_08.053.08.1{23} ahaṃ hi te harivo brahma vājayurājiṃ yāmi sadotibhiḥ
analyzed: aham hi te harivas brahma vājayuḥ ājim yāmi sadā ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.053.08.2{23} tvāmideva tamame samaśvayurgavyuragre mathīnām
analyzed: tvāmideva tam ame sam aśvayuḥ gavyuḥ agre mathīnām

original: RV_08.054.01.1{24} etat ta indra vīryaṃ gīrbhirgṛṇanti kāravaḥ
analyzed: etat te indra vīryam gīrbhiḥ gṛṇanti kāravaḥ

original: RV_08.054.01.2{24} te stobhanta ūrjamāvan ghṛtaścutaṃ paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: te stobhantaḥ ūrjamāvan ghṛtaścutam paurāsaḥ nakṣan dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_08.054.02.1{24} nakṣanta indramavase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṃ suteṣu mandase
analyzed: nakṣante indram avase su kṛtyayā yeṣām suteṣu mandase

original: RV_08.054.02.2{24} yathā saṃvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva
analyzed: yathā saṃvarte amadaḥ yathā kṛśe eva asme indra matsva

original: RV_08.054.03.1{24} ā no viśve sajoṣaso devāso gantanopa naḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ viśve sajoṣasaḥ devāsaḥ gantana upa naḥ

original: RV_08.054.03.2{24} vasavo rudrāavase na ā gamañchṛṇvantu maruto havam
analyzed: vasavaḥ rudrāḥ avase naḥ ā gaman śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam

original: RV_08.054.04.1{24} pūṣā viṣṇurhavanaṃ me sarasvatyavantu sapta sindhavaḥ
analyzed: pūṣā viṣṇuḥ havanam me sarasvatī avantu sapta sindhavaḥ

original: RV_08.054.04.2{24} āpo vātaḥ parvatāso vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam
analyzed: āpaḥ vātaḥ parvatāsaḥ vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam

original: RV_08.054.05.1{25} yadindra rādho asti te māghonaṃ maghavattama
analyzed: yat indra rādhaḥ asti te māghonam maghavattama

original: RV_08.054.05.2{25} tena no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe bhago dānāya vṛtrahan
analyzed: tena naḥ bodhi sadhamādyaḥ vṛdhe bhagaḥ dānāya vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.054.06.1{25} ājipate nṛpate tvamid dhi no vāja ā vakṣi sukrato
analyzed: āji pate nṛpate tvam id hi naḥ vāje ā vakṣi su krato

original: RV_08.054.06.2{25} vītīhotrābhiruta devavītibhiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire
analyzed: vītīhotrābhiḥ uta deva vītibhiḥ sasavāṃsaḥ vi śṛṇvire

original: RV_08.054.07.1{25} santi hyarya āśiṣa indra āyurjanānām
analyzed: santi hi aryaḥ āśiṣaḥ indre āyuḥ janānām

original: RV_08.054.07.2{25} asmān nakṣasvamaghavannupāvase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīmiṣam
analyzed: asmān nakṣasva maghavan upa avase dhukṣasva pipyuṣī imiṣam

original: RV_08.054.08.1{25} vayaṃ ta indra stomebhirvidhema tvamasmākaṃ śatakrato
analyzed: vayam te indra stomebhiḥ vidhema tvam asmākam śatakrato

original: RV_08.054.08.2{25} mahi sthūraṃ śaśayaṃ rādho ahrayaṃ praskaṇvāya ni tośaya
analyzed: mahi sthūram śaśayam rādhaḥ ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya

original: RV_08.055.01.1{26} bhūrīdindrasya vīryaṃ vyakhyamabhyāyati
analyzed: bhūri id indrasya vīryam vyakhyam abhyāyati

original: RV_08.055.01.2{26} rādhaste dasyave vṛka
analyzed: rādhaḥ te dasyave vṛka

original: RV_08.055.02.1{26} śataṃ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante
analyzed: śatam śvetāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ divi tāraḥ na rocante

original: RV_08.055.02.2{26} mahnā divaṃ na tastabhuḥ
analyzed: mahnā divam na tastabhuḥ

original: RV_08.055.03.1{26} śataṃ veṇūñchataṃ śunaḥ śataṃ carmāṇi mlātāni
analyzed: śatam veṇūn śatam śunaḥ śatam carmāṇi mlātāni

original: RV_08.055.03.2{26} śataṃ me balbajastukā aruṣīṇāṃ catuḥśatam
analyzed: śatam me balbaja stukāḥ aruṣīṇām catuḥśatam

original: RV_08.055.04.1{26} sudevāḥ stha kāṇvāyanā vayo-vayo vicarantaḥ
analyzed: su devāḥ stha kāṇvāyanāḥ vayaḥ vayaḥ vicarantaḥ

original: RV_08.055.04.2{26} aśvāso nacaṅkramata
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ nacaṅkramata

original: RV_08.055.05.1{26} ādit sāptasya carkirannānūnasya mahi śravaḥ
analyzed: ādit sāptasya carkiran na anūnasya mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_08.055.05.2{26} śyāvīratidhvasan pathaścakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe
analyzed: śyāvīḥ atidhvasan pathaḥ cakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe

original: RV_08.056.01.1{27} prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśyahrayam
analyzed: prati te dasyave vṛka rādhaḥ adarśya hrayam

original: RV_08.056.01.2{27} dyaurna prathinā śavaḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ na prathinā śavaḥ

original: RV_08.056.02.1{27} daśa mahyaṃ pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ
analyzed: daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ

original: RV_08.056.02.2{27} nityād rāyo amaṃhata
analyzed: nityāt rāyaḥ amaṃhata

original: RV_08.056.03.1{27} śataṃ me gardabhānāṃ śatamūrṇāvatīnām
analyzed: śatam me gardabhānām śatam ūrṇāvatīnām

original: RV_08.056.03.2{27} śataṃ dāsānati srajaḥ
analyzed: śatam dāsān ati srajaḥ

original: RV_08.056.04.1{27} tatro api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā
analyzed: tatra u api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā

original: RV_08.056.04.2{27} aśvānāmin na yūthyām
analyzed: aśvānāmin na yūthyām

original: RV_08.056.05.1{27} acetyagniścikiturhavyavāṭ sa sumadrathaḥ
analyzed: aceti agniḥ cikituḥ havyavāṭ sa sumat rathaḥ

original: RV_08.056.05.2{27} agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata
analyzed: agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūraḥ arocata divi sūryaḥ arocata

original: RV_08.057.01.1{28} yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā
analyzed: yuvam devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣam yajatrā

original: RV_08.057.01.2{28} āgachataṃ nāsatyā śacībhiridaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ pibāthaḥ
analyzed: āgacchatam nāsatyā śacībhiḥ idam tṛtīyam savanam pibāthaḥ

original: RV_08.057.02.1{28} yuvāṃ devāstraya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt
analyzed: yuvām devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt

original: RV_08.057.02.2{28} asmākaṃ yajñaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇā pātaṃ somamaśvinā dīdyagnī
analyzed: asmākam yajñam savanam juṣāṇā pātam somam aśvinā dīdi agnī

original: RV_08.057.03.1{28} panāyyaṃ tadaśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: panāyyam tat aśvinā kṛtam vām vṛṣabhaḥ divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_08.057.03.2{28} sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvānit tānupa yātā pibadhyai
analyzed: sahasram śaṃsāḥ uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvān id tān upa yāta pibadhyai

original: RV_08.057.04.1{28} ayaṃ vāṃ bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam
analyzed: ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yajatrā imāḥ giraḥ nāsatyā upa yātam

original: RV_08.057.04.2{28} pibataṃ somaṃ madhumantamasme pra dāśvāṃsamavataṃ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: pibatam somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṃsam avatam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_08.058.01.1{29} yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñamimaṃ vahanti
analyzed: yam ṛtvijaḥ bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetasaḥ yajñam imam vahanti

original: RV_08.058.01.2{29} yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṃvit
analyzed: yaḥ anūcānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt kā svid tatra yajamānasya saṃvid

original: RV_08.058.02.1{29} eka evāgnirbahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvamanu prabhūtaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva agniḥ bahudhā samiddhaḥ ekaḥ sūryaḥ viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ

original: RV_08.058.02.2{29} ekaivoṣāḥ sarvamidaṃ vi bhātyekaṃ vā idaṃvi babhūva sarvam
analyzed: ekā eva uṣāḥ sarvam idam vi bhāti ekam vai idam vi babhūva sarvam

original: RV_08.058.03.1{29} jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadaṃ bhūrivāram
analyzed: jyotiṣmantam ketumantam tri cakram sukham ratham suṣadam bhūri vāram

original: RV_08.058.03.2{29} citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huveati riktaṃ pibadhyai
analyzed: citrāmaghā yasya yoge tam vām huve ati riktam pibadhyai

original: RV_08.059.01.1{30} imāni vāṃ bhāgadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām
analyzed: imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrate indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām

original: RV_08.059.01.2{30} yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ
analyzed: yajñeyajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyathaḥ yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ

original: RV_08.059.02.1{30} niṣṣidhvarīroṣadhīrāpa āstāmindrāvaruṇā mahimānamāśata
analyzed: niṣṣidhvarīḥ oṣadhīḥ āpaḥ āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata

original: RV_08.059.02.2{30} yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrurnakirādeva ohate
analyzed: yā sisratuḥ rajasaḥ pāre adhvanaḥ yayoḥ śatruḥ nakirādevaḥ ohate

original: RV_08.059.03.1{30} satyaṃ tadindrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vāṃ madhva ūrmiṃ duhate sapta vāṇīḥ
analyzed: satyam tat indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhvaḥ ūrmim duhate sapta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_08.059.03.2{30} tābhirdāśvāṃsamavataṃ śubhas patī yo vāmadabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ dāśvāṃsam avatam śubhaḥ patī yaḥ vāmadabdhaḥ abhi pāti cittibhiḥ

original: RV_08.059.04.1{30} ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya
analyzed: ghṛta pruṣaḥ saumyāḥ jīra dānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadane ṛtasya

original: RV_08.059.04.2{30} yā ha vāmindrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutastābhirdhattaṃ yajamānāya śikṣatam
analyzed: yāḥ ha vām indrāvaruṇāḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ tābhiḥ dhattam yajamānāya śikṣatam

original: RV_08.059.05.1{31} avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyaṃ tveṣābhyāṃ mahimānamindriyam
analyzed: avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyam tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam

original: RV_08.059.05.2{31} asmān svindrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutastribhiḥ sāptebhiravataṃ śubhas patī
analyzed: asmān su indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutaḥ tribhiḥ sāptebhiḥ avatam śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_08.059.06.1{31} indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṃ vāco matiṃ śrutamadattamagre
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā yat ṛṣibhyaḥ manīṣām vācaḥ matim śrutam adattam agre

original: RV_08.059.06.2{31} yāni sthānānyasṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṃ tanvānāstapasābhyapaśyam
analyzed: yāni sthānāni asṛjanta dhīrāḥ yajñam tanvānāḥ tapasā abhyapaśyam

original: RV_08.059.07.1{31} indrāvaruṇā saumanasamadṛptaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhattam
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhattam

original: RV_08.059.07.2{31} prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ bhūtimasmāsu dhattaṃ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṃ na āyuḥ
analyzed: prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattam dīrgha āyu tvāya pra tiratam naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_08.060.01.1{32} agna ā yāhyagnibhirhotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: agne ā yāhi agnibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.060.01.2{32} ā tvāmanaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭhaṃ barhirāsade
analyzed: ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_08.060.02.1{32} achā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaścarantyadhvare
analyzed: achā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaḥ caranti adhvare

original: RV_08.060.02.2{32} ūrjo napātaṃ ghṛtakeśamīmahe 'gniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam ghṛta keśam īmahe gnim yajñeṣu pūrvyam

original: RV_08.060.03.1{32} agne kavirvedhā asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ
analyzed: agne kaviḥ vedhāḥ asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ

original: RV_08.060.03.2{32} mandro yajiṣṭho adhvareṣvīḍyo viprebhiḥ śukra manmabiḥ
analyzed: mandraḥ yajiṣṭhaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ viprebhiḥ śukra manmabiḥ

original: RV_08.060.04.1{32} adroghamā vahośato yaviṣṭhya devānajasra vītaye
analyzed: adroghamāḥ vaha uśataḥ yaviṣṭhya devān ajasra vītaye

original: RV_08.060.04.2{32} abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhirhitaḥ
analyzed: abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_08.060.05.1{32} tvamit saprathā asyagne trātar{ṛ}tas kaviḥ
analyzed: tvam id saprathāḥ asi agne trātar ṛtaḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_08.060.05.2{32} tvāṃ viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdiva ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ
analyzed: tvām viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdivas ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_08.060.06.1{33} śocā śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayo rāsva stotre mahānasi
analyzed: śoca śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayaḥ rāsva stotre mahān asi

original: RV_08.060.06.2{33} devānāṃ śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ
analyzed: devānām śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ su agnayaḥ

original: RV_08.060.07.1{33} yathā cid vṛddhamatasamagne saṃjūrvasi kṣami
analyzed: yathā cit vṛddha matasam agne saṃjūrvasi kṣami

original: RV_08.060.07.2{33} evā dahamitramaho yo asmadhrug durmanmā kaśca venati
analyzed: eva daha mitra mahas yaḥ asmadhruk durmanmā kaḥ ca venati

original: RV_08.060.08.1{33} mā no martāya ripave rakṣasvine māghaśaṃsāya rīradhaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ martāya ripave rakṣasvine mā agha śaṃsāya rīradhaḥ

original: RV_08.060.08.2{33} asredhadbhistaraṇibhiryaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ
analyzed: a sredhadbhiḥ taraṇibhiḥ yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ

original: RV_08.060.09.1{33} pāhi no agna ekayā pāhyuta dvitīyayā
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne ekayā pāhi uta dvitīyayā

original: RV_08.060.09.2{33} pāhi gīrbhistisṛbhirūrjāṃ pate pāhi catasṛbhirvaso
analyzed: pāhi gīrbhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhiḥ vaso

original: RV_08.060.10.1{33} pāhi viśvasmād rakṣaso arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu no 'va
analyzed: pāhi viśvasmāt rakṣasaḥ arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu naḥ va

original: RV_08.060.10.2{33} tvāmid dhi nediṣṭhaṃ devatātaya āpiṃ nakṣāmahe vṛdhe
analyzed: tvām id hi nediṣṭham devatātaye āpim nakṣāmahe vṛdhe

original: RV_08.060.11.1{34} ā no agne vayovṛdhaṃ rayiṃ pāvaka śaṃsyam
analyzed: ā naḥ agne vayaḥ vṛdham rayim pāvaka śaṃsyam

original: RV_08.060.11.2{34} rāsvā ca na upamāte puruspṛhaṃ sunītī svayaśastaram
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ upamāte puruspṛham su nītī sva yaśastaram

original: RV_08.060.12.1{34} yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhatastaranto arya ādiśaḥ
analyzed: yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhataḥ tarantaḥ aryaḥ ādiśaḥ

original: RV_08.060.12.2{34} sa tvaṃ no vardha prayasā śacīvaso jinvā dhiyo vasuvidaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ vardha prayasā śacī vaso jinva dhiyaḥ vasu vidaḥ

original: RV_08.060.13.1{34} śiśāno vṛṣabho yathāgniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat
analyzed: śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yathā agniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat

original: RV_08.060.13.2{34} tigmā asya nanavo na pratidhṛṣe sujambhaḥ sahaso yahuḥ
analyzed: tigmāḥ asya nanavaḥ na pratidhṛṣe su jambhaḥ sahasaḥ yahuḥ

original: RV_08.060.14.1{34} nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāso yad vitiṣṭase
analyzed: nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāsaḥ yat vitiṣṭase

original: RV_08.060.14.2{34} satvaṃ no hotaḥ suhutaṃ haviṣ kṛdhi vaṃsvā no vāryā puru
analyzed: satvam naḥ hotar su hutam haviḥ kṛdhi vaṃsva naḥ vāryā puru

original: RV_08.060.15.1{34} śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ saṃ tvā martāsa indhate
analyzed: śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ sam tvā martāsaḥ indhate

original: RV_08.060.15.2{34} atandro havyā vahasi haviṣkṛta ādid deveṣu rājasi
analyzed: atandraḥ havyā vahasi haviṣkṛtaḥ ādid deveṣu rājasi

original: RV_08.060.16.1{35} sapta hotārastamidīḷate tvāgne sutyajamahrayam
analyzed: sapta hotāraḥ tam id īḍate tvā agne sutyajam ahrayam

original: RV_08.060.16.2{35} bhinatsyadriṃ tapasā vi śociṣā prāgne tiṣṭha janānati
analyzed: bhinatsi adrim tapasā vi śociṣā pra agne tiṣṭha janān ati

original: RV_08.060.17.1{35} agnim-agniṃ vo adhriguṃ huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: agnim agnim vaḥ adhrigum huvema vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.060.17.2{35} agniṃ hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣvā hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: agnim hita prayasaḥ śaśvatī iṣvā hotāram carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_08.060.18.1{35} ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇyagne tubhyaṃ cikitvanā
analyzed: ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇi agne tubhyam cikitvanā

original: RV_08.060.18.2{35} iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpamā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭhamūtaye
analyzed: iṣaṇyayā naḥ puru rūpam ā bhara vājam nediṣṭham ūtaye

original: RV_08.060.19.1{35} agne jaritarviśpatistepāno deva rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: agne jaritar viśpatiḥ tepānaḥ deva rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_08.060.19.2{35} aproṣivān gṛhapatirmahānasi divas pāyurduroṇayuḥ
analyzed: a proṣivān gṛhapatiḥ mahānasi divaḥ pāyuḥ duroṇayuḥ

original: RV_08.060.20.1{35} mā no rakṣa ā veśīdāghṛṇīvaso mā yāturyātumāvatām
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ ā veśīda aghṛṇīvaso mā yātuḥ yātumāvatām

original: RV_08.060.20.2{35} parogavyūtyanirāmapa kṣudhamagne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ
analyzed: kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ

original: RV_08.061.01.1{36} ubhayaṃ śṛṇavacca na indro arvāgidaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ

original: RV_08.061.01.2{36} satrācyāmaghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat
analyzed: satrācyā maghavā soma pītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭhaḥ ā gamat

original: RV_08.061.02.1{36} taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tamojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ
analyzed: tam hi sva rājam vṛṣabham tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ

original: RV_08.061.02.2{36} utopamānāṃ prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ
analyzed: uta upamānām prathamaḥ ni sīdasi soma kāmam hi te manaḥ

original: RV_08.061.03.1{36} ā vṛṣasva purūvaso sutasyendrāndhasaḥ
analyzed: ā vṛṣasva purūvaso sutasya indra andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.061.03.2{36} vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahimadhṛṣṭaṃ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim
analyzed: vidma hi tvā harivas pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭam cit dadhṛṣvaṇim

original: RV_08.061.04.1{36} aprāmisatya maghavan tathedasadindra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ
analyzed: aprāmisatya maghavan tathā id asat indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ

original: RV_08.061.04.2{36} sanema vājaṃ tava śiprinnavasā makṣū cid yanto adrivaḥ
analyzed: sanema vājam tava śiprin navasā makṣū cit yantaḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.061.05.1{36} śagdhyū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: śagdhi u su śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.061.05.2{36} bhagaṃna hi tvā yaśasaṃ vasuvidamanu śūra carāmasi
analyzed: bhagaṃna hi tvā yaśasam vasu vidam anu śūra carāmasi

original: RV_08.061.06.1{37} pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavāmasyutso deva hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: pauraḥ aśvasya puru kṛt gavām asi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_08.061.06.2{37} nakirhi dānaṃ parimardhiṣat tve yad-yad yāmi tadā bhara
analyzed: nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yat yat yāmi tadā bhara

original: RV_08.061.07.1{37} tvaṃ hyehi cerave vidā bhagaṃ vasuttaye
analyzed: tvam hi ehi cerave vida bhagam vasuttaye

original: RV_08.061.07.2{37} ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya udindrāśvamiṣṭaye
analyzed: ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaye ud indra aśvamiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.061.08.1{37} tvaṃ purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase
analyzed: tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase

original: RV_08.061.08.2{37} ā purandaraṃ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṃ gāyanto 'vase
analyzed: ā purandaram cakṛma vipra vacasaḥ indram gāyantaḥ vase

original: RV_08.061.09.1{37} avipro vā yadavidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ
analyzed: a vipraḥ vā yat avidhat vipraḥ vā indra te vacaḥ

original: RV_08.061.09.2{37} sa pra mamandattvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana
analyzed: sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana

original: RV_08.061.10.1{37} ugrabāhurmrakṣakṛtvā purandaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam
analyzed: ugra bāhuḥ mrakṣa kṛtvā purandaraḥ yadi me śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_08.061.10.2{37} vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomairindraṃ havāmahe
analyzed: vasūyavaḥ vasu patim śatakratum stomaiḥ indram havāmahe

original: RV_08.061.11.1{38} na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḷhavaḥ
analyzed: na pāpāsaḥ manāmahe na arāyāsaḥ na jaḷhavaḥ

original: RV_08.061.11.2{38} yadin nvindraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute sakhāyaṃ kṛṇavāmahai
analyzed: yat id nu indram vṛṣaṇam sacā sute sakhāyam kṛṇavāmahai

original: RV_08.061.12.1{38} ugraṃ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātimadābhyam
analyzed: ugram yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakāti madābhyam

original: RV_08.061.12.2{38} vedā bhṛmaṃ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṃ yamidū naśat
analyzed: veda bhṛmam cit sanitā rathītamaḥ vājinam yamidū naśat

original: RV_08.061.13.1{38} yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi
analyzed: yatas indra bhayāmahe tatas naḥ abhayam kṛdhi

original: RV_08.061.13.2{38} maghavañchagdhitava tan na ūtibhirvi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi
analyzed: maghavan śagdhi tava tat naḥ ūtibhiḥ vi dviṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi

original: RV_08.061.14.1{38} tvaṃ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ
analyzed: tvam hi rādhaspate rādhasaḥ mahaḥ kṣayasya asi vidhataḥ

original: RV_08.061.14.2{38} taṃ tvā vayaṃ maghavannindra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe
analyzed: tam tvā vayam maghavan indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.061.15.1{38} indra spaḷ uta vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ
analyzed: indra spaṣ uta vṛtrahā paraspāḥ naḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_08.061.15.2{38} sa no rakṣiṣaccaramaṃ sa madhyamaṃ sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣiṣat caramam sa madhyamam sa paścāt pātu naḥ puras

original: RV_08.061.16.1{39} tvaṃ naḥ paścādadharāduttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ paścāt adharāt uttarāt puras indra ni pāhi viśvatas

original: RV_08.061.16.2{39} āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyaṃ bhayamāre hetīradevīḥ
analyzed: āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīra devīḥ

original: RV_08.061.17.1{39} adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ
analyzed: adya adya śvas śvas indra trāsva pare ca naḥ

original: RV_08.061.17.2{39} viśvā ca nojaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṃ ca rakṣiṣaḥ
analyzed: viśvā ca naḥ jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktam ca rakṣiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.061.18.1{39} prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiṣlo viryāya kam
analyzed: prabhaṅgī śūraḥ maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiṣlaḥ viryāya kam

original: RV_08.061.18.2{39} ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajraṃ mimikṣatuḥ
analyzed: ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ

original: RV_08.062.01.1{40} pro asmā upastutiṃ bharatā yajjujoṣati
analyzed: pra u asmai upastutim bharata yat jujoṣati

original: RV_08.062.01.2{40} ukthairindrasya māhinaṃ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: ukthaiḥ indrasya māhinam vayaḥ vardhanti sominaḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.02.1{40} ayujo asamo nṛbhirekaḥ kṛṣṭīrayāsyaḥ
analyzed: ayujaḥ asamaḥ nṛbhiḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīrayāsyaḥ

original: RV_08.062.02.2{40} pūrvīrati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātānyojasā bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
