analyzed: pūrvīrati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāni ojasā bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.03.1{40} ahitena cidarvatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati
analyzed: a hitena cit arvatā jīra dānuḥ siṣāsati

original: RV_08.062.03.2{40} pravācyamindra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.04.1{40} ā yāhi kṛṇavāma ta indra brahmāṇi vardhanā
analyzed: ā yāhi kṛṇavāma te indra brahmāṇi vardhanā

original: RV_08.062.04.2{40} yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākano bhadramiha śravasyate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākanaḥ bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.05.1{40} dhṛṣataścid dhṛṣan manaḥ kṛṇoṣīndra yat tvam
analyzed: dhṛṣataḥ cit dhṛṣat manaḥ kṛṇoṣi indra yat tvam

original: RV_08.062.05.2{40} tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyato namobhiḥ pratibhūṣato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyataḥ namobhiḥ pratibhūṣataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.06.1{40} ava caṣṭa ṛcīṣamo 'vatāniva mānuṣaḥ
analyzed: ava caṣṭe ṛcīṣamaḥ vatān iva mānuṣaḥ

original: RV_08.062.06.2{40} juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute yujaṃ bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyam kṛṇute yujam bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.07.1{41} viśve ta indra vīryaṃ devā anu kratuṃ daduḥ
analyzed: viśve te indra vīryam devāḥ anu kratum daduḥ

original: RV_08.062.07.2{41} bhuvo viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: bhuvaḥ viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.08.1{41} gṛṇe tadindra te śava upamaṃ devatātaye
analyzed: gṛṇe tat indra te śavaḥ upamam devatātaye

original: RV_08.062.08.2{41} yad dhaṃsi vṛtramojasā śacīpate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: yat haṃsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.09.1{41} samaneva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavan mānuṣā yugā
analyzed: samanā iva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavat mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_08.062.09.2{41} vide tadindraścetanamadha śruto bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: vide tat indraḥ cetanam adha śrutaḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.10.1{41} ujjātamindra te śava ut tvāmut tava kratum
analyzed: ujjātam indra te śavaḥ ud tvām ud tava kratum

original: RV_08.062.10.2{41} bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhurmaghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhuḥ maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.11.1{41} ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan saṃ yujyāva sanibhya ā
analyzed: aham ca tvam ca vṛtrahan sam yujyāva sanibhyaḥ ā

original: RV_08.062.11.2{41} arātīvā cidadrivo 'nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: arātīvā cit adrivas nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.062.12.1{41} satyamid vā u taṃ vayamindraṃ stavāma nānṛtam
analyzed: satyam id vai u tam vayam indram stavāma na anṛtam

original: RV_08.062.12.2{41} mahānasunvato vadho bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: mahān a sunvataḥ vadhaḥ bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvataḥ bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.063.01.1{42} sa pūrvyo mahānāṃ venaḥ kratubhirānaje
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ mahānām venaḥ kratubhiḥ ānaje

original: RV_08.063.01.2{42} yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje
analyzed: yasya dvārā manuḥ pitā deveṣu dhiyaḥ ānaje

original: RV_08.063.02.1{42} divo mānaṃ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ mānam na ud sadan soma pṛṣṭhāsaḥ adrayaḥ

original: RV_08.063.02.2{42} ukthā brahmaca śaṃsyā
analyzed: ukthā brahmaca śaṃsyā

original: RV_08.063.03.1{42} sa vidvānaṅgirobhya indro gā avṛṇodapa
analyzed: sa vidvān aṅgirobhyaḥ indraḥ gāḥ avṛṇot apa

original: RV_08.063.03.2{42} stuṣe tadasyapauṃsyam
analyzed: stuṣe tad asya pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.063.04.1{42} sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ
analyzed: sa pratnathā kavi vṛdhaḥ indraḥ vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_08.063.04.2{42} śivo arkasya homanyasmatrā gantvavase
analyzed: śivaḥ arkasya homani asmatrā gantu avase

original: RV_08.063.05.1{42} ādū nu te anu kratuṃ svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ
analyzed: ādū nu te anu kratum svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ

original: RV_08.063.05.2{42} śvātramarkā anūṣatendra gotrasya dāvane
analyzed: śvātram arkāḥ anūṣata indra gotrasya dāvane

original: RV_08.063.06.1{42} indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca
analyzed: indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca

original: RV_08.063.06.2{42} yamarkā adhvaraṃ viduḥ
analyzed: yam arkāḥ adhvaram viduḥ

original: RV_08.063.07.1{43} yat pāñcajanyayā viśendre ghoṣā asṛkṣata
analyzed: yat pāñcajanyayā viśā indre ghoṣāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_08.063.07.2{43} astṛṇād barhaṇā vipo 'ryo mānasya sa kṣayaḥ
analyzed: astṛṇāt barhaṇā vipaḥ ryaḥ mānasya sa kṣayaḥ

original: RV_08.063.08.1{43} iyamu te anuṣṭutiścakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā
analyzed: iyam u te anuṣṭutiḥ cakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_08.063.08.2{43} prāvaścakrasya vartanim
analyzed: prāvaḥ cakrasya vartanim

original: RV_08.063.09.1{43} asya vṛṣṇo vyodana uru kramiṣṭa jīvase
analyzed: asya vṛṣṇaḥ vi odanaḥ uru kramiṣṭa jīvase

original: RV_08.063.09.2{43} yavaṃ na paśvaā dade
analyzed: yavam na paśvaā dade

original: RV_08.063.10.1{43} tad dadhānā avasyavo yuṣmābhirdakṣapitaraḥ
analyzed: tat dadhānāḥ avasyavaḥ yuṣmābhiḥ dakṣa pitaraḥ

original: RV_08.063.10.2{43} syāma marutvato vṛdhe
analyzed: syāma marutvataḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_08.063.11.1{43} baḷ ṛtviyāya dhāmna ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ
analyzed: baṭ ṛtviyāya dhāmnaḥ ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ

original: RV_08.063.11.2{43} jeṣāmendra tvayā yujā
analyzed: jeṣāma indra tvayā yujā

original: RV_08.063.12.1{43} asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: asme rudrāḥ mehanā parvatāsaḥ vṛtra hatye bhara hūtau sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_08.063.12.2{43} yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmānavantu devāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajraḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ asmān avantu devāḥ

original: RV_08.064.01.1{44} ut tvā mandantu stomaḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ
analyzed: ud tvā mandantu stomaḥ kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.064.01.2{44} ava brahmadviṣo jahi
analyzed: ava brahma dviṣaḥ jahi

original: RV_08.064.02.1{44} padā paṇīnrarādhaso ni bādhasva mahānasi
analyzed: padā paṇīn rarādhasaḥ ni bādhasva mahān asi

original: RV_08.064.02.2{44} nahi tvā kaścana prati
analyzed: nahi tvā kaścana prati

original: RV_08.064.03.1{44} tvamīśiṣe sutānāmindra tvamasutānām
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam a sutānām

original: RV_08.064.03.2{44} tvaṃ rājā janānām
analyzed: tvam rājā janānām

original: RV_08.064.04.1{44} ehi prehi kṣayo divyāghoṣañcarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: ehi prehi kṣayaḥ divi āghoṣan carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_08.064.04.2{44} obhe pṛṇāsirodasī
analyzed: ā ubhe pṛṇa asi rodasī

original: RV_08.064.05.1{44} tyaṃ cit parvataṃ giriṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam
analyzed: tyam cit parvatam girim śatavantam sahasriṇam

original: RV_08.064.05.2{44} vi stotṛbhyo rurojitha
analyzed: vi stotṛbhyaḥ rurojitha

original: RV_08.064.06.1{44} vayamu tvā divā sute vayaṃ naktaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: vayam u tvā divā sute vayam naktam havāmahe

original: RV_08.064.06.2{44} asmākaṃ kāmamā pṛṇa
analyzed: asmākam kāmam ā pṛṇa

original: RV_08.064.07.1{45} kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvigrīvo anānataḥ
analyzed: kva sya vṛṣabhaḥ yuvā tuvi grīvaḥ an ānataḥ

original: RV_08.064.07.2{45} brahmā kastaṃ saparyati
analyzed: brahmā kaḥ tam saparyati

original: RV_08.064.08.1{45} kasya svit savanaṃ vṛṣā jujuṣvānava gachati
analyzed: kasya svid savanam vṛṣā jujuṣvān ava gacchati

original: RV_08.064.08.2{45} indraṃ kau svidā cake
analyzed: indram kau svidā cake

original: RV_08.064.09.1{45} kaṃ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṃ suvīryā
analyzed: kam te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kam su vīryā

original: RV_08.064.09.2{45} ukthe ka u svidantamaḥ
analyzed: ukthe kaḥ u svidantamaḥ

original: RV_08.064.10.1{45} ayaṃ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate
analyzed: ayam te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate

original: RV_08.064.10.2{45} tasyehi pra dravā piba
analyzed: tasya ihi pra drava piba

original: RV_08.064.11.1{45} ayaṃ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyāmadhi priyaḥ
analyzed: ayam te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ

original: RV_08.064.11.2{45} ārjīkīyemadintamaḥ
analyzed: ārjīkīyemadintamaḥ

original: RV_08.064.12.1{45} tamadya rādhase mahe cāruṃ madāya ghṛṣvaye
analyzed: tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye

original: RV_08.064.12.2{45} ehīmindradravā piba
analyzed: ehi īm indradrava piba

original: RV_08.065.01.1{46} yadindra prāgapāgudaṃ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: yat indra prāk apāk udam nyak vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_08.065.01.2{46} ā yāhi tūyamāśubhiḥ
analyzed: ā yāhi tūyam āśubhiḥ

original: RV_08.065.02.1{46} yad vā prasravaṇe divo mādayāse svarṇare
analyzed: yat vā prasravaṇe divaḥ mādayāse svarṇare

original: RV_08.065.02.2{46} yad vā samudreandhasaḥ
analyzed: yat vā samudreandhasaḥ

original: RV_08.065.03.1{46} ā tvā gīrbhirmahāmuruṃ huve gāmiva bhojase
analyzed: ā tvā gīrbhiḥ mahām urum huve gām iva bhojase

original: RV_08.065.03.2{46} indra somasya pītaye
analyzed: indra somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.065.04.1{46} ā ta indra mahimānaṃ harayo deva te mahaḥ
analyzed: ā te indra mahimānam harayaḥ deva te mahaḥ

original: RV_08.065.04.2{46} rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ
analyzed: rathe vahantu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_08.065.05.1{46} indra gṛṇīṣa u stuṣe mahānugra īśānakṛt
analyzed: indra gṛṇīṣe u stuṣe mahān ugraḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_08.065.05.2{46} ehi naḥ sutaṃ piba
analyzed: ehi naḥ sutam piba

original: RV_08.065.06.1{46} sutāvantastvā vayaṃ prayasvanto havāmahe
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.065.06.2{46} idaṃ no barhirāsade
analyzed: idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_08.065.07.1{47} yaccid dhi śaśvatāmasīndra sādhāraṇastvam
analyzed: yat cit hi śaśvatām asi indra sādhāraṇaḥ tvam

original: RV_08.065.07.2{47} taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: tam tvā vayam havāmahe

original: RV_08.065.08.1{47} idaṃ te somyaṃ madhvadhukṣannadribhirnaraḥ
analyzed: idam te somyam madhu adhukṣan adribhiḥ naraḥ

original: RV_08.065.08.2{47} juṣāṇa indra tat piba
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ indra tat piba

original: RV_08.065.09.1{47} viśvānaryo vipaścito 'ti khyastūyamā gahi
analyzed: viśvānaryaḥ vipaścitaḥ ti khyaḥ tūyamāḥ gahi

original: RV_08.065.09.2{47} asme dhehiśravo bṛhat
analyzed: asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_08.065.10.1{47} dātā me pṛṣatīnāṃ rājā hiraṇyavīnām
analyzed: dātā me pṛṣatīnām rājā hiraṇyavīnām

original: RV_08.065.10.2{47} mā devā maghavā riṣat
analyzed: mā devāḥ maghavā riṣat

original: RV_08.065.11.1{47} sahasre pṛṣatīnāmadhi ścandraṃ bṛhat pṛthu
analyzed: sahasre pṛṣatīnām adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu

original: RV_08.065.11.2{47} śukraṃ hiraṇyamā dade
analyzed: śukram hiraṇyamā dade

original: RV_08.065.12.1{47} napāto durgahasya me sahasreṇa surādhasaḥ
analyzed: napātaḥ durgahasya me sahasreṇa su rādhasaḥ

original: RV_08.065.12.2{47} śravo deveṣvakrata
analyzed: śravaḥ deveṣu akrata

original: RV_08.066.01.1{48} tarobhirvo vidadvasumindraṃ sabādha ūtaye
analyzed: tarobhiḥ vaḥ vidadvasum indram sabādhas ūtaye

original: RV_08.066.01.2{48} bṛhad gāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare huve bharaṃ na kāriṇam
analyzed: bṛhat gāyantaḥ suta some adhvare huve bharam na kāriṇam

original: RV_08.066.02.1{48} na yaṃ dudhrā varante na sthirā muro made suṣipramandhasaḥ
analyzed: na yam dudhrāḥ varante na sthirāḥ muraḥ made suṣipram andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.066.02.2{48} ya ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritra ukthyam
analyzed: yaḥ ādṛtya śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritre ukthyam

original: RV_08.066.03.1{48} yaḥ śakro mṛkṣo aśvyo yo vā kījo hiraṇyayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ śakraḥ mṛkṣaḥ aśvyaḥ yaḥ vā kījaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_08.066.03.2{48} sa ūrvasya rejayatyapāvṛtimindro gavyasya vṛtrahā
analyzed: saḥ ūrvasya rejayati apāvṛtim indraḥ gavyasya vṛtrahā

original: RV_08.066.04.1{48} nikhātaṃ cid yaḥ purusambhṛtaṃ vasūdid vapati dāśuṣe
analyzed: nikhātam cit yaḥ puru sambhṛtam vasūdit vapati dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.066.04.2{48} vajrī suśipro haryaśva it karadindraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat
analyzed: vajrī su śipraḥ haryaśvaḥ id karat indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat

original: RV_08.066.05.1{48} yad vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cicchūra nṛṇām
analyzed: yat vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cit śūra nṛṇām

original: RV_08.066.05.2{48} vayaṃ tatta indra saṃ bharāmasi yajñamukthaṃ turaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: vayam tat te indra sam bharāmasi yajñam uktham turam vacaḥ

original: RV_08.066.06.1{49} sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivo madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ
analyzed: sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivas madāya dyukṣa soma pāḥ

original: RV_08.066.06.2{49} tvamid dhi brahmakṛte kāmyaṃ vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ
analyzed: tvam id hi brahma kṛte kāmyam vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ

original: RV_08.066.07.1{49} vayamenamidā hyo 'pīpemeha vajriṇam
analyzed: vayam enam idā hyas pīpema iha vajriṇam

original: RV_08.066.07.2{49} tasmā u adya samanā sutaṃ bharā nūnaṃ bhūṣata śrute
analyzed: tasmai u adya samanā sutam bhara nūnam bhūṣata śrute

original: RV_08.066.08.1{49} vṛkaścidasya vāraṇa urāmathirā vayuneṣu bhūṣati
analyzed: vṛkaḥ cit asya vāraṇaḥ urā mathirā vayuneṣu bhūṣati

original: RV_08.066.08.2{49} semaṃ naḥ stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā gahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā
analyzed: sa imam naḥ stomam jujuṣāṇaḥ ā gahi indra pra citrayā dhiyā

original: RV_08.066.09.1{49} kadū nvasyākṛtamindrasyāsti pauṃsyam
analyzed: kadu nu asya a kṛtam indrasya asti pauṃsyam

original: RV_08.066.09.2{49} keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā
analyzed: kena u nu kam śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā

original: RV_08.066.10.1{49} kadū mahīradhṛṣṭā asya taviṣīḥ kadu vṛtraghno astṛtam
analyzed: kadu mahīḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ asya taviṣīḥ kadu vṛtra ghnaḥ u astṛtam

original: RV_08.066.10.2{49} indro viśvān bekanāṭānahardṛśa uta kratvā paṇīnrabhi
analyzed: indraḥ viśvān bekanāṭān ahar dṛśaḥ uta kratvā paṇīn rabhi

original: RV_08.066.11.1{50} vayaṃ ghā te apūrvyendra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan
analyzed: vayam gha te apūrvya indra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.066.11.2{50} purūtamāsaḥpuruhūta vajrivo bhṛtiṃ na pra bharāmasi
analyzed: purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivas bhṛtim na pra bharāmasi

original: RV_08.066.12.1{50} pūrvīścid dhi tve tuvikūrminnāśaso havanta indrotayaḥ
analyzed: pūrvīḥ cit hi tve tuvikūrmin āśasaḥ havante indra ūtayaḥ

original: RV_08.066.12.2{50} tiraścidaryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam
analyzed: tiraścit aryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam

original: RV_08.066.13.1{50} vayaṃ ghā te tve id vindra vipra api ṣmasi
analyzed: vayam gha te tve id vindra vipra api smasi

original: RV_08.066.13.2{50} nahi tvadanyaḥ puruhūta kaścana maghavannasti marḍitā
analyzed: nahi tvad anyaḥ puruhūta kaścana maghavan asti marḍitā

original: RV_08.066.14.1{50} tvaṃ no asyā amateruta kṣudho 'bhiśasterava spṛdhi
analyzed: tvam naḥ asyāḥ amateḥ uta kṣudhaḥ bhiśasteḥ ava spṛdhi

original: RV_08.066.14.2{50} tvaṃ na utī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣā śaciṣṭha gātuvit
analyzed: tvam naḥ utī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣa śaciṣṭha gātu vid

original: RV_08.066.15.1{50} soma id vaḥ suto astu kalayo mā bibhītana
analyzed: somaḥ id vaḥ sutaḥ astu kalayaḥ mā bibhītana

original: RV_08.066.15.2{50} apedeṣa dhvasmāyati svayaṃ ghaiṣo apāyati
analyzed: apa id eṣa dhvasmā ayati svayam gha eṣaḥ apāyati

original: RV_08.067.01.1{51} tyān nu kṣatriyānava ādityān yāciṣāmahe
analyzed: tyān nu kṣatriyānavaḥ ādityān yāciṣāmahe

original: RV_08.067.01.2{51} sumṛḷīkānabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: su mṛḍīkān abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.067.02.1{51} mitro no atyaṃhatiṃ varuṇaḥ parṣadaryamā
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ ati aṃhatim varuṇaḥ parṣat aryamā

original: RV_08.067.02.2{51} ādityāso yathā viduḥ
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ yathā viduḥ

original: RV_08.067.03.1{51} teṣāṃ hi citramukthyaṃ varūthamasti dāśuṣe
analyzed: teṣām hi citram ukthyam varūtham asti dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.067.03.2{51} ādityānāmaraṃkṛte
analyzed: ādityānām araṃkṛte

original: RV_08.067.04.1{51} mahi vo mahatāmavo varuṇa mitrāryaman
analyzed: mahi vaḥ mahatām avaḥ varuṇa mitra aryaman

original: RV_08.067.04.2{51} avāṃsyā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: avāṃsyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.067.05.1{51} jīvān no abhi dhetanādityāsaḥ purā hathāt
analyzed: jīvān naḥ abhi dhetana ādityāsaḥ purā hathāt

original: RV_08.067.05.2{51} kad dha sthahavanaśrutaḥ
analyzed: kad ha stha havana śrutaḥ

original: RV_08.067.06.1{52} yad vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūthamasti yacchardiḥ
analyzed: yat vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūtham asti yat chardiḥ

original: RV_08.067.06.2{52} tenā no adhi vocata
analyzed: tena naḥ adhi vocata

original: RV_08.067.07.1{52} asti devā aṃhorurvasti ratnamanāgasaḥ
analyzed: asti devāḥ aṃhā uruḥ asti ratnam anāgasaḥ

original: RV_08.067.07.2{52} ādityā adbhutainasaḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ adbhuta enasaḥ

original: RV_08.067.08.1{52} mā naḥ setuḥ siṣedayaṃ mahe vṛṇaktu nas pari
analyzed: mā naḥ setuḥ siṣedayam mahe vṛṇaktu naḥ pari

original: RV_08.067.08.2{52} indra id dhi śruto vaśī
analyzed: indraḥ id hi śrutaḥ vaśī

original: RV_08.067.09.1{52} mā no mṛcā ripūṇāṃ vṛjinānāmaviṣyavaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ mṛcā ripūṇām vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ

original: RV_08.067.09.2{52} devā abhi pra mṛkṣata
analyzed: devāḥ abhi pra mṛkṣata

original: RV_08.067.10.1{52} uta tvāmadite mahyahaṃ devyupa bruve
analyzed: uta tvām adite mahi aham devi upa bruve

original: RV_08.067.10.2{52} sumṛḷīkāmabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: su mṛḍīkām abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.067.11.1{53} parṣi dīne gabhīra ānugraputre jighāṃsataḥ
analyzed: parṣi dīne gabhīre ānugra putre jighāṃsataḥ

original: RV_08.067.11.2{53} mākistokasya no riṣat
analyzed: mākir stokasya naḥ riṣat

original: RV_08.067.12.1{53} aneho na uruvraja urūci vi prasartave
analyzed: anehaḥ naḥ uru vraje urūci vi prasartave

original: RV_08.067.12.2{53} kṛdhi tokāya jīvase
analyzed: kṛdhi tokāya jīvase

original: RV_08.067.13.1{53} ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnāmadabdhāsaḥ svayaśasaḥ
analyzed: ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām adabdhāsaḥ sva yaśasaḥ

original: RV_08.067.13.2{53} vratā rakṣante adruhaḥ
analyzed: vratā rakṣante adruhaḥ

original: RV_08.067.14.1{53} te na āsno vṛkāṇāmādityāso mumocata
analyzed: te naḥ āsnaḥ vṛkāṇām ādityāsaḥ mumocata

original: RV_08.067.14.2{53} stenaṃ baddhamivādite
analyzed: stenam baddham iva adite

original: RV_08.067.15.1{53} apo ṣu ṇa iyaṃ śarurādityā apa durmatiḥ
analyzed: apa u su naḥ iyam śaruḥ ādityāḥ apa durmatiḥ

original: RV_08.067.15.2{53} asmadetvajaghnuṣī
analyzed: asmat etu a jaghnuṣī

original: RV_08.067.16.1{54} śaśvad dhi vaḥ sudānava ādityā ūtibhirvayam
analyzed: śaśvat hi vaḥ sudānavaḥ ādityāḥ ūtibhiḥ vayam

original: RV_08.067.16.2{54} purā nūnaṃ bubhujmahe
analyzed: purā nūnam bubhujmahe

original: RV_08.067.17.1{54} śaśvantaṃ hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantaṃ cidenasaḥ
analyzed: śaśvantam hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantam cit enasaḥ

original: RV_08.067.17.2{54} devāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase
analyzed: devāḥ kṛṇutha jīvase

original: RV_08.067.18.1{54} tat su no navyaṃ sanyasa ādityā yan mumocati
analyzed: tat su naḥ navyam sanyase ādityāḥ yat mumocati

original: RV_08.067.18.2{54} bandhād baddhamivādite
analyzed: bandhāt baddham iva adite

original: RV_08.067.19.1{54} nāsmākamasti tat tara ādityāso atiṣkade
analyzed: na asmākam asti tat taraḥ ādityāsaḥ atiṣkade

original: RV_08.067.19.2{54} yūyamasmabhyaṃ mṛḷata
analyzed: yūyam asmabhyam mṛḍata

original: RV_08.067.20.1{54} mā no hetirvivasvata ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ hetiḥ vivasvataḥ ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ

original: RV_08.067.20.2{54} purā nujaraso vadhīt
analyzed: purā nujarasaḥ vadhīt

original: RV_08.067.21.1{54} vi ṣu dveṣo vyaṃhatimādityāso vi saṃhitam
analyzed: vi su dveṣaḥ vi aṃhatim ādityāsaḥ vi saṃhitam

original: RV_08.067.21.2{54} viṣvag vi vṛhatā rapaḥ
analyzed: viṣvak vi vṛhata rapaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{01}1 . ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi /
analyzed: ā tvā ratham yathā ūtaye sumnāya vartayāmasi

original: RV_08.068.{01}2 . tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate //
analyzed: tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate

original: RV_08.068.{02}1 . tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate /
analyzed: tuvi śuṣma tuvi krato śacīvas viśvayā mate

original: RV_08.068.{02}2 . ā paprātha mahitvanā //
analyzed: ā paprātha mahitvanā

original: RV_08.068.{03}1 . yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ /
analyzed: yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ

original: RV_08.068.{03}2 . hastā vajraṃ hiraṇyayam //
analyzed: hastāḥ vajram hiraṇyayam

original: RV_08.068.{04}1 . viśvānarasya vas patim anānatasya śavasaḥ /
analyzed: viśvānarasya vaḥ patim an ānatasya śavasaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{04}2 . evaiś ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām //
analyzed: evaiḥ ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām

original: RV_08.068.{05}1 . abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdhaṃ svarmīḷheṣu yaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdham svarmīḷheṣu yam naraḥ

original: RV_08.068.{05}2 . nānā havanta ūtaye //
analyzed: nānā havante ūtaye

original: RV_08.068.{06}1 . paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugraṃ surādhasam /
analyzed: paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugram su rādhasam

original: RV_08.068.{06}2 . īśānaṃ cid vasūnām //
analyzed: īśānam cit vasūnām

original: RV_08.068.{07}1 . taṃ-tam id rādhase maha indraṃ codāmi pītaye /
analyzed: taṃtam id rādhase mahe indram codāmi pītaye

original: RV_08.068.{07}2 . yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnāṃ nṛtuḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnām nṛtuḥ

original: RV_08.068.{08}1 . na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ /
analyzed: na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{08}2 . nakiḥ śavāṃsi te naśat //
analyzed: nakir śavāṃsi te naśat

original: RV_08.068.{09}1 . tvotāsas tvā yujāpsu sūrye mahad dhanam /
analyzed: tvotāsaḥ tvā yujā apsu sūrye mahat dhanam

original: RV_08.068.{09}2 . jayema pṛtsu vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: jayema pṛtsu vajrivas

original: RV_08.068.{10}1 . taṃ tvā yajñebhir īmahe taṃ gīrbhir girvaṇastama /
analyzed: tam tvā yajñebhiḥ īmahe tam gīrbhiḥ girvaṇastama

original: RV_08.068.{10}2 . indra yathā cid āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam //
analyzed: indra yathā cit āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam

original: RV_08.068.{11}1 . yasya te svādu sakhyaṃ svādvī praṇītir adrivaḥ /
analyzed: yasya te svādu sakhyam svādvī praṇītiḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.068.{11}2 . yajño vitantasāyyaḥ //
analyzed: yajñaḥ vitantasāyyaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{12}1 . uru ṇas tanve tana uru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi /
analyzed: uru naḥ tanve tane uru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_08.068.{12}2 . uru ṇo yandhi jīvase //
analyzed: uru naḥ yandhi jīvase

original: RV_08.068.{13}1 . uruṃ nṛbhya uruṃ gava uruṃ rathāya panthām /
analyzed: urum nṛbhyaḥ urum gave urum rathāya panthām

original: RV_08.068.{13}2 . devavītim manāmahe //
analyzed: deva vītim manāmahe

original: RV_08.068.{14}1 . upa mā ṣaḍ dvā-dvā naraḥ somasya harṣyā /
analyzed: upa mā ṣaṭ dvādvāḥ naraḥ somasya harṣyā

original: RV_08.068.{14}2 . tiṣṭhanti svādurātayaḥ //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti svādu rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{15}1 . ṛjrāv indrota ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi /
analyzed: ṛjrau indrote ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi

original: RV_08.068.{15}2 . āśvamedhasya rohitā //
analyzed: āśvamedhasya rohitā

original: RV_08.068.{16}1 . surathāṃ ātithigve svabhīśūṃr ārkṣe /
analyzed: su rathān ātithigve su abhīśūn ārkṣe

original: RV_08.068.{16}2 . āśvamedhe supeśasaḥ //
analyzed: āśvamedhe supeśasaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{17}1 . ṣaḷ aśvāṃ ātithigva indrote vadhūmataḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ aśvān ātithigve indrote vadhūmataḥ

original: RV_08.068.{17}2 . sacā pūtakratau sanam //
analyzed: sacā pūtakratau sanam

original: RV_08.068.{18}1 . aiṣu cetad vṛṣaṇvaty antar ṛjreṣv aruṣī /
analyzed: ā eṣu cetat vṛṣaṇvatī antar ṛjreṣu aruṣī

original: RV_08.068.{18}2 . svabhīśuḥ kaśāvatī //
analyzed: su abhīśuḥ kaśāvatī

original: RV_08.068.{19}1 . na yuṣme vājabandhavo ninitsuś cana martyaḥ /
analyzed: na yuṣme vāja bandhavaḥ ninitsuḥ cana martyaḥ

original: RV_08.068.{19}2 . avadyam adhi dīdharat //
analyzed: avadyam adhi dīdharat

original: RV_08.069.{01}1 . pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave /
analyzed: pra pra vaḥ triṣṭubham iṣam mandat vīrāya indave

original: RV_08.069.{01}2 . dhiyā vo medhasātaye puraṃdhyā vivāsati //
analyzed: dhiyā vaḥ medha sātaye puraṃdhyā vivāsati

original: RV_08.069.{02}1 . nadaṃ va odatīnāṃ nadaṃ yoyuvatīnām /
analyzed: nadam vaḥ odatīnām nadam yoyuvatīnām

original: RV_08.069.{02}2 . patiṃ vo aghnyānāṃ dhenūnām iṣudhyasi //
analyzed: patim vaḥ aghnyānām dhenūnām iṣudhyasi

original: RV_08.069.{03}1 . tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya sūdadohasaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ

original: RV_08.069.{03}2 . janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane divaḥ //
analyzed: janman devānām viśaḥ triṣu ā rocane divaḥ

original: RV_08.069.{04}1 . abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide /
analyzed: abhi pra go patim girā indram arca yathā vide

original: RV_08.069.{04}2 . sūnuṃ satyasya satpatim //
analyzed: sūnum satyasya sat patim

original: RV_08.069.{05}1 . ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire 'ruṣīr adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire ruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_08.069.{05}2 . yatrābhi saṃnavāmahe //
analyzed: yatra abhi saṃnavāmahe

original: RV_08.069.{06}1 . indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
analyzed: indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram duduhre vajriṇe madhu

original: RV_08.069.{06}2 . yat sīm upahvare vidat //
analyzed: yat sīm upahvare vidat

original: RV_08.069.{07}1 . ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi /
analyzed: ud yat bradhnasya viṣṭapam gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi

original: RV_08.069.{07}2 . madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade //
analyzed: madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi tris sapta sakhyuḥ pade

original: RV_08.069.{08}1 . arcata prārcata priyamedhāso arcata /
analyzed: arcata prārcata priyamedhāsaḥ arcata

original: RV_08.069.{08}2 . arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata //
analyzed: arcantu putrakāḥ uta puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata

original: RV_08.069.{09}1 . ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat /
analyzed: ava svarāti gargaraḥ godhā pari saniṣvaṇat

original: RV_08.069.{09}2 . piOgā pari caniṣkadad indrāya brahmodyatam //
analyzed: piogā pari caniṣkadat indrāya brahma udyatam

original: RV_08.069.{10}1 . ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ /
analyzed: ā yat patanti enyaḥ su dughāḥ an apasphuraḥ

original: RV_08.069.{10}2 . apasphuraṃ gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave //
analyzed: apasphuram gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave

original: RV_08.069.{11}1 . apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata /
analyzed: apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ viśve devāḥ amatsata

original: RV_08.069.{11}2 . varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva //
analyzed: varuṇe id iha kṣayat tam āpaḥ abhī anūṣata vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva

original: RV_08.069.{12}1 . sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: su devaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ

original: RV_08.069.{12}2 . anukṣaranti kākudaṃ sūrmyaṃ suṣirām iva //
analyzed: anukṣaranti kākudam sūrmyam suṣirām iva

original: RV_08.069.{13}1 . yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ vyatīn aphāṇayat su yuktām upa dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.069.{13}2 . takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata //
analyzed: takvaḥ netā tat id vapuḥ upamā yaḥ amucyata

original: RV_08.069.{14}1 . atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati id u śakraḥ ohate indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_08.069.{14}2 . bhinat kanīna odanam pacyamānam paro girā //
analyzed: bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam pacyamānam paras girā

original: RV_08.069.{15}1 . arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhan navaṃ ratham /
analyzed: arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ dhi tiṣṭhat navam ratham

original: RV_08.069.{15}2 . sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum //
analyzed: sa pakṣat mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhu kratum

original: RV_08.069.{16}1 . ā tū suśipra dampate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam /
analyzed: ā tu su śipra dampate ratham tiṣṭha hiraṇyayam

original: RV_08.069.{16}2 . adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām anehasam //
analyzed: adha dyukṣam sacevahi sahasra pādam aruṣam svasti gām anehasam

original: RV_08.069.{17}1 . taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate

original: RV_08.069.{17}2 . arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etava āvartayanti dāvane //
analyzed: artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave āvartayanti dāvane

original: RV_08.069.{18}1 . anu pratnasyaukasaḥ priyamedhāsa eṣām /
analyzed: anu pratnasya okasaḥ priyamedhāsaḥ eṣām

original: RV_08.069.{18}2 . pūrvām anu prayatiṃ vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa āśata //
analyzed: pūrvām anu prayatim vṛkta barhiṣaḥ hita prayasaḥ āśata

original: RV_08.070.{01}1 . yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ rājā carṣaṇīnām yātā rathebhiḥ adhriguḥ

original: RV_08.070.{01}2 . viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe //
analyzed: viśvāsām tarutā pṛtanānām jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ vṛtra hā gṛṇe

original: RV_08.070.{02}1 . indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari /
analyzed: indram tam śumbha puru hanman avase yasya dvitā vidhartari

original: RV_08.070.{02}2 . hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ //
analyzed: hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśataḥ mahaḥ dive na sūryaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{03}1 . nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham /
analyzed: nakir tam karmaṇā naśat yaḥ cakāra sadāvṛdham

original: RV_08.070.{03}2 . indraṃ na yajñair viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṇvïjasam //
analyzed: indram na yajñaiḥ viśva gūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭam dhṛṣṇvjasam

original: RV_08.070.{04}1 . aṣāḷham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ /
analyzed: aṣāḍham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahim yasmin mahīḥ urujrayaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{04}2 . saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ //
analyzed: sam dhenavaḥ jāyamāne anonavuḥ dyāvaḥ kṣāmaḥ anonavuḥ

original: RV_08.070.{05}1 . yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śatam bhūmīr uta syuḥ /
analyzed: yat dyāvaḥ indra te śatam śatam bhūmīḥ uta syuḥ

original: RV_08.070.{05}2 . na tvā vajrin sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī //
analyzed: na tvā vajrin sahasram sūryāḥ anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī

original: RV_08.070.{06}1 . ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā /
analyzed: ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā

original: RV_08.070.{06}2 . asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: asmān ava maghavan gomati vraje vajrim citrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.070.{07}1 . na sīm adeva āpad iṣaṃ dīrghāyo martyaḥ /
analyzed: na sīm adevaḥ āpat iṣam dīrgha āyo martyaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{07}2 . etagvā cid ya etaśā yuyojate harī indro yuyojate //
analyzed: etagvā cit yaḥ etaśā yuyojate harī indraḥ yuyojate

original: RV_08.070.{08}1 . taṃ vo maho mahāyyam indraṃ dānāya sakṣaṇim /
analyzed: tam vaḥ mahāyyam indram dānāya sakṣaṇim

original: RV_08.070.{08}2 . yo gādheṣu ya āraṇeṣu havyo vājeṣv asti havyaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ gādheṣu yaḥ āraṇeṣu havyaḥ vājeṣu asti havyaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{09}1 . ud ū ṣu ṇo vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase /
analyzed: ud u su naḥ vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase

original: RV_08.070.{09}2 . ud ū ṣu mahyai maghavan maghattaya ud indra śravase mahe //
analyzed: ud u su mahyai maghavan maghattaye ud indra śravase mahe

original: RV_08.070.{10}1 . tvaṃ na indra ṛtayus tvānido ni tṛmpasi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indraḥ ṛtayuḥ tvānidaḥ ni tṛmpasi

original: RV_08.070.{10}2 . madhye vasiṣva tuvinṛmṇorvor ni dāsaṃ śiśnatho hathaiḥ //
analyzed: madhye vasiṣva tuvi nṛmṇa ūrvoḥ ni dāsam śiśnathaḥ hathaiḥ

original: RV_08.070.{11}1 . anyavratam amānuṣam ayajvānam adevayum /
analyzed: anya vratam a mānuṣam a yajvānam a devayum

original: RV_08.070.{11}2 . ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ sughnāya dasyum parvataḥ //
analyzed: ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ su ghnāya dasyum parvataḥ

original: RV_08.070.{12}1 . tvaṃ na indrāsāṃ haste śaviṣṭha dāvane /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra āsām haste śaviṣṭha dāvane

original: RV_08.070.{12}2 . dhānānāṃ na saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayur dviḥ saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayuḥ //
analyzed: dhānānām na sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ dvis sam gṛbhāya asmayuḥ

original: RV_08.070.{13}1 . sakhāyaḥ kratum ichata kathā rādhāma śarasya /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ kratum ichata kathā rādhāma śarasya

original: RV_08.070.{13}2 . upastutim bhojaḥ sūrir yo ahrayaḥ //
analyzed: upastutim bhojaḥ sūriḥ yaḥ ahrayaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{14}1 . bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhir barhiṣmadbhi staviṣyase /
analyzed: bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhiḥ barhiṣmadbhiḥ staviṣyase

original: RV_08.070.{14}2 . yad ittham ekam-ekam ic chara vatsān parādadaḥ //
analyzed: yat ittham ekam ekam id śara vatsān parādadaḥ

original: RV_08.070.{15}1 . karṇagṛhyā maghavā śauradevyo vatsaṃ nas tribhya ānayat /
analyzed: karṇa gṛhya maghavā śauradevyaḥ vatsam naḥ tribhyaḥ ānayat

original: RV_08.070.{15}2 . ajāṃ sūrir na dhātave //
analyzed: ajām sūriḥ na dhātave

original: RV_08.071.{01}1 . tvaṃ no agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyā arāteḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyāḥ arāteḥ

original: RV_08.071.{01}2 . uta dviṣo martyasya //
analyzed: uta dviṣaḥ martyasya

original: RV_08.071.{02}1 . nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeya īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta /
analyzed: nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeyaḥ īśe hi vaḥ priya jāta

original: RV_08.071.{02}2 . tvam id asi kṣapāvān //
analyzed: tvam id asi kṣapāvān

original: RV_08.071.{03}1 . sa no viśvebhir devebhir ūrjo napād bhadraśoce /
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvebhiḥ devebhiḥ ūrjaḥ napāt bhadra śoce

original: RV_08.071.{03}2 . rayiṃ dehi viśvavāram //
analyzed: rayim dehi viśva vāram

original: RV_08.071.{04}1 . na tam agne arātayo martaṃ yuvanta rāyaḥ /
analyzed: na tam agne arātayaḥ martam yuvanta rāyaḥ

original: RV_08.071.{04}2 . yaṃ trāyase dāśvāṃsam //
analyzed: yam trāyase dāśvāṃsam

original: RV_08.071.{05}1 . yaṃ tvaṃ vipra medhasātāv agne hinoṣi dhanāya /
analyzed: yam tvam vipra medha sātau agne hinoṣi dhanāya

original: RV_08.071.{05}2 . sa tavotī goṣu gantā //
analyzed: sa tava ūtī goṣu gantā

original: RV_08.071.{06}1 . tvaṃ rayim puruvīram agne dāśuṣe martāya /
analyzed: tvam rayim puru vīram agne dāśuṣe martāya

original: RV_08.071.{06}2 . pra ṇo naya vasyo acha //
analyzed: pra naḥ naya vasyaḥ acha

original: RV_08.071.{07}1 . uruṣyā ṇo mā parā dā aghāyate jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: uruṣya naḥ mā parā dāḥ aghāyate jātavedaḥ

original: RV_08.071.{07}2 . durādhye martāya //
analyzed: durādhye martāya

original: RV_08.071.{08}1 . agne mākiṣ ṭe devasya rātim adevo yuyota /
analyzed: agne mākir te devasya rātim adevaḥ yuyota

original: RV_08.071.{08}2 . tvam īśiṣe vasūnām //
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe vasūnām

original: RV_08.071.{09}1 . sa no vasva upa māsy ūrjo napān māhinasya /
analyzed: sa naḥ vasvaḥ upa māsi ūrjaḥ napāt māhinasya

original: RV_08.071.{09}2 . sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_08.071.{10}1 . achā naḥ śīraśociṣaṃ giro yantu darśatam /
analyzed: achā naḥ śīra śociṣam giraḥ yantu darśatam

original: RV_08.071.{10}2 . achā yajñāso namasā purūvasum purupraśastam ūtaye //
analyzed: achā yajñāsaḥ namasā purūvasum puru praśastam ūtaye

original: RV_08.071.{11}1 . agniṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ dānāya vāryāṇām /
analyzed: agnim sūnum sahasaḥ jātavedasam dānāya vāryāṇām

original: RV_08.071.{11}2 . dvitā yo bhūd amṛto martyeṣv ā hotā mandratamo viśi //
analyzed: dvitā yaḥ bhūt amṛtaḥ martyeṣu ā hotā mandratamaḥ viśi

original: RV_08.071.{12}1 . agniṃ vo devayajyayāgnim prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: agnim vaḥ deva yajyayā agnim prayati adhvare

original: RV_08.071.{12}2 . agniṃ dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvaty agniṃ kṣaitrāya sādhase //
analyzed: agnim dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvati agnim kṣaitrāya sādhase

original: RV_08.071.{13}1 . agnir iṣāṃ sakhye dadātu na īśe yo vāryāṇām /
analyzed: agniḥ iṣām sakhye dadātu naḥ īśe yaḥ vāryāṇām

original: RV_08.071.{13}2 . agniṃ toke tanaye śaśvad īmahe vasuṃ santaṃ tanūpām //
analyzed: agnim toke tanaye śaśvat īmahe vasum santam tanū pām

original: RV_08.071.{14}1 . agnim īḷiṣvāvase gāthābhiḥ śīraśociṣam /
analyzed: agnim īḍiṣva avase gāthābhiḥ śīra śociṣam

original: RV_08.071.{14}2 . agniṃ rāye purumīḷha śrutaṃ naro 'gniṃ sudītaye chardiḥ //
analyzed: agnim rāye purumīḷha śrutam naraḥ gnim sudītaye chardiḥ

original: RV_08.071.{15}1 . agniṃ dveṣo yotavai no gṛṇīmasy agniṃ śaṃ yoś ca dātave /
analyzed: agnim dveṣaḥ yotavai naḥ gṛṇīmasi agnim śam yos ca dātave

original: RV_08.071.{15}2 . viśvāsu vikṣv aviteva havyo bhuvad vastur ṛṣūṇām //
analyzed: viśvāsu vikṣu avitā iva havyaḥ bhuvat vastuḥ ṛṣūṇām

original: RV_08.072.01.1{14} haviṣ kṛṇudhvamā gamadadhvaryurvanate punaḥ
analyzed: haviḥ kṛṇudhvam ā gamat adhvaryuḥ vanate punar

original: RV_08.072.01.2{14} vidvānasyapraśāsanam
analyzed: vidvān asya praśāsanam

original: RV_08.072.02.1{14} ni tigmamabhyaṃśuṃ sīdad dhotā manāvadhi
analyzed: ni tigmam abhyaṃśum sīdat hotā manau adhi

original: RV_08.072.02.2{14} juṣāṇoasya sakhyam
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ oasya sakhyam

original: RV_08.072.03.1{14} antarichanti taṃ jane rudraṃ paro manīṣayā
analyzed: antar ichanti tam jane rudram paras manīṣayā

original: RV_08.072.03.2{14} gṛbhṇanti jihvayā sasam
analyzed: gṛbhṇanti jihvayā sasam

original: RV_08.072.04.1{14} jāmyatītape dhanurvayodhā aruhad vanam
analyzed: jāmī atītape dhanuḥ vayodhāḥ aruhat vanam

original: RV_08.072.04.2{14} dṛṣadaṃ jihvayāvadhīt
analyzed: dṛṣadam jihvayā avadhīt

original: RV_08.072.05.1{14} caran vatso ruśanniha nidātāraṃ na vindate
analyzed: caran vatsaḥ ruśan iha nidātāram na vindate

original: RV_08.072.05.2{14} veti stotavāmbyam
analyzed: vā iti stotavāmbyam

original: RV_08.072.06.1{15} uto nvasya yan mahadaśvāvad yojanaṃ bṛhad
analyzed: uta u nu asya yat mahat aśvāvat yojanam bṛhat

original: RV_08.072.06.2{15} dāmā rathasya dadṛśe
analyzed: dāmā rathasya dadṛśe

original: RV_08.072.07.1{15} duhanti saptaikāmupa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ
analyzed: duhanti sapta ekām upa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ

original: RV_08.072.07.2{15} tīrthe sindhoradhi svare
analyzed: tīrthe sindhoḥ adhi svare

original: RV_08.072.08.1{15} ā daśabhirvivasvata indraḥ kośamacucyavīt
analyzed: ā daśabhiḥ vivasvataḥ indraḥ kośam acucyavīt

original: RV_08.072.08.2{15} khedayā trivṛtā divaḥ
analyzed: khedayā trivṛtā divaḥ

original: RV_08.072.09.1{15} pari tridhāturadhvaraṃ jūrṇireti navīyasī
analyzed: pari tri dhātuḥ adhvaram jūrṇiḥ eti navīyasī

analyzed: madhvā hotāraḥ añjate

analyzed: siñcanti namasā avatam uccācakram parijmānam

analyzed: nīcīna bāram akṣitam

analyzed: niṣiktam puṣkare madhu

analyzed: avatasya visarjane

analyzed: gāvaḥ upāvata avatam mahī yajñasya rapsu dā

analyzed: ubhā karṇā ahiraṇyayā

analyzed: rasāḥ dadhītavṛṣabham

analyzed: te jānata svam okyam sam vatsāsaḥ na mātṛbhiḥ

analyzed: mithas nasanta jāmibhiḥ

analyzed: upa srakveṣu bapsataḥ kṛṇvate dharuṇam divi

analyzed: indre agne anamaḥ svar

analyzed: adhukṣat pipyuṣīm iṣam ūrjam saptapadīm ariḥ

original: RV_08.072.16.2{17} sūryasya sapta raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: sūryasya sapta raśmibhiḥ

analyzed: somasya mitrāvaruṇā uditā sūre ā dade

analyzed: tat āturasya bheṣajam

analyzed: uta u nu asya yat padam haryatasya nidhānyam

analyzed: pari dyām jihvayā atanat

analyzed: anti sadbhūtu vāmavaḥ

anti ṣat

analyzed: kuha sthaḥ kuha jagmathuḥ kuha śyenā iva petathuḥ
anti ṣat

analyzed: yat adya karhi karhi cit śuśrūyātam imam havam
anti ṣat

analyzed: aśvinā yāmahūtamā nediṣṭham yāmyāpyam

analyzed: avantam atraye gṛham kṛṇutam yuvam aśvinā
anti ṣat

analyzed: varethe agnim ātapaḥ vadate valgvatraye

original: RV_08.073.09.1{19} pra saptavadhrirāśasā dhārāmagneraśāyata
analyzed: pra saptavadhriḥ āśasā dhārām agneḥ aśāyata

analyzed: iha ā gatam vṛṣaṇvasū śṛṇutam me imam havam

analyzed: kim idam vām purāṇa vat jaratoḥ iva śasyate

analyzed: samānam vām sajātyam samānaḥ bandhuḥ aśvinā

analyzed: ā naḥ gavyebhiḥ aśvyaiḥ sahasraiḥ upa gacchatam

anti ṣat

analyzed: aruṇapsuḥ uṣāḥ abhūt akaḥ jyotiḥ ṛtāvarī
anti ṣat

analyzed: aśvinā su vicākaśat vṛkṣam paraśumān iva
anti ṣat

anti ṣat

analyzed: praśaṃsanti praśastibhiḥ

analyzed: havyāni airayat divi

analyzed: juhvānāsaḥ ūyata srucaḥ

analyzed: tayā vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ

analyzed: sā dyumnaiḥ dyumninī bṛhat upa upa śravasi śravaḥ

analyzed: dadhīta vṛtratūrye

analyzed: aśvam id gām ratha prām tveṣam indram na satpatim

analyzed: sa bodhi vṛtratūrye

analyzed: aham huvānaḥ ārkṣe śrutarvaṇi mada cyuti

analyzed: nedīyaḥ yajñam aṅgiraḥ

analyzed: vṛṣṇe codasva suṣṭutim

analyzed: kamu svid asya senayā agneḥ apāka cakṣasaḥ

analyzed: paṇim goṣu starāmahe

analyzed: mā naḥ devānām viśaḥ prasnātīḥ iva usrāḥ

analyzed: amaiḥ amitram ardaya

original: RV_08.075.11.1{26} kuvit su no gaviṣṭaye 'gne saṃveṣiṣo rayim

analyzed: uru kṛt uru naḥ kṛdhi

analyzed: anyam asmat bhiyai iyam agne siṣaktu duchunā

analyzed: vardha naḥ amavat śavaḥ

original: RV_08.075.14.1{26} yasyājuṣan namasvinaḥ śamīmadurmakhasya vā

original: RV_08.075.15.2{26} yatrāhamasmi tānava
analyzed: yatra aham asmi tān ava

original: RV_08.075.16.1{26} vidmā hi te purā vayamagne pituryathāvasaḥ
analyzed: vidma hi te purā vayam agne pituḥ yathāvasas

analyzed: adhā te sumnamīmahe

original: RV_08.076.01.1{27} imaṃ nu māyinaṃ huva indramīśānamojasā

analyzed: marutvantam na vṛñjase

original: RV_08.076.02.1{27} ayamindro marutsakhā vi vṛtrasyābhinacchiraḥ

analyzed: vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_08.076.03.2{27} sṛjan samudriyāapaḥ
analyzed: sṛjan samudriyā apaḥ

original: RV_08.076.04.1{27} ayaṃ ha yena vā idaṃ svarmarutvatā jitam

original: RV_08.076.04.2{27} indreṇa somapītaye
analyzed: indreṇa soma pītaye

original: RV_08.076.05.1{27} marutvantam ṛjīṣiṇamojasvantaṃ virapśinam
analyzed: marutvantam ṛjīṣiṇam ojasvantam virapśinam

analyzed: indram gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_08.076.06.1{27} indraṃ pratnena manmanā marutvantaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: indram pratnena manmanā marutvantam havāmahe

original: RV_08.076.06.2{27} asya somasya pītaye
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.076.07.1{28} marutvānindra mīḍhvaḥ pibā somaṃ śatakrato
analyzed: marutvān indra mīḍhvaḥ piba somam śatakrato

original: RV_08.076.07.2{28} asmin yajñepuruṣṭuta
analyzed: asmin yajñepuruṣṭuta

original: RV_08.076.08.1{28} tubhyedindra marutvate sutāḥ somāso adrivaḥ
analyzed: tubhya id indra marutvate sutāḥ somāsaḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.076.08.2{28} hṛdā hūyanta ukthinaḥ
analyzed: hṛdā hūyante ukthinaḥ

original: RV_08.076.09.1{28} pibedindra marutsakhā sutaṃ somaṃ diviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: pibet indra marut sakhā sutam somam diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_08.076.09.2{28} vajraṃ śiśāna ojasā
analyzed: vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_08.076.10.1{28} uttiṣṭhannojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ

original: RV_08.076.10.2{28} somamindracamū sutam
analyzed: somam indra camū sutam

original: RV_08.076.11.1{28} anu tvā rodasī ubhe krakṣamāṇamakṛpetām

original: RV_08.076.11.2{28} indra yad dasyuhābhavaḥ
analyzed: indra yat dasyu hā abhavaḥ

original: RV_08.076.12.1{28} vācamaṣṭāpadīmahaṃ navasraktim ṛtaspṛśam

analyzed: indrāt pari tanvam mame

original: RV_08.077.01.1{29} jajñāno nu śatakraturvi pṛchaditi mātaram
analyzed: jajñānaḥ nu śatakratuḥ vi pṛcchat iti mātaram

original: RV_08.077.01.2{29} ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire
analyzed: ke ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire

original: RV_08.077.02.1{29} ādīṃ śavasyabravīdaurṇavābhamahīśuvam
analyzed: ādīm śavasi abravīt aurṇava ābha mahīśuvam

original: RV_08.077.02.2{29} te putra santu niṣṭuraḥ
analyzed: te putra santu niṣṭuraḥ

original: RV_08.077.03.1{29} samit tān vṛtrahākhidat khe arāniva khedayā
analyzed: samidh tān vṛtrahā akhidat khe arān iva khedayā

original: RV_08.077.03.2{29} pravṛddhodasyuhābhavat
analyzed: pravṛddhā udasyu hā abhavat

analyzed: ekayā pratidhāpibat sākam sarāṃsi triṃśatam

original: RV_08.077.04.2{29} indraḥ somasya kāṇukā
analyzed: indraḥ somasya kāṇukā

original: RV_08.077.05.1{29} abhi gandharvamatṛṇadabudhneṣu rajassvā
analyzed: abhi gandharvam atṛṇata budhneṣu rajassvā

original: RV_08.077.05.2{29} indro brahmabhya id vṛdhe
analyzed: indraḥ brahmabhyaḥ id vṛdhe

analyzed: nirāvidhyat giribhyaḥ ā dhārayat pakvam odanam

analyzed: indraḥ bundam su ātatam

analyzed: śata bradhnaḥ iṣuḥ tava sahasra parṇaḥ ekaḥ id

original: RV_08.077.07.2{30} yamindra cakṛṣe yujam
analyzed: yam indra cakṛṣe yujam

analyzed: tena stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara nṛbhyaḥ nāribhyaḥ attave

original: RV_08.077.08.2{30} sadyo jātaṛbhuṣṭhira
analyzed: sadyas jāta ṛbhuṣṭhira

analyzed: etā cyautnāni te kṛtā varṣiṣṭhāni parīṇasā

original: RV_08.077.09.2{30} hṛdā vīḍvadhārayaḥ
analyzed: hṛdā vīḍvadhārayaḥ

original: RV_08.077.10.1{30} viśvet tā viṣṇurābharadurukramastveṣitaḥ
analyzed: viśvā id tāḥ viṣṇuḥ ābharat urukramaḥ tveṣitaḥ

analyzed: śatam mahiṣān kṣīra pākam odanam varāham indraḥ emuṣam

analyzed: tuvikṣam te su kṛtam sūmayam dhanuḥ sādhuḥ bundaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

analyzed: ubhā te bāhū raṇyā su saṃskṛte ṛdūpe cit ṛdūvṛdhā

original: RV_08.078.01.1{31} puroḷāśaṃ no andhasa indra sahasramā bhara
analyzed: puroḷāśam naḥ andhasaḥ indra sahasram ā bhara

original: RV_08.078.01.2{31} śatā ca śūra gonām
analyzed: śatā ca śūra gonām

original: RV_08.078.02.1{31} ā no bhara vyañjanaṃ gāmaśvamabhyañjanam
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara vyañjanam gām aśvam abhyañjanam

original: RV_08.078.02.2{31} sacā manāhiraṇyayā
analyzed: sacā manāhiraṇyayā

original: RV_08.078.03.1{31} uta naḥ karṇaśobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇavā bhara
analyzed: uta naḥ karṇa śobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇavā bhara

original: RV_08.078.03.2{31} tvaṃ hiśṛṇviṣe vaso
analyzed: tvam hiśṛṇviṣe vaso

analyzed: nakīm vṛdhīkaḥ indra te na su sāḥ na su dāḥ uta

original: RV_08.078.04.2{31} nānyastvacchūra vāghataḥ
analyzed: na anyaḥ tvat śūra vāghataḥ

analyzed: nakīm indraḥ nikartave na śakraḥ pariśaktave

analyzed: viśvam śṛṇoti paśyati

analyzed: sa manyum martyānām adabdhaḥ ni cikīṣate

analyzed: purā nidaḥ cikīṣate

analyzed: kratvaḥ id pūrṇam udaram turasya asti vidhataḥ

original: RV_08.078.07.2{32} vṛtraghnaḥsomapāvnaḥ
analyzed: vṛtra ghnaḥ soma pāvnaḥ

analyzed: tve vasūni saṃgatā viśvā ca soma saubhagā

original: RV_08.078.08.2{32} sudātvaparihvṛtā
analyzed: su dātu aparihvṛtā

original: RV_08.078.10.2{32} dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā
analyzed: dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā

analyzed: ayam kṛtnuḥ a gṛbhītaḥ viśva jit udbhidit somaḥ

original: RV_08.079.01.2{33} ṛṣirvipraḥ kāvyena
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ kāvyena

analyzed: uru yantā asi varūtham

original: RV_08.079.08.2{34} mā no hārdi tviṣā vadhīḥ

analyzed: rājan apa dviṣaḥ sedha mīḍhvaḥ apa sridhaḥ sedha

analyzed: kuvid su indraṇaḥ śakaḥ

analyzed: indra pra naḥ ratham ava paścāt cit santam adrivas

analyzed: purastāt enam me kṛdhi

analyzed: upamam vājayu śravaḥ

analyzed: asmān su jigyuṣaḥ kṛdhi

analyzed: iyam dhīḥ ṛtviyāvatī

analyzed: apāvṛktāḥ aratnayaḥ

analyzed: ā tu naḥ indra kṣumantam citram grābham sam gṛbhāya

original: RV_08.081.01.2{37} mahāhastī dakṣiṇena
analyzed: mahā hastī dakṣiṇena

analyzed: tuvimātram avobhiḥ

analyzed: bhīmam na gām vārayante

original: RV_08.081.04.1{37} eto nvindraṃ stavāmeśānaṃ vasvaḥ svarājam

analyzed: na rādhasā mardhiṣat naḥ

analyzed: abhi rādhasā jugurat

analyzed: ā naḥ bhara dakṣiṇena abhi savyena pra mṛśa

analyzed: indra mā naḥ vasoḥ nirbhāj

original: RV_08.081.07.2{38} adāśūṣṭarasya vedaḥ
analyzed: a dāśūṣṭarasya vedaḥ

original: RV_08.081.08.2{38} asmābhiḥsu taṃ sanuhi
analyzed: asmābhiḥsu tam sanuhi

original: RV_08.081.09.1{38} sadyojuvaste vājā asmabhyaṃ viśvaścandrāḥ
analyzed: sadyas juvaḥ te vājāḥ asmabhyam viśva ścandrāḥ

original: RV_08.081.09.2{38} vaśaiśca makṣū jarante
analyzed: vaśaiḥ ca makṣū jarante

original: RV_08.082.01.1{01} ā pra drava parāvato 'rvāvataśca vṛtrahan
analyzed: ā pra drava parāvataḥ rvāvataḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.082.01.2{01} madhvaḥ pratiprabharmaṇi
analyzed: madhvaḥ pratiprabharmaṇi

original: RV_08.082.02.1{01} tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahi sutāso mādayiṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: tīvrāḥ somāsaḥ ā gahi sutāsaḥ mādayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_08.082.02.2{01} pibā dadhṛg yathociṣe
analyzed: pibā dadhṛṣ yathā ūciṣe

original: RV_08.082.03.1{01} iṣā mandasvādu te 'raṃ varāya manyave
analyzed: iṣā mandasva ādu te raṃ varāya manyave

original: RV_08.082.03.2{01} bhuvat ta indra śaṃ hṛde
analyzed: bhuvat te indra śam hṛde

original: RV_08.082.04.1{01} ā tvaśatravā gahi nyukthāni ca hūyase
analyzed: ā tva śatravā gahi ni ukthāni ca hūyase

original: RV_08.082.04.2{01} upame rocane divaḥ
analyzed: upame rocane divaḥ

original: RV_08.082.05.1{01} tubhyāyamadribhiḥ suto gobhiḥ śrīto madāya kam
analyzed: tubhya ayam adribhiḥ sutaḥ gobhiḥ śrītaḥ madāya kam

original: RV_08.082.05.2{01} pra soma indra hūyate
analyzed: pra somaḥ indra hūyate

original: RV_08.082.06.1{02} indra śrudhi su me havamasme sutasya gomataḥ
analyzed: indra śrudhi su me havam asme sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.082.06.2{02} vi pītintṛptimaśnuhi
analyzed: vi pītim tṛptim aśnuhi

original: RV_08.082.07.1{02} ya indra camaseṣvā somaścamūṣu te sutaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ indra camaseṣu ā somaḥ camūṣu te sutaḥ

original: RV_08.082.07.2{02} pibedasya tvamīśiṣe
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_08.082.08.1{02} yo apsu candramā iva somaścamūṣu dadṛśe
analyzed: yaḥ apsu candramāḥ iva somaḥ camūṣu dadṛśe

original: RV_08.082.08.2{02} pibedasya tvamīśiṣe
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_08.082.09.1{02} yaṃ te śyenaḥ padābharat tiro rajāṃsyaspṛtam
analyzed: yam te śyenaḥ padā abharat tiras rajāṃsi a spṛtam

original: RV_08.082.09.2{02} pibedasya tvamīśiṣe
analyzed: piba id asya tvam īśiṣe

original: RV_08.083.01.1{03} devānāmidavo mahat tadā vṛṇīmahe vayam
analyzed: devānām idavaḥ mahat tadā vṛṇīmahe vayam

original: RV_08.083.01.2{03} vṛṣṇāmasmabhyamūtaye
analyzed: vṛṣṇām asmabhyam ūtaye

original: RV_08.083.02.1{03} te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_08.083.02.2{03} vṛdhāsaśca pracetasaḥ
analyzed: vṛdhāsaḥ ca pracetasaḥ

original: RV_08.083.03.1{03} ati no viṣpitā puru naubhirapo na parṣatha
analyzed: ati naḥ viṣpitā puru naubhiḥ apaḥ na parṣatha

original: RV_08.083.03.2{03} yūyam ṛtasyarathyaḥ
analyzed: yūyam ṛtasyarathyaḥ

original: RV_08.083.04.1{03} vāmaṃ no astvaryaman vāmaṃ varuṇa śaṃsyam
analyzed: vāmam naḥ astu aryaman vāmam varuṇa śaṃsyam

original: RV_08.083.04.2{03} vāmaṃ hyāvṛṇīmahe
analyzed: vāmam hi āvṛṇīmahe

original: RV_08.083.05.1{03} vāmasya hi pracetasa īśānāśo riśādasaḥ
analyzed: vāmasya hi pracetasaḥ īśāna āśaḥ riśādasaḥ

original: RV_08.083.05.2{03} nemādityā aghasya yat
analyzed: nema ādityāḥ aghasya yat

original: RV_08.083.06.1{04} vayamid vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyanto yānto adhvannā
analyzed: vayam id vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyantaḥ yāntaḥ adhvannā

original: RV_08.083.06.2{04} devā vṛdhāya hūmahe
analyzed: devāḥ vṛdhāya hūmahe

original: RV_08.083.07.1{04} adhi na indraiṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām
analyzed: adhi naḥ indra eṣām viṣṇo sajātyānām

original: RV_08.083.07.2{04} itā maruto aśvinā
analyzed: ita marutaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.083.08.1{04} pra bhrātṛtvaṃ sudānavo 'dha dvitā samānyā
analyzed: pra bhrātṛ tvam sudānavaḥ dha dvitā samānyā

original: RV_08.083.08.2{04} māturgarbhe bharāmahe
analyzed: mātuḥ garbhe bharāmahe

original: RV_08.083.09.1{04} yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_08.083.09.2{04} adhācid va uta bruve
analyzed: adha acit vaḥ uta bruve

original: RV_08.084.01.1{05} preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ stuṣe mitramiva priyam
analyzed: preṣṭham vaḥ atithim stuṣe mitram iva priyam

original: RV_08.084.01.2{05} agniṃ rathaṃ na vedyam
analyzed: agnim ratham na vedyam

original: RV_08.084.02.1{05} kavimiva pracetasaṃ yaṃ devāso adha dvitā
analyzed: kavim iva pracetasam yam devāsaḥ adha dvitā

original: RV_08.084.02.2{05} ni martyeṣvādadhuḥ
analyzed: ni martyeṣu ādadhuḥ

original: RV_08.084.03.1{05} tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṝn pāhi śṛṇudhī giraḥ
analyzed: tvam yaviṣṭha dāśuṣaḥ nṝn pāhi śṛṇudhi giraḥ

original: RV_08.084.03.2{05} rakṣā tokamuta tmanā
analyzed: rakṣa tokam uta tmanā

original: RV_08.084.04.1{05} kayā te agne aṅgira ūrjo napādupastutim
analyzed: kayā te agne aṅgiraḥ ūrjaḥ napāt upastutim

original: RV_08.084.04.2{05} varāya deva manyave
analyzed: varāya deva manyave

original: RV_08.084.05.1{05} dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahaso yaho
analyzed: dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_08.084.05.2{05} kadu voca idaṃnamaḥ
analyzed: kadu voce idaṃnamaḥ

original: RV_08.084.06.1{06} adhā tvaṃ hi nas karo viśvā asmabhyaṃ sukṣitīḥ
analyzed: adhā tvam hi naḥ karaḥ viśvāḥ asmabhyam su kṣitīḥ

original: RV_08.084.06.2{06} vājadraviṇaso giraḥ
analyzed: vāja draviṇasaḥ giraḥ

original: RV_08.084.07.1{06} kasya nūnaṃ parīṇaso dhiyo jinvasi dampate
analyzed: kasya nūnam parīṇasaḥ dhiyaḥ jinvasi dampate

original: RV_08.084.07.2{06} goṣātā yasyate giraḥ
analyzed: goṣātā yasyate giraḥ

original: RV_08.084.08.1{06} taṃ marjayanta sukratuṃ puroyāvānamājiṣu
analyzed: tam marjayanta sukratum puras yāvānam ājiṣu

original: RV_08.084.08.2{06} sveṣu kṣayeṣuvājinam
analyzed: sveṣu kṣayeṣuvājinam

original: RV_08.084.09.1{06} kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhirnakiryaṃ ghnanti hanti yaḥ
analyzed: kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhiḥ nakiryam ghnanti hanti yaḥ

original: RV_08.084.09.2{06} agne suvīra edhate
analyzed: agne su vīraḥ edhate

original: RV_08.085.01.1{07} ā me havaṃ nāsatyāśvinā gachataṃ yuvam
analyzed: ā me havam nāsatyā aśvinā gacchatam yuvam

original: RV_08.085.01.2{07} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.02.1{07} imaṃ me stomamaśvinemaṃ me śṛṇutaṃ havam
analyzed: imam me stomam aśvinā imam me śṛṇutam havam

original: RV_08.085.02.2{07} madhvaḥ somasyapītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.03.1{07} ayaṃ vāṃ kṛṣṇo aśvinā havate vājinīvasū
analyzed: ayam vām kṛṣṇaḥ aśvinā havate vājinīvasū

original: RV_08.085.03.2{07} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.04.1{07} śṛṇutaṃ jariturhavaṃ kṛṣṇasya stuvato narā
analyzed: śṛṇutam jarituḥ havam kṛṣṇasya stuvataḥ narā

original: RV_08.085.04.2{07} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.05.1{07} chardiryantamadābhyaṃ viprāya stuvate narā
analyzed: chardiḥ yantam adābhyam viprāya stuvate narā

original: RV_08.085.05.2{07} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.06.1{08} gachataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhamitthā stuvato aśvinā
analyzed: gacchatam dāśuṣaḥ gṛham itthā stuvataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_08.085.06.2{08} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.07.1{08} yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ rathe vīḍvaṅge vṛṣaṇvasū
analyzed: yuñjāthām rāsabham rathe vīḍu aṅge vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_08.085.07.2{08} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.08.1{08} trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathenā yātamaśvinā
analyzed: tri vandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_08.085.08.2{08} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.085.09.1{08} nū me giro nāsatyāśvinā prāvataṃ yuvam
analyzed: nu me giraḥ nāsatyā aśvinā prāvatam yuvam

original: RV_08.085.09.2{08} madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
analyzed: madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.086.01.1{09} ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvobhā dakṣasya vacaso babhūvathuḥ
analyzed: ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvā ubhā dakṣasya vacasaḥ babhūvathuḥ

original: RV_08.086.01.2{09} tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam
analyzed: tā vām viśvakaḥ havate tanū kṛthe mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_08.086.02.1{09} kathā nūnaṃ vāṃ vimanā upa stavad yuvaṃ dhiyaṃ dadathurvasyaiṣtaye
analyzed: kathā nūnam vām vimanāḥ upa stavat yuvam dhiyam

original: RV_08.086.02.2{09} tā vāṃ viśvako ...
analyzed: tā vām

original: RV_08.086.03.1{09} yuvaṃ hi ṣmā purubhujemamedhatuṃ viṣṇāpve dadathurvasyaiṣṭaye
analyzed: yuvam hi sma puru bhujā imamedhatum viṣṇāpve dadathuḥ vasyaiṣṭaye

original: RV_08.086.03.2{09} tā vāṃ viśvako ...
analyzed: tā vām

original: RV_08.086.04.1{09} uta tyaṃ vīraṃ dhanasām ṛjīṣiṇaṃ dūre cit santamavase havāmahe
analyzed: uta tyam vīram dhana sām ṛjīṣiṇam dūre cit santam avase havāmahe

original: RV_08.086.04.2{09} yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pituryathā mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam
analyzed: yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pituḥ yathā mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_08.086.05.1{09} ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyata ṛtasya śṛṅgamurviyā vi paprathe
analyzed: ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyate ṛtasya śṛṅgam urviyā vi paprathe

original: RV_08.086.05.2{09} ṛtaṃ sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyato mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam
analyzed: ṛtam sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyataḥ mā naḥ vi yauṣṭam sakhyā mumocatam

original: RV_08.087.01.1{10} dyumnī vāṃ stomo aśvinā krivirna seka ā gatam
analyzed: dyumnī vām stomaḥ aśvinā kriviḥ na seke ā gatam

original: RV_08.087.01.2{10} madhvaḥsutasya sa divi priyo narā pātaṃ gaurāviveriṇe
analyzed: madhvaḥsutasya sa divi priyaḥ narā pātam gaurau iva iriṇe

original: RV_08.087.02.1{10} pibataṃ gharmaṃ madhumantamaśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā
analyzed: pibatam gharmam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdatam narā

original: RV_08.087.02.2{10} tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā ni pātaṃ vedasā vayaḥ
analyzed: tā mandasānā manuṣaḥ duroṇe ā ni pātam vedasā vayaḥ

original: RV_08.087.03.1{10} ā vāṃ viśvābhirūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata
analyzed: ā vām viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_08.087.03.2{10} tā vartiryātamupa vṛktabarhiṣo juṣṭaṃ yajñaṃ diviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: tā vartiḥ yātam upa vṛkta barhiṣaḥ juṣṭam yajñam diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_08.087.04.1{10} pibataṃ somaṃ madhumantamaśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ sumat
analyzed: pibatam somam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdatam sumat

original: RV_08.087.04.2{10} tā vāvṛdhānā upa suṣṭutiṃ divo gantaṃ gaurāviveriṇam
analyzed: tā vāvṛdhānau upa suṣṭutim divaḥ gantam gaurau iva iriṇam

original: RV_08.087.05.1{10} ā nūnaṃ yātamaśvināśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ
analyzed: ā nūnam yātam aśvinā aśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ

original: RV_08.087.05.2{10} dasrā hiraṇyavartanī śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: dasrā hiraṇya vartanī śubhaḥ patī pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_08.087.06.1{10} vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmahe vipanyavo viprāso vājasātaye
analyzed: vayam hi vām havāmahe vipanyavaḥ viprāsaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_08.087.06.2{10} tāvalgū dasrā purudaṃsasā dhiyāśvinā śruṣṭyā gatam
analyzed: tāvalgū dasrā puru daṃsasā dhiyā aśvinā śruṣṭyā gatam

original: RV_08.088.01.1{11} taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasormandānamandhasaḥ
analyzed: tam vaḥ dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasoḥ mandānam andhasaḥ

original: RV_08.088.01.2{11} abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhirnavāmahe
analyzed: abhi vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ indram gīrbhiḥ navāmahe

original: RV_08.088.02.1{11} dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhirāvṛtaṃ giriṃ na purubhojasam
analyzed: dyukṣam sudānum taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam girim na puru bhojasam

original: RV_08.088.02.2{11} kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ makṣū gomantamīmahe
analyzed: kṣumantam vājam śatinam sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe

original: RV_08.088.03.1{11} na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḷavaḥ
analyzed: na tvā bṛhantaḥ adrayaḥ varante indra vīḍavaḥ

original: RV_08.088.03.2{11} yad ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakiṣ ṭadā mināti te
analyzed: yat ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakir tadā mināti te

original: RV_08.088.04.1{11} yoddhāsi kratvā śavasota daṃsanā viśvā jātābhi majmanā
analyzed: yoddhā asi kratvā śavasā uta daṃsanā viśvā jātā abhi majmanā

original: RV_08.088.04.2{11} ā tvāyamarka ūtaye vavartati yaṃ gotamā ajījanan
analyzed: ā tvā ayam arkaḥ ūtaye vavartati yam gotamāḥ ajījanan

original: RV_08.088.05.1{11} pra hi ririkṣa ojasā divo antebhyas pari
analyzed: pra hi ririkṣe ojasā divaḥ antebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_08.088.05.2{11} na tvā vivyācaraja indra pārthivamanu svadhāṃ vavakṣitha
analyzed: na tvā vivyāca rajaḥ indra pārthivam anu svadhām vavakṣitha

original: RV_08.088.06.1{11} nakiḥ pariṣṭirmaghavan maghasya te yad dāśuṣe daśasyasi
analyzed: nakir pariṣṭiḥ maghavan maghasya te yat dāśuṣe daśasyasi

original: RV_08.088.06.2{11} asmākaṃ bodhyucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye
analyzed: asmākam bodhi ucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vāja sātaye

original: RV_08.089.01.1{12} bṛhadindrāya gāyata maruto vṛtrahantamam
analyzed: bṛhat indrāya gāyata marutaḥ vṛtra hantamam

original: RV_08.089.01.2{12} yena jyotirajanayannṛtāvṛdho devaṃ devāya jāgṛvi
analyzed: yena jyotiḥ ajanayan ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devam devāya jāgṛvi

original: RV_08.089.02.1{12} apādhamadabhiśastīraśastihāthendro dyumnyābhavat
analyzed: apādhamat abhiśastīḥ aśasti hā atha indraḥ dyumnyā abhavat

original: RV_08.089.02.2{12} devāsta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudgaṇa
analyzed: devāḥ te indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhat bhāno marut gaṇa

original: RV_08.089.03.1{12} pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya bṛhate marutaḥ brahma arcata

original: RV_08.089.03.2{12} vṛtraṃ hanati vṛtrahā śatakraturvajreṇa śataparvaṇā
analyzed: vṛtram hanati vṛtrahā śatakratuḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_08.089.04.1{12} abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣanmanaḥ śravaścit te asad bṛhat
analyzed: abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣat manaḥ śravaḥ cit te asat bṛhat

original: RV_08.089.04.2{12} arṣantvāpo javasā vi mātaro hano vṛtraṃ jayā svaḥ
analyzed: arṣantu āpaḥ javasā vi mātaraḥ hanaḥ vṛtram jaya svar

original: RV_08.089.05.1{12} yajjāyathā apūrvya maghavan vṛtrahatyāya
analyzed: yat jāyathāḥ apūrvya maghavan vṛtra hatyāya

original: RV_08.089.05.2{12} tat pṛthivīmaprathayastadastabhnā uta dyām
analyzed: tat pṛthivīm aprathayaḥ tat astabhnāḥ uta dyām

original: RV_08.089.06.1{12} tat te yajño ajāyata tadarka uta haskṛtiḥ
analyzed: tat te yajñaḥ ajāyata tat arkaḥ uta haskṛtiḥ

original: RV_08.089.06.2{12} tad viśvamabhibhūrasi yajjātaṃ yacca jantvam
analyzed: tat viśvam abhibhūḥ asi yat jātam yat ca jantvam

original: RV_08.089.07.1{12} āmāsu pakvamairaya ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi
analyzed: āmāsu pakvam airayaḥ ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_08.089.07.2{12} gharmaṃ na sāman tapatā suvṛktibhirjuṣṭaṃ girvaṇase bṛhat
analyzed: gharmam na sāman tapata suvṛktibhiḥ juṣṭam girvaṇase bṛhat

original: RV_08.090.01.1{13} ā no viśvāsu havya indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvāsu havyaḥ indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu

original: RV_08.090.01.2{13} upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyāḥ ṛcīṣamaḥ

original: RV_08.090.02.1{13} tvaṃ dātā prathamo rādhasāmasyasi satya īśānakṛt
analyzed: tvam dātā prathamaḥ rādhasām asyasi satyaḥ īśāna kṛt

original: RV_08.090.02.2{13} tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ
analyzed: tuvi dyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_08.090.03.1{13} brahmā ta indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā
analyzed: brahmā te indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā

original: RV_08.090.03.2{13} imā juṣasvaharyaśva yojanendra yā te amanmahi
analyzed: imā juṣasva aharyaśva yojanā indra yā te amanmahi

original: RV_08.090.04.1{13} tvaṃ hi satyo maghavannanānato vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase
analyzed: tvam hi satyaḥ maghavan anānataḥ vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase

original: RV_08.090.04.2{13} satvaṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe 'rvāñcaṃ rayimā kṛdhi
analyzed: satvam śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe rvāñcam rayimā kṛdhi

original: RV_08.090.05.1{13} tvamindra yaśā asy ṛjīṣī śavasas pate
analyzed: tvam indra yaśāḥ asi ṛjīṣī śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_08.090.05.2{13} tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi haṃsyapratīnyeka idanuttā carṣaṇīdhṛtā
analyzed: tvam vṛtrāṇi haṃsi apratīni ekaḥ id anuttā carṣaṇī dhṛtā

original: RV_08.090.06.1{13} tamu tvā nūnamasura pracetasaṃ rādho bhāgamivemahe
analyzed: tam u tvā nūnam asura pracetasam rādhaḥ bhāgam iva īmahe

original: RV_08.090.06.2{13} mahīva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā ta indra pra te sumnā no aśnavan
analyzed: mahī iva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā te indra pra te sumnā naḥ aśnavan

original: RV_08.091.01.1{14} kanyā vāravāyatī somamapi srutāvidat
analyzed: kanyā vāravāyatī somam api srutā avidat

original: RV_08.091.01.2{14} astaṃ bharantyabravīdindrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā
analyzed: astam bharantī abravīt indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā

original: RV_08.091.02.1{14} asau ya eṣi vīrako gṛhaṃ-gṛhaṃ vicākaśad
analyzed: asau yaḥ eṣi vīrakaḥ gṛhaṃgṛham vicākaśat

original: RV_08.091.02.2{14} imaṃ jambhasutaṃ piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇamapūpavantamukthinam
analyzed: imam jambha sutam piba dhānāvantam karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam

original: RV_08.091.03.1{14} ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi
analyzed: ā cana tvā cikitsāmaḥ dhi cana tvā na imasi

original: RV_08.091.03.2{14} śanairiva śanakairivendrāyendo pari srava
analyzed: śanais iva śanakais iva indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_08.091.04.1{14} kuvicchakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat
analyzed: kuvid śakat kuvid karat kuvid naḥ vasyasaḥ karat

original: RV_08.091.04.2{14} kuvit patidviṣo yatīrindreṇa saṃgamāmahai
analyzed: kuvid pati dviṣaḥ yatīḥ indreṇa saṃgamāmahai

original: RV_08.091.05.1{14} imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya
analyzed: imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tāni indra vi rohaya

original: RV_08.091.05.2{14} śirastatasyorvarāmādidaṃ ma upodare
analyzed: śiraḥ tatasya urvarā māt idam me upa udare

original: RV_08.091.06.1{14} asau ca yā na urvarādimāṃ tanvaṃ mama
analyzed: asau ca yā naḥ urvarā āt imām tanvam mama

original: RV_08.091.06.2{14} atho tatasya yacchiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi
analyzed: atha u tatasya yat śiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi

original: RV_08.091.07.1{14} khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato
analyzed: khe rathasya khe nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato

original: RV_08.091.07.2{14} apālāmindratriṣ pūtvyakṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam
analyzed: apālām indra tris pūtvī akṛṇoḥ sūrya tvacam

original: RV_08.092.01.1{15} pāntamā vo andhasa indramabhi pra gāyata
analyzed: pāntamāḥ vaḥ andhasaḥ indram abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_08.092.01.2{15} viśvāsāhaṃśatakratuṃ maṃhiṣṭhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: viśvāsāham śatakratum maṃhiṣṭham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_08.092.02.1{15} puruhūtaṃ puruṣṭutaṃ gāthānyaṃ sanaśrutam
analyzed: puruhūtam puruṣṭutam gāthānyam sana śrutam

original: RV_08.092.02.2{15} indra iti bravītana
analyzed: indraḥ iti bravītana

original: RV_08.092.03.1{15} indra in no mahānāṃ dātā vājānāṃ nṛtuḥ
analyzed: indraḥ id naḥ mahānām dātā vājānām nṛtuḥ

original: RV_08.092.03.2{15} mahānabhijñvā yamat
analyzed: mahān abhijñvā yamat

original: RV_08.092.04.1{15} apādu śipryandhasaḥ sudakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: apādu śipri andhasaḥ su dakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_08.092.04.2{15} indorindroyavāśiraḥ
analyzed: indoḥ indraḥ yava āśiraḥ

original: RV_08.092.05.1{15} taṃ vabhi prārcatendraṃ somasya pītaye
analyzed: tam vabhi prārcata indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.092.05.2{15} tadid dhyasyavardhanam
analyzed: tat id hi asya vardhanam

analyzed: asya pītvā madānām devaḥ devasya ojasā

analyzed: viśvā abhi bhuvanā bhuvat

original: RV_08.092.07.2{16} ā cyāvayasyūtaye
analyzed: ā cyāvayasi ūtaye

original: RV_08.092.08.1{16} yudhmaṃ santamanarvāṇaṃ somapāmanapacyutam
analyzed: yudhmam santam anarvāṇam soma pām an apacyutam

analyzed: naram avārya kratum

original: RV_08.092.09.2{16} avā naḥ pārye dhane
analyzed: avā naḥ pārye dhane

analyzed: atas cit indra naḥ upa ā yāhi śata vājayā

analyzed: iṣā sahasra vājayā

analyzed: ayāma dhīvataḥ dhiyaḥ rvadbhiḥ śakra godare

analyzed: jayema pṛtsu vajrivas

analyzed: vayam u tvā śatakrato gāvaḥ na yavasa iṣvā

analyzed: uktheṣu raṇayāmasi

original: RV_08.092.13.1{17} viśvā hi martyatvanānukāmā śatakrato
analyzed: viśvā hi martyatvanā anukāmā śatakrato

analyzed: aganma vajrin āśasaḥ

analyzed: na tvām indra atiricyate

analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣan saniṣṭhayā sam ghorayā dravitnvā

analyzed: dhiyā aviḍḍhi purandhyā

analyzed: tena nūnam made madeḥ

analyzed: yaḥ te citra śravastamaḥ yaḥ indra vṛtra hantamaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ ojaḥ dātamaḥ omadaḥ

analyzed: viśvāsudasma kṛṣṭiṣu

analyzed: indrāya madvane sutam pari stobhantu naḥ giraḥ

analyzed: arkam arcantu kāravaḥ

analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ

analyzed: indraṃsute havāmahe

analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

analyzed: tam id giraḥ

analyzed: ā tvā viśantu indavaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ

analyzed: na tvām indra ati ricyate

analyzed: vivyaktha mahinā vṛṣan bhakṣam somasya jāgṛve

analyzed: yaḥ indra jaṭhareṣu te

analyzed: aram aśvāya gāyati śrutakakṣaḥ aram gave

analyzed: aram indrasya dhāmne

analyzed: aram hi sma suteṣu naḥ someṣu indra bhūṣasi

analyzed: aram teśakra dāvane

analyzed: parākāt tāt cit adrivas tvām nakṣanta naḥ giraḥ

analyzed: eva hi asi vīrayuḥ eva śūraḥ uta sthiraḥ

analyzed: eva te rādhyam manaḥ

analyzed: adha cit indra me sacā

analyzed: mā u su brahmā iva tandrayuḥ bhuvaḥ vājānām pate

analyzed: matsva sutasya gomataḥ

analyzed: tvā yujā vanema tat

analyzed: tvayā id indra yujā vayam prati bruvīmahi spṛdhaḥ

analyzed: sarvān tān indra gacchasi

analyzed: dyumnīślokī sa somyaḥ

analyzed: yat indra mṛḍayāsi naḥ

original: RV_08.093.30.2{26} yadindra mṛḷayāsinaḥ

original: RV_08.093.32.2{27} upa no haribhiḥ sutam

analyzed: upa naḥ haribhiḥ sutam

analyzed: vājī dadātuvājinam
