analyzed: pibanti mitraḥ aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ

original: RV_08.094.05.2{28} triṣadhasthasya jāvataḥ
analyzed: triṣadhasthasya jāvataḥ

original: RV_08.094.06.1{28} uto nvasya joṣamānindraḥ sutasya gomataḥ
analyzed: uta u nu asya joṣamān indraḥ sutasya gomataḥ

original: RV_08.094.06.2{28} prātarhoteva matsati
analyzed: prātar hotā iva matsati

original: RV_08.094.07.1{29} kadatviṣanta sūrayastira āpa iva sridhaḥ
analyzed: kadatviṣanta sūrayaḥ tiras āpaḥ iva sridhaḥ

original: RV_08.094.07.2{29} arṣanti pūtadakṣasaḥ
analyzed: arṣanti pūta dakṣasaḥ

original: RV_08.094.08.1{29} kad vo adya mahānāṃ devānāmavo vṛṇe
analyzed: kad vaḥ adya mahānām devānām avaḥ vṛṇe

original: RV_08.094.08.2{29} tmanā ca dasmavarcasām
analyzed: tmanā ca dasma varcasām

original: RV_08.094.09.1{29} ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ
analyzed: ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ

original: RV_08.094.09.2{29} marutaḥsomapītaye
analyzed: marutaḥsoma pītaye

original: RV_08.094.10.1{29} tyān nu pūtadakṣaso divo vo maruto huve
analyzed: tyān nu pūta dakṣasaḥ divaḥ vaḥ marutaḥ huve

original: RV_08.094.10.2{29} asya somasya pītaye
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.094.11.1{29} tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhurmaruto huve
analyzed: tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhuḥ marutaḥ huve

original: RV_08.094.11.2{29} asya somasya pītaye
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.094.12.1{29} tyaṃ nu mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ giriṣṭhāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ huve
analyzed: tyam nu mārutam gaṇam giriṣṭhām vṛṣaṇam huve

original: RV_08.094.12.2{29} asyasomasya pītaye
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.095.01.1{30} ā tvā giro rathīrivāsthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā giraḥ rathīḥ iva asthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.095.01.2{30} abhi tvā samanūṣatendra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ
analyzed: abhi tvā samanūṣata indra vatsam na mātaraḥ

original: RV_08.095.02.1{30} ā tvā śukrā acucyavuḥ sutāsa indra girvaṇaḥ
analyzed: ā tvā śukrāḥ acucyavuḥ sutāsaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.095.02.2{30} pibā tvasyāndhasa indra viśvāsu te hitam
analyzed: piba tvasya andhasaḥ indra viśvāsu te hitam

original: RV_08.095.03.1{30} pibā somaṃ madāya kamindra śyenābhṛtaṃ sutam
analyzed: pibā somam madāya kam indra śyena ābhṛtam sutam

original: RV_08.095.03.2{30} tvaṃ hiśaśvatīnāṃ patī rājā viśāmasi
analyzed: tvam hi śaśvatīnām patiḥ rājā viśāmasi

original: RV_08.095.04.1{30} śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā indra yastvā saparyati
analyzed: śrudhi havam tiraścyāḥ indra yaḥ tvā saparyati

original: RV_08.095.04.2{30} suvīryasya gomato rāyas pūrdhi mahānasi
analyzed: su vīryasya gomataḥ rāyaḥ pūrdhi mahānasi

original: RV_08.095.05.1{30} indra yaste navāyasīṃ giraṃ mandrāmajījanat
analyzed: indra yaḥ te navāyasīm giram mandrām ajījanat

original: RV_08.095.05.2{30} cikitvinmanasaṃ dhiyaṃ pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm
analyzed: cikitvit manasam dhiyam pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm

original: RV_08.095.06.1{31} tamu ṣṭavāma yaṃ gira indramukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: tam u stavāma yam giraḥ indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_08.095.06.2{31} purūṇyasya pauṃsyā siṣāsanto vanāmahe
analyzed: purūṇi asya pauṃsyā siṣāsantaḥ vanāmahe

original: RV_08.095.07.1{31} eto nvindraṃ stavāma śuddhaṃ śuddhena sāmnā
analyzed: eta u nu indram stavāma śuddham śuddhena sāmnā

original: RV_08.095.07.2{31} śuddhairukthairvāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ śuddha āśīrvān mamattu
analyzed: śuddhaiḥ ukthaiḥ vāvṛdhvāṃsam śuddhaḥ āśīrvān mamattu

original: RV_08.095.08.1{31} indra śuddho na ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: indra śuddhaḥ naḥ ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.095.08.2{31} śuddho rayiṃ ni dhāraya śuddho mamaddhi somyaḥ
analyzed: śuddhaḥ rayim ni dhāraya śuddhaḥ mamaddhi somyaḥ

original: RV_08.095.09.1{31} indra śuddho hi no rayiṃ śuddho ratnāni dāśuṣe
analyzed: indra śuddhaḥ hi naḥ rayim śuddhaḥ ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.095.09.2{31} śuddho vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddho vājaṃ siṣāsasi
analyzed: śuddhaḥ vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddhaḥ vājam siṣāsasi

original: RV_08.096.01.1{32} asmā uṣāsa ātiranta yāmamindrāya naktamūrmyāḥ suvācaḥ
analyzed: asmai uṣāsaḥ ātiranta yāmam indrāya naktamūrmyāḥ su vācaḥ

original: RV_08.096.01.2{32} asmā āpo mātaraḥ sapta tasthurnṛbhyastarāya sindhavaḥ supārāḥ
analyzed: asmai āpaḥ mātaraḥ sapta tasthuḥ nṛbhyastarāya sindhavaḥ su pārāḥ

original: RV_08.096.02.1{32} atividdhā vithureṇā cidastrā triḥ sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām
analyzed: atividdhā vithureṇa cit astrā tris sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām

original: RV_08.096.02.2{32} na tad devo na martyastuturyād yāni pravṛddho vṛṣabhaścakāra
analyzed: na tat devaḥ na martyaḥ tuturyāt yāni pravṛddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ cakāra

original: RV_08.096.03.1{32} indrasya vajra āyaso nimiśla indrasya bāhvorbhūyiṣṭhamojaḥ
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ āyasaḥ nimiślaḥ indrasya bāhvoḥ bhūyiṣṭham ojaḥ

original: RV_08.096.03.2{32} śīrṣannindrasya kratavo nireka āsanneṣanta śrutyā upāke
analyzed: śīrṣan indrasya kratavaḥ nireke āsan eṣanta śrutyai upāke

original: RV_08.096.04.1{32} manye tvā yajñiyaṃ yajñiyānāṃ manye tvā cyavanamacyutānām
analyzed: manye tvā yajñiyam yajñiyānām manye tvā cyavanam acyutānām

original: RV_08.096.04.2{32} manye tvā satvanāmindra ketuṃ manye tvā vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām
analyzed: manye tvā satvanām indra ketum manye tvā vṛṣabham carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_08.096.05.1{32} ā yad vajraṃ bāhvorindra dhatse madacyutamahaye hantavāu
analyzed: ā yat vajram bāhvoḥ indra dhatse mada cyutam ahaye hantavau

original: RV_08.096.05.2{32} pra parvatā anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇo abhinakṣanta indram
analyzed: pra parvatāḥ anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇaḥ abhinakṣantaḥ indram

original: RV_08.096.06.1{33} tamu ṣṭavāma ya imā jajāna viśvā jātānyavarāṇyasmāt
analyzed: tam u stavāma yaḥ imā jajāna viśvā jātāni avarāṇi asmāt

original: RV_08.096.06.2{33} indreṇa mitraṃ didhiṣema gīrbhirupo namobhirvṛṣabhaṃ viśema
analyzed: indreṇa mitram didhiṣema gīrbhiḥ upa u namobhiḥ vṛṣabham viśema

original: RV_08.096.07.1{33} vṛtrasya tvā śvasathādīṣamāṇā viśve devā ajahurye sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: vṛtrasya tvā śvasathāt īṣamāṇāḥ viśve devāḥ ajahuḥ ye sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_08.096.07.2{33} marudbhirindra sakhyaṃ te astvathemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāsi
analyzed: marudbhiḥ indra sakhyam te astu atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāsi

original: RV_08.096.08.1{33} triḥ ṣaṣṭistvā maruto vāvṛdhānā usrā iva rāśayo yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: tris ṣaṣṭiḥ tvā marutaḥ vāvṛdhānāḥ usrāḥ iva rāśayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_08.096.08.2{33} upa tvemaḥ kṛdhi no bhāgadheyaṃ śuṣmaṃ ta enā haviṣā vidhema
analyzed: upa tvā imaḥ kṛdhi naḥ bhāgadheyam śuṣmam te enā haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_08.096.09.1{33} tigmamāyudhaṃ marutāmanīkaṃ kasta indra prati vajraṃ dadharṣa
analyzed: tigmam āyudham marutām anīkam kaḥ te indra prati vajram dadharṣa

original: RV_08.096.09.2{33} anāyudhāso asurā adevāścakreṇa tānapa vapa ṛjīṣin
analyzed: an āyudhāsaḥ asurāḥ a devāḥ cakreṇa tān apa vapa ṛjīṣin

original: RV_08.096.10.1{33} maha ugrāya tavase suvṛktiṃ preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ
analyzed: mahe ugrāya tavase suvṛktim preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ

original: RV_08.096.10.2{33} girvāhase gira indrāya pūrvīrdhehi tanve kuvidaṅga vedat
analyzed: gir vāhase giraḥ indrāya pūrvīḥ dhehi tanve kuvid aṅga vedat

original: RV_08.096.11.1{34} ukthavāhase vibhve manīṣāṃ druṇā na pāramīrayā nadīnām
analyzed: uktha vāhase vibhve manīṣām druṇā na pāram īraya nadīnām

original: RV_08.096.11.2{34} ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvidaṅga vedat
analyzed: ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvidaṅga vedat

original: RV_08.096.12.1{34} tad viviḍḍhi yat ta indro jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutiṃ namasāvivāsa
analyzed: tat viviḍḍhi yat te indraḥ jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutim namasā āvivāsa

original: RV_08.096.12.2{34} upa bhūṣa jaritarmā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvayā vācaṃ kuvidaṅga vedat
analyzed: upa bhūṣa jaritar mā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvaya vācam kuvidaṅga vedat

original: RV_08.096.13.1{34} ava drapso aṃśumatīmatiṣṭhadiyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ
analyzed: ava drapsaḥ aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhat iyānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ

original: RV_08.096.13.2{34} āvat tamindraḥ śacyā dhamantamapa snehitīrnṛmaṇā adhatta
analyzed: āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīḥ nṛmaṇāḥ adhatta

original: RV_08.096.14.1{34} drapsamapaśyaṃ viṣuṇe carantamupahvare nadyo aṃśumatyāḥ
analyzed: drapsam apaśyam viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyaḥ aṃśumatyāḥ

original: RV_08.096.14.2{34} nabho na kṛṣṇamavatasthivāṃsamiṣyāmi vo vṛṣaṇo yudhyatājau
analyzed: nabhaḥ na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yudhyata ājau

original: RV_08.096.15.1{34} adha drapso aṃśumatyā upasthe 'dhārayat tanvaṃ titviṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: adha drapsaḥ aṃśumatyāḥ upasthe dhārayat tanvam titviṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_08.096.15.2{34} viśo adevīrabhyācarantīrbṛhaspatinā yujendraḥ sasāhe
analyzed: viśaḥ adevīḥ abhyācarantīḥ bṛhaspatinā yujā indraḥ sasāhe

original: RV_08.096.16.1{35} tvaṃ ha tyat saptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrurindra
analyzed: tvam ha tyad saptabhyaḥ jāyamānaḥ śatrubhyaḥ abhavaḥ śatruḥ indra

original: RV_08.096.16.2{35} gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anvavindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo raṇaṃ dhāḥ
analyzed: gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anvavindaḥ vibhumadbhyaḥ bhuvanebhyaḥ raṇam dhāḥ

original: RV_08.096.17.1{35} tvaṃ ha tyadapratimānamojo vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣito jaghantha
analyzed: tvam ha tyad a pratimānam ojaḥ vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣitaḥ jaghantha

original: RV_08.096.17.2{35} tvaṃ śuṣṇasyāvātiro vadhatraistvaṃ gā indra śacyedavindaḥ
analyzed: tvam śuṣṇasya avātiraḥ vadhatraiḥ tvam gāḥ indra śacyā id avindaḥ

original: RV_08.096.18.1{35} tvaṃ ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnāṃ ghano vṛtrānāṃ taviṣobabhūtha
analyzed: tvam ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām ghanaḥ vṛtrānām taviṣaḥ ubabhūtha

original: RV_08.096.18.2{35} tvaṃ sindhūnrasṛjastastabhānān tvamapo ajayodāsapatnīḥ
analyzed: tvam sindhūn rasṛjaḥ stastabhānān tvam apaḥ ajayaḥ udāsa patnīḥ

original: RV_08.096.19.1{35} sa sukratū raṇitā yaḥ suteṣvanuttamanyuryo aheva revān
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ raṇitā yaḥ suteṣu anutta manyuḥ yaḥ ahā iva revān

original: RV_08.096.19.2{35} ya eka in naryapāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā pratīdanyamāhuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id narya apāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā pratīdanyam āhuḥ

original: RV_08.096.20.1{35} sa vṛtrahendraścarṣaṇīdhṛt taṃ suṣṭutyā havyaṃ huvema
analyzed: sa vṛtrahā indraḥ carṣaṇī dhṛt tam suṣṭutyā havyam huvema

original: RV_08.096.20.2{35} sa prāvitā maghavā no 'dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasyadātā
analyzed: sa prāvitā maghavā naḥ dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasya dātā

original: RV_08.096.21.1{35} sa vṛtrahendra ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūva
analyzed: sa vṛtrahā indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyas jajñānaḥ havyaḥ babhūva

original: RV_08.096.21.2{35} kṛṇvannapāṃsi naryā purūṇi somo na pīto havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ
analyzed: kṛṇvan napāṃsi naryā purūṇi somaḥ na pītaḥ havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_08.097.01.1{36} yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarvānasurebhyaḥ
analyzed: yāḥ indra bhujaḥ ābharaḥ svarvān asurebhyaḥ

original: RV_08.097.01.2{36} stotāramin maghavannasya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: stotāram id maghavan asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_08.097.02.1{36} yamindra dadhiṣe tvamaśvaṃ gāṃ bhāgamavyayam
analyzed: yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvam gām bhāgam avyayam

original: RV_08.097.02.2{36} yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṃ dhehi mā paṇau
analyzed: yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin tam dhehi mā paṇau

original: RV_08.097.03.1{36} ya indra sastyavrato 'nuṣvāpamadevayuḥ
analyzed: yaḥ indra sastya vrataḥ nuṣva apama devayuḥ

original: RV_08.097.03.2{36} svaiḥ ṣa evairmumurat poṣyaṃ rayiṃ sanutardhehi taṃ tataḥ
analyzed: svaiḥ saḥ evaiḥ mumurat poṣyam rayim sanutardhehi tam tatas

original: RV_08.097.04.1{36} yacchakrāsi parāvati yadarvāvati vṛtrahan
analyzed: yat śakra asi parāvati yat arvāvati vṛtrahan

original: RV_08.097.04.2{36} atastvā gīrbhirdyugadindra keśibhiḥ sutāvānā vivāsati
analyzed: atas tvā gīrbhiḥ dyugat indra keśibhiḥ sutāvānā vivāsati

original: RV_08.097.05.1{36} yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi
analyzed: yat vā asi rocane divaḥ samudrasya adhi viṣṭapi

original: RV_08.097.05.2{36} yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yadantarikṣa ā gahi
analyzed: yat pārthive sadane vṛtra hantama yat antarikṣe ā gahi

original: RV_08.097.06.1{37} sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate
analyzed: sa naḥ someṣu soma pāḥ suteṣu śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_08.097.06.2{37} mādayasva rādasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā
analyzed: mādayasva rādasā sūnṛtāvatā indra rāyā parīṇasā

original: RV_08.097.07.1{37} mā na indra parā vṛṇag bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ indra parā vṛṇak bhava naḥ sadhamādyaḥ

original: RV_08.097.07.2{37} tvaṃ na ūtī tvamin na āpyaṃ mā na indra parā vṛṇak
analyzed: tvam naḥ ūtī tvam id naḥ āpyam mā naḥ indra parā vṛṇak

original: RV_08.097.08.1{37} asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu
analyzed: asme indra sacā sute ni sada pītaye madhu

original: RV_08.097.08.2{37} kṛdhī jaritremaghavannavo mahadasme indra sacā sute
analyzed: kṛdhi jaritre maghavan avaḥ mahat asme indra sacā sute

original: RV_08.097.09.1{37} na tvā devāsa āśata na martyāso adrivaḥ
analyzed: na tvā devāsaḥ āśata na martyāsaḥ adrivas

original: RV_08.097.09.2{37} viśvā jātāniśavasābhibhūrasi na tvā devāsa āśata
analyzed: viśvā jātāni śavasā abhibhūḥ asi na tvā devāsaḥ āśata

original: RV_08.097.10.1{37} viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṃ naraṃ sajūstatakṣurindraṃjajanuśca rājase
analyzed: viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ abhibhūtaram naram sajūs tatakṣuḥ indram jajanuḥ ca rājase

original: RV_08.097.10.2{37} kratvā varuṣṭhaṃ vara āmurimutogramojiṣṭhaṃ tavasaṃ tarasvinam
analyzed: kratvā varuṣṭham vare āmurim uta ugram ojiṣṭham tavasam tarasvinam

original: RV_08.097.11.1{38} samīṃ rebhāso asvarannindraṃ somasya pītaye
analyzed: samīm rebhāsaḥ asvaran indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_08.097.11.2{38} svarpatiṃyadīṃ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hyojasā samūtibhiḥ
analyzed: svarpatiṃyadīm vṛdhe dhṛtavrataḥ hi ojasā samūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.097.12.1{38} nemiṃ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṃ viprā abhisvarā
analyzed: nemim namanti cakṣasā meṣam viprāḥ abhisvarā

original: RV_08.097.12.2{38} sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ
analyzed: su dītayaḥ vaḥ adruhaḥ pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_08.097.13.1{38} tamindraṃ johavīmi maghavānamugraṃ satrā dadhānamapratiṣkutaṃ śavāṃsi
analyzed: tam indram johavīmi maghavānam ugram satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutam śavāṃsi

original: RV_08.097.13.2{38} maṃhiṣṭho gīrbhirā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā supathā kṛṇotu vajrī
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhaḥ gīrbhirā ca yajñiyaḥ vavartat rāye naḥ viśvā su pathā kṛṇotu vajrī

original: RV_08.097.14.1{38} tvaṃ pura indra cikidenā vyojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai
analyzed: tvam puras indra vyojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai

original: RV_08.097.14.2{38} tvad viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā
analyzed: tvat viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā

original: RV_08.097.15.1{38} tan ma ṛtamindra śūra citra pātvapo na vajrin duritāti parṣi bhūri
analyzed: tat me ṛtam indra śūra citra pātu apaḥ na vajrin duritā ati parṣi bhūri

original: RV_08.097.15.2{38} kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyerviśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan
analyzed: kadā naḥ indra rāyaḥ ā daśasyeḥ viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan

original: RV_08.098.01.1{01} indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat
analyzed: indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat

original: RV_08.098.01.2{01} dharmakṛte vipaścite panasyave
analyzed: dharma kṛte vipaścite panasyave

original: RV_08.098.02.1{01} tvamindrābhibhūrasi tvaṃ sūryamarocayaḥ
analyzed: tvam indra abhibhūḥ asi tvam sūryam arocayaḥ

original: RV_08.098.02.2{01} viśvakarmā viśvadevo mahānasi
analyzed: viśvakarmā viśva devaḥ mahān asi

original: RV_08.098.03.1{01} vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svaragacho rocanaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: vibhrājam jyotiṣā svara gachaḥ rocanam divaḥ

original: RV_08.098.03.2{01} devāsta indra sakhyāya yemire
analyzed: devāḥ te indra sakhyāya yemire

original: RV_08.098.04.1{01} endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājidagohyaḥ
analyzed: ā indra naḥ gadhi priyaḥ satrājit agohyaḥ

original: RV_08.098.04.2{01} girirna viśvataspṛthuḥ patirdivaḥ
analyzed: giriḥ na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_08.098.05.1{01} abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī
analyzed: abhi hi satya soma pāḥ ubhe babhūtha rodasī

original: RV_08.098.05.2{01} indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patirdivaḥ
analyzed: indra asi sunvataḥ vṛdhaḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_08.098.06.1{01} tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnāmindra dartā purāmasi
analyzed: tvam hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi

original: RV_08.098.06.2{01} hantā dasyormanorvṛdhaḥ patirdivaḥ
analyzed: hantā dasyoḥ manoḥ vṛdhaḥ patiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_08.098.07.1{02} adhā hindra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe
analyzed: adha hi indra girvaṇaḥ upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe

original: RV_08.098.07.2{02} udevayanta udabhiḥ
analyzed: udevayantaḥ udabhiḥ

original: RV_08.098.08.1{02} vārṇa tvā yavyābhirvardhanti śūra brahmāṇi
analyzed: vārṇa tvā yavyābhiḥ vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi

original: RV_08.098.08.2{02} vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ cidadrivo dive-dive
analyzed: vāvṛdhvāṃsam cit adrivas dive dive

original: RV_08.098.09.1{02} yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge
analyzed: yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayā urau rathe uru yuge

original: RV_08.098.09.2{02} indravāhā vacoyujā
analyzed: indra vāhā vacaḥ yujā

original: RV_08.098.10.1{02} tvaṃ na indrā bharanojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra ā bharan ojaḥ nṛmṇam śatakrato vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_08.098.10.2{02} ā vīraṃ pṛtanāṣaham
analyzed: ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham

original: RV_08.098.11.1{02} tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvaṃ mātā śatakrato babhūvitha
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha

original: RV_08.098.11.2{02} adhā te sumnamīmahe
analyzed: adhā te sumnamīmahe

original: RV_08.098.12.1{02} tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantamupa bruve śatakrato
analyzed: tvām śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato

original: RV_08.098.12.2{02} sa norāsva suvīryam
analyzed: sa naḥ urāsva su vīryam

original: RV_08.099.01.1{03} tvāmidā hyo naro 'pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ
analyzed: tvāmidāḥ hyas naraḥ pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_08.099.01.2{03} sa indra stomavāhasāmiha śrudhyupa svasaramā gahi
analyzed: saḥ indra stoma vāhasām iha śrudhi upa svasaramā gahi

original: RV_08.099.02.1{03} matsvā suśipra harivastadīmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ
analyzed: matsva su śipra harivastadīmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_08.099.02.2{03} tava śravāṃsyupamānyukthyā suteṣvindra girvaṇaḥ
analyzed: tava śravāṃsi upamāni ukthyā suteṣu indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_08.099.03.1{03} śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśvedindrasya bhakṣata
analyzed: śrāyantaḥ iva sūryam viśve dindrasya bhakṣata

original: RV_08.099.03.2{03} vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima
analyzed: vasūni jāte janamāne ojasā prati bhāgam na dīdhima

original: RV_08.099.04.1{03} anarśarātiṃ vasudāmupa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ
analyzed: anarśarātim vasu dām upa stuhi bhadrāḥ indrasya rātayaḥ

original: RV_08.099.04.2{03} so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan
analyzed: saḥ asya kāmam vidhataḥ na roṣati manaḥ dānāya codayan

original: RV_08.099.05.1{03} tvamindra pratūrtiṣvabhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ
analyzed: tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_08.099.05.2{03} aśastihā janitā viśvatūrasi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ
analyzed: aśasti hā janitā viśvatūrasi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ

original: RV_08.099.06.1{03} anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantamīyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā
analyzed: anu te śuṣmam turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśum na mātarā

original: RV_08.099.06.2{03} viśvāste spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yadindratūrvasi
analyzed: viśvāḥ te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtram yat indratūrvasi

original: RV_08.099.07.1{03} ita ūtī vo ajaraṃ prahetāramaprahitam
analyzed: itas ūtī vaḥ ajaram prahetāram a prahitam

original: RV_08.099.07.2{03} āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamamatūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham
analyzed: āśum jetāram hetāram rathītamam atūrtam tugryāvṛdham

original: RV_08.099.08.1{03} iṣkartāramaniṣkṛtaṃ sahaskṛtaṃ śatamūtiṃ śatakratum
analyzed: iṣkartāram aniṣkṛtam sahaskṛtam śatamūtim śatakratum

original: RV_08.099.08.2{03} samānamindramavase havāmahe vasavānaṃ vasūjuvam
analyzed: samānam indram avase havāmahe vasavānam vasūjuvam

original: RV_08.100.01.1{04} ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt
analyzed: ayam te emi tanvā purastāt viśve devāḥ abhi mā yanti paścāt

original: RV_08.100.01.2{04} yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāgamindrādin mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi
analyzed: yadā mahyam dīdharaḥ bhāgam indra adit mayā kṛṇavaḥ vīryāṇi

original: RV_08.100.02.1{04} dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣamagre hitaste bhāgaḥ suto astu somaḥ
analyzed: dadhāmi te madhunaḥ bhakṣam agre hitaḥ te bhāgaḥ sutaḥ astu somaḥ

original: RV_08.100.02.2{04} asaśca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇijaṅghanāva bhūri
analyzed: asaḥ ca tvam dakṣiṇatas sakhā me dhāḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri

original: RV_08.100.03.1{04} pra su stomaṃ bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyamasti
analyzed: pra su stomam bharata vājayantaḥ indrāya satyam yadi satyam asti

original: RV_08.100.03.2{04} nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa kamabhiṣṭavāma
analyzed: na indraḥ asti iti nemaḥ u tve āha kaḥ īm dadarśa kam abhiṣṭavāma

original: RV_08.100.04.1{04} ayamasmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātānyabhyasmi mahnā
analyzed: ayam asmi jaritar paśya mā iha viśvā jātāni abhi asmi mahnā

original: RV_08.100.04.2{04} ṛtasya mā pradiśo vardhayantyādardiro bhuvanā dardarīmi
analyzed: ṛtasya mā pradiśaḥ vardhayanti ādardiraḥ bhuvanā dardarīmi

original: RV_08.100.05.1{04} ā yan mā venā aruhannṛtasyanekamāsīnaṃ haryatasya pṛṣṭhe
analyzed: ā yat mā venāḥ āsīnam haryatasya pṛṣṭhe

original: RV_08.100.05.2{04} manaścin me hṛda ā pratyavocadacikradañchiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ cit me hṛde ā pratyavocat acikradan śiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_08.100.06.1{04} viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavannindra sunvate
analyzed: viśvā id tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavan indra sunvate

original: RV_08.100.06.2{04} pārāvataṃ yat purusambhṛtaṃ vasvapāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣibandhave
analyzed: pārāvatam yat puru sambhṛtam vasu apāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣi bandhave

original: RV_08.100.07.1{05} pra nūnaṃ dhāvatā pṛthaṃ neha yo vo avāvarīt
analyzed: pra nūnam dhāvata pṛtham na iha yaḥ vaḥ avāvarīt

original: RV_08.100.07.2{05} ni ṣīṃ vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajramindro apīpatat
analyzed: ni sīm vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajram indraḥ apīpatat

original: RV_08.100.08.1{05} manojavā ayamāna āyasīmatarat puram
analyzed: manaḥ javāḥ ayamānaḥ āyasīm atarat puram

original: RV_08.100.08.2{05} divaṃ suparṇo gatvāya somaṃ vajriṇa ābharat
analyzed: divam suparṇaḥ gatvāya somam vajriṇe ābharat

original: RV_08.100.09.1{05} samudre antaḥ śayata udnā vajro abhīvṛtaḥ
analyzed: samudre antar śayate udnā vajraḥ abhīvṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.100.09.2{05} bharantyasmaisaṃyataḥ puraḥprasravaṇā balim
analyzed: bharanti asmai saṃyataḥ puras prasravaṇāḥ balim

original: RV_08.100.10.1{05} yad vāg vadantyavicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānāṃ niṣasādamandrā
analyzed: yat vāc vadantī avicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānām niṣasāda mandrā

original: RV_08.100.10.2{05} catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svidasyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma
analyzed: catasraḥ ūrjam duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramam jagāma

original: RV_08.100.11.1{05} devīṃ vācamajanayanta devāstāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti
analyzed: devīm vācam ajanayanta devāḥ tām viśva rūpāḥ paśavaḥ vadanti

original: RV_08.100.11.2{05} sā no mandreṣamūrjaṃ duhānā dhenurvāgasmānupa suṣṭutaitu
analyzed: sā naḥ mandrā iṣam ūrjam duhānā dhenuḥ vāc asmān upa suṣṭutā etu

original: RV_08.100.12.1{05} sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva dyaurdehi lokaṃ vajrāya viṣkabhe
analyzed: sakhe viṣṇo vitaram vi kramasva dyauḥ dehi lokam vajrāya viṣkabhe

original: RV_08.100.12.2{05} hanāva vṛtraṃ riṇacāva sindhūnindrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: hanāva vṛtram riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_08.101.01.1{06} ṛdhagitthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye
analyzed: ṛdhak itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye

original: RV_08.101.01.2{06} yo nūnaṃ mitrāvaruṇāvabhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye
analyzed: yaḥ nūnam mitrāvaruṇau abhiṣṭaye ācakre havya dātaye

original: RV_08.101.02.1{06} varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā
analyzed: varṣiṣṭha kṣatrau uru cakṣasā narā rājānā dīrgha śruttamā

original: RV_08.101.02.2{06} tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_08.101.03.1{06} pra yo vāṃ mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat
analyzed: pra yaḥ vām mitrāvaruṇā ajiraḥ dūtaḥ adravat

original: RV_08.101.03.2{06} ayaḥśīrṣā maderaghuḥ
analyzed: ayaḥ śīrṣā maderaghuḥ

original: RV_08.101.04.1{06} na yaḥ sampṛche na punarhavītave nasaṃvādāya ramate
analyzed: na yaḥ sampṛcche na punarhavītave na saṃvādāya ramate

original: RV_08.101.04.2{06} tasmān no adya samṛteruruṣyataṃ bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam
analyzed: tasmāt naḥ adya samṛteḥ uruṣyatam bāhubhyām naḥ uruṣyatam

original: RV_08.101.05.1{06} pra mitrāya prāryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso
analyzed: pra mitrāya pra aryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso

original: RV_08.101.05.2{06} varūthyaṃ varuṇe chandyaṃ vaca stotraṃ rājasu gāyata
analyzed: varūthyam varuṇe chandyam vacaḥ stotram rājasu gāyata

original: RV_08.101.06.1{07} te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasvekaṃ putraṃ tisṝṇām
analyzed: te hinvire aruṇam jenyam vasu ekam putram tisṝṇām

original: RV_08.101.06.2{07} tedhāmānyamṛtā martyānāmadabdhā abhi cakṣate
analyzed: tedhāmāni amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate

original: RV_08.101.07.1{07} ā me vacāṃsyudyatā dyumattamāni kartvā
analyzed: ā me vacāṃsi udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā

original: RV_08.101.07.2{07} ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye
analyzed: ubhā yātam nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_08.101.08.1{07} rātiṃ yad vāmarakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū
analyzed: rātim yat vāmarakṣasam havāmahe yuvābhyām vājinīvasū

original: RV_08.101.08.2{07} prācīṃ hotrāṃ pratirantāvitaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā
analyzed: prācīm hotrām pratirantau itam narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā

original: RV_08.101.09.1{07} ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam divispṛśam vāyo yāhi su manmabhiḥ

original: RV_08.101.09.2{07} antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te
analyzed: antar pavitre upari śrīṇānaḥ yam śukraḥ ayāmi te

original: RV_08.101.10.1{07} vetyadhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye
analyzed: veti adhvaryuḥ pathibhiḥ rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye

original: RV_08.101.10.2{07} adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram
analyzed: adha niyutvas ubhayasya naḥ piba śucim somam gavāśiram

original: RV_08.101.11.1{08} baṇ mahānasi sūrya baḷ āditya mahānasi
analyzed: baṭ mahānasi sūrya baṭ āditya mahānasi

original: RV_08.101.11.2{08} mahaste sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahānasi
analyzed: mahaḥ te sataḥ mahimā panasyate ddhā deva mahān asi

original: RV_08.101.12.1{08} baṭ surya śravasā mahānasi satrā deva mahānasi
analyzed: baṭ surya śravasā mahānasi satrā deva mahānasi

original: RV_08.101.12.2{08} mahnādevānāmasuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotiradābhyam
analyzed: mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohitaḥ vibhu jyotiḥ adābhyam

original: RV_08.101.13.1{08} iyaṃ yā nīcyarkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā
analyzed: iyam yā nīcī arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā

original: RV_08.101.13.2{08} citreva pratyadarśyāyatyantardaśasu bāhuṣu
analyzed: citrā iva pratyadarśyā āyatī antar daśasu bāhuṣu

original: RV_08.101.14.1{08} prajā ha tisro atyāyamīyurnyanyā arkamabhito viviśre
analyzed: prajāḥ ha tisraḥ atyāyam īyuḥ ni anyāḥ arkam abhitas viviśre

original: RV_08.101.14.2{08} bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣvantaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa
analyzed: bṛhat ha tasthau bhuvaneṣu antar pavamānaḥ haritaḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_08.101.15.1{08} mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānāmamṛtasya nābhiḥ
analyzed: mātā rudrāṇām duhitā vasūnām svasā ādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_08.101.15.2{08} pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gāmanāgāmaditiṃ vadhiṣṭa
analyzed: pra nu vocam cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditim vadhiṣṭa

original: RV_08.101.16.1{08} vacovidaṃ vācamudīrayantīṃ viśvābhirdhībhirupatiṣṭhamānām
analyzed: vacaḥ vidam vācam udīrayantīm viśvābhiḥ dhībhiḥ upatiṣṭhamānām

original: RV_08.101.16.2{08} devīṃ devebhyaḥ paryeyuṣīṃ gāmā māvṛkta martyo dabhracetāḥ
analyzed: devīm devebhyaḥ paryeyuṣīm gām ā mā avṛkta martyaḥ dabhra cetāḥ

original: RV_08.102.01.1{09} tvamagne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe
analyzed: tvam agne bṛhat vayaḥ dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe

original: RV_08.102.01.2{09} kavirgṛhapatiryuvā
analyzed: kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_08.102.02.1{09} sa na īḷānayā saha devānagne duvasyuvā
analyzed: sa naḥ īḍānayā saha devān agne duvasyuvā

original: RV_08.102.02.2{09} cikid vibhānavā vaha
analyzed: cikit vibhānavā vaha

original: RV_08.102.03.1{09} tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya
analyzed: tvayā ha svid yujā vayam codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_08.102.03.2{09} abhi ṣmovājasātaye
analyzed: abhi sma u vājasātaye

original: RV_08.102.04.1{09} aurvabhṛguvacchucimapnavānavadā huve
analyzed: aurva bhṛguvat śuci mapnavāna vadāḥ huve

original: RV_08.102.04.2{09} agniṃ samudravāsasam
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_08.102.05.1{09} huve vātasvanaṃ kaviṃ parjanyakrandyaṃ sahaḥ
analyzed: huve vāta svanam kavim parjanya krandyam sahaḥ

original: RV_08.102.05.2{09} agniṃ samudravāsasam
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_08.102.06.1{10} ā savaṃ savituryathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve
analyzed: ā savam savituḥ yathā bhagasya iva bhujim huve

original: RV_08.102.06.2{10} agniṃ samudravāsasam
analyzed: agnim samudra vāsasam

original: RV_08.102.07.1{10} agniṃ vo vṛdhantamadhvarāṇāṃ purūtamam
analyzed: agnim vaḥ vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam

original: RV_08.102.07.2{10} achā naptre sahasvate
analyzed: achā naptre sahasvate

original: RV_08.102.08.1{10} ayaṃ yathā na ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpeva takṣyā
analyzed: ayam yathā naḥ ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpā iva takṣyā

original: RV_08.102.08.2{10} asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ
analyzed: asya kratvā yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_08.102.09.1{10} ayaṃ viśvā abhi śriyo 'gnirdeveṣu patyate
analyzed: ayam viśvāḥ abhi śriyaḥ gniḥ deveṣu patyate

original: RV_08.102.09.2{10} ā vājairupa no gamat
analyzed: ā vājaiḥ upa naḥ gamat

original: RV_08.102.10.1{10} viśveṣāmiha stuhi hotṝṇāṃ yaśastamam
analyzed: viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇām yaśastamam

original: RV_08.102.10.2{10} agniṃ yajñeṣupūrvyam
analyzed: agnim yajñeṣupūrvyam

original: RV_08.102.11.1{11} śīraṃ pāvakaśociṣaṃ jyeṣṭho yo dameṣvā
analyzed: śīram pāvaka śociṣam jyeṣṭhaḥ yaḥ dama iṣvā

original: RV_08.102.11.2{11} dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ
analyzed: dīdāya dīrghaśruttamaḥ

original: RV_08.102.12.1{11} tamarvantaṃ na sānasiṃ gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam
analyzed: tam arvantam na sānasim gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam

original: RV_08.102.12.2{11} mitraṃna yātayajjanam
analyzed: mitraṃna yātayat janam

original: RV_08.102.13.1{11} upa tvā jāmayo giro dediśatīrhaviṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: upa tvā jāmayaḥ giraḥ dediśatīḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_08.102.13.2{11} vāyoranīkeasthiran
analyzed: vāyoḥ anīke asthiran

original: RV_08.102.14.1{11} yasya tridhātvavṛtaṃ barhistasthāvasandinam
analyzed: yasya tri dhātu avṛtam barhiḥ tasthau asat dinam

original: RV_08.102.c“.ê{ā@}i dadhā padaāÅ`
analyzed: dadhā padaā

original: RV_08.102.15.1{11} padaṃ devasya mīḷhuṣo 'nādhṛṣṭābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: padam devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ na adhṛṣṭābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_08.102.15.2{11} bhadrāsūrya ivopadṛk
analyzed: bhadrāsūryaḥ iva upadṛś

original: RV_08.102.16.1{12} agne ghṛtasya dhītibhistepāno deva śociṣā
analyzed: agne ghṛtasya dhītibhiḥ tepānaḥ deva śociṣā

original: RV_08.102.16.2{12} ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca
analyzed: ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: RV_08.102.17.1{12} taṃ tvājananta mātaraḥ kaviṃ devāso aṅgiraḥ
analyzed: tam tvā ajananta mātaraḥ kavim devāsaḥ aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_08.102.17.2{12} havyavāhamamartyam
analyzed: havyavāham amartyam

original: RV_08.102.18.1{12} pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam
analyzed: pracetasam tvā kave gne dūtam vareṇyam

original: RV_08.102.18.2{12} havyavāhaṃ ni ṣedire
analyzed: havyavāham ni sedire

original: RV_08.102.19.1{12} nahi me astyaghnyā na svadhitirvananvati
analyzed: nahi me asti aghnyā na svadhitiḥ vananvati

original: RV_08.102.19.2{12} athaitādṛg bharāmi te
analyzed: atha etādṛś bharāmi te

original: RV_08.102.20.1{12} yadagne kāni kāni cidā te dārūṇi dadhmasi
analyzed: yat agne kāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi

original: RV_08.102.20.2{12} tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya
analyzed: tā juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_08.102.21.1{12} yadattyupajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati
analyzed: yat atti upajihvikā yat vamraḥ atisarpati

original: RV_08.102.21.2{12} sarvaṃ tadastu te ghṛtam
analyzed: sarvam tat astu te ghṛtam

original: RV_08.102.22.1{12} agnimindhāno manasā dhiyaṃ saceta martyaḥ
analyzed: agnim indhānaḥ manasā dhiyam saceta martyaḥ

original: RV_08.102.22.2{12} agnimīdhe vivasvabhiḥ
analyzed: agnim īdhe vivasvabhiḥ

original: RV_08.103.01.1{13} adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratānyādadhuḥ
analyzed: adarśi gātu vittamaḥ yasmin vratāni ādadhuḥ

original: RV_08.103.01.2{13} upo ṣu jātamāryasya vardhanamagniṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ
analyzed: upa u su jātam āryasya vardhanam agnim nakṣanta naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_08.103.02.1{13} pra daivodāso agnirdevānachā na majmanā
analyzed: pra daivodāsaḥ agniḥ devān achā na majmanā

original: RV_08.103.02.2{13} anu mātarampṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi
analyzed: anu mātarampṛthivīm vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi

original: RV_08.103.03.1{13} yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaścarkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ
analyzed: yasmāt rejanta kṛṣṭayaḥ carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ

original: RV_08.103.03.2{13} sahasrasāmmedhasātāviva tmanāgniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata
analyzed: sahasra sām medha sātau iva tmanā agnim dhībhiḥ saparyata

original: RV_08.103.04.1{13} pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yaste vaso dāśat
analyzed: pra yam rāye ninīṣasi martaḥ yaḥ te vaso dāśat

original: RV_08.103.04.2{13} sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam
analyzed: sa vīram dhatte agne uktha śaṃsinam tmanā sahasra poṣiṇam

original: RV_08.103.05.1{13} sa dṛḷhe cidabhi tṛṇatti vājamarvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ
analyzed: sa dṛḷhe cit abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_08.103.05.2{13} tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi
analyzed: tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi

original: RV_08.103.06.1{14} yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandraḥ janānām

original: RV_08.103.06.2{14} madhorna pātrā prathamānyasmai pra stomā yantyagnaye
analyzed: madhoḥ na pātrā prathamāni asmai pra stomāḥ yanti agnaye

original: RV_08.103.07.1{14} aśvaṃ na gīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ
analyzed: aśvam na gīrbhiḥ rathyam sudānavaḥ marmṛjyante devayavaḥ

original: RV_08.103.07.2{14} ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām
analyzed: ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_08.103.08.1{14} pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukraśociṣe
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukra śociṣe

original: RV_08.103.08.2{14} upastutāso agnaye
analyzed: upastutāsaḥ agnaye

original: RV_08.103.09.1{14} ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravad yaśaḥ samiddho dyumnyāhutaḥ
analyzed: ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravat yaśaḥ samiddhaḥ dyumnya āhutaḥ

original: RV_08.103.09.2{14} kuvin no asya sumatirnavīyasyachā vājebhirāgamat
analyzed: kuvid naḥ asya sumatiḥ navīyasī achā vājebhiḥ āgamat

original: RV_08.103.10.1{14} preṣṭhamu priyāṇāṃ stuhyāsāvātithim
analyzed: preṣṭham u priyāṇām stuhi asau ātithim

original: RV_08.103.10.2{14} agniṃ rathānāṃ yamam
analyzed: agnim rathānām yamam

original: RV_08.103.11.1{15} uditā yo niditā veditā vasvā yajñiyo vavartati
analyzed: uditā yaḥ niditā veditā vasvā yajñiyaḥ vavartati

original: RV_08.103.11.2{15} duṣṭarā yasya pravaṇe normayo dhiyā vājaṃ siṣāsataḥ
analyzed: duṣṭarāḥ yasya pravaṇe na ūrmayaḥ dhiyā vājam siṣāsataḥ

original: RV_08.103.12.1{15} mā no hṛṇītāmatithirvasuragniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ hṛṇītām atithiḥ vasuḥ agniḥ puru praśastaḥ eṣaḥ

original: RV_08.103.12.2{15} yaḥ suhotā svadhvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ su hotā su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_08.103.13.1{15} mo te riṣan ye achoktibhirvaso 'gne kebhiścidevaiḥ
analyzed: mā u te riṣan ye achoktibhiḥ vaso gne kebhiścid devaiḥ

original: RV_08.103.13.2{15} kīriścid dhi tvāmīṭṭe dūtyāya rātahavyaḥ svadhvaraḥ
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvāmīṭṭe dūtyāya rāta havyaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_08.103.14.1{15} āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye
analyzed: ā agne yāhi marut sakhā rudrebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_08.103.14.2{15} sobharyā upa suṣṭutiṃ mādayasva svarṇare
analyzed: sobharyai upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare
